text: Moshe ne Arone bakavua bamane kuenza bishima bia bungi, mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu mutangile

Haleha bidimu bisatu nuenu nempatule tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso biakakumbana tshidimu atshi, nenutshiteke ku mbelu kuenu; ne Bena Lewi, bualu bua bobo kabena ne tshituha anyi buhianyi kunudi, ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi ku mbelu kuenu nebalue, nebadie, nebukute; nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Nebadinyemene benda basakilangane, bu badi banyema mvita, kadi kakuyi muntu Udi ubipata

Kukumi mutshima webe ku mukashi wa mukuenu, anyi ku nsubu wa mukuenu, anyi ku budimi buandi, anyi ku muhika wandi mulume anyi ku muhika wandi mukashi, anyi ku ngombe wandi anyi ku mpunda wandi anyi ku tshintu tshionso tshia mukuenu
Nanku, makopu onsu dikumi ne abidi avua ne bujitu bua grame
Bana ba balume ba Pedaya: Zelubabela ne Shimei
Bimenga abi, bivua makumi asambombu, bivua mu buloba bua Argobe, mu ditunga dia Bashane, muaba uvua mukalenga Oge ne bumfumu

Binuasangana disua dia nyunyu mu nshila ku mutshi anyi ha buloba, ne bana ba nyunyu anyi makela bidimu, ne mukashi wa nyunyu udi ushikama ha bana anyi ha makela, kanuangatshi mukashi wa nyunyu ne bana bandi kabidi; nulekele mukashi wa nyunyu tshianana, kadi nudi mua kudiangatshila bana ba nyunyu; nunku malu enu neikale mimpe, nenuvudishe matuku enu
Abrahame kupesha Izake bia bumpianyi bionsu bivuaye nabi

Nakangata bualu bubi bunuakenza, kana ka ngombe mene, nakakosha ne kahia, nakakadiata munda mua dikasa, nakakabotesha bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba: nakela dinfuenkenya diaku mu kasulu kakadi kafuma ku mukuna
Kueyemenyi buhele bua muntu muhele mu dikosa dia tshilumbu tshiandi
Bedi ba mikete bakela bantu bebe mikete ku mutu kua lumbu mene; bantu ba mukelenge bakuabo bakafua ne muntu webe Uliya, Muena Hiti, wakafua kabidi

Bikala muntu muenze bualu bubi bua lufu, ne badi bamushiha, nebamuowe ku mutshi; kabashiyi tshitalu tshiandi ku mutshi butuku bujima, bamujike anu dituku adi mene; muntu yonso muowa ku mutshi udi muedibue mulau kudi Nzambi; kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Mukashi wa ku Tekoa wakambila mukelenge ne, Mukelenge, bualu ebu bubi buikale kundi ne ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi; mukelenge ne nkuasa wandi wa butumbi kabikadi ne bualu
Upatuke kabidi ne nyama yonsu iuvua nayi, nyunyi, bimuna ne nyama minene ne mikese, bua ivulangane imuangalaka pa buloba bujima
Tuakenza mudimu nunku: tshituha tshia bantu tshiakakuata mafuma ku dinda tô ne ku butuku hakamueneka mitoto

Mose wakabikila Datana ne Abilama, bana balume ba Eliaba, ne bobo bakamba ne, Katuena tulua, bualu budi bukese bua wewe wakumuka n etu mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi bua kubishiha mu tshihela, udi musue kudibandisha bu mukelenge wetu kabidi, anyi
Bakamusangana mu budimi bua Nabota, Muena Yizelele
Apakashada wakalela Shela; ne Shela wakalela Ebê
Kadi balume babidi bakashala mu tshitudilu, dina dia umue ne Eladada ne dina dia mukuabo ne Medada
Biasanganabo muntu udi wiba muan abo umue wa Bena Isalele, udi umuenza bu muhika, anyi udi umuhana, hashishe nebashihe muibi: nunku nenûmusbe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Kadi nuadile pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, bualu adi biakudia bia tshijila menemene
Wewe wakuenza buhote mu bualu ebu, kubangila mu dituku edi wewe newikale ne nvita
Pashishe neufuile pa mukuna apu, bua ulonde bankambua bebe
Tshimenga atshi nutshiupule bua kashidi, kabayi mua kutshiasulula kabidi to
Kanuikadi ne biamu bibidi bia kuidikisha n abi majitu, ne tshinene ne tshikese
Mbulamatadi udi mwa kupeesha bisumbu bia tshidiidi lupetu lwa mbulamatadi bwa biôbi kwenza nalu didiswisha diabi bwa kusungudibwa anyi kwenza midimu yabi, mu bulongolodi bufila kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Nunku lua biebe kundi, ndi nkusengelela, bua meme kukuha lungenyi lua mua kusungila muoyo webe ne muoyo wa muan ebe Solomo

Kanulondi nzambi mikuabo ya bantu badi ha buihi n enu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi wa mukau, bua tshiji tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, katshikadi kunudi, ne bua yeye kanujimishi ha mutu ha buloba
Kutedi dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi webe, tshitelatela, bua Yehowa kena ubingisha muntu udi utela dina diandi tshitelatela
Makuta atuvua nawu ne bimuna bietu, ukadi mumane kubiangata
Bua Nafatale yeye wakamba ne, Nafatale wakadiukutshisha ne diakalengele, udi mûle tente ne disanka dia Yehowa
Dibadika Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe ne mutuangaji Elazare, muana wa Arone, ubambila ne: Nubadike bantu balume bonsu ba bena Izrayele ku meku abu
Hakunvua Elisha, muntu wa Nzambi, lumu ne, Mukelenge wa Isalele wakahanda bilulu biandi, yeye wakatumina mukelenge dî ne, Wakuhandila bilulu biebe tshinyi
Meme Maweja Nangila, ndi ngamba ne: muntu wa kunudi nansha umue, kena mua kubuelela mukaji wa mulela wende mu nzubu
Tubalu tuakadi Solomo n atu tuakufuma ku Ejipitu: bendi ba mushinga ba mukelenge bakatuangata mu bisumbu, bakafila mushinga ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu
Pashishe kufuaye
Malu onso akabangeye mu mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi ne a mu mikenji ne mei bua kukeba Nzambi wandi, yeye wakaenza ne mutshima wandi wonso, wakadi ne diakalengele

Mu dîba dia mvita anyi didibo bapeesha bilwilu bukookeshi bwa kubweeja bulongama mu bantu bônso,anyi didibo badiundisha bukookeshi bwa kubwejabu budipope, Mulombodi wa Ditunga mu dipangadika dilonga mu Kapangu ka baminisitila, udi mwa kwanji kwimanyika pa tshipaapu tshiônso tshia Ditunga anyi pa tshitupa tshimwe tshiaadi ne bwa bûngi bwa matuku ne bibawu bidiye uteela, midimu ya dinyookangana ya bilumbulwidi bia bantu bônso pa kumbusha beena tshidiidi, bwa kuyipeesha bilumbulwidi bia basalayi
Misoko ei yonso yakadi ne mpangu mile ne bibi bikanda ne biamu; tuakanyenga misoko mikuabo ya bungi yakadi kayiyi ne mpangu
Yeye wakenda mu nshila ya hakelenge ba Isalele bu muakenza ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba, bualu bua muana wa Ahaba wakadi mukashi wandi; yeye wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Bualu bua nakumana kukulongoluela nsubu ne muaba wa tumelo tuebe
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuelela muntu mukenji ne: Udi mua kudia bimuma bia mitshi yonsu idi mu lupangu
Asela wakadi ne bana ba balume basambombo; mena abo: Azelikama, Bokelu ne Yishemaele ne Shealeya ne Obadaya ne Etenana; aba bakadi bana ba balume ba Asela
Hilekiya muakuidi munene wakambila Shafana secrétaire ne, Nakusangana mukanda wa mikenji ya Mose mu nsubu wa Yehowa

Au mmalu anakuambila Palô, Nzambi wakulesha Palô malu akadiye ha kuenza Monai, bidimu muanda mutekete bilualua bidi buloba bua Ejipitu buonso bulua ne bintu bia bungi, ne ku nyima bidimu muanda mutekete bia tshiole bilualua bidi bantu bahua muoyo bua bintu bia bungi biakadibo n abi, tshiole netshidie bintu bionso biakadi mu buloba, kabena bamanye bintu bia bungi mu buloba bualu bua tshiole tshilualua, netshitambe bukole
udi mumanye mua kubala tshituha tshinai tshia Bena Isalele nganyi
Mukenji wa Bamonyi Kanuitabushi dî dia mumonyi umue udi utumpila mukuabo tshianana bua dihambuka diandi anyi bua bubi buakenzeye; malu neajalame anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu
Bakajingulula ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa wakalua mu tshitudilu
Yeye neambule dianza dia bukula bubotesha tente budi busangisha ne manyi ne musenga wa manananshi, neabuoshe ha tshioshelu bu tshintu tshidi tshima dihembu, bu tshivulukidi kudi Yehowa
Nunku Bena Isalele bakatombokela ba mu nsubu wa Davidi tô ne ku didiku edi
Nenushale bioshelu biabo, nutshibule mabue abo bituha, nuoshe Bashela babo ne kahia; nenutahe mpingu yakasongabo ne tshifuanyikishi tshia nzambi yabo; nenjimishe mena abo mu muaba au
Bâsha, muana wa Ahiya, wa mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, wakamuelela tshifufu
Bintu bia kumpala binudi nunowa mu madimi enu, nufike nabi mu nzubu wanyi, bualu ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Bikala muenyi mushikame n enu, udi musue kuenza tshilele tshia kuhita kua Yehowa, nebatengule bana bandi ba balume bonso, nunku yeye udi mua kutshienza, yeye neikale bu muntu muledibue mu buloba buenu, kadi muntu udi kayi mutengula kena mua kutshidia
Yoasha wakamuhita bukole misangu isatu, wakasungila misoko ya Bena Isalele
Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe

Muakuidi neangate mashi a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, nealabe mashi ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha, ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume, ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshianza tshia balume
Genese Nzambi wakavuluka Noa ne nyama yonso ne bimuna bionso biakadi n andi mu buatu, Nzambi wakahehesha luhehele ha buloba ne mai akahueka
Yehowa akufute bua mudimu webe, bakuhe difutu diebe dionso kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, uwakulua kuso koma muinshi mua mahuahua andi

Badi Bahanga Kuibaka Ntempelo Tshiakabidi Mu tshidimu tshibidi tshia dihingana diabo ku nsubu wa Nzambi mu Yelushalema, mu ngondo muibidi, Zelubabela, muana wa Shaletiele, ne Yeshua, muana wa Yozadaka, ne bana babo bakadi bashala ba bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne bonso bakumuka mu buhika ne bakahingana ku Yelushalema, bakabanga kusungula Bena Lewi ba bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ku mutu bua kuikalabo ku mutu kua mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Disanka edi nedilue ha mutu ha Yosefe, ne ku lubombo lua mutu wa muntu wakadi mutahuluke kudi bana babo

Nunku nebaye ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshisumbu tshia Bena Lewi tshikala munkatshi mua bisumbu bikuabo bu mudibo bashikama mu bitudilu, nebaye ku mpala nunku, muntu mu muaba wandi mundi mu muaba wandi ku mabendele abo

Bakosha musoko ne bintu bionso biakadimu ne kahia; anu tshiamu tshia argent ne tshia or, ne malonga a tshiamu tshia mitaku ne tshia tshiamu tshifike, bakahueka mu tshibutshilu tshia mu nsubu wa Yehowa

Yeye wakavula bilulu bia mu lufuila, wakaluata bilulu bikuabo, wakadibuikila ne tshilulu tshikudika, wakashikama ku tshibi tshia ku Enayima, hehi ne nshila wa ku Timena, bualu bua yeye wakamona ne, Shela wakamana kudiunda ne kabena banze kumbakisha kudiye
Nanku, yeye mmumanye mua kuenza midimu yonsu
Nunku nebikale ne bundu ne tshiji bia bungi
Mose wakatshina, wakamba ne, Bulelela, bualu ebu buakumanyibua

Bakabambila m, Kanuena nuhitaku ne bantu banuakukuata mu nvita; bualu bua nudi nukeba kutubuesha mu malu mabi kudi Yehowa ha mutu ha mibi yetu ne malu mabi etu; bualu bua mibi yetu idi minene, ne tshiji tshikole tshidi kudi Bena Isalele
Mesu a Isalele akadi bileshileshi bualu bua bununu buandi, yeye kakamanya mua kumona bimpe Yeye wakalua n abo ha buihi n andi, yeye wakatuangana n abo mishiku, wakabuhukila
Yeye wakakebulula kakasangana mpingu
Mbimpe tupingane mu Ejipitu
Bantu bandi bakamuambila ne, Mona, mukashi mutempi wa lubuku udi mu Ene dô
Kuena mua kufikila bantu bonsu munda bua tshilema tshia muntu umue

Nsubu wakadi mule tente ne balume ne bakashi; bakelenge bonso ba Bena Peleshete bakadimu; ne bantu bu binunu bisatu ne balume ne bakashi bakadi ha mutu ha nsubu, batangile hakadi Shimishona ubasekesha
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kukonka bantu bende bua kujadika tshivua tshienzeke
Davidi wakasangisha balume bonso hasungula ba mu Isalele, binunu makumi asatu
Nebanshipe bua kukuangata wewe
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakadifuanyisha bu muntu mukuabo, wakaya mu nvita
Nebavungulule tshilulu ku mesu kua bakulu ba mu musoko
Yeye wakamba ne, Muan a mukala utshidi mushale; mona, yeye udi ulama mikoko
Ekesode Nzambi Udi Ubaka Mona Bakabika mu Elima ne Bena Isalele bonso, bakalua mu tshihela, dina diatshi Sina, hankatshi ha Elima ne Sinai
Bantu bakadi bahitaku bakatangila tshitalu tshiandi mu nshila ne nyama wa ntambue muimane ha buihi n atshi; bakamba bualu ebu mu musoko muakadi muprofete mununu mushikame
Muntu yonso udi ulumbuluisha benyi anyi bana ba nshiya anyi bakashi ba mu lufuila dilumbulula didi kadiyi diakane udi ne mulau
Udi unuipatshila baluishi benu, nuenu batangile, unuamba bua kubabutula
Padiye ujadika ne mbuji ewu ngua Maweja Nangila, udi umulambula bua mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Kubinaminyi, kubitendeledi, bua meme Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ndi bianyi Nzambi wa mukau, ntu ngatumina bana ba tshihungu tshisatu anyi tshinai badi hanyi lukuna mibi ya batatu abo
Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila tshibutshilu tshinena Kanungu ka Tshibutshilu tshinene tshia Kongu ke tshidi tshikala nzubu mupatudi wa kashintu wa ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Nakadielela meji munda muanyi, nakatandangana ne bantu banene ne bakokeshi, nakabambila ne, Muntu ne muntu udi ulomba tshia kasombela kudi muan abo
Yeye wakalela muakuny andi Ebele kabidi Ebele wakadi mulami wa mikoko, kadi Kana wakadi tshidime
Kakuena muntu udi muakane bu Yehowa, bualu bua kakuena mukuabo udi ku mpala kuebe: kakuena dibue dikuabo didi bu Nzambi wetu
Kadi Gala wakamuambila kabidi ne, Tangila, bantu badi bahueka munkatshi mua mikuna, ne tshisumbu tshimue tshidi tshiluila mu nshila wa ku mutshi wa telebinta wa Meonenima
Bualu Sihone uvua muluangane mvita kale ne mukalenga mukuabu wa bena Mowabe, mumunyenge ditunga dijima too ne ku musulu wa Amone
Arone kuenza bivua Moshe mumuambile
Mei au anakukuambila lelu eu ikale mu mutshima webe; wewe newayishe bana bebe, wewe neusombelele n abo bua mei au, hawashikama mu nsubu webe, ne hawenda mu nshila, ne hawalala, ne hawabika
Izake kubinyika mena abi a kale, avua Abrahame mubinyike
Nudimuke, kanulekedi Muena Lewi tô matuku onso anudi nushala mu buloba buenu
Nanku neupeshe Arone ne bana bende bena Levi, bua babambuluishe muabu muonsu mu dina dia bena Izrayele bakuabu, balame nzubu wa tshijila
Numanye ne: bidi ne mikiya
Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakahunga n etu tshihungidi mu Holeba
Bienzedi bia Lehabama, bia kumudia ne bia kunshikidilu kabiena bifunda mu kulondolola kua Shemaya muprofete, ne kua Ido mumonyi wa malu, bu mudibo bafunda mikanda ya kulondolola anyi

Bantu bakuabo ba Bena Hiti ne Bena Amole ne Bena Pelese ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse bakadi bashala, bakadi kabayi Bena Isalele; Solomo wakabuesha bana babo bakadi bashala ku nyima kuabo, bakadi kabayi bashihibue kudi Bena Isalele, mu buhika tô ne ku dituku edi
Ke munudi mua kujikija buenzayi munkatshi mua bena Izrayele nanku
Nudi ne muanenu mukuabu wa balume anyi
Kadi kanudi mashi andi; nuahongolole hanshi ha buloba bu mai
Meme nentue nende ndondu wa kashidi kabidi ne ndelanganyi yende yonsu
Yeye ne balume bakadi n andi bakadia, bakanua, bakalala butuku abu, bakabika ne dinda, yeye wakabambila ne, Nuntume kudi mukelenge wanyi
Nzambi wanyi, uvuluke Tobiya ne Sanebalata bu mudi bienzedi biabo; uvuluke Noadaya muprofete mukashi ne baprofete bakuabo badi bakeba kuntshinyisha
Muena Peleshete wakakenzakana, hakatangileye Davidi, wakamulengulula bualu bua yeye wakatshidi nsongalume, wakadi ne mpala lukunjila kunjila, wakadi ne mpala muimpe
Hakatshia butuku banjelo bakenzesha Lota ne, Bika biebe, wangate mukashi webe ne bana bebe bakashi babidi badiku diambedi kanuyi banze kufua mu dikenga dia musoko eu
Muntumpu awu wikale ne nshingu
Diba adi, Maweja Nangila neanufuile munda, anubutule musangu umue
Bualu bena diku dia Rubene ne dia Ngade, ne tshia bibidi tshimue tshia tshisamba tshia bena Menashe, bakadi bamane kupeta wabu muaba
Yeye wakatangila kudi Bena Kene, wakabela lusumuinu ne, Muaba unudi nushikama udi mukole, udi munkatshi mua mabue
Balaame kuandamuna ne: Bantu aba mbafume kudi Balake, muana wa Sipore, mukalenga wa bena Mowabe

Bikala bana balume ba difu dimue bashikame muaba umue, ne biafua umue wabo kayi mushiye muana mulume, mukashi wa muntu mufue kayi ku dibaka kudi mulume mukuabo; muan abo ne mulume wandi neamuangate, alue bu mukashi wandi; neamuenzele bualu buakadiye ne bualu bua kuenza bu muan abo
Bakadi basangisha bisumbu bia mikoko bionso kunoko, bakumusha dibue diakadi ku mushiku wa dina, bakanuisha mikoko mai, bakahingasha dibue dia ku mushiku wa ku muaba wadi
Balake kukandika Balaame ne: Ne wabengi kubatshipa, kadi kubeedi lupemba nansha

Noa wakaluhuka ne bana bandi balume ne mukashi andi ne bakashi ba bana bandi, ne nyama yonso ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu yonso ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshiendakana ha buloba, bu mudi mishindu yabi, biakaluhuka mu buatu
Hakunvua Ahaba lumu lua lufu lua Nabota, Ahaba wakajuka, wakaya ku budimi bua Nabota, Muena Yizelele, bua kubuangata
Bakasonga ha nseke ei yonso bakeluba ne nyama ya ntambue ne mabue a ngashi bu mudi muaba wabi ne bisumbu bia bilongo
Kaleba wakakolesha bantu ku mesu kua Mose ne, Tuyai katataka, tunyenge buloba abu, tudi bamanye mua kuhita bena buloba abu bukole
Samuele Bena Peleshete Badi Bahingisha Mushete wa Tshihungidi Mushete wa Yehowa wakadi mu buloba bua Bena Peleshete ngondo muanda mutekete
Tudi basue kusumba biakudia munemu
Hakadi bukelenge hua Lehabama bujadikibue bimpe, ne hakakoleye biakane, yeye wakasesuka ku mikenji ya Yehowa, ne Bena Isalele bakamulonda

Solomo wakumusha muana mukashi wa Palô mu musoko wa Davidi, ku nsubu wakamuibakileye; bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Mukashi wanyi kena mushikame mu nsubu wa Davidi, mukelenge wa Bena Isalele, bualu bua ei idi miaba ya tshijila yakadi mushete wa Yehowa
Wewe newenze malonga ne nkuta ne mpanza ne bihanza bia or mutambe buimpe
Izake kumunanga bikole

Kulondolola Hakashika malu â, Bena Isalele bonso bakadiku bakamuangalaka ku misoko yonso ya Yuda, bakashimbula makunshi onso a bitendelelu bia mpingu, bakataha mitshi ya Bashela, bakashimbula bioshelu bionso biakadi ha mutu ha mikuna ya mu Yuda ne mu Benyamina, ne ya mu Efelayima ne mu Manashe kabidi, tô ne hakabishimbulabo bionso
Benze tshilamba tshidi tshijika mushete awu

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, muakuidi neamutangile kabidi, bielanganeye meji ne disama didi diamba kushika, kadiena ditampakana, nunku muakuidi neamubueshe mu nsubu ha nkayandi matuku muanda mutekete makuabo

Dutelonone Mikenji ya Nvita Hanuaya kuluangana nvita ne bantu badi n enu lukuna, ne hamutangila tubalu ne makalu ne bantu badi banuhita bungi, kanubatshinyi bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, udi n enu
Musangu muibidi udibu bela mpungi ne bibingu, bena Izrayele badi basombe luseke lua kuinshi kua ntenta wa kusambakena, nebatuadije luendu

Halua Yehowa n enu mu buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana, hanuihatshileye bisamba bia bungi ku mpala kuenu, Bena Hiti ne Bena Gîgashi ne Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse, bisamba muanda mutekete bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole; habafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu bianza bienu, nenubashihe; hashishe nenubajimishe ha buloba: kanuhungi n abo tshihungidi, kanubaleshi luse, kanubakanganyi n abo, kanubakishi muan enu mukashi kudi muana wabo mulume, kanuangatshidi muana wenu mulume mukashi kudibo
Samuele wakamba ne, Bawakadi bu muntu muhuekele ku mesu kuebe, kabena bakuteka ku mutu kua bisamba bia Bena Isalele, anyi
Bilamba bionsu bivua binyungulula lupangu, bivua bia buanda bukole bua ndanda
Nuvua bapatuke lelu, mu ngondu ewu wa Abibe

Bakuidi bakadi nunku: Yedaya, muana wa Yoyaliba, ne Yakina, Selaya, muana wa Hilekiya, muana wa Meshulama, muana wa Sadoka, muana wa Melayota, muana wa Ahituba, wakadi ku mutu kua malu a mu nsubu wa Nzambi; bana babo bakadi benza mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi bakadi nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi abidi ne babidi; Adaya, muana wa Yeholama, muana wa Pelalaya, muana wa Amasi, muana wa Zekâya, muana wa Pashû, muana wa Malakiya; bana babo bakadi ku mutu kua biota bia batatu abo bakadi nkama ibidi ne makumi anai ne babidi; Amashai, muana wa Azalele, muana wa Azai, muana wa Meshilemota, muana wa Imê, bana babo, bena bukitu, bakadi lukama ne makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu; Zabediele, muana wa Hagedolima, wakadi kahita kabo
Bakenza nkanu ya or ibidi bakayiteka ku luseke lua tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi luakadi lutuangane ne efoda

Milau ei yonso neyilue kunudi, neyinulonde, neyinuhete tô ne hanuajimishibua ba buloba; bualu bua nuenu kanuakunvua mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi biakanuambileye: milau ei neyikale kunudi bu tshimanyinu ne dikema, ne kudi bana benu tshiendelele

Dituku dikuabo hakayeye mu nsubu bua kuenzeye mudimu wandi, ne mu nsubu kamuakadi muntu mukuabo, yeye wakamukuata ku tshivualu tshiandi, wakamuambila ne, Ulale n anyi, ne yeye wakashiya tshivualu tshiandi mu tshianza tshiandi, wakanyema, wakahatuka
Nunku Yehowa wakadi ne Yoshua; ne lumu luandi luakatangadika buloba buonso
Ebele uvua mulami wa mikoku, Kayine uvua tshidime
Meku a Kîyata yalima akadi Bena Yitela ne Bena Puta ne Bena Shumati ne Bena Mishete; Bena Solea ne Bena Eshetaola bakafuma kudibo
Nuenu bena Izrayele, umvuayi mukenji unudi ne bua kulama kashidi: matuku dikumi a ngondu wa muanda mutekete, nuenu, bana benu ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, nujile biakudia
Bana babu ne Yozefe kumuka mu Ejipitu, kupingana mu ditunga dia Kenaane, muaba uvua tatuabu Yakobe
Kanuluhuki ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusangakena matuku muanda mutekete tô ne hanuashikisha matuku a kujidila kuenu, bualu bua Yehowa neanujidile matuku muanda mutekete
Nanku kanuakusomba makuta kudi bantu ba bisamba bikuabu to
Bakimana muntu ne muntu mu muaba wandi bu muakadi mukenji wa Mose, muntu wa Nzambi; bakuidi bakamiamina mashi akangatabo ku bianza bia Bena Lewi
Nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mei akanuambileye ne malu andi akanumanyisheye
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Gada, Eleyasafa muana mulume wa Deuele
Nuenu nenudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene dituku adi bualu bua nakahatula bisumbu bienu mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nunku nenujidile dituku edi bu tshivulukidi tshienu tshiendelele
Tuhita tuakabenzesha ne, Nushikishai mudimu wenu wa buatshia buatshia bu munuakenza hanuakadi ne bisonsa
Yuda udi wakuila Binyamine Yuda ne bana babu kufika ku mbelu kua Yozefe, kumusangana amu, muaba awu
Nenushale ne muoyi matuku mavule mu ditunga didiye munupe kashidi
Nenukute mafu tente, nenusakidile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bualu bua buloba buimpe buakalayeye
Nembutule bintu bionsu bidi ne muoyi, bindi mufuke pa buloba
Kujidila kua Ntempelo Kul

Davidi wakalela bana ba balume mu Hebelone: muan a bute wandi wakadi Amenona, muana wa Abinoama, Muena Yizelele; muana wandi muibidi wakadi Kileaba, muana wa Abigayila wakadi mukashi wa Nabala, Muena Kâmele; muisatu wakadi Abashaloma, muana wa Mâka, muana mukashi wa Talemai, mukelenge wa mu Geshû; muinai wakadi Adoniya, muana mulume wa Hagita; muitanu wakadi Shefataya, muana wa Abitala; muisambombo wakadi Yitelama, muana wa Egala, mukashi wa Davidi
Padi njila mupite bule, musombuedi udi mua kupeta mushipianganyi, kumushipa
Bonsu abu, bisumbu bisatu, ke badi ne bua kubanga luendu, benza tshiluilu tshia kumpala
Dutelonone Bidimu Biakashalabo mu Tshihela Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze, bu muakangambila Yehowa; tuakanyunguluka mukuna wa Sei matuku a bungi
Katataka mona, badiadia, banuanua ku mpala kuandi bamba ne, Mukelenge Adoniya ikale ne muoyo musangu mule
Matuku malondangane muanda mutekete, nudie anu mampa adi kaayi mela buanga
Ditumibwa dia muntu ewu didi dia matuku makumi asatu adibo mwa kwambulula musangu umwe epele

Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, yeye neadiangatshile nansha nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi nansha mputu nyunyu ibidi, nealue n ai ku mpala kua Yehowa ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, neayifile mu bianza bia muakuidi, ne muakuidi neayifile bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neafue milambu ya kumubuikidila n ai bubi ku mpala kua Yehowa bualu bua tufina tuandi

Davidi wakaya, wakangata mifuba ya Shaula ne ya Yonatana muan andi kudi Bena Yabesha gilada, bakayiba mu misesu ya Bete shana kuakabowa Bena Peleshete ku dituku diakashiha Bena Peleshete Shaula mu Gileboa
Kanunyangishi dina dianyi dia tshijila, kadi nengikale mujidibue munkatshi mua Bena Isalele meme ndi Yehowa udi unujidila, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kuikala Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa

Mbua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne kuenda mu nshila yandi yonso, ne bua kumusua, ne bua kuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mudimu ne mitshima yenu yonso ne bukole buenu buonso, ne bua kutumikila mikenji ya Yehowa ne mei andi anakunuambila lelu bua nuenu kukuma dikasa dimpe
Misangu yonso hakaya mukelenge mu nsubu wa Yehowa, balami bakadi baya n ai, bakahingana n ai mu nsubu wabo kabidi
Yehoshafata wakamba ne, Dî dia Yehowa didi mukana muandi
Mukashi wakamukudimuna ne, Umpe kakanu ka ku munu webe ne mionshi misuika ku maboko ebe ne tshibangu tshiebe tshiudi n atshi mu tshianza tshiebe
Ba bana ba Mushi: Mali ne Edê ne Yelimota
Nuenu nutumikile, nuenze mei onso anakunuambila; kanutentekashi dî dikuabo ha mutu ha mei au, kanûmushi dî ku mei au

Bena Gada bakuabo bakaya kudi Davidi ku musoko wa lumbu wa mu tshihela, bena bukitu bakayishibua malu onso a nvita, bakamanya mua kuluangana ne ngabu ne mafuma; mpala yabo yakadi bu mpala ya nyama ya ntambue, bakamanya mua kunyema lubilu bu ntole ya mu mikuna; Ezê wakadi ha mutu habo, Obadaya muibidi, ne Eliaba muisatu, Mishemana muinai, ne Yelemiya muitanu, ne Atai muisambombo, ne Eliele wa muanda mutekete, ne Yohanana wa muanda mukulu, ne Elezabada wa tshitema, Yelemiya wa dikumi, Makebanai wa dikumi ne umue
Nanku mbimpe tuye nebe
Badi Badia Kuhita kua Yehowa Kul
Bualu badi mua kulonda bibidilu bibi bia nsongakaji idi inemeka mvidie ya ditunga diabu
Moshe kukosa tshimpanga atshi muminu, kumiamina mashi atshi ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Tshimuangi Bilamba bia batuangaji: efode Batedi ba bilamba kutela bilamba bia lumu bia kuenza nabi mudimu muaba wa tshijila
Yozefe kulota tshilota tshikuabu, kutshiawila bana babu, ubambila ne: Mvua mulote: diba, ngondu ne mitotu dikumi ne umue bilua kunkukuila
Ke Moshe kubanda ku mukuna, kuambilaye Maweja Nangila ne: Bantu aba mbenze tshilema tshipite bunene, mbadienzele mvidie wa tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Kanungu ka : Bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu budi budilekelela ne bukalenga bulongolodi bwa mêyi ne mikandu ne kabidi ne Bukalenga bunene
Dinda, bena Izrayele bavua baye kuangula, baapela pankatshi pa mabue abidi, nansha baatua mu tshinu
Bule buandi bua luidi lua kumudilu buakadi coudées makumi asambombo; butshiama buandi buakadi coudées makumi abidi
Yehowa wakanuambila mei munkatshi mua kahia: nuenu nuakulua mei kadi kanuakatangila muntu; nuakunvua anu dî dia muntu
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bitanu ne nkama mai
Balume bonso ba mu musoko wabo nebamukume ne mabue tô ne hafueye: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu; ne Bena Isalele nebunvue, nebatshine
bintu bia kudia mu nshila mu bianza bienu, yai bienu kusangakana n abo, nubambile ne, Tuetu tudi bahika benu, nuhunge n etu tshihungidi
Hakunvua mukelenge wa Yosefe mei akamuambila mukashi wandi ne, Muntu webe wakungenzela nunku, tshiji tshikole tshiakamukuata
Muena budimi abu afute mushinga awu anu dituku adi, bua baulambule Maweja Nangila
Kadi bana ba Kora kabavua bafue musangu awu to
Bantu bonso bakadisangisha kudi Shaula mu Gilegala
Kadi yeye wakamba ne, Bialua malu onso kundi, nyaya
Kanungu ka Beena mu Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa badi ne mwânzu wa batshipwita bakulumpa ba mabala
Bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ne muoyo, kakuena tshisamba anyi bukelenge bidi mukelenge wanyi kayi utuma bantu bua kukukeba
Kadi bu tuetu bahanyibue bu bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, nakadi kuhuwa, kadi muena lukuna kakadi mua kufuta mukelenge ku bualu ebu bubi
Maweja Nangila udi ukuba bena Izrayele, mudi nyunyi wa tshiminyi upapala pa mutu pa disua diende, wibidija bana bende bua kubuka mulu, nansha wolola mapuapua muinshi mua bana bua kabamatshi panshi
Wakamutendelela; Nzambi wakamunvuila, wakitabusha kutendekena kuandi, wakamuhingisha ku Yelushalema mu bukelenge buandi kabidi

Katataka nudikonke munda bua matuku adi ku nyima akadi ku mpala kuenu, katshia Nzambi wafuka bantu ha buloba, ne ku luseke lumue lua diulu tô ne ku luseke lukuabo ne, Bikalaku bualu bunene nunku, anyi bikalabo bunvue lumu lua bualu bua nunku
Meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu kunupatula ku bukole buanyi

Yehowa neanunzuluile masanka adiye n au mu diulu bua kunulokeshila nvula ha buloba mu tshikondo tshia nvula, ne bua kunuvudishila disanka mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu; nuenu nenusombeshe bisamba bia bungi bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nusomba bintu kudibo
Kena muanyishe bua bena Izrayele bumuke to
Hakamona Yoaba ne, Bakasa mualu wa nvita ku mpala kuandi ne ku nyima kuandi, yeye wakasungula bena bukitu ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele bonso, wakasa mualu wa nvita kudi Bena Sulia
Bana ba balume ba Lubena, muan a bute wa Isalele: Hanoka ne Palu, Heselona ne Kâmi
Bana ba balume ba Shemida bakadi Ahiana ne Shekeme ne Likihi ne Aniama
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bika biebe, uhueke lubilu bualu bua bantu bebe bawakahatula mu Ejipitu, bakoneka, bakasesuka lubilu mu nshila unakabalesha; bakadienzela luhingu ne biamu biakatulabo
Ke padibu babikila muaba awu ne: Sukote, mbuena kuamba ne: bikumbi
Nebashihele mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neamiamine mashi ku nseke yonso ya tshioshelu
Maweja Nangila kubamuangalaja pa buloba bujima
Nsongakaji kuandamuna ne: Mukalenga wanyi, nuaku
Musangu unudi nunowa biakudia, kanuena mua kunowa too ne bidi ku mpenga kua budimi to

Davidi wakambila Solomo muan andi ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima, wenze bualu ebu; kutshinyi, kuhangi bualu ebu; bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi, Nzambi wanyi mene, udi n ebe; yeye kena ukuhanga, kena ukulekela tô ne hawashikisha mudimu eu wonso wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Enza tshiamu tshilukibue bu munyingu ne nkanu mai ya tshiamu tshia mitaku ku matumba atshi anai
Bienzedi bia Ahaba bikuabo biakenzeye ne nsubu wa mibanga wakaseye ne misoko yonso yakaseye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a hakelenge ba Isalele, anyi
Yeye neanunyenge madimi enu ne madimi a nvinyo ne madimi enu a olive, madimi mene adi matambe buimpe, neâfile kudi bahika bandi
Bakaji abu kuibidija bena Izrayele bua kulambuila mvidie ya mu ditunga diabu

Nenudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene to matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia kumudilu nenumushe luevene mu nsubu yenu, muntu yonso udi udia mampa adi neluevene ku dituku dia kumudilu to matuku muanda mutekete, nebamumushe munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Pashishe padi butu bukuate ku tshintu atshi, dikeji dimueneka tshiakabidi, neboshe tshintu atshi
Muana wa balume wa kumpala walela mukaji awu, nebamutangile bu muana wa mufue awu, bua kusangula dina dia mufue mu Izrayele
Uteke bidia ne mai ku mpala kuabo, bobo badie, banue, bahingane kudi mukelenge wabo

Bule bua mahuahua a bakeluba buakadi coudées makumi abidi; dihuahua dia mukeluba mukuabo diakadi bule bua coudées itanu; lusongo luadi luakafika tô ne ku tshimanu tshia nsubu; dihuahua dikuabo diakadi bule bua coudées itanu, diakafika tô ne ku dihuahua dia mukuabo
Tshiakukuambila, anyi

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Buhidia Buabo Hashishe halua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, n enu mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kunuhabu, misoko minene ne miakane mudi kanuyi bibake, ne nsubu miule tente ne bintu bimpe mudi kanuyi bûshe, ne mena a mai akumbulabo, anudi kanuyi bumbule, ne madimi a tumuma tukese ne mitshi ya olive, binudi kanuyi bakune; nuenu nenudie, nenukute mafu tente; hashishe nudimukai, bua kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa buluka
Binuamba mei malelela, nuitabushe bua: umue wenu ashale musuikibue mu nsubi wa lukanu, kadi bakuabo benu baye kuenu ne bia kudia bualu bua tshiole tshidi mu nsubu yenu
Bilulu bitanu nebikale bituangane ne bilulu bitanu bikuabo, binga bilulu bitanu nebikale bituangane ne bilulu bitanu bikuabo
Hashishe, mukelenge Lehabama wakatuma Adolama, wakadi ku mutu kua bena mudimu, ne Bena Isalele bakamushiha ne mabue
Bualu meme Ndi Maweja Nangila

Hakajidilabo nsubu eu wa Nzambi bakafila milambu ya ngombe lukama ne bimpanga nkama ibidi ne bana ba mikoko nkama inai; bakafila milambu ya kubuikila n ai mibi ya Bena Isalele bonso mpumbu ya mbushi dikumi ne ibidi bu bungi bua bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Samuele Yehowa Udi Ubikila Samuele Muana eu Samuele wakakuatshila Yehowa mudimu ku mesu kua Eli

Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu udi ukengesha bena Izrayele Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kuambila Shifra ne Puwa, baleleshi ba bena Ebrewu ne: Panudi nulelesha bakaji ba bena Ebrewu, nutangile bimpe mushindu udi muana
Kadi tudi mua kuiba tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, nansha mpawungi bidi mu nzubu mua mukalenga webe bua tshinyi
Bakambila Tamâ ne, Tatu ebe muenu uyaya ku Timena bua kukoseye mikoko yandi miosa
Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakangambila ne, Songa mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi, ulue biebe kundi ku mukuna, udienzele mushete wa mabaya
Moshe kuamba ne: Nenujadike mundi tshiyi ndienzela malu nkayanyi to, kabidi mudi Maweja Nangila nkayende muntume bua kukumbaja bionsu ebi
Pashishe wewe neutante, wikale tshisamba tshinene

Mudimu wabo wakadi wa kukuatshisha bana ba Alona mu midimu yabo ya mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne mu biendedi ne mu nsubu mikese ne mu kujidila kua bintu bionso ne mu midimu yonso yakenzabo mu nsubu wa Nzambi; ne bua kulongololabo bidia bioshibue ne bukula bua milambu ya bukula bubotesha, nansha bua mikata idi kayiyi ne luevene, nansha bua bidia biakalambabo mu malonga, nansha bua bidia biakinabo mu mai ne bua bihikidi bia mishindu yonso; ne bua kuimanabo lunkelu ku difuku ku dituku bua kusakidilabo Yehowa ne bua kumutumbishabo, ne dilolo kabidi; ne bua kufilabo milambu ya kuosha kudi Yehowa ku matuku a lumingu ne bakabala ngondo ne ku matuku akatuabo bidia bia disanka ku tshikondo tshiau misangu yonso ku mpala kua Yehowa; ne bua bobo balame nsubu wa kusambakena ne muaba wa tshijila, ne bana balume ba Alona, bana babo, mu mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa

Mu matuku andi Hiele, Muena Betele, wakasa musoko wa Yeleko; hakajadikeye makunshi a musoko, muan a bute wandi Abilama wakafua, hakatekeye bibi bia musoko, muaha mukala wandi Seguba wakafua, bu mu dî dia Yehowa diakambileye Yoshua, muana wa Nuna
Amu bualu bua Yozefe, Maweja Nangila kututshisha muena Ejipitu diakalenga
Neafuile muaba ewu, bualu nuvua bantombokele ku mayi a Meriba
Kadi mesu enu akatangila malu manene onso akenza Yehowa
Ya Gêshoma: Libeni muan andi, ne Yahata muan andi, ne Zima muan andi, ne Yoa muan andi, ne Yido muan andi, ne Zela muan andi, ne Yatelai muan andi
Pashishe kuyaye kuebeja Maweja Nangila
Kuaka nenutendelele nzambi mikuabo yakasongabo ne mitshi ne mabue, kayena mua kutangila anyi mua kunvua anyi mua kudia anyi mua kununkila
Nudi bamanye mushindu utuvua mu Ejipitu, ne mushindu utuvua bapitshile mu matunga a bisamba bionsu bivua mu njila

Aba mbashihianganyi badi mua kunyemenamu bua kuikala ne muoyo: muntu yonso udi ushiha mukuabo ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi; bu muntu wakuya ne mukuabo muitu bua kutaha nkunyi, ne hakuambeye kutaha mutshi ne kasui, ne kasui kakukuka, kakutaha muntu mukuabo, kakumushiha; muntu eu neanyemene ku umue wa misoko ei, neikale ne muoyo
Yehowa wakatuma muanjelo wandi, nguakashiha bena bukitu ne tupitene ne bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Ashû mu tshitudilu tshia mukelenge wa Ashû

Bantu ba Tshijila ba Yehowa Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusungula munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bidi hanshi ha buloba, bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne muku wandi udi ne mulau

Bena Peleshete bakuabo bakalua ne bintu kudi Yehoshafata ne argent ya milambu; Bena Alabâ bakalua kudiye ne bimuna biabo, bimpanga binunu muanda mutekete ne nkama muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu ya mbushi binunu muanda mutekete ne nkama muanda mutekete
Yehowa, Nzambi wandi udi n andi ne dî dia lubila dia bukelenge didi munkatshi muabo

Bikala Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muleheshe matshika enu, bu muakudi tshiheye kudi bankambua benu, bianuheye buloba buonso buakalayeye bankambua benu; binuatumikila mukenji eu, undi munuelele lelu, binuawenza, bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi; hashishe nenusungule misoko mikuabo isatu ha mutu ha misoko ei isatu
Bisumbu bia tshidiidi bidi biambulwisha bwa bantu kwambabo majinga abo mu disungulangana bwa kukolesha dimanya dia bwikadi bwa mweena Kongu ne bwa kulongesha bantu mianda ya bweena mwabo
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Aye biandi ku nsubu kuandi, katangidi mpala wanyi

Mukelenge wa Isalele wakambila Yehoshafata ne, Muntu mukuabo udiku utudi mua kuebesha Yehowa mukana muandi, dina diandi Mikaya, muana wa Yimela; kadi ndi n andi tshiji bualu bua yeye katu wangambila malu mimpe, utu wangambila anu malu mabi, Yehoshafata wakamba ne, Mukelenge kambi nunku nansha
Dituku edi nedikale tshimanyinu tshia diumvuangana didi pankatshi panyi ne bena Izrayele
Bimuna biende kabivua bibalakana mu bimuna bia Labane to
Bena Isalele bakenza bu mu dî dia Mose, bakatamba Bena Ejipitu bilenga bia argent ne bia or ne bilulu
Bantu badi Maweja Nangila kayi mukanyine, mundi mua kubakanyina meme mmunyi
Nanku nuye kumanyisha tatu muanzu undi nawu mu Ejipitu
Nenuikale ne disanka mu bisaka bienu ne mu malonga anudi nuenzelamu mampa
Benyamina udi bu nkashama udi ne luonji, udi udia bintu dinda, ne dilolo udi ubiabanya
Bakaji abu batanu kuya mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Wewe neuhidie kudihuekesha ku mesu kuanyi musangu bule munyi
Hashishe bantu bakuabo bakaya, bakamanyisha Davidi muakenzeleye bantu bandi
Yehowa avudishile bintu biandi disanka, itabushe mudimu wa bianza biandi: atshibule nyima ya bantu badi bahika ku mpala kuandi, ne ya badi n andi lukuna bua kababiki kabidi
Bana bakuabu ba Yuda babidi, Ere ne Onane, bavua bafuile mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Kadi pikala bena dianyi babenga, diditshipa diebe kadiena dikuenzela bualu to, bualu diba adi kadiena dikukuata kabidi to
Bonsu badi bakuela lupemba, nembele
Ku ndelanganyi aku nekupatuke bisamba bia bungi, nekupatuke kabidi bakalenga banene

Hashikameye ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge, yeye neadifundile mukanda wa mikenji idi mifunda mu mukanda au udi mu bianza bia bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi; yeye neashale ne mukanda eu, neaubale matuku andi onso; nunku yeye neamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, ne mua kutumikila mei onso ne mikenji yonso bidi bifundamu, bua kubienza; nunku mutshima wandi kaudibandishi ku mutu kua bana babo, nunku yeye kasesuki mu nshila wa mikenji nansha ku tshianza tshia balume nansha ku tshianza tshia bakashi; nunku nebavudishe matuku a bukelenge buandi, ne a bana bandi mu Isalele
Hashishe Eli wakamukudimuna ne, Ya biebe talalâ, Nzambi wa Isalele unvue biandi kulomba kuwakumulomba
Wakakuatshila Bala mudimu, wakamutendelela bua kufuisha Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, tshiji bu muakenza tatu wandi
Bana ba Bigewai binunu bibidi ne makumi asambombo ne muanda mutekete
Yeye wakamba ne, Makelela Mose wakamba ne, Bualu buikale bu mu dî diebe, bua kukumanyisha ne, Kakuena nzambi mukuabo bu Yehowa Nzambi wetu
Maweja Nangila mmukumbaji wa ndondu Maweja Nangila mmununange, munusungule, ki mbua ne: nudi nupita bisamba bionsu ku bungi to
Ngowu aa mu tshibombi tshianyi
Bana babu bonsu nebabanange
Arone uvua ne bana ba balume banayi: Nadabe, Abiku, Elazare ne Itamare
Kadi padi mutuangaji umona ne: mu tshibangu kamuena boya butokoloke, kabidi katshiena tshiondoke, tshidi anu tshimpe, neateke muntu ewu pa nkayende matuku muanda mutekete
Kadi padiye ulambula mulambu wa diampa dikanga pa dilata, diampa adi dikale dienza ne bukula busopakaja ne mafuta, kabuyi buela buanga bua mampa to
Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi ne bakelenge bonso ba mu tshisumbu bakaya bua kusangakena n abo ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Baledi ba Rebeka kumuela lupemba, bamba ne: Wewe muanetu wa bakaji, Ulele balume, ulele bakaji ba bungi

Yehoshafata wakimanaku mpala kua tshisumbu tshia Bena Yuda ne Bena Yelushalema, mu nsubu wa Yehowa, mu tshiendedi tshihia tshihia, wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa hatatu betu, wewe kuena Nzambi wa mu diulu, anyi
Mvidi Mukulu mumane kujikija mudimu uvuaye muenze, kuikishaye dituku dia muanda muteketa
Ibisana wakafua, bakamujika mu Beteleheme
Kubafukaye mulume ne mukaji

Yeye wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu muanda mukulu; yeye wakumuka, bantu kabayi bamunange; bakamujika mu musoko wa Davidi, kadi kabakamujika mu nkita ya bakelenge
Nansha, nuenu bantu balume nudi mua kuya kutendelela Yehowa, bualu bua nudi basue kuenza nunku
Kanungu ka Dijikija dia dipanga dia mukanda didi dipangadika dia ditunga dijima,didi Bukalenga bunene ne tshia kwenzela ndongamu wa sungansunga bwa kudikumbaja
Kadi tuetu kupawula bimuna ne bintu bionsu bituvua basangane mu bimenga abi
Bana ba Atê wa Hezikiya makumi tshitema ne muanda mukulu
Dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Kubitekaye pa mafuta ne pa tshibelu tshia luseke lua dia balume dia tshimpanga
Shimei, muana wa Gela, Muena Benyamina wa mu Bahulima, wakaya lubilu ne Bena Yuda bakuabo bua kusangakeneye ne mukelenge Davidi
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Bana ba balume ba Elekana: Amasai ne Ahimota
Nunku nuenu nutumikile mei a tshihungidi etshi, nuê nze, bua nuenu nuikale ne dikasa dimpe mu malu onso anudi nuenza
Munyinyi wa mafuta onsu udi mushale, mutuangaji awoshe pa tshilambuilu, bu mudibu benza bua mulambu wa bobumue
Bana Baledibue kudi Yakoba Hakatangila Yehowa ne Lea wakadi mubengibue, yeye wakamulelesha bana, kadi Lakele wakadi nkumba
Hakebesha mukelenge mukashi bualu ebu, yeye wakamuambilabu
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Tuakufuma ku Beteleheme yuda; tuyaya ku nyima kua mikuna ya Efelayima, nkunakafuma
Tshimuangi Muaba wa kulambuila milambu Pashishe, wenze tshilambuilu tshia mabaya a mitshi ya ndunga tshia kuoshila milambu
Nanku, nembuikile muaba ewu ne butumbi buanyi
Ndi mumvue miadi yabu
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne binai ne nkama mai
Bilamba abi bavua babilembeleja ne nkanu ne milonda ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole ku makunji makumi abidi a tshiamu tshikunze
Tshihungidi tshia Asa ne Bene hadada Kul
Balumbuluishi Dibikidibua dia Gideona Bena Isalele bakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; ne Yehowa wakabafila mu bianza bia Bena Midiyana bidimu muanda mutekete
Ngulube kena muakane kunudi bualu bua yeye udi ne mikono mihanduluke kadi kena uhingishilula bintu mukana; kanudi munyinyi wa nyama ei, kanulengi tshianza ham bidi ha bitalu biai

Nenteke mikalu yenu ku Dishiba Dikunze tô ne ku mai manene a Bena Peleshete, ne ku tshihela tô ne ku musulu wa Pelata, bualu bua meme nenfile bena buloba mu bianza bienu, nuenu nenubihate ku mpala kuenu
Tshilambuilu atshi tshivua kumpala kua tshilamba tshilembeleja
Butshia, Lote kufika mu Soware
Ahaba, muana wa Omeli, Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa akahita a bonso bakadi ku mpala kuandi bubi

Bualu bua nuenu kanuakakuatshila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mudimu ne disanka mu mitshima yenu bua bintu bionso biakanuheye, nunku nenukuatshile badi n enu lukuna mudimu badi Yehowa unutumina, ne nzala ne nyota ne butaka ne kuhanga kua bintu bionso
Kanuangatshi makuta bua kubingisha mushipianganyi, muena tshibawu tshia lufu
Nanku, Kayine kupeta tshiji tshikole, kufika munda
Mona, meme nengimane ku mpala kuebe ha mutu ha dibue dia Holeba, wewe neukume dibue ne mai neahatuke, bantu banue mai Mose wakenza nunku ku mesu kua bakulu ba Bena Isalele
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi Padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi, angate bukula, elepu mafuta, atentekepu ne musenga wa kamonya
Yeye wakambila bantu ba mu Sukota ne, Ndi nnusengelela ne numpe mitanda ya bidia bua bantu badi n anyi
Amasaya, muana wa Yoasha, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakikala ne muoyo bidimu dikumi ne bitanu ku nyima kua lufu lua Yehoasha, muana wa Yehoaza, mukelenge wa Isalele
Netubashihele bisumbu bia mikoko ne ngombe bua kubadisha, anyi
Bena Amona bakafila kudiye tshidimu atshi lukama lua ntalanta ya argent ne bihiminu bia blé binunu dikumi ne bia orge binunu dikumi
Bualu patudi katuyi tuenza nanku, udi mua kututumina disama dia tshiambu tshikole, nansha kutushipa ku muele wa mvita

Badi Basangula Bena Lewi bua Kulamabo Mushete Yeye wakashiya Asafa ne bana babo ku mpala kua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, bua kuenzelabo mudimu ku mpala kua mushete bikondo bionso bu muakadi mudimu wa buatshia buatshia, ne Obeda edome ne bana babo makumi asambombo ne muanda mukulu, ne Obeda edome, muana wa Yedutuna, ne Hosa bua kuikalabo balami ba bibi
Nenuikale ne milau hanuabuela mu nsubu, nenuikale ne milau hanualuhukamu

Panuafika mu ditunga dia bena Kenaane, bena Iti, bena Amore, bena Ivi ne bena Yebusa, divua Maweja Nangila mulaye bankambua benu, ditunga didi ne biakudia bipite bungi, nuikale nuenza tshibilu etshi, ku tshidimu ku tshidimu, mu ngondu wa Abibe
Kadi nebapikule muanabute wa balume wa muntu, nebapikule kabidi muanabute wa nyama udi ne mikiya
Wakajuka, wakendakana mu nsubu, wakabanda kabidi, wakadinana ham bidi na muana; muana wakela nyatshi misangu muanda mutekete, wakabulula mesu andi
Yeye wakamba ne Yeye wakumpa bihiminu ebi bia orge bisambombo, wakungambila ne Kuyi bituhu kudi mamuen ebe
Pashishe kuangataye kabidi bintu abi ku bianza bia Arone ne bia bana bende ba balume, kubitentekajaye pa mutu pa milambu ya kuosha ivua pa tshilambuilu, kubioshila Maweja Nangila

Bana ba balume ba Davidi bakamulelelabo mu Hebelone: Amenona, muan a bute, muana wa Ahinoama, Muena Yizelele; muana muibidi Danyele, muana wa Abigayila, Muena Kâmele; muana muisatu Abashaloma, muana wa Mâka, muana wa bakashi wa Talemai, mukelenge wa mu Geshû; muana muinai Adoniya, muana wa Hagita; muana muitanu Shefatiya, muana wa Abitala; muana muisambombo Itelema, muana wa mukashi wandi Egela: hakamulelela bana basambombo mu Hebelone kuakakokesheye bidimu muanda mutekete ne ngondo isambombo
Mu butuku abu Nzambi wakamueneka kudi Solomo, wakamuambila ne, Ulombe tshinakuha
Ndi nkulomba bua umpeshe bakaji banyi ne bana banyi, bua mpingane nabu kuetu, bualu udi mumanye mundi mumane kukuenzela mudimu bidimu bia bungi bua kubasela
Kadi Maweja Nangila kubabutula bonsu munkatshi mua mayi
Bantu bonso bakatendelela, bimbi ba misambu bakimba, bena mpungi bakela mpungi; bakenza nunku tô ne hakahia milambu ya kuosha yonso
Kadi panuikala basue kusela muanetu wa bakaji, bateke balume bonsu ba muenu panshi
Wakafila Bena Isalele bakuabo mu bianza bia Abishai muan abo; bobo bakasa mualu wa nvita kudi Bena Amona
Mikuna minene yakazakala ku mesu kua Yehowa; mukuna au munene wa Sinai mene ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele
Kanungu ka Mu matuku asambombo adi alonda dianyisha dia dîyi , badi badituma kwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga bwa adipatula
Diba adi, neanufuile luse
Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Solomo butuku, wakamuambila ne, Nakunvua kulomba kuebe, nakadisunguila muaba eu bu nsubu wanyi wa milambu
Biakudia kabiyi bimueneka, bantu bonsu bavua bakeba kufua nzala
Genese Diulu ne buloba ne bintu bionso biakashikishibua, buonso buabi
Nuenze mudimu wenu matuku asambombo kadi nuikishe mu dituku dia muanda mutekete, bua ngombe webe ne mpunda webe bikishe ne muana wa balume wa muhika webe mukashi, ne muenyi basangale
Yeye wakamuitaba ne Ndi nkeba bana betu, ndi nkusengelela ne, undeshe kudibo badisha mikoko
Bana ba balume ba Zebuluna, Selede ne Elona ne Yalele
Kabavua bamanye ne: Yozefe udi umvua bitudi tuamba to, bualu Yozefe uvua ne muntu uvua wandamuna mu muakulu wabu bivuaye uyukila nabu
Dibue dionsu dikale dibueja mu disosu dia tshiamu tshia mpawungi didi ku tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi
Muakuidi nealue munu wandi mu mashi makuabo a mulambu, nealabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia kahia, neahongolole mashi makuabo ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu tshia kahia
Kadi meme nkadi mumane kufuisha muananyi

Bena Izrayele bavuluke Mvidi Mukulu wabu Panuafika mu ditunga, didi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu unupesha, nuwuaye mulaye bankambua benu, Abrahame, Izake ne Yakobe, nenusangane bimenga bimpe, binene, binuvua kanuyi bibake to
Muntu eu nealue mu nsubu wanyi, anyi
Esetê wakamukudimuna ne, Bikalabi bimpe kudi mukelenge, mukelenge ne Hamana balue ku disanka dinakalongoluela mukelenge
Davidi wakanyenga ngabu ya or yakadi n ai bantu ba Hadadezê, wakalua n ai ku Yelushalema

Genese Nzambi Udi Uvudishila Yakoba Disanka ku Betele Nzambi wakambila Yakoba ne, Bika biebe uye ku Betele, ushikameku, wenzeleku Nzambi, wakamueneka kûdi bawakadi unyema ku mesu kua Esau, mukulu ebe, tshioshelu
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen

Yeye nealengeshe nsubu ne mashi a nyunyu ne mai adi ahueka ne nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo ne mitshi ya cêdre ne mabeshi a hisopa ne bintu bikunze, kadi yeye nealekele nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu tshisuku ku butshika bua musoko, nealengeshe nsubu nunku, ne nsubu neikale muakane
Wewe mubatshipe, misangu mikuabu ndi mua kubatshimuna, kubipata mu ditunga
Yakobe kumuangala muaba awu, kuya kuasa mitanda yende dishiya dia Migdale Edere
Bavua anu bindila diyi dia Maweja Nangila

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye neangate bana balume ba mikoko babidi badi kabayi ne tshilema ne muana mukashi wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue udi kayi ne tshilema ne bituha bisatu bia dikumi bia épha bia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ne dikoho dia manyi
Kadi, nuenu bitabe diyi diende, bakumbaje bionsu bindi ngamba, meme Maweja Nangila nenduishe bantu bonsu badi banuelela meji mabi
Badi mwa kwitaba dilomba adi anu pikalabu bafila ditontolola dia tshilumbulwilu ku Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika anyi ku Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi

Bikala balume babidi baluangane, ne mukashi wa umue wabo ulualua bua kusungila mulume wandi mu tshianza tshia muntu udi umukuma, udi wolola tshianza tshiandi, udi umukuata ku biaha mesu, ku nyima nebamukose tshianza tshiandi, kabamuleshi luse nansha
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Unzulula tshibi tshia ku esete; wakatshiunzulula
Abashaloma wakaya kudi mukelenge, wakamuambila ne, Mona, muntu webe udi ne bakoshi ba miosa ya mikoko, ndi nkusengelela ne, Mukelenge ne bantu bandi baye ne muntu wandi
Nembashihe ne disama dikole, nembahidie, nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshidi tshibahita bunene ne bukole

Nkuasa wa bukelenge wakadi ne tshibandilu tshia bidiatshilu bisambombo, ne tshitekelu tshia makasa tshia or tshitue ne nkuasa; bitekelu bibidi bia maboko biakadi ku luseke ne luseke lua nkuasa; tshifuanyikishi tshia nyama wa ntambue tshiakadi tshilamata ku tshitekelu ne tshitekelu tshia maboko
Bena Erane ke ndelanganyi ya Erane, muana wa Shutela
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakaluhuka, wakashiha tubalu ne makalu ne Bena Sulia ne kushiha kukole
Mêyi a ditunga adi afila buludiki bwa dibaka
Nebashale pabu mu dikenga bua dintombokela dienu, too ne panuabutuka bonsu, nuenu baledi babu
Nunku nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kusua benyi bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Nansha umue wabo wakashala anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna
Mukelenge Wakenza nkuasa munene e wa bukelenge wa mibanga, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha nyima n andi honso

Meme nakimitshisha baledi ba bantu aba mafu, anyi, nakabalela, anyi, bua wewe wakungambila ne, Ubatuale ha tshiadi tshiebe, bu mudi muledi utuala muana utshidi wamua, tô ne ku buloba buwakalaya batatu abo
Mose wakamanyisha Yehowa mei a bantu
Muntu wakalua lubilu, wakambila Eli
Batuadi ba majitu: Bana ba Shaluma ne bana ba Atê ne bana ba Talemona ne bana ba Akuba ne bana ba Hatita ne bana ba Shobai lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu
Munyinyi udi utuanganaa ne tshintu tshibi, kabena mua kûdia, nebawoshe mu kahia
Nanku, bena Izrayele bavua bajula mitanda, bayasa muaba mukuabu, pavua Maweja Nangila muambe
Kuikadi ne nzambi mikuabo ne meme hohamue
Pashishe muena mudimu wa Abrahame ne bonsu bavuaye muende nabu, kudiabu, kunuabu, kulalabu
Bidimu bia tshiole muanda mutekete biakabanga kulua bu muakamba Yosefe, biole biakadi mu maloba onso, kadi mu Ejipitu muakadi mushale bintu bia kudia
Kadi nenjadike tshihungidi tshiandi ne Isaka, wakulelela Sala tshidimu tshialua hakumbana ngondo yandi
Mukalenga wa bena Edome kubenga, wamba ne: Kanuena mua kupita to
Padi mukaji ulala ne nyama, bamushipe
Mukaji yonsu wa bena Izrayele, nealombe kudi mukaji wa bena Ejipitu udi ku nzubu kuende, nansha kudi muena mutumba nende, bintu bia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, nansha bia mpawungi
Kanuenzedianganyi bibi to, nunnemeke meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Nunku Bena Edome badi batombokela Bena Yuda tô ne ku dituku edi; hashishe Bena Libina bakamutombokela kabidi, bualu bua yeye wakahidia Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu andi
Bakamuangalaka tô ne ku tshibuelelu tshia Gedô ku luseke lua ku esete kua tshibanda bua kukebabo mashinde a kudisha n au bimuna biabo
Nunku unvuai dî dianyi, nuhingishe bahika aba banuakukuata kudi bana benu; bualu bua tshiji tshikole tshia Yehowa tshidi kunudi
Bena Peleshete bakangata mushete wa Nzambi, bakalua n au mu nsubu wa Dagona, bakauteka hehi ne Dagona

Mose Udi Uhingana mu Ejipitu Mose wakahingana kudi Yetelo tatu andi muenu, wakamuambila ne, Ndi musue kuhingana kudi bana betu badi mu Ejipitu, bua kubamona ne bobo batshidi ne muoyo Yetelo wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe talala
Yeye wakangata bantu bandi, wakabatahulula mu bisumbu bisatu, bakalamina; wakatangila bantu baluhuka ku musoko, ne yeye wakabika, wakabaluisha ne wakabashiha
Numuke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu: nutumikile mikenji ei yonso
Manashe wakadi ne bidimu dikumi ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi atanu ne bitanu
Hashishe Yoaba wakahingana ku Yelushalema
Nakuiba bintu bia nganyi

Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi usanganyibwa pa tshipapu tshia ditunga udi ne bukookeshi bwa kwendakanapu mudilekelela, bukookeshi bwa kwasapu lwende lubanza, bwa kumbuka ne kupingana, bilondeshila makanyika a mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga
Bana bende ba balume kumuambuila mashi

Mose wakabatuma bua kutentekela buloba bua Kanâna, wakabambila ne, Yilai ku nshila wa luseke lua Sude, yai bienu mu buloba bua mikuna nutangile buloba ne budi munyi, bantu badimu badi bakole anyi badi batekete, badi banya banya anyi badi ba bungi: buloba budi munyi budibo bashikama, budi buimpe anyi budi bubi, misoko idibo bashikamamu idi ya hatuhu anyi idi ya mpangu ya mabue, nutangile buloba ne budi ne bufunfule anyi budi busenguluke, mitangile ne mudi metu, anyi kaenamu
Nunku bakatshina Yehowa, kadi bakadisunguila bakuidi ba munkatshi muabo, bakabafidila milambu mu nsubu yakadi ku mutu kua mikuna
Netubuelemu munyi
Mose wakangata mashi, wakâmiamma ham bidi ha bantu, wakamba ne, Tangilai mashi a dihungila, diakuhunga n enu Yehowa bua mei au onso

Ubambile kabidi ne, Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua bana benu ku bikondo biabo bionso udi ulua ha buihi ne bintu bidi Bena Isalele bajidile Yehowa ne mubidi wandi kauyi muakane, nebamumushe ku mesu kuanyi meme ndi Yehowa

Kadi misoko ya bantu aba idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuhayi bua nuenu kuyihiana, kanusungidi tshintu tshimue tshidi tshieyela muhuya; kadi nenubishihe bionso: ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; bua bobo kabanuyishi mua kulonda malu mabi abo, adibo benzela nzambi yabo; nunku nuenu nenuenzele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bibi
Hakunvua Yoaba mei a mpungi, wakamba ne, Ahu diyoyo dinene didi ku musoko ndia tshinyi
Yeye wakadimusha Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima; bualu bua wewe neulue ne Bena Isalele mu buloba bunakabalaya; meme nengikale n ebe
Kubambilaye ne: Dianjilayi kumpala
Bua mukaji nebafute Maweja Nangila nkanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole makumi asatu
Kadi bena Sodome bavua bena buenzayi, babenga meyi a Maweja Nangila
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neanufikishe mu ditunga didiye munupe
Yehowa kakahunga tshihungidi etshi ne batatu betu, kadi wakatshihunga anu n etu buonso buetu badi ne muoyo lelu eu
Kanuluatshi tshilulu tshiakakumabo ne miosa ya mikoko misambakasha ne buanda bua lin
Kutuadija musangu awu, mabue adi amu mu mushete amu
Bena Isalele bakakudimuna mitshima yabo bualu bua Bena Benyamina, bana babo, bamba ne, Tshisamba tshimue tshidi tshiumushibua munkatshi mua Bena Isalele lelu
Hakunvuabo mei akamba Davidi, bakâmbila Shaula, ne yeye wakamubikila
Yoshua wakambila Akana ne, Muan anyi, ndi nkusengelela ne, Utumbishe Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, umutondele bubi buebe; ungambile buwakuenza, kubusokoki kundi nansha
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Tshianza tshia Yoaba tshidi n ebe mu bualu ebu buonso, anyi
Kadi Abishai, muana wa Seluya, wakanusungila, wakataha Muena Peleshete, wakamushiha

a Sedekiya wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne tshimue hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu dikumi ne tshimue; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Hamutala, muana mukashi wa Yelemiya wa mu Libena
Pashishe Arone kukosa nyama wende wa tshimpanga wa mulambu wa kuosha awu muminu
Hakalua dituku dia muanda mutekete, bakambila mukashi wa Shimishona ne, Wewe witabushishe bayebe bua atujinguluile dijimbu, anyi tuetu netuoshe nsubu wa tatu webe ne kahia
Alona wakalela Nadaba ne Abihu ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ
Hakafuma mukelenge ku Damaseke, yeye wakatangila tshioshelu; wakasemena ha buihi ne tshioshelu, wakafilahu milambu
Mikuna eyi idi pabuipi ne mitshi ya nsanga ya tshijila ya mu Moreya, idi mitangilangane ne Ngilgale
Kabidi bavua bateta Maweja Nangila, badikonka ne: Maweja Nangila udi munkatshi muetu anyi kenamu
Yeye wakamba ne, Wakukuteka mukelenge wetu ne mulumbuluishi wetu nganyi
Nebakutuadile wewe anu bilumbu binene
Butshiama bua luhangu lua ku esete nebuikale coudées makumi atanu
Nunku yeye wakahingana n andi, wakadia mu nsubu muandi, wakanuamu
Moshe kubikila Yoshuwa, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile, kumuimanyika kumpala kua mutuangaji Elazare ne bena Izrayele bonsu

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Solomo ne, Bua nsubu eu ûdi wibaka, biwenda mu nshila yanyi, biwenza mei anyi, biwatumikila mikenji yanyi yonso, nunku nenjadike dî dianyi kûdi, diakambila Davidi, tatu webe
Halua tshidimu tshitanu, nudi mua kudia mamuma ne kuendulula n au mushinga meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yoshua wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakasangisha bantu, ne yeye ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele bakaya ku mpala kua bantu ku Ai

Kadi kanudi nyama mikuabo idi mihingishilula bintu mukana anyi idi ne mikono mihanduluke: kamelo, ne nsenji, ne kabundi ka ku mputu; bualu bua nyama ei idi mihingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kayena ne mikono mihanduluke, kayena miakane kunudi
Nenudie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku asambombo; ne dituku dia muanda mutekete nedikale dia tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; kanuenji mudimu nansha
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakambila Manoa ne, Mukashi adimuke bua mei onso anakamuambila
Tuakuangata argent yonso yakadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, tuakuyifila mu bianza bia tuhita ne mu bianza bia bena mudimu
Eliya wakabanda ha mutu ha Kâmele; wakinama hanshi, wakateka mpala wandi hankatshi ha binu biandi
Bavua bambila Moshe ne: Wewe nkayebe utuambile malu onsu, netuteleje

Nanku bena Ngershone nebenze midimu eyi: kuambula tshilamba tshia kubuikila nzubu wa tshijila, biseba bia mikoku ya bimpanga ne bia nyama wa nkonga bia kubuikila pa mutu pa bionsu, tshilamba tshia mu mushiku wa ntenta
Kuikadi ne nzambi mikuabo ne meme hohamue
Bena Isalele Badi Batombokela Yehowa ku Holeba Numanye bienu ne, Yehowa kena munuhe buloba ebu buimpe bu buhianyi bualu bua buakane buenu; bualu bua nudi bantu ba tshitshu
Kadi Shekeme kunanga Diina bikole, kumuambila malu onsu avua munda muende, bua atekeshe muoyi wende
Yeye wakamba ne, Biasuabo ditalala, nubakuate ne muoyo; biasuabo nvita, nubakuate ne muoyo kabidi
Hakatshiabu, hakalua Bena Peleshete bua kunyengabo bintu bia bantu bafue, bakasangana Shaula ne bana bandi ba balume bahone hanshi ku mukuna wa Gileboa
Musulu wa mayi kupatuka mu Edene bua kufila tshitalela mu lupangu

Bienzedi bia Hezikiya bikuabo ne bukole buandi buonso ne bu muakumbuleye dina dinene ne mitubu bia kutuma mai munda mua musoko, kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Mvidie eyi ke idibu batendelela kudi bantu ba bisamba bikuabu, bidi pabuipi nenu, nansha bidi kule, pa buloba bujima
Hashishe Ehuda wakahatuka mu tubanda, wakamuinshidila bibi bia ku nsubu wa kulu, wakela nsahi
Bana babu ne Yozefe kuambuisha tumelu tuabu bibombi bia ntete ya kuenza bukula abi, kupingana ku Kenaane
Tuetu nkayetu tudi basue kuenza nunku kabidi
Batshidi mua kulumona mu Raba, tshimenga tshinene tshia bena Amone
Usokoke mushete udi ne meyi ne mikenji panyima pa tshilamba atshi
Bobo bakatuma dî, bakabikila bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete, bakabambila ne, Numushe mushete wa Nzambi wa Isalele kutudi, uye ku muaba wau, kautushihi ne bana betu
Wakenza malonga a mesa, ne nkuta ne bihanza ne bibuikilu bia bintu ebi ne tshiamu tshia or nkayandi

Kanungu ka Bûngi bwabo mu tshipidi tshiônso, midimu ya kutuma dîyi dîba diônso ne miaba yônso, idi ne tshia kulondeshila bipangidikilu bilelela bitangila popamwe dikumbana dia mubidi,dia kalasa kalonga ne bibidilu bîmpe pamwe ne dileeja dia mpala dia momumwe dia polovensa ne polovensa
Kulondolola Tunkanunuina tua Yuda Bana ba balume ba Yuda: Pelese, Heselona ne Kâmi ne Hula ne Shobala
Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Benyamina
Tamare kumuambila ne: Ungeyeke tshitampi tshiebe tshia mu nshingu, ne nshinga uudi mutshiela
Matuku onsu atshidi bantu pa buloba, tshikondu tshia kukuna ne tshia kunowa, tshia mashika ne tshia luya, tshia mvula ne tshia mushipu, tshia munya ne tshia midima kabiena bijika kabidi to
Mukelenge wakabikila Bena Gibeona, wakayikila n abo
Bena Izrayele kuipata bena Amore, kubanyenga tshimenga atshi, kabidi ne misoku yonsu ivua mutumba natshi
Wewe musangane bantu bakane makumi atanu mu musoku awu, udi mua kufuilaku musoku mujima luse, bua kupandisha bantu aba makumi atanu, anyi udi ubutula musoku mujima
, ne nsongakaji ivua kayiyi mianji kumanya balume
Kanubatshinyi, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila nvita
Maweja Nangila neanupe bana ba bungi, biakudia bipite bungi pa madimi enu; neavudije ngombe yenu, mikoku ne mbuji
Yehowa neanujadike bu bantu bandi ba tshijila, bu muakanulayeye, binuatumikila mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, binuenda mu nshila yandi
Neavuluke ndondu uvuaye mutue ne bankambua benu
Isaka wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi muan anyi Esau bulelela, anyi

Wewe neubambile kabidi ne, Eu udi mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia unudi nûfila kudi Yehowa bana balume ba mikoko ba tshidimu tshimue, badi kabayi ne tshilema, bana babidi ba buatshia buatshia, bu mulambu wa kuosha wa tshiendelele
Nakunvua lumu ne, Wewe udi ukosa miosa ya mikoko; balami bebe ba mikoko bakadi n etu, tuetu katuakabenzela bibi, kabakamba tshintu tshimue musangu wonso wakadibo mu Kâmele

Bualu bua ndi mumanye ne, Ku nyima kua lufu luanyi nenutambe kudisangisha ne kusesuka mu nshila unakunulesha; malu mabi neanukuate mu matuku atshidi ku mpala; bualu bua nuenu nenuenze malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufikisha munda bua mudimu wa bianza bienu
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa ditunga udi upatula dîyi mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adibo bamutuminadio panyima pa bipungu bidibu bafila kudi tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu
Wewe neukole ukulakaja, ufua ne disanka ne ditalala, ulonda bankambua bebe
Kanuenji bu munudi nuenza kunoko lelu, benza muntu yonso anu malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi; bualu bua kanuena banze kubuela mu dikisha ne buhianyi bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Meku a Bena Kohata, Bena Lewi, bakashala, bakangata bimenga bia mu tshituha tshiabo tshia mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima

Katataka, tangilai, anu meme nkayanyi, nYeye mene, kakuena nzambi mukuabo, anu meme; meme ndi nshiha bantu, ndi mbabisha ku lufu; meme ndi ntaha bantu mputa, ndi mbondaha kabidi; kakuena muntu udi mua kubasungila mu tshianza tshianyi
Butuku ne munya nenuikale anu nuzakala
Muladilu wa Dituku dia Dikisha, muena Izrayele yonsu uvua wambula litre ya biakudia muanda mukulu pa mutu pa inayi iwaye wambula ku dituku
Diba adi, muntu wa kunudi udi ne muoyi muimpe, wa kanemu, newoshe muanabu, nansha bana badiye mushale nabu, nansha mukajende, disu dia lonji
Muntu umue wakadi kumanya mua kuihata tshinunu tshia bantu, ne bantu babidi bakadi kumanya mua kuihata binunu dikumi bia bantu munyi, bikala Dibue kadiyi dibahane, ne Yehowa kayi mubafile kudibo
Rakele, mukaji wa Yakobe, uvua mulele bana ba balume babidi: Yozefe ne Binyamine
Kuinshi kuonsu aku, kuvua kulembeleja kabidi ndibu ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi menemene, pankatshi pa bimuma bia grenade
Ndi mumanye ne: pambafua, bena Izrayele nebenze bibi, nebabenge bionsu bimvua mubambile
Lelu udi ungipata pa buloba
Mose wakadimusha bantu dituku adi mene ne, Bantu aba nebimane ha mutu ha Gelizima bua kuvudishila bantu disanka hanuasabuka Yadene: Shimeona ne Lewi ne Yuda ne Yisakâ ne Yosefe ne Benyamina
Pashishe nebabuikile tshiseba tshikole tshia nyama wa nkonga pa bintu bionsu ebi, babiteka pa mabaya a kubiambula nawu
Bualu nudi tshisamba tshia bantu badi bamutombokela
Bualu bidimu bikuabu bia tshiyole bitshidi bishale bitanu
Muntu yonso udi ushikama ha tshintu tshiashikameye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo

Bakafila milambu kudi Yehowa; bakafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa, ne lunkelu kabidi bakafila tshinunu tshia balume ba ngombe ne tshinunu tshia bimpanga ne tshinunu tshia bana ba mikoko ne milambu idibo banua; Bena Isalele bonso bakafila milambu ya bungi; bakadia, bakanua ku mpala kua Yehowa dituku adi ne disanka dinene
Baye kukuata ditunga dimvua muditshipe bua kupesha bankambua babu
Pashishe mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kutuma diyi bua bantu bende bumushe Abrame mu ditunga pamue ne mukajende ne bionsu bivuaye nabi
Nuenze midimu yenu matuku asambombu
Enza mabaya makumi abidi bua kuteka ku luseke lua ku Sude lua tshitendelelu
Yotama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika hohamue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi, tatu wandi; Ahaza, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Nunku, Nzambi wetu, tudi tukusakidila, tudi tutumbisha dina diebe dia butumbi
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi, anyi yeye neatekeshe mitshima ya bantu bakuabo
Mbuji wa mpumbu umue bua mulambu wa dikobolola bantu

Pa mwânzu ewu, mudimu watshi udi wa: a bulami bwa lupetu lwa mbulamatadi; b dikuba ne dishindamija dia bulongolodi bwa mianda ya kashintu; c disunguluja ne dikumbaja dia bulongodi bwa mianda ya kashintu; d ditangilula dia bujima bwa mianda ya tshibutshilu; e difila dia ngenyi mitangila bubanji ne lupetu kudi Bukalenga bunene

Yeye wakimana ku mpala kua tshioshelu tshia Yehowa ku mpala kua Bena Isalele bonso, wakolola bianza biandi bualu bua Solomo Wakenza tshiambidilu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku: bule buatshi buakadi coudées itanu, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées itanu, ne bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées isatu, wakatshidika mu tshiendedi; yeye wakimana ha mutu hatshi, wakatua binu biandi hanshi ku mpala kua Bena Isalele bonso, wakolola bianza biandi kulu , wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, kakuena Nzambi mukuabo bu wewe mu diulu anyi hanshi ha buloba; udi ulama tshihungidi tshiebe ne luse lujalame ne bantu bebe badi benda ku mpala kuebe ne mitshima yabo yonso; wakashikisha kudi Davidi tatu wanyi milayi yonso wakamulaya; bulelela, wewe udi wamba dî mukana muebe, udi udishikisha ne bianza biebe, bu muakuenjibua lelu eu
Mose ne bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi bakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Huwai, unvuai, Bena Isalele, lelu nuakulua bu bantu ba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Amu bumuka mu tshimenga, kabayi banji kuenda mutantshi mule, Yozefe kuambila mulombodi wa bena mudimu bende ne: Londakaja bantu abu lukasa, ubapete, ubakonke ne: Tuetu banuenzele bimpe, nuenu nudi nutuenzela bibi bua tshinyi
Kumonaye ne bionsu bidi bimpe
Muntu yonsu wa kunudi anemeke tatuende ne mamuende, kabidi anemeke dituku dia Dikisha
Bidi bimueka ne: kakuena tshidi mua kubakolela kabidi
Labana wakebesha Yakoba ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi tshinyi, wakunyema kundi mu musokoko, wakuya ne bana banyi bakashi bu bahika bakuata mu nvita, anyi
Pikala muena tshimuna atshi kule, nansha panuikala kanuyi bamumanye, nulame amu tshimuna atshi ku nzubu kuenu, too ne pafika muenatshi bua kutshiangata
Hanuahuola tumuma tukese tua mu madimi enu a tumuma, kanutuhuodi tshiakabidi: tumuma netushale tua benyi ne tua bana ba nshiya ne tua bakashi ba mu lufuila

Nyama udi mufofo, anyi ne mifuba mitshibuke, anyi udi ujeka, anyi udi ne mputa, anyi udi ne tshikutu, anyi udi ne bilamulamu, kanufidi nyama ei kudi Yehowa bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa
Kanukebi mua kubalesha ditalala ne malu makane tô matuku enu onso

Bakumuka mu tshihela, bakaya ku Matana: bakumuka ku Matana, bakaya ku Nahaliele, bakumuka ku Nahaliele, bakaya ku Bamota, bakumuka ku Bamota, bakaya mu tshibanda tshia mu buloba bua Moaba tô ne ku mutu kua mukuna wa Pisega, kuakatangilabo tshihela
Hakambabo kufika kunfudilu kua musoko, Samuele wakambila Shaula ne, Ambile muena mudimu webe ahite ku mpala kuetu ne yeye wakahita , kadi wimane biebe bua meme kutunyuisha mei a Nzambi
Bana ba balume ba Kohata: Amalama ne Yisehâ ne Hebelone ne Uziele, bidimu bia Kohata biakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne bisatu
Pa kuenza tshibilu etshi, mmianyishe bana benu ba balume ne: Tudi tuenza nunku, bua kuvuluka muvua Maweja Nangila mutupatule mu Ejipitu
Mambre ne bana babu Eshekole ne Anere bavua batue ndondu ne Abrame
Mvidi Mukulu kumuambila ne: Kabena bakubikila kabidi ne: Yakobe to
Bena Ejipitu kabakunua kabidi mayi awu to
Mulume umona mukaji, kuelaye diyi dikole wamba ne: Mpindiewu mbapetshi wa ku meme, munyinyi wa ku munyinyi wanyi, mufuba wa ku mifuba yanyi
Davidi wakabikila umue wa bansongalume bandi, wakamuambila ne, Semena ha buihi n andi, umushihe
Muntu yônso udi mwa kuya ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu bwa kuleeja dibenga kumvwangana dia Dîyi dikulu ne dipangadika diônso dia bwenji anyi dia buludiki
Bena Isalele bonso nebunvue lumu elu, nebatshine, kabena benza bualu ebu bubi kabidi munkatshi muenu
Yehowa avudishile bintu biandi disanka, itabushe mudimu wa bianza biandi: atshibule nyima ya bantu badi bahika ku mpala kuandi, ne ya badi n andi lukuna bua kababiki kabidi

Yehowa wakamufila buloba buonso bua Gilada tô ne ku Dana, ne buloba buonso bua Nafatale, ne bua Efelayima ne Manashe ne buloba buonso bua Yuda tô ne ku mai manene a ku nyima, ne buloba bua ku Sude, ne mpata wa mu tshibanda tshia Yeleko, musoko wa mabue, tô ne ku Soâ
Bûngi bwa batshipwita bakulumpa pamwe ne mushindu wa kubasungula ne kusungudibwa badi babuleeja kudi dîyi didi ditangila masungulangana
Wewe kutuandamuna ne: Panuikala kanuyi bafike ne muakunyenu awu, kanufiki kabidi kunu to
Mukelenge wakumuka, ne bantu bonso bakamulonda, bakashikama mu Bete mêhaka
Mukashi, muhika wandi wakadiye mubake, wa mu Shekeme, wakamulelela muana wa balume kabidi, wakamuidika dina ne Abimeleke

Kadi Yonatana kakunyua hakakandika tatu wandi bantu ne mutshihu: nunku yeye wakatua lusongo lua mulangala wakadi mu tshianza tshiandi mu dihula dia buitshi, wakela tshianza mukana muandi; mesu andi akatanduka
Hebê wakalela Yafeleta ne Shomê ne Hotama, ne Shua wakadi muan abo wa bakashi
Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, muakuidi neamutangile ne bikala disama ditampakane mu dikoba muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi
Muinshi muatshi muakadi bifuanyikishi bia ngombe yakanyunguluka ku nseke yonso, ku coudées dikumi ku nseke yonso ya tshiowelu

Yeye wakamuvudishila disanka, wakamba ne, Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu, mufuki wa diulu ne buloba asankishe Abalama, ne Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu, wakafua bena lukuna bebe mu tshianza tshiebe, atumbishibue Abalama wakamuha tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso
Nakamuambila ne, Binahanga kuhingana n andi kûdi, hashishe nendituadile bujitu bua bualu ebu tshiendelele

Kadi padi tshitalu atshi tshikale tshia tatuende, nansha mamuende, nansha muanabu wa balume, nansha tshia muanende wa balume nansha wa bakaji, mikiya ayi kayena Padiye ulenga tshitalu tshia muanabu wa bakaji, udi kayi muanji kuya ku dibaka, kena upia mikiya to
Sala wakadi useka munda munda, wamba ne, Meme nakulua mukoke ne mukelenge wanyi muikale mununu kabidi, nengikale ne disanka, anyi

Lewitiki Mikenji ya Bintu Bidibo Bajidila Yehowa Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Biasua mundi kushikisha kuditshiha kua kudifila kuandi, wewe neubale bungi bua bintu bidiye ufila kudi Yehowa

Tshisamba tshia Binyamine tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Bela, ndelanganyi ya Bela; dia bena Ashebele, ndelanganyi ya Ashebele; dia bena Akirame, ndelanganyi ya Akirame; dia bena Shufame, ndelanganyi ya Shufame; ne dia bena Ufame, ndelanganyi ya Ufame
Kumbulaye tshiina tshia mayi tshisatu muaba mukuabu
Yeye wakamba ne, Udi tshihe kundi yeye wakaditshiha Isalele wakashindamina mutu ku mutu wa bulalu
Hashishe, hakadiye wakula, tangilai, Lebeka wakadi mulela kudi Betuele, muana mulume wa Mileka, mukashi wa Naho, muan abo ne Abalahama, wakaluhuka ne mulondo wa mai ha diaha diandi
Mukelenge Wakenza ngabu ya or yakatulabo nkama ibidi: bujitu bua or ya mu ngabu umue buakadi nshekele nkama isambombo
Mikenji ya bena Levi BADI BAJIDILA BATUANGAJI BA KUMPALA Tshibilu tshia kujidila Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ubikidishe Arone ne bana bende ba balume ku mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Tshiena mfika munda lukasa

Milau ei yonso neyilue kunudi, neyinulonde, neyinuhete tô ne hanuajimishibua ba buloba; bualu bua nuenu kanuakunvua mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi biakanuambileye: milau ei neyikale kunudi bu tshimanyinu ne dikema, ne kudi bana benu tshiendelele
Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe
Nunku bakamushikika mu dikalu diandi
Matuku onso a Mahalelela akadi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi tshitema ne bitanu, yeye wakafua biandi
Pa kumbusha bulongolodi bukwabu bwa Dîyi dikulu
Pashishe, Arone kuangata tukanu atu, kutuengululaye muiku, kututuaye mu tshinu, kuenzaye lupingu lua kana ka ngombe, ka tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Pashishe, tshilambuilu katshikadi ne bibandilu to, bualu butaka bua udi ubanda bua kundambula milambu budi mua kumueneka
Kadi butuku abu mene dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Natana ne, Ya, Wambile muntu wanyi Davidi ne, Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Wewe udi musue kungibakila nsubu wa meme kushikamamu, anyi
Semena biebe ha buihi, unvua mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, musue kubambila: utuambile bietu mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, mukuambile; tuetu netulue dî diandi, netudienze
Bena Ngade mbalale bu nyama wa ntambue, ukeba mua kukuata nyama, kumudia mujima, ne maboku ne mutu
Nunku kakunyua dî dia Yehowa; bakahingana mu nshila yabo bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa
Mvua mpola tumuma atu, nkamina mayi mu dikopu adi bua kudipesha mukalenga
Diampa adi badikose mu bitupa, bela kabidi mafuta pa bitupa abi, bualu mmulambu wa bintu bia mu budimi
Nebakumbaje mikenji yende
Ku Holeba wa mu nshila wa ku mukuna wa Sei tô ne ku Kadeshe bânea, nduendu lua matuku dikumi ne dimue
Yakoba wakatangila mpala wa Labana, kakadi bu muvueye dia mbedi

Kadi panudi nulambula Maweja Nangila bintu bia tshianyi bia mu madimi enu, nudi mua kuelamu buanga bua mampa ne buitshi, kanuyi nubiosha pa tshilambuilu, bu munudi nuenza ne mulambu udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Bualu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu mmusungule bena Levi kashidi munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabu bionsu, bua bamuenzele mudimu wa butuangaji
Nuvuluke matuku a diambedi, nuelangane meji a bidimu ne bikondo bia bungi: webeshe tatu webe, ne yeye neakuleshe; ne bakulu benu, bobo nebakuambile
Yeye wakahunga dî ne Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, ne Ebeyatâ muakuidi; bobo bakalonda Adoniya, bakanutatshisha
Padi muena Izrayele, nansha muenyi udi musombe munkatshi muabu, ukuata nyama nansha nyunyi mu bulembi, wa ku idi bantu mua kudia, neele mashi ende panshi, aajibikile ne buloba

Nunku nuangate dikalu dihia dihia, nudilongolole bimpe, nuangate ngombe ibidi idi ne mabele, idi kayiyi mianze kumanya mutshi wa tshikokedi; nusuike ngombe ku dikalu, nuhingishe bana bai mu nsubu wai; nuangate mushete wa Yehowa, nuteke ha dikalu, nuteke bintu bia or binudi numuhingishila bu mulambu mu mushete mukuabo, nûsuike ku mpenge; nutume mushete, uye
Muntu yonso wakashiha muntu wakadi uluangana n andi; Bena Sulia bakanyema, ne Bena Isalele bakabihata

Yehowa Udi Witabusha bua Mose Atangile Buloba bua Kanâna Yehowa wakambila Mose dituku adi mene ne, Banda biebe mukuna eu wa Abalima, ku mutu kua mukuna wa Nebo, udi buludiludi ne Yeleko mu buloba bua Moaba, utangile buloba bua Kanâna bundi mpa Bena Isalele bu buhianyi buabo; afue biebe ku mukuna ûdi ubanda, usangishibue kudi bankambua bebe, bu muakafua Alona, mukulu webe, ku mukuna wa Hô, wakasangishibua kudi bankambua bandi: bualu bua wewe wakahidia dî dianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele ku mai a Meliba a mu Kadesha mu tshihela tshia Sina; bualu bua wewe kuakanjidila munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Nuenu nuakalua kundi, buonso buenu muakamba ne, Tutume bantu ku mpala kuetu, bua hobo batentekele buloba, bahingane, batumanyishe bua nshila utudi tuyamu, ne misoko itudi tubuelamu

Bimenga bia tshisamba tshia Bena Benyamina ku meku abo biakadi Yeleko ne Bete hogola ne Emeke kezizi, ne Bete alabâ ne Semalayima ne Betele, ne Bena Awa ne Pâla ne Ofela, ne Kefâ amonai ne Ofeni ne Geba; bimenga dikumi ne bibidi ne misoko yabi; Gibeona ne Lama ne Belota, ne Misepe ne Kefila ne Moza, ne Lekema ne Yipele ne Talalâ, ne Sela ne Elefe ne musoko wa Bena Yebuse Yelushalema mene , Gibena ne Kîyata; bimenga dikumi ne binai ne misoko yabi
Yeye wakadila kudi tatu wandi ne, Mutu wanyi, mutu wanyi
Pashishe balombodi ba bena mvita, nebambile bena mvita ne: Pikala muntu wa munkatshi muenu muase nzubu, kayi muanji kusombamu, apingane kuende
Hezikiya kena unuitabushisha bua kunuluisha ne tshiole ne nyota, wamba ne, Yehowa Nzambi wetu neatuhandishe mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Ashû, anyi
Uhiane biebe buloba bua ku dishiha ne bua ku sude
Muntu yonsu udi ulenga tshintu tshivua pa bulalu bua mukaji awu, nansha tshivua pa muaba uvuaye musombe, neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Davidi ne bantu bandi bonso bakahingana ku Yelushalema

Kadi Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona, wakahidia bua tuetu tuhite mu buloba; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanyengabasha meji andi, wakakolesha mutshima wandi, bualu bua kumufila mu tshianza tshienu, bu muakenzeye lelu
Nanku Maweja Nangila uvua wakula, mutangilangane nenu, ku mukuna, munkatshi mua kapia
Mose wakafunda mikenji ei, wakayifila mu bianza bia bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne kudi bakulu bonso ba mu Isalele

Wewe neushikame mu buloba bua Goshene, newikale ha buihi n anyi, wewe ne bana bebe ne bana ba bana bebe, ne mikoko yebe ne ngombe yebe ne bintu bionso biudi n abi, nenkudishileku bualu bua bidimu bia tshiole bidi bishale bitanu; kanulu bu bahele, wewe ne bonso badi mu nsubu webe ne bintu biudi n abi
Bakenza makalu au bu mudibo benza makalu a nvita: bakafula milonda yau ne biamu bia nkata ne tulonda tuau ne tshielelu tshia tukanu
Nomba Milambu ya Buatshia buatshia Ek

Kadi mu bualu ebu buonso kanuakatumikila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakaya ku mpala kuenu mu nshila bua kunukebela muaba wa kushimika ntenta yenu, mu difutu dikenka kahia butuku, ne mu dî tulu dia diledi munya, bua kunulombola mu nshila unuakadi ne bualu bua kuenda
Yeshaya wakambila Hezikiya ne, Unvue biebe dî dia Yehowa
Hakalueye kudiye, yeye wakamusengelela bua yeye kulomba tatu wandi budimi; mukashi wakahuka ha nyima ha mpunda wandi, ne Kaleba wakamuebesha ne, Udi musue tshinyi
Pashishe, neenze bionsu bidi bikengela bua kukobolola batuangaji ne bena Izrayele bonsu
Mu ditunga dienu nemuikale mitshi ya olive ya bungi
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakambila Belâma ne, Ya biebe ne balume aba kadi wewe wambe anu dî dinaknambila

Yonatana wakasua kuya kudi masalayi a Bena Peleshete mu nshila mubumbakane, dibue disongoloka diakadi ku tshianza tshia balume, dikuabo disongoloka diakadi ku tshianza tshia bakashi: dina dia dikuabo diakadi Bosese, dina dia dinga diakadi Sene
Nebumvuangane amu ku mushinga udiye wamba awu

Muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu udi utambisha muan andi mulume anyi muan andi mukashi mu kahia, nansha mutempi wa mbuku, nansha muena dijimbu nansha muena bilengulengu, nansha muena buloshi, nansha musesuishi wa bantu ne miloû yandi, nansha mutendeledi wa bakishi, nansha muena muhongo, nansha muena lubuku lua muzangu
