Bialenga muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi munga muntu tshianza diambedi yeye kayi muanze kuowa bianza biandi, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Budimi ne lubuebue luakadimu biakaya mu bianza bia Abalahama tshiendelele ku mpala kua bana ba Hete bu muaba wa kujikabo bantu bafue

Dielulula Bintu bidi ndelanganyi ya bena Levi mua kuangata Tshisamba tshijima tshia bena Levi nansha batuangaji badi munkatshi muabu, kabena bapeta buloba bua bumpianyi, munkatshi mua bena Izrayele to
Nenku, bimuma bionsu biakuamayi tshidimu tshinayi, nubindambule mu tshibilu tshia dintumbisha
Bena Lewi ne bana ba Kohata ne bana ba Kola bakajuka, bakatumbisha Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele ne dî dikole
Mututshianganyi, bamufute pende

Bakenza n atshi nkanu ya ku tshibi tshia nsubu, ne tshioshelu tshia nyama ne biamu bitshiamakane, ne malonga onso a tshioshelu, ne nkanu ya ku luhangu, ne nkanu ya ku tshibi tshia luhangu, ne milonda yonso ya mu nsubu, ne milonda yonso ya mu luhangu lua ku muaba wa tshitendelelu
Yeye wakanumanyisha bua tshihungidi tshiandi tshiakanuambileye bua nuenu nuenze, mikenji ei dikumi mene mene; yeye wakayifunda ha mabue abidi

Tshisamba tshia bena Naftali tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Yashiyele, ndelanganyi ya Yashiyele; dia bena Nguni, ndelanganyi ya Nguni; dia bena Yeshere, ndelanganyi ya Yeshere; dia bena Shileme, ndelanganyi ya Shileme

Dimungutula nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kwenzeka mu tshidimu tshidi tshilonda masungulangana, nansha mu tshikondo tshia mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi wa bilwilu anyi tshia mvita, nansha padi Ditunga ku bulombodi bwa mfumu wa tshimpitshimpi

Davidi wakajuka, wakalua ku muaba wakadi Shaula mutule; Davidi wakatangila muaba wakadi Shaula mulale ne Abinê, muana wa Ne, kapitene ka masalayi andi, Shaula wakadi mulale munkatshi mua makalu ne bantu bandi bakadi bamunyunguluka
Bobu bamane kupatuka mu ditunga, mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu mukuabu kuambila Lote ne: Nyema, kolesha bua kudipandisha
Dituku adi, nenuikishe, anu bu munudi nuenza dituku dia Dikisha
Datane ne Abirame bavua bapatuke mu ntenta yabu, bimane pambelu ne bakaji babu, bana babu ne bena meku abu bonsu
Kufila Kuabo kua Buatshiabuatshia Nom
Meme ndi mulami wa muanetu anyi
Udimuke biebe, bualu bua Yehowa wakukusungula bua wewe kuibaka nsubu udi mua kuikala muaba wandi wa tshijila; wikale ne bukole, wenze nsubu eu
Bukokeshi bua Yehoshafata Bak
Bonsu ne: Enze

Hashishe Menahema wakahaula musoko wa Tifesa, wakashiha bantu bakadiku tô ne ku Tîsa; bualu bua bobo kabakunzulula bibi ku mpala kuandi, yeye wakabashiha; bakashi bonso bakadi ne mafu, yeye wakabahanda
Bantu banyi bonsu nebitabe mikenji yebe
Yeye wakatshina, wakamba ne Muaba eu ngua bualu bukole udi nsubu wa Nzambi ne bu mushiku wa diulu
Maweja Nangila mmubapeshe ditunga dia mikuna, mubadishe ne biakudia bia mu madimi, mubapatule buitshi mu lubuebue
Aba mbakelenge bakakokesha mu buloba bua Edome diambedi mukelenge kayi muanze kukokesha Bena Isalele: Bela, muana mulume wa Beô; dina dia musoko wandi diakadi Dinehaba
Wewe neushihe tshimpanga, newangate mashi atshi wamiamine ha tshioshelu tshionso
Nashona muana mulume wa Aminadaba neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Yuda

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hingasha mulangala wa Alona ku mpala kua mushete, bu tshivulukidi kudi bantu badi basue kutomboka, neumanye mua kushikisha kutontolola kudibo bantontolola n aku bua bobo kabafu nansha
Mukaji wa Yuda kuimita kabidi difu, kulela muana wa balume muibidi
Muena muaba au wakabakonka ne, Tatu wabo udi nganyi
Uvua mungambile ne: Upingane kuenu mu ditunga dienu
Kubutulaku bantu bonsu nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, batshikale ne muoyi
Misoko yabo yakadi Etama ne Ayina, Limona ne Tokene ne Ashana, misoko itanu; ne misoko yabo yonso yakadi ha buihi ne bimenga biobimue tô ne ku Bâla
Witabe bionsu bidiye ukuambila
Bena Isalele bakabika ne dinda, bakatula tshitudilu tshiabo hehi ne Gibea; Bena Isalele bakaluhuka bua kuluangana ne Bena Benyamina; Bena Isalele bakela mualu wa nvita kudibo ku Gibea

Dutelonone Mose Udi Udimusha Bena Isalele bua Kutumikilabo Yehowa Katataka, nuenu Bena Isalele, unvuai mei ne mikenji bindi musue kunuyisha, bua nuenu kubienza bua nuikale ne muoyo, nubuelemu, nuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, unuha
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya tunkanunuina tua Sheme Hakadi Shema ne bidimu lukama, wakalela Âpakashada, bidimu bibidi ku nyima kua nvula munene
Yozefe kubakonka ne: Nudi ne bukole bua mubidi anyi
Adame mumane kulela Shete, kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu
Bana babu bamone muvua tatuabu mutambe kunanga Yozefe, kujilabu muanabu, kabayi mua kuyukila nende kakuyi matandu
Nsesu wa bukalenga neashale mu diku dia Yuda
Tshibangidilu Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu udi ulota bilota Kupita bidimu bibidi, mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kulota tshilota: uvua ku muelelu wa musulu wa Nile
Nudi mua kudia nyunyu yonso idi miakane

Hakatshiabu Davidi wakabika, wakashiya mikoko mu bianza bia mulami, wakangata bintu abi, wakaya bu muakamuambila Yishai; wakalua ku muaba wakadi makalu a nvita hakadi bena nvita baye ku nvita, hele mbila bua nvita

Hanuabuela mu musoko, hashishe numukebe diambedi yeye kayi muanze kuya ku mukuna bua kudieye bidia: bualu bua bantu kabena badia bidia diambedi yeye kayi muanze kulua, bualu bua yeye udi uvudishila milambu yabo disanka, hashishe bantu bakabikilabo badi badia bidia
Kuena mua kutshipa bantu aba, bualu ndi mumane kubela lupemba
Aye nabi kudi batuangaji, bana ba Arone
Kadi Oge, mukalenga wa mu Bashane, ne bena mvita bende, kuya kuluisha bena Izrayele mu Edreyi
Davidi wakakonka Yehowa ne, Nenye bua kushiha Bena Peleshete aba, anyi

Uvuluke ne wewe wakadi muhika mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatulamu ne tshianza tshia bukole ne diboko diandi diolola: nunku Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakalelela mukenji bua wewe uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu
Pawafika kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, wenze bishima bionsu bindi mukuleje
Utuute dikombu pa lubuebue, mayi apatuke bua bena Izrayele banue
Wakadi ne nkete ya tshiamu tshia mitaku ku mikolo yandi, wakadi ne difuma dia tshiamu tshia mitaku ha diaha diandi

Dutelonone Biabika muprofete anyi mulotshi wa bilota munkatshi muenu, udi unulesha tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema; ne hashikisheye tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema bua kunubikila ne, Tuye, tulonde nzambi mikuabo mudi kanuyi bamanye, tuyenzele mudimu; kanunvu mei a muprofete au, anyi mulotshi au wa bilota; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munutete, bua kumanya ne, Nudi basue Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso
Datane ne Abirame, ke bakulu bavua batombokela Moshe ne Arone mu tshisangilu, pamue ne bena Kora, pavuabu babenga Maweja Nangila
Mahuahua a bakeluba akololodibua tô coudeês makumi abidi; bakeluba bakadi bimana ne makasa abo; mpala yabo yakatangilangana
Ujidile tshilambuilu matuku muanda mutekete bua kujimija mibi yonsu idiku
Bakalua kudi Yakoba, tatu abo, mu buloba bua Kanana, bakamuambila malu onso akabakuata ne, Muntu au mukelenge wa mu buloba, wakatua mbila mei makole, wakatuenzela bu batentekedi ba buloba
Dutelonone Buloba Buimpe bua Kuhiana Nuenze mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo, nukumbane, nubuelemu bua kuhiana buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu
Yeye wakabakonka bua malu abo ne, Tatu wenu, muntu au mununu unuakungambila, udi mukole, anyi
Padi mukaji ulela muana wa bakaji, neashale ne mikiya mbingu ibidi, anu bu muyilaye mupie mikiya matuku ende a tshijila tshia bakaji
Mfumu wa tshisamba eshi uvua Eliyasafe, muana wa Layele
Bualu bua nenusabuke Yadene bua kubuelamu ne bua kuhiana buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha; nenubuhiane, nenushikamemu
Dielulula Nuitabe mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu Moshe kuambila kabidi bena Izrayele ne: Nuenu bitabe meyi ne mikenji bindi munulongeshe, nenuikale ne muoyi
Hakafika Hushai, Muena Aka, mulunda wa Davidi, kudi Abashaloma, Hushai wakambila Abashaloma ne, Mukelenge ikale ne muoyo musangu mule
Nganyi udi Nzambi bikaleye kayi Yehowa
Kuena ne bua kubuelela mamuebe mukuabu mu nzubu to, bualu udi muanabu ne mamuebe
Ka dî binuahidia kuenza nunku, monai, nuakuenzela Yehowa bualu bubi, numanye bienu ne, Bualu bubi buenu nebunukuate bulelela
Mpindiewu umbuka, upingane kuebe
Kadi Maweja Nangila kena muitabe dilomba dianyi to
Nanku, ulamakaja bilamba bitanu bitanu
Tshibuikidiji atshi, tshivua ne bule bua metre umue ne santimetre makumi abidi ne itanu, ne butshiama bua santimetre makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu
Yehowa wakasamisha mukelenge ne disama dia nsudi tô ne ku dituku dia lufu luandi; wakashikama mu nsubu ha buandi
Abrame umvua ne: mbakuate Lote, muana wa muanetu, kubikilaye biende bilobu nkama isatu dikumi ne muanda mukulu, bia mu diku diende
Yehowa neanuhingashe mu Ejipitu kabidi mu matu mu nshila unakanuambila ne, Kanuena numutangila kabidi
Bakadi batuadi ba mata a mikete, bakamanya mua kuela mabue ne tshianza tshia balume ne tshia bakashi, bakamanya mua kuela mata abo nunku kabidi; bakadi bana babo ne Shaula, Bena Benyamina
Bena Isalele bakakolesha mitshima yabo, bakela mualu wa nvita ku muaba wakelabo mualu wa nvita diambedi
Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakangambila ne, Songa mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi, ulue biebe kundi ku mukuna, udienzele mushete wa mabaya
Misoko ei yonso yakadi ne mpangu mile ne bibi bikanda ne biamu; tuakanyenga misoko mikuabo ya bungi yakadi kayiyi ne mpangu
Hashishe mukelenge wakabika, wakahanda bilulu biandi, wakalala hanshi mu buloba; bantu bandi bonso bakimana ha buihi n andi ne bilulu biabo bihanda
Bintu bidi bipetesha mikiya Nyama mikuabu idi ipetesha muntu mikiya too ne ku dilolu, padiye uyilenga, yoyi mimane kufua
Yeye wakayambila ne, Nuambile mukelenge wanyi Esau nunku ne, Muntu webe Yakoba udi wamba ne, Nakashikama ne Labana, nakushalaku to ne katataka

Mesu enu akatangila bualu buakenza Yehowa bualu bua Bâla peô; Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakashiha balume bonso munkatshi muenu bakalonda Bâla peô; kadi nuenu bakalamata Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nudi ne muoyo lelu eu
Nudimuke
Bena Izrayele lukama, nebatshimune baluishi binunu dikumi, babashipe bonsu

Wakenza tshilulu tshikuabo tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin tshia kuteka ku mbelu kua tshitendelelu, wakatshienzesha kudi bena lungenyi lule, wakenza makunshi atanu ne bitubuilu biau, wakalamata tshiamu tshia or ha mutu, ne nkanu ya tshilulu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Panuafika mu ditunga divua Maweja Nangila munulaye, nuikale nuenza tshibilu etshi
Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, wakadianjila kufikaku, wakayuishibua kapitene
Meme nakabambila ne, Muntu yonso udi ne or akuohole, ne bobo bakafua or kundi, nakuela mu kahia ne kana aka ka ngombe ka or kakahatuka mu kahia
Nebamuenzele bibi, bivuaye muenzele muntu mukuabu
Newafunde ha minoko ya bibi bia nsubu webe, ne ha bibi bia mishiku ya luhangu luebe
Dibadika Milambu ya kujidila nayi nzubu wa tshijila Moshe mumane kuasa nzubu wa tshijila mujikije, kujidilaye nzubu awu kabidi ne bintu bionsu bivua mu nzubu pa kubilaba manyi
Yeye kakamutangila kabidi
Maweja Nangila mmusue kutubueja mu ditunga dia Kenaane bua kutubutula mu mvita anyi
Yeshaya wakamuambila ne, Etshi ntshimanyinu tshia Yehowa kudi bua kukutuisha ne, Yehowa nênze bualu ebu buakuambeye: mundidimbi neuye ku mpala biendedi dikumi, anyi neuhingane biendedi dikumi
Nennyoke bantu bonsu badi bankina too ne ku ndelanganyi yabu ya musangu muisatu nansha muinayi
Meme nakadimusha balumbuluishi benu tshikondo atshi ne, Unvuai bilumbu bia bana benu, nulumbulule bilumbu bia muntu ne muan abo mulume ne muenyi udi n andi biakane
Dîba edi Minisitila kavulambedi udi ufila mukanda wa dilekele dia mudimu dia Bukalenga bunene kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga mu mêba makumi abidi ne anaayi

Tshimuangi Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu udi ulondakaja bena Izrayele Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Manyisha bena Izrayele bapingane, base mitanda yabu kumpala kua Pi Hahirote, pankatshi pa Migdole ne mayi manene, pabuipi ne Baale Sefone
Yehowa, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi ne butumbi ne bukole, Yehowa, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi tshisunsula bantu badi n etu lukuna
Kadi kanuedi meji ne: nudi badipetele diakalenga ku bukole buenu nkayenu to
Biahidia mukashi kukulonda, hashishe, munda muebe nemu ikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku
Nanku padi tufina atu tupatuka, nansha tupatakaja mubidi wende awu, tufina atu tudi ne mikiya, tudi lukuatshisha kabidi muntu mikiya
Nudimuke
Merari uvua mulele bana ba balume babidi: Mali ne Mushi
Shaula wakaditshiha kudiye mu dina dia Yehowa wamba ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo kabena bakuhisha ku bualu ebu
Hakadi Esau ne bidimu makumi anai, wakangata Yudita, muana mukashi wa Bêli, Muena Hiti, ne Basemata, muana mukashi wa Elone, Muena Hiti, bu bakashi bandi
Nunku mona, bu muakadi muoyo webe bu tshintu tshia mushinga mukole ku mesu kuanyi lelu, muoyo wanyi wikale bu tshintu tshia mushinga mukole ku mesu kua Yehowa, yeye ansungile mu makenga onso
Lote ubamona, kujukaye bua kubakidila
Mulau ukukuate, Moaba

Yehowa kakateka luse luandi kunudi, kakanusungula bualu bua nuenu nuakahita bantu bakuabo bungi; nuenu nuakatamba bantu bonso bukese; kadi bualu bua Yehowa udi munusue ne bualu bua yeye utu watumikila mulayi wakalayeye batatu benu, Yehowa wakanuhatula ne tshianza tshikole, wakanuhikula mu nsubu wa lukanu, ne mu tshianza tshia Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu
Leya umona ne lulelu luakoseki, kufilaye mupika wende Zilpa kudi Yakobe, bua ashale mukajende
Nenushishe kuya nende
Muntu yonsu udi ubuelela mamuenende mu nzubu, asangane muena tshibawu kuenza anyi

Kadi biatangila muakuidi ne miosa mitoke tô kayenaku, ne disama kadiena dibuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, nunku muakuidi neamubueshe ha nkayandi mu nsubu matuku muanda mutekete, bikala disama ditampakane mu dikoba, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi
Bikala mukuenu kayi ha buihi n enu, anyi biwikala kuyi mumumanye, hashishe nuye n abi ku nsubu kuenu, nushale n abi tô ne halua mukuenu bua kubikeba, nuenu nubihingashe kudiye
Bena Levi nkayabu ke badi mua kuenza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Ku dituku dinakasungula nempingane kûdi, hakumbana ngondo yandi, Sala nealele muana mulume
bulongolodi butangila bibutshilu bia lupetu ne midimu yabi ne ya difila dia mishinga ya kashintu ;
Neyinupeteshe diakalenga
Musombuedi kalondi mushihianganyi eu hadiye ne tshiji tshikole, kamuhetshi, bualu bua nshila udi utamba bule, kamushihi diambedi kabayi banze kumuhisha, bualu bua yeye kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi
Mayi a mu musulu wa Nile kununka mupuya mubi, bena Ejipitu kabayi mua kunua mayi awu kabidi to
Nunku Samuele wakakudimuka bua kulonda Shaula; ne Shaula wakatendelela Yehowa
Yeye wakamba ne, Bakuatai ne muoyo
Kadi ndi mukushiye ne muoyi, bua ujadike bukole buanyi, kabidi bua lumu luanyi lumanyike pa buloba bujima

Yehowa neanumuangalashe munkatshi mua bantu bonso ku ditengu edi dia buloba tô ne ku ditengu dikuabo; nenukuatshileku nzambi mikuabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue mudimu, mudi kanuyi bamanye, ne bankambua benu kabakayimanya kabidi

Kanungu ka Bukalenga bunene kabweena mwa kutumina nzuji dîyi padiye mu mudimu wende to, anyi kutangila bilumbu, anyi kunyangakaja lwendu lwa dilumbulwisha, anyi kubenga mwa kukumbaja dipangadika dia bilumbulwilu
Nenulongolole nshila, nenutahulule mikalu ya buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi bituha bisatu, bua mushihianganyi yonso anyemenemu
Dituku dinayi: nundambule ngombe milume dikumi, mikoku ya bimpanga ibidi, bana ba mikoku dikumi ne banayi, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijima, kabidi ne mbuji wa mpumbu umue
Mukalu wenu wa luseke lua ku wesete neutuangane ne muelelu wa mai manene, eu newikale mukalu wenu wa ku wesete
Bana ba Pashû tshinunu tshimue ne nkama ibidi ne makumi anai ne muanda mutekete
Kanungu ka Bilumbulwilu bia basalayi bidi bitangila bilumbu bibunda kudi beena bilwilu ne bampulushi
Adama wakamanyangana ne mukashi wandi kabidi, Wakalela muana mulume, wakamuidika dina ne, Sheta Wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa muana mukuabo mu muaba wa Ebele, bualu bua Kana wakamushiha
Dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Shelomita, muana mukashi wa Dibili, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana

Mikenji ya Kusombangana Talalâ Kanuhingashi muhika wakunyemena kunudi munyeme mu bianza bia mukelenge wandi; yeye ashikame n enu mu muaba udiye usungula mu umue wa misoko yenu udi utamba kumusankisha; kanumuenzedi bibi
Majuwa adi afumina ku Kitime
Yozefe apete lumu

Bakaha meku a Bena Melali, bakashala ba Bena Lewi, Yokenama ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Kâta ne miaba ya ku matshika, munkatshi mua tshisamba tshia Zebuluna: Dimana ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Nahalala ne miaba ya ku matshika: bimenga binai
Nuenu basangane muanenu utata ne ngombe, nansha mpunde wende, mudishinde mutshibukile panshi mu njila, kanumulekedi utata nkayende
Kadi, kuena mua kutua ndondu ne bantu ba ditunga dinuasomba to
Mvidi Mukulu uvua mumone buenzayi bua bantu pa buloba bujima

Shaula ne, Bualu bua nakatangila bantu babanga kummuangalala, ne wewe kuakulua mu dituku dituakasungula, ne Bena Peleshete hakamana kudisangisha ku Mikemasha; nunku nakamba ne, Bena Peleshete nebalue kunduisha ku Gilegala diambedi tshiyi muanze kukeba diakalengele kudi Yehowa: nunku nakadienzesha nkayanyi ku bukole, nakafila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Mutumibue wa Maweja Nangila kumubela wamba ne: Pingana anu kudi Sarayi, mfumuebe wa mudimu
Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kakunyua mei a Belâma; kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakudimuna mulau ulua disanka dienu, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusua
Yeye wakamba ne, Nuenu bantu bonso, unvuai
Muntu yonso udi umulenga tshianza ham bidi handi neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Eu udi mulambu wa tshiendelele unakanuelela mukenji mu mukuna wa Sinai, mulambu udi utua dihembu, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa
Nealuate tshikowelu tshia ku ne mihanu ya lin, nêle mukaba wa lin ku tshimono tshiandi, nease tshifufu tshia lin ku mutu ebi mbilulu bia tshijila, yeye neowe mai, neabiluate
Samala wakafua ne Shaula wa mu Lehobota hehi ne musulu wa Pelata wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Pashishe mashi adi mashale, mutuangaji ayitshikije kuinshi kua tshilambuilu atshi
Kora ne bonsu bavuaye nabu kuitababu
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakamukudimuna ne, Nansha, bualu bua Yehowa wakabikila bakelenge aba basatu hohamue bua kubafila mu bianza bia Bena Moaba

Bena Ejipitu bakatuenzela bibi, bakatukengesha, bakatuenzesha mudimu mukole; ne tuetu tuakadi la kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua betu, ne Yehowa wakulua dî dietu, wakatangila makenga etu ne mudimu wetu ne majitu etu
Abigayila wakalela Amasa; tatu wa Amasa wakadi Yete, Muena Yishemaele
Kadi yeye wakahidia, wakambila mukashi wa mukelenge wandi ne, Mona, mukelenge wanyi kena mumanye bintu bindi n abi mu nsubu muandi, yeye wakashiya bintu bionso bidiye n abi mu tshianza tshianza

Kanulondi nzambi mikuabo ya bantu badi ha buihi n enu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi wa mukau, bua tshiji tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, katshikadi kunudi, ne bua yeye kanujimishi ha mutu ha buloba
Wewe neubafile mu tshianza tshianyi, anyi
Bobo bakamukudimuna di ne, Kakuakadi mukashi wa nasandi kunoko
Shaula wakambila Samuele ne, Bulelela, nakatumikila dî dia Yehowa, nakaya mu nshila wakantuma Yehowa; nakakuata Agaga, mukelenge wa Bena Amaleka, nakashiha Bena Amaleka bonso
Padi batuangaji mu madilu, kabena mua kubeya biketu mu nsuki, kabena mua kukungula miedi ku nseke, nansha kuditapisha nsalu pambidi
Kadi nudi mua kudia bintu bionso bidi ne mahuahua bidi bienda ne mikolo mai bituhike ha buloba, nudi mua kudia mikumbi ne nsua ne bintunte ne mintuntu
Bulalu buonso budiye ulalahu hahatuka tufina budi ne bukoya, ne bintu bionso bidiye ushikamahu bidi ne bukoya
Bana balume ba baprofete ba mu Yeleko bakaluhuka kudi Elisha, bakamuebesha ne
Nunku Obadaya wakaya bua kusangileye ne Ahaba, wakamuambila dî edi
Kuasaye tshimenga tshia Ninive, tshia Reyobote Ire, ne tshia Kela
Bulelela, wewe wakabalama mu tshihela bidimu makumi anai, kabakadi bakengela tshintu; bilulu biabo kabiakasunsuka ne makasa abo kakûla nansha

Pikalabo kabayi bafila tshingenyingenyi mu tshipungu tshîmpe bwa kutshipatulabo kumpala kwa ntwadijilu wa tshikondu tshipiatshipia, Bukalenga bunene budi bulomba Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga bwa tshiaanji kwanyisha dipatula dia lupetu lwa nzanzanza
Ba munkatshi mua Bena Dana bakamanya mua kuasa mualu wa nvita bakadi binunu makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu ne nkama isambombo
Ha diba adi Bena Yuda bakela mbila; hakela Bena Yuda mbila, Nzambi wakalekesha Yalobama ne Bena Isalele bonso ku mpala kua Abiya ne Bena Yuda
Batuangaji bakumbaje muabu muonsu bindi mubambile
Nunku nufile balume, bantu balembakane, ba mu Gibea kutudi, bua tuetu tubashihe, neamushe bubi ebu mu Isalele
Bakangata bintu bionso bia bantu ne bia bimuna kabidi
Hakadi Yehu ulumbuluisha ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba, yeye wakasangana bantu banene bi Bena Yuda ne bana balume ba bana babo ne Ahazaya bakuatshile Ahazaya mudimu; yeye wakabashiha

Kuyabu kudi Moshe, kudi mutuangaji Elazare, ne kudi bamfumu ba bena Izrayele, kubambilabu ne: Bimenga ebi, Atarote, Dibone, Yazere, Nimra, Eshebone, Elale, Sebame, Nebo ne Beyone, mbia mu ditunga dia bena Izrayele, didibu bapete ku diambuluisha dia Maweja Nangila
Kadi, muntu kena mua kulaba mafuta awu pambidi to
Palô wakabikila Mose ne Alona mu butuku, wakamba ne, Bikai, yai bienu munkatshi mua bantu banyi, ne nuenu ne Bena Isalele, yai bienu nutendelele Yehowa bu munuakamba
Ekesode Malu Adibo ne bua Kuenzela Bahika Dut
Bua tshitangidi bualu ebu bubi budi bulue kudi tatu wanyi
Nenuikale nupeta biakudia matuku asambombu malondangane
Ke bobu kumuandamuna ne: Kabiena nanku to, Mukalenga
Meme nenjadike nsubu wandi: yeye nende ku mesu kua wanyi unakuela manyi ha mutu tshiendelele
Padi muntu ushipa mukuende, bamushipe pende
Bu yeye kayi muenze nanku, mvua mua kukushipa wewe, kumushiya yeye ne muoyi
Bualu mmulambu wa dipembu dimpe wa kungoshila meme Maweja Nangila
Nakanulombola mu tshihela tô bidimu makumi anai: bilulu bienu kabiakasunsuka ham bidi henu, ne bisabata kabiakasunsuka ku makasa enu
Mvidi Mukulu ujikija kuakula ne Abrahame, kulayanganabu

Zêba ne Salemuna bakadi mu Kakô, ne misumba yabo yakadi n abo, bu binunu dikumi ne bitanu, bonso bakadi bashala ba mu musumba wa bantu ba ku esete; bualu bua bena nvita bu binunu lukama ne makumi abidi bakahona bafue
Nuakulekela Dibue diakanufuka, nuakuhua Nzambi wakanulelesha muoyo
Pashishe mukalenga kuambila Yozefe ne: Bu mudi Mvidi Mukulu mukuleje bintu abi, kakuena muntu mukuabu udi mua kukupua ku lungenyi ne meji to
Disama dia nsudi Nudimuke bua disama dia nsudi kadinukuatshi

Nenuenze bu mudibo bamba ha muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula; nuenu nenutumikile mei onso adibo banuyisha: nenuenze bu mudi mikenji idibo banuyisha, ne bu dilumbulula didibo banuambila; kanusesuki ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi mu dî didibo banuambila
Bena musoko wandi, bakulu ne bantu banene ba mu musoko muakadiye mushikame, bakenza bu mu dî dia Izebele diakabafundileye mu mikanda yandi
Hakatshiabu Yehowa Wakenza bualu ebu; bimuna bionso bia mu Ejipitu biakafua, kadi bimuna bia Bena Isalele kabiakafua nansha tshimue

Nunku hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu, ne hanuaheta dikisha mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana, hashishe nenujimishe tshivulukidi tshia Amaleka muinshi mua diulu; kanuhu muoyo bua bualu ebu nansha
Kadi hanuasabuka Yadene, hanuashikama mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuhianyisha, udi unuha dikisha kudi bena lukuna bonso badi banunyunguluka, ne nenushikame talalâ
Mulambu awu uvua ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Juka, umuka apa, upingane mu ditunga dienu
Bana ba Yakobe badi bapingana mu Kenaane Yozefe upingana, kubambilaye ne: Ndi ndama Shimeyone
Wewe kubananga, kubalombola ne bukole
Bana benu bena Levi abu nebanuambuluishe bua midimu yonsu ya mu ntenta wa kusambakena

Bakulu ba mu musoko au nebakuate muntu au, nebamukengeshe; ne bobo nemmuambile ne, Ufute lukama lua nshekele ya argent ne yeye neayifile kudi tatu wa mushikankunde eu, bualu bua yeye wakuona lumu lua mukashi utshidi kamama mu Isalele: yeye neikale mukashi wandi, yeye kena mua kumuhidia tô matuku andi onso

Peka, muana mulume wa Lemalaya, kapitene ka masalayi andi wakamuelela tshifufu, wakamukuma mu Samalea mu nsubu wa mukelenge; Âgoba ne Aliye ne Bena Gilada makumi atanu bakadi n andi; yeye wakamushiha, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi

Eu mmukanda wakaha mukelenge Atashasete Ezela muakuidi ne mufundi, mufundi mene wa mei a mikenji ya Yehowa ne wa malu akadiye musue benze kudi Bena Isalele: Atashasete, mukelenge wa bakelenge, kudi Ezela, muakuidi, mufundi wa mikenji ya Nzambi wa mu diulu udi muakane: Meme ndi ngela mukenji ne, Bena Isalele bonso ne bakuidi babo ne Bena Lewi badi mu bukelenge buanyi badi basue mu mitshima yabo bua kuya ku Yelushalema, baye n ebe
Dibadika Bena Izrayele badi batshimuna bena Kenaane Mukalenga wa Arade, muena Kenaane, uvua muase mu tshitupa tshia kuinshi tshia ditunga adi
Abalahama wakadi ne bidimu makumi tshitema ne tshitema hakamutengulabo
Samuele Bena Isalele Badi Balomba Mukelenge Hakalua Samuele muntu mununu, yeye wakasungula Bena Isalele bana bandi ba balume bu balumbuluishi babo
Edi ke dina dianyi dia kashidi dia nuenu ne ndelanganyi yonsu kumbikila
Neanusangishe, bua kunupingaja mu ditunga dia bankambua benu
Muhika wandi wakamukudimuna di ne, Abu biahidia mukashi kundonda ku buloba ebu, netuhingane ne muan ebe mulume ku buloba buwakumuka, anyi
Nuakulekela Dibue diakanufuka, nuakuhua Nzambi wakanulelesha muoyo
Ke Rakele kulomba Leya ne: Bu wewe musue, mpeshaku bimue bimuma bia mutshi wa dinanga, bidi muanebe mukutuadile

Kanudi mampa adi ne luevene ne mulambu eu; nenudie n au mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mbia kudia bia tshivulukidi tshia dikenga; bualu bua nuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu lubilu; nunku numuke dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu matuku onso a muoyo wenu
Bimfuanyi bia Bakerubine bibidi abi, bikale bilamakane ne tshibuikidiji tshia mushete, etshi ku ndekelu, tshikuabu ku ndekelu

Mukelenge wakambila bantu mei makole, kakalonda lungenyi luakamuambila bakulumpe, kadi wakabambila lungenyi luakamuambila bansongalume ne, Tatu wanyi wakanunemeshila mutshi wa tshikokedi, kadi meme nennukumbashile majitu makuabo: tatu wanyi wakamutuma ne nsokotshi, kadi meme nennukume ne tuminyiminyi
Kadi tatuende uvua anu uvuluka misangu mivule bilota abi
Nunku nuelele bantu aba mukenji ne, Balekele mudimu, kabashi musoko au tô ne hangamba dî dikuabo
Metushayele kulela Lemeke
Bikalabo babakibue kudi balume ba mu tshisamba tshikuabo tshia Bena Isalele, nunku nebanyeme buhianyi buabo ku buhianyi bua batatu etu, nebabusangishe ku buhianyi bua tshisamba tshiakayabo
Bimuna bia bena Levi kabidi nebikale bianyi meme, pa muaba wa bamuanabute ba bimuna bia bena Izrayele
Muana wa balume wa Yonatana wakadi Meliba bâla; Meliba bâla wakalela Mika

Bikala mulume anyi mukashi ne mputa ku mutu anyi ku muedi, muakuidi neatangile ha muaba au, bielanganeye meji ne mputa udi ubuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, ne nsuki yakuandamuka mitoke tô, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi didi ku mutu anyi ku muedi
Bahika ba Shaula bakamba mei au mu matshu a Davidi
Pashishe tuetu kukuata bimenga biende bionsu
Bavua bantu balume binunu nkama isambombu, katuyi babale bakaji, bana ne bantu bakulakaje
Bana bonso banudi batela mbanyi; ban a bute ba balume ba bimuna mbanyi, ban a bute ba ngombe ne ba mikoko
Ku nyima Bena Isalele bonso bakafua ha buihi ne yeye wakabamanyisha mikenji yonso yakamuambila Yehowa ha mukuna wa Sinai
Bena Isalele bakashikama mu ntenta yabo bu muakenzabo diambedi, Kadi kabakumuka ku malu mabi a ba mu nsubu wa Yalobama akenzesheye Bena Isalele; batshivua bendamu
Ke muvua bena Izrayele ne bua kuambula bukula bua mampa buvuabu bamane kusopa, buanga kabuyi buanji kubandisha ditapi
Pashishe atue munu wende wa tshianza tshia balume, udi ulonda tshiala, mu mafuta adi mu tshianza tshiende tshia bakaji, amiamine mafuta awu ne munu misangu muanda mutekete kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Bakeluba bakolola mahuahua abo kulu, bakabuikila tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne mahuahua abo, bakadi belangana mpala, mpala yabo yakadi ku tshibuikilu tshia mushete

Nomba Dilomba dia Bana Bakashi ba Selofehada Bana bakashi ba Selofehada, muana mulume wa Hefê, muana mulume wa Gilada, muana mulume wa Mala, muana mulume wa Manashe, wa meku a Manashe, muana mulume wa Yosefe, au mmena a bana bakashi: Mahala ne Noa ne Hogela ne Mileka ne Tîsa
Hakabutula Nzambi misoko ya mu Mpala, yeye wakavuluka Abalahama, wakumusha Lota munkatshi mua dikenga hakabutuleye misoko kuakadi Lota mushikame
Bungi bua balume ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu buakadi binunu bisambombo ne nkama ibidi
Tshisamba tshia Ngade:
Mona, nentshifile mu bianza biebe lelu, wewe neumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Esawu kumona ne: Izake mmulayangane ne Yakobe, mumutume ku Mezopotamiya bua kusela mukaji, mumukandike bua kasedi mukaji wa bena Kenaane
Bobo nebanusombeshe bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nubasombesha bintu; bobo nebikale bu mitu, nuenu nenuikale bu mikila
Mbatubueje munu bua kutukuata ne kutukengesha
Nanku, Meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu nennuvuluke
Yehowa neanutumme biusha bibi ku binu bienu ne ku mikolo yenu, ne ku munda mua makasa tô ne mu lubombo lua mutu: disama didi kadiyi mua kuondahibua
Bena Eme bakashikamamu diambedi, bantu banene, bantu ba bungi, bule bua Bena Anaka: badi bababikila kabidi ne, Bena Lefa, bu Bena Anaka; kadi Bena Moaba bakababikila ne, Bena Eme
Hilama, mukelenge wa Tulo, wakatuma ba messager kudi Davidi, ne mitshi ya cèdre ne bena tushola ne bena mabaya bua kumuashilabo nsubu
Muntu yonso udi ukuma mukuabo mu musokoko udi ne mulau
Biahona bintu ebi mu tshivuadi tshia dima, netshikale ne bukoya, nebatshishihe
Kuitabusha bua yeye kuikala bu muntu mufue udi ne tshituha tshia mubidi mubole hamulelabo
Hashishe Yonatana ne Davidi bakahungakasha tshihungidi, bualu bua yeye wakamunanga bu mutshima wandi mene
Muleleshi wakamba ne, Mona tshihatukidi tshiwakuhatuka
Nsongakaji uya lubilu kumbelu kuabu, kulondelaye mamuende malu awu onsu
Ku bukole bua tshiji tshiebe, mayi kudisanga muaba umue
Upingaje kabidi ku mibangubangu ya tshibombi makuta avua muntu yonsu mutule
Baku ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi ne bonso baudi n abo mu musoko eu, umuke n abo mu muaba eu
Nanku Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neanuele lupemba mu bionsu binudi nuenza
Kadi Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bua bualu buenu, yeye kena mungunvuile; Yehowa wakangambila ne, Kuakushika, kungambidi bualu ebu kabidi
Nuikale anu ne tshiamu tshimue tshidi tshiakane, ne tshihiminu tshimue tshidi tshiakane; nunku matuku enu neikale a bungi mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha

Kadi kanuena mua kudia nyunyi eyi: nyunyi ya biminyi, tubemba tua mvulu, nyunyi idi idia minyinyi ya mu mayi, ntuba mifuane mukanku , mikanku, nyunyi mishilangane mifuane tubemba, bikololu, kasonga nyunyi, nyunyi idi yendakana butuku mifuanangane ne kakutukutu, nyunyi ya pa mayi idi idia malandi, nkumbikumbi, bipungulu, tshishenene, nyunyi idi mifuanangane ne tshikololu, nkumbikumbi, kalamangombe, tshiowa, nyunyi ya mikolu mile idi yenda ku muelelu wa mayi, nyunyi idi ne tshisuba ne nyunyi ya midima
Bana babu kupampakana, kumvua bowa
Kadi mei a Bena Yuda akatamba mei a Bena Isalele bukole
Ndi nkuata amu muntu uvua ne dikopu awu, neashale mupika
Nanku nenuikale ne mampa mapite bungi

Nunku batusunguile bantu banene ba munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshietu, hashishe bonso aba bakabaka bakashi ba bende baye kudibo mu misoko yabo mu bikondo bidibo basungule; bakulu ne balumbuluishi ba musoko ne musoko baye n abo, tô ne hashikishabo bualu ebu bua kukudimuna tshiji tshikole tshia Nzambi wetu kutudi
Bualu bua bobo badi bampebue bajima munkatshi mua Bena Isalele mu miabo ya ban a bute bonso ba Bena Isalele nakadiangatshilabo
Muanabute neikale mupika wa muakunyende
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Ubambile ne, Kanuyi, kanuluanganyi; bualu bua meme tshiena munkatshi muenu; kanuhonyi ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna
Kahia ka ha tshioshelu kakajimi nansha, muakuidi neatekehu nkunyi dinda ne dinda, nealonge mulambu wa kuosha ha tshioshelu, neoshe dianyi dia mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala
Mukashi kaluatshi bilulu bia mulume, ne mulume kaluatshi bilulu bia bakashi: muntu yonso udi wenza malu au nunku udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
kupangisha dijinga diônso dia kufikisha ku bukalenga bwa nkaya;
Bintu bia mu Ntempelo Kul
Tshidi ne mudimu wa kukookesha ne kushiindika budikadidi ne dikuba dia butshikuma mbila pamwe ne mishindu yônso ya dimanyisha tshibûngi maalu mu kaneemu ka dîyi
Kuendi masandi
Kadi kapatula tshidimu tshiônso mulubu udiku kenzela Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga ne Bukalenga bunene
Ku nzubu yonsu kudibu badie munyinyi awu, nebalabe mashi ku dibaya didi kulu kua tshiibi ne ku mabaya adi ku nseke yatshi
Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, ndi nkulomba ne, Ungendeshe dikasa dimpe lelu, ufuile mukelenge wanyi Abalahama luse
Yonatana wakambila muambudi wa ngabu wandi ne, Lua, undonde, bualu bua Yehowa wakamana kubafila mu bianza bia Bena Isalele
Eli wakalua muntu mununu; wakunyua lumu lua malu mabi a bana bandi ba balume akenzelabo Bena Isalele bonso, ne bu muakalalabo ne bakashi bakadi benza mudimu ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Yeye wakanumanyisha bua tshihungidi tshiandi tshiakanuambileye bua nuenu nuenze, mikenji ei dikumi mene mene; yeye wakayifunda ha mabue abidi
Kadi padibu bakambila mu luesu lua tshiamu tshikunze, balukone, balusukule ne mayi a bungi
Ndi mmona bidi Maweja Nangila wa bukole buonsu uleja
Nakunvua kutontolola kua Bena Isalele kudibo bantontolola n aku
Kuladi ne nyama bua kudionena mutshima webe, ne mukashi kimanyi biandi ku mpala kua nyama bua kulala handi, bualu ebu budi butamba bubi
Kadi padiu ushala kabidi too ne ku dituku disatu, bawoshe mu kapia
Pavua divuba adi dishale muaba wa tshijila matuku abidi, ngondu mujima, nansha matuku mapite bungi, bena Izrayele bavua anu basombe, bindile bua divuba dibande
Hashishe, Elekana bayandi wakamukonka ne, Hana, udi udidila tshinyi
Belâma Udi Uvudishila Bena Isalele Disanka Dinda Balaka wakaya ne Belâma ku mutu kua mikuna ya Bâla; yeye wakatangila tô ne ku matshika onso a tshitudilu tshia bantu
Kadi bua nuenu kumupeta, anu nuenu bamukebe ne muoyi mujima ne bukole buenu buonsu

Mona, mukuabo wa Bena Isalele wakalua kudi bana babo ne mukashi wa Bena Midiyana ku mesu kua Mose ne ku mesu kua tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, hakadibo badila ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena

Uvuluke bantu bebe, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba; kutangidi tshitshu tshia bantu aba anyi buhidia buabo anyi mibi yabo, bua bena buloba buwakatuhatula kabambi ne, Bualu bua Yehowa kakadi ne bukole bua kulua n abo mu buloba buakahaneye ne bualu bua yeye wakadi n abo tshiji, yeye wakalua n abo mu tshihela bua kubashiha
Yeye wakanumanyisha bua tshihungidi tshiandi tshiakanuambileye bua nuenu nuenze, mikenji ei dikumi mene mene; yeye wakayifunda ha mabue abidi
Kabidi bantu bakuabu nebapete diakalenga kuudi

Hashishe hakajimina bena nvita bonso, hakafuabo munkatshi mua bantu, Yehowa wakangambila ne, Lelu nenuhite ku Ala, butshika bua Moaba: hanualua ba buihi ne Bena Amona, kanubatatshishi, kanuluanganyi n abo; bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba bua Bena Amona bu buhianyi buenu, bualu bua nakamana kuha bana ba Lota buloba abu bu buhianyi buabo
Yoshua wakamba ne, Wewe wakatukengesha bualu kai
Ngombe mikuabu minyane muanda mutekete ne miepu ya mponda muanda mutekete ivua mifubishe kudi lupepela, bidi bileja kabidi bidimu muanda mutekete, kadi mbia tshiyole tshia nzala
Bantu ba Hulama ne bantu ba Solomo bakalua ne or wa ku Ofî, bakalua ne mitshi ya sandal ne mabue a mushinga mukole
Kadi pikala mulume wenza bualu bua mushindu ewu, mukuate ku bukole mu tshisuku mukaji mumane kubangila, nushipe anu mulume nkayende
Nenutante mu ditunga didi ne biakudia bia bungi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu munulaye
Kabakuenza kabidi buenzayi ebu to
Yeye ke unudi nujana
Bamfumu ba Ditunga ba kale bavwabo basungula badi batshipwita bakulumpa bwa kashidi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Kanudi dianyi dia ngombe anyi dia mukoko anyi dia mbushi
Bialueye ne nyama udibo bafila bu mulambu kudi Yehowa, bintu bionso bidibo baha Yehowa nebikale bintu bia tshijila
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Muntu yonso udi ushiha Kana, nebamusombuele misangu muanda mutekete Yehowa wakalekela Kana tshimanyinu bua wamusangana kamushihi
Mulau wa Midima Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe mulu, midima ikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bantu babubute mu midima
Bakenzakana, kumonabu tshisumbu tshia bena Ismayele, bafuma ku ditunga dia Ngilaade baya ku Ejipitu
Yehoshafata wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu ne bitanu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu
Nuikishe dituku dia Dikisha, nunemeke muaba wanyi wa tshijila
Mulume kuandamuna ne: Anu mukaji uuvua mumpeshe ke udi muntuadile tshimuma, meme panyi kutshidia
Dî diakalua kudiye, diakamukonka ne, Eliya, udi wenza tshinyi kunoko

Yehowa wakamufila buloba buonso bua Gilada tô ne ku Dana, ne buloba buonso bua Nafatale, ne bua Efelayima ne Manashe ne buloba buonso bua Yuda tô ne ku mai manene a ku nyima, ne buloba bua ku Sude, ne mpata wa mu tshibanda tshia Yeleko, musoko wa mabue, tô ne ku Soâ
Nzambi wakamueneka kudi La bana, Muena Alama, mu tshiota butuku, wakamuambila ne, Udimuke, kuambidi Yakoba nansha di dimpe nansha di dibi
Nakufila midioko yonso bu bia kudia kudi nyama yonso ya ha buloba ne nyunyu ya mulu ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi, tshionso tshidi ne muoyo; bualu buakenjibua
Kadi kanutshinyi, kanupampakanyi bua panuvua bampane
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele nunku kadi bobo kabakatumikila dî dia Mose bualu bua kanyinganyinga ka mutshima, ne bua dikenga dia buhika
Bua Zebuluna yeye wakamba ne, Usanke mu kuluhuka kuebe; ne Yisakâ, usanke mu ntenta yebe
Diimanyika kadieena mwa kupita matuku a midimu idi yenzeka ku bûngi to

Hakuvudishila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, disanka, bikala nshila mutambe kule, ne wewe kuena mua kutuala bintu biebe bualu bua muaba udi Yehowa neusungule bua kujadikamu dina diandi udi utamba kule, hashishe neubihane ku argent: wangate argent mu tshianza tshiebe, uye biebe ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, musungule; neudisumbile bintu bidi mutshima webe musue, nansha ngombe nansha mikoko nansha mioyo nansha maluvu makole nansha bintu bionso biudi musue; neubidie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, neusanke, wewe ne ba mu nsubu webe
Yahata wakadi kahita, Ziza muibidi; kadi Yeusha ne Belia kabakadi ne bana balume ba bungi; nunku bobo bakadi babadibue mu nsubu umue wa batatu babo
Enzai nunku ne ngombe yenu ne mikoko yenu kabidi, muana neikale ne mamu wandi matuku muanda mutekete, kadi numufile kundi dituku dia muanda mukulu
Abimeleke ne Ahuzata, muanda wandi, ne Pikola, kamanda ka masalayi andi, bakumuka ku Gelâ, bakaya kudiye
Yakambila mutshi wa olive ne, Utukokeshe
Bualu ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, udi munusungule munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabu
Kadi Esawu kukonka tatuende ne: Kuena mua kungela panyi lupemba nansha lukese anyi
Isaka wakaya mu budimi dilolo bua kutendelela, wakabandisha mesu andi, ne monai, tumelo tuakadi tulua

Pikala muntu musue kundambula ngombe bua mulambu wa kuosha nansha wa bobumue, nansha bua kukumbaja malaya, nansha bua mulambu wa tshibidilu, ku nyama yonsu awu, asakidile kilo tshitema ya bukula, budibu basambakaja ne mafuta litre isatu

Binuasangana disua dia nyunyu mu nshila ku mutshi anyi ha buloba, ne bana ba nyunyu anyi makela bidimu, ne mukashi wa nyunyu udi ushikama ha bana anyi ha makela, kanuangatshi mukashi wa nyunyu ne bana bandi kabidi; nulekele mukashi wa nyunyu tshianana, kadi nudi mua kudiangatshila bana ba nyunyu; nunku malu enu neikale mimpe, nenuvudishe matuku enu
Matamba awu kusampila, kuela bilongu, kukuama tumuma tumane kuboba
Enza biebe bilulu bia miosa ya mbushi dikumi ne tshimue bualu bua kuteka ha mutu ha tshitendelelu
Mu dekele mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, udi uteeka bantu ku midimu ya basivile ne ya basalâyi idi kayiyi ku bukookeshi bwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga
Mafuta awu, ke adi ajadika ne: badi batuangaji kashidi, bobu ne ndelanganyi yabu yonsu

Binunvua mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, inakunuambila lelu, nenuhete disanka; binuahidia kunvua mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, binuasesuka mu nshila unakunulesha lelu bua kulonda nzambi mikuabo, Nudi kanuyi bamanye, nenuhete mulau
Miaba yonsu ivua mayi apatukila muinshi mua buloba ne mulu kudikangayi, mela kukama
Tangilai, nakateka disanka ne mulau ku mpala kuenu lelu
Katataka wewe neutangile ne bualu bunakukuambila nebuenjibue anyi kabuena buenjibua
Kadi Kalebe kubapuwisha, wamba ne: Tuyayi mu ditunga adi
Nunku Natana wakambila Davidi mei â onso, wakamuawila tshikena kumona etshi tshionso
Yai bienu lubilu kudi tatu wanyi, numuambile ne, Muan ebe Yosefe wakamba ne, Nzambi wakanvuisha mukelenge wa buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, Ulue biebe kundi, kujanguluki
Alue biandi kundi, amanye biandi ne muprofete udi mu Isalele
Bakuabo babo bakadi ne mudimu wa kulamabo malonga a mu nsubu; bakadi babala malonga hakabuelabo n au ne hakahatukabo n au
Nakanuambila nunku, kanuakangunvuila; kadi nuakadi ne budisu, nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, nuakadiyila ku mikuna
Nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nuende mu nshila yandi, numutshine
Nehemiya Kutendelela kua Nehemiya Bualu bua Yelushalema Mei a Nehemiya, muana wa Hakaleya
Pikalaye wenza mudimu kumpala kuanyi nansha upatuka mu muaba wa tshijila bantu bonsu nebumvue muadi wa ndibu ayi

Kanudi tshintu tshidifuile: nudi mua kuha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu atshi, yeye atshidie; anyi nudi mua kutshihanyisha muntu wa bende; bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yeye wakunyua dî dianyi mu ntempelo wandi, muadi wanyi wakafika mu matshu andi
Yehowa wakakonka Abalahama ne, Sala wakaseka bua tshinyi, wamba ne, Meme nendele muana, hankadi mukoke aha, anyi
Kabeena mwa kufunda, kukwata , kweela mu lukanu anyi kupiishisha muntu kampanda bwa bwaalu bwenza kudi munga muntu to
Yakoba wakamba ne, Yehowa Nzambi wa kaku wanyi Abalahama, ne Nzambi wa tatu anyi Isaka, wewe wakungambila ne, Uhingane kuebe, ne kudi bana benu, nenkuenzele bimpe

Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wewe udi muakane; bualu bua wewe wakatahila difuka dihanduka bu mudidi lelu eu; mona, tudi ku mesu kuebe mu kuhila kuetu; kakuena udi mumanye mua kuimana ku mpala kuebe bua bualu ebu

Mikenji ya bena Levi Arone ne bana bende ba balume badi batuadija mudimu Dituku divua dilonda matuku muanda mutekete avuabu bajidile Arone ne bana bende ba balume, Moshe kubabikila pamue ne bakulu ba bena Izrayele
Hashishe kahia ka Yehowa kakahona hanshi, kakosha mulambu ne nkunyi ne mabue ne dinfuenkenya ne kakakamisha mai akadi mu mutuhu

Wakafika ku Yelushalema ne batuadi ba bungi, ne tumelo tuakadi ne bintu bia muhuya muimpe ne biamu bia or bia bungi ne mabue a mushinga mukole; hakafikeye kudi Solomo wakayikila n andi, wakamuambila malu onso akadiye n au mu mutshima wandi
Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakangambila ne, Songa mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi, ulue biebe kundi ku mukuna, udienzele mushete wa mabaya
Bantu kai bakumpa dî dia Nzambi diakalua kudibo munkatshi mua kahia, bu munuakadiunvua, ne bakikala ne muoyo
Bialua muntu ne luonji lua kushiha mukuandi mu budimu, wewe neumumushe ku tshioshelu tshianyi, bua kumushiha

Numanye kabidi ne, Nendombe bulami bua mashi enu, nembulombe kudi nyama yonso ne kudi muntu yonso, nendombe bulami bua muoyo wa muntu hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu Muntu yonso udi umatshisha mashi a munga muntu hanshi, nebamatshishe mashi andi hanshi, bualu bua Nzambi wakafuka bantu mu tshifuanyikishi tshiandi

Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, ne bantu bakuabo ba Davidi bakaluhuka, bakasambakena n abo hehi ne dishiha dia mu Gibeona; bakashikama hanshi, bakuabo ku muelelu umue wa dishiha, bakuabo ku muelelu mukuabo wa dishiha

Yehowa atukande bua katumutombokedi, katubambuki kudiye, katuhangi kumulonda, ne katuashi tshioshelu tshia milambu ya kuosha ne ya bukula, ne ya nyama mishiha, anu tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, tshidi ku mpala kua tshitendelelu tshiandi
Kadi kanukukuidi mvidie mikuabu, mvidie ya bisamba binudi nabi mutumba

Kanuhu tshihungidi tshinakahunga n enu muoyo; kanuena ne bualu bua kutshina nzambi mikuabo; kadi bunudi n abu mbua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; yeye neanusungile mu bianza bia bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna
Amrame wakashala ne muoyi bidimu lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete
Hakunvua mukelenge mei a mukashi eu, wakadihanda bilulu biandi yeye wakadi wendakana ha mutu ha lumbu ; bantu bakamona ne, Yeye wakadi ne bilulu bikayabala mubishi mua bilulu ham bidi handi

Nunku halua matata ne makenga makole kudibo, musambu eu newikale bu mumanyi wa bualu, neudiambe kudibo; bana babo kabahu musambu eu muoyo, bualu bua meme ndi mumanye meji adibo n au mu mitshima yabo lelu diambedi tshiyi muanze kulua n abo mu buloba bunakabalaya
Nubilekele bapela ne benyi
Nenku yeye nkayende neasungule muntu wende wa tshijila
Wakalua ne mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, waka ufila bu muakadi mukenji
Kadi nuenu nuikale ne bukole, kanutekeshi maboko enu; bualu bua nebanufute ku midimu yenu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Wewe neumudinge, neumuhite bukole; ya, wenze nunku
Mbimpe witabe tshindi nkuambila
Bakashiha bantu bonso bakadimu ne miele ya nvita, bakaba butula; kabakashiya nansha umue ne muoyo; wakosha Hasô ne kahia
Kupinganabu ku Kadeshe, mu tshipela tshia Parane, muaba uvua Moshe, Arone ne bena Izrayele bonsu
Pikala muntu mupela wa mu tshisamba tshianyi ukenga, wewe mumusombeshe makuta, kumulombi tshia kasombela to
Yakoba wakalua ku Luze eu udi Betele mu buloba bua Kanana, yeye ne bantu bonso bakadiye n abo
Moshe udi upingana mu mitanda Moshe kutuluka ku mukuna wa Sinayi ne mabue abidi a ndondu makuate ku bianza
Bu bobo bikale ne lungenyi, bakadi kujingulula bualu ebu, bakadi kuela meji a malu atua kudibo
Arone neavuale muntumpu awu diba didiye wenza mudimu wende wa butuangaji
Pashishe, bena Izrayele kufika ku Elime
Bualu bua bobo badi bu tshisamba tshia bantu badi kabayi ne lungenyi, kabena ne dijingulula dia malu munda muabo
Mbamujingidi diakalenga divua diebe wewe
Nuyisuike kabidi ku maboku enu, ne pa mpala yenu, bua kanuyipu muoyi to
Dutelonone Matuku a Masanka Majalame Ek
Bualu kabuena nunku, kadi muntu wa ku mikuna ya Efelayima, dina diandi Sheba, muana wa Bikili, wakatombokela mukelenge Davidi mene; anji kumufila mu bianza bianyi, tuetu netumuke tushiya musoko
Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Yehowa, meme tshiena mua kuakula bimpe, nansha diambedi, nansha katshia wabanga kuakula ne muntu webe, bualu bua meme ndi muena tshikukumina
Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka kalongu ka , Dîyi dikulu dia Bukalenga bwa Tshisabu dia mu dia a lwabanya ndifwa

Yehowa Udi Ubenga bua Mose Abuele mu Buloba bua Kanâna Nakasengelela Yehowa ku tshikondo atshi, nakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, wewe wakabanga kulesha muntu webe bunene buebe, ne tshianza tshiebe tshikole: nzambi kai udi mu diulu anyi udi ha buloba udi mua kuenza bu mûdi wenza malu ebe a kukema
Nebateke dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Lubena ku luseke lua ku sude
Mêyi a ditunga adi afila mishindu ya kwaasa ne ya kwendesha bilongelu ebi
Mampa malambula Mvidi Mukulu Wangate bukula, wenze mikata dikumi ne ibidi, mukata onsu wikale ne bujitu bua kilo isambombu
Monai, nakanuyisha mei ne mikenji, bu muakangambila Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, bua nuenu kubienza mu buloba bunudi nubuela bua kubuhiana
Nuangate balume ba lungenyi lule, banudi bamanye, bungi bua bisamba bienu, nembateke ku mutu kuenu
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Kimehama neaye n anyi, nemmuenzele budi buimpe kûdi; nenkuenzele tshionso tshiudi ungebesha

Wakashimbula kabidi tshioshelu tshiakadi ku Betele ne tshitendelelu tshiakenza Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, wakenzesha Bena Isalele malu mabi; wakosha tshitendelelu, wakatshibutula bu luhuishi, wakosha mpingu ya Bashela mu kahia
Ke kusemenabu pabuipi, kuambula bitalu abi, bivuadike mintumpu

Biahuekeshabo mitshima yabo idi kayiyi mitengula, bitabushabo dikenga dia mibi yabo, nenvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi ne Yakoba ne tshihungidi tshianyi ne Isaka ne tshihungidi tshianyi ne Abalahama, nenvuluke buloba ebu
Patuikala dijinga ne biakudia, nansha ne mayi a kunua, netusumbe
Nganyi udi dibue, bikaleye kayi Nzambi wetu
Neutukokeshe, anyi
Yehowa wakunsokoka bualu ebu, kena muanze kubungambila

Nshobo ya kumudilu wa Asafa yakakuata Yosefe; mibidi yakakuata Gedaliya; yeye ne bana babo bakadi dikumi ne babidi; misatu yakakuata Zakû ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; mmai yakakuata Yiseli ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; mitanu yakakuata Netanya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; misambombo yakakuata Bukia ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya muanda mutekete yakakuata Yeshalela ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya muanda mukulu yakakuata Yeshaya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya tshitema yakakuata Matanaya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi yakakuata Shimei ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne umue yakakuata Azalele ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne ibidi yakakuata Hashabeya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne isatu yakakuata Shubaele ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne inai yakakuata Matitiya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne itanu yakakuata Yelemota ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne isambombo yakakuata Hananya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne muanda mutekete yakakuata Yoshebekasha ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne muanda mukulu yakakuata Hanani ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne tshitema yakakuata Maloti ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya makumi abidi yakakuata Eliata ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya makumi abidi ne umue yakakuata Hotî ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya makumi abidi ne ibidi yakakuata Gidaleti ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya makumi abidi ne isatu yakakuata Mahaziota ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya makumi abidi ne inai yakakuata Lomameti ezê ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi
Hashishe Solomo wakamba ne, Yehowa wakamba ne, Meme nenshikame mu mîdima mikole

Mu nseke yonso yakaya mukenji wa mukelenge ne dî diandi, muadi munene wakadi munkatshi mua Bena Yuda, bakajila bia kudia, bakasa muadi, bakadila, ba bungi bakaluata bilulu bikayabala, bakadiela butue ham bidi

Bualu bua yeye wakambila Bena Yuda ne, Tuase misoko ei, tuyinyunguluke ne ngumbu ne bibumba ne bibi bia biamu; buloba butshidi ku mpala kuetu bualu bua tuetu tuakakeba Yehowa Nzambi wetu; tuakamukeba, ne yeye wakutuha ditalala ku nseke yonso
Kadi padi bidimu bishala bikese bua kufika ku tshidimu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene, muena Izrayele awu neapingaje makuta mashadile, bilondeshile bungi bua bidimu bidi bishale abi
Kutedi dina dia Nzambi tshitelatela, kuhendi mukokeshi wa bantu bebe
Mukàjì kayi mutamba bakwabu Utena yeya ne maalu munda Kalwa ubwela mu cyalukamu
Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kwasa, nansha bishi, tshisumbu tshia kabumwe pa tshipapu tshijima tshia buloba bwa ditunga anyi pa tshitupa tshiadi
Mu ntu au wakakujingulula ikale biandi ne disanka Yeye wakamanyisha mamuen andi ne, Muena kunakadi wenza mudimu lelu wakadi Boaza
Bena mudimu babidi bavua nende

Tshisamba tshia Ngade tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Sefone, ndelanganyi ya Sefone; dia bena Agi, ndelanganyi ya Agi; dia bena Shuni, ndelanganyi ya Shuni, dia bena Ozni, ndelanganyi ya Ozni; die bena Eri, ndelanganyi ya Eri; dia bena Arode, ndelanganyi ya Arode; ne dia bena Areli, ndelanganyi ya Areli
Tumunuishe kabidi maluvu lelu
Nuntendelele anu meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Yehowa neanuihate ku mesu kua bena lukuna benu; nuenu nenuye kudibo mu nshila umue, kadi nenunyeme ku mesu kuabo mu nshila muanda mutekete; nebanuendakashe munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia ha buloba
Bamfumu badi bafuma ku ndelanganyi ya Esawu badi nunku: Elifaze, muanabute, udi nkambua wa bamfumu basambombu: Temane, Omare, Sefo, Kenaze, Ngatame ne Amaleke
Bena Lewi bonso nebanyunguluke mukelenge, muntu ne muntu ne bintu bia nvita mu bianza biandi; muntu yonso udi ubuela mu nsubu bamushihe; nuenu nuikale ne mukelenge habueleye mu nsubu ne humukeye

Ka nudiangatshidi tshintu tshimue tshia mulau tshia musoko au mu tshianza tshienu; nunku Yehowa nealekele tshiji tshiandi tshikole, neanuleshe luse, neanusankishe, neanukumbashe bu muakalayeye batatu benu; hanunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi yonso inakunuambila lelu ne bua kuenza malu adi makane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yeye wakamba ne, Kanana udi muedibue mulau, yeye neikale muhika wa bahika kudi bana babo
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Nuakunyunguluka mukuna eu musangu mule, yai bienu ku nôde
Bituadije dituku dimvua mubutule bamuanabute ba bena Ejipitu, ndi muangate bamuanabute ba bena Izrayele bua bikale banyi ba tshijila
Kadi muonshi wakayambila ne, Nshiye nvinyo yanyi mihia mihia, idi isankisha Nzambi ne bantu kabidi, bua kuya kuhehukahehuka ku mutu kua mitshi yonso mikuabo, anyi
Udi ujadika pa diludika dieenda, lwendu lululama lwa bukalenga bwa Mbulamatadi ne lwa bishimikidi pamwe ne ntungunukilu wa Mbulamatadi
Nanku nuenu bena Izrayele, nukumbaje amu bidi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu musue
Bualu bua nakutshina difik a munda ne tshiji tshikole biakadi Yehowa n abi bua kunushiha
Mabaya awu, ikale ne bitaku makumi anayi bienza ne tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Abiya wakasa mualu wa nvita ne bena nvita ba bukitu binunu nkama inai; Yalobama wakaluangana n andi ne bena nvita ba bukitu binunu nkama muanda mukulu
Shaula wakebesha bantu bandi bakadi bimane kudiye ne, Nuenu Bena Benyamina, unvuai, Muana eu wa Yishai neanuhe madimi ne madimi a tumuma tukese, anyi

Azaya, muana wa Sadoka, muakuidi; Eleholefe ne Ahiya, bana ba Shisha, bakadi ba secrétaire; Yehoshafata, muana wa Ahiluda, wakadi mufundi; Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakadi ku mutu kua masalayi; Sadoka ne Ebeyatâ bakadi bakuidi; Azaya, muana wa Natana, wakadi ku mutu kua tuhita tuandi; Zabuda, muana wa Natana, wakadi muloho wandi manene, mulunda wa mukelenge; Alusha wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu wandi; Adonilama, muana wa Abeda, wakadi kahita ka bena mudimu
Mukuna mujima kunyunga bikole
Bumuka ku Makelote, kuyabu ku Tahate
Hakaha Nzambi wa mu diulu bisamba buhianyi buabi, hakatahululeye bantu, wakadika mikalu ya bantu bu mudi bungi bua bana ba Isalele
Mose wakolola tshianza tshiandi ha mai, ne hakatshia butuku mai akahingana kabidi ne bukole buau, Bena Ejipitu bakanyema ne Yehowa wakahita Bena Ejipitu bukole mu bunene bua mai
Bumuka mu Mitka, kuyabu ku Ashemona
Yeye wakela Benyamina tshituha ku nshingu, wakadila, ne Benyamina wakadia ku nshingu wandi kabidi
Hakasemena bantu aba ha buihi ne Elisha, yeye wakalomba Yehowa ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ufofomeshe mesu a bantu aba

Mikenji Neyitekibue mu Mushete wa Tshihungidi tshia Mei Hakashikisha Mose kufunda mei a mikenji ei mu mukanda, hashishe Mose wakadimusha Bena Lewi bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ne, Nuangate mukanda eu wa mikenji, nûteke ku luseke lua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, newikaleku bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi

Bilulu biakadiye n abi, nansha tshilulu tshiakenzabo ne miosa ya mikoko nansha tshilulu tshia lin, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama ya miosa ya mikoko anyi ya lin, nansha mu tshiseba anyi mu tshintu tshiakenzabo ne tshiseba, bikala bintu bifike anyi bikunze mu tshilulu anyi mu tshiseba anyi mu milongo ya buludi anyi mu milongo ya butshiama anyi mu tshintu tshiakenzabo ne tshiseba, edi ndisama dia nsudi, nebaleshe disama edi kudi muakuidi
Nenshale muendakanyi
Bu muakajimisha Yehowa bisamba bikuabo ku mpala kuenu, nunku nuenu nenujimine, bualu bua nuenu nuakahidia kunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kadi padiye kayi usukula bilamba biende, kayi wowa mayi pambidi, neapete tshibawu
Mutuangaji enze bionsu ebi anu muvuaye wenza bua mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi
Nakamukudimuna ne, Ndiku
Biashala bidimu bikese tô ne ku tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, bobo nebabibale, yeye neamuhingishile tshituha tshia kudihikula n atshi bu bungi bua bidimu biandi bidi bishala
Isalele udi ushikama biandi talalâ, mpokolo wa Yakoba udi ha nkayandi mu madimi a blé ne a nvinyo mihia mihia: ne matutu andi adi amatshisha dibungi
Kadi hanuasabuka Yadene, hanuashikama mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuhianyisha, udi unuha dikisha kudi bena lukuna bonso badi banunyunguluka, ne nenushikame talalâ
Nunku bakela Bena Isalele nyima, bakamba kuya mu tshihela; kadi nvita mikole yakabalonda; bakashiha kabidi bantu bakadi baluhuka mu misoko mu muaba eu mene
Nunku Delila wakangata mionshi mihia mihia, wakamusuika n ai, wakamuambila ne, Shimishona, Bena Peleshete badi ham bidi hebe
Kadi Moshe kunyema, kuya mu ditunga dia Madiyane
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Solomo ne malu onso akenzeye ne meji andi kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa bienzedi bia Solomo, anyi
Bilobu bia bena Mowabe kuzakala
Mukashi wandi, Muena Yuda, wakalela Yelede, tatu wa Gedô, ne Hebê, tatu wa Soko, ne Yekutiele, tatu wa Zanoa
Ku bisamba bionsu, nansha bidi ne bantu bapite bungi, kakuena tshisamba tshidi ne mikenji mimpe, bu idi mu mukanda wa mikenji undi nnuleja lelu ewu
Maona, Kâmele ne Zifa ne Yuta, ne Yizelele ne Yokedama ne Zanoa, Kayina, Gibea ne Timena; bimenga dikumi ne misoko yabi
Wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi muana wa nganyi

Mose wakabatuma ku nvita, bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba ku tshisamba, Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eleazâ muakuidi, wakaya n abo ne bintu bikuabo bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne mpungi ya kuela n ai dî dikole mu tshianza tshiandi
Kadi bonsu badi bakutshipa, nembatshipe
Pashishe bena Izrayele kumuka mu Ramsese bua kuya ku Sukote
Moshe, Arone ne Ure kubanda pa katongobela ka mukuna
Bena Isalele kabakabashiha, bualu bua bakelenge babo bakamana kuditshiha kudibo mu dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele
Kadi Yozefe kubakolesha ku muoyi, wamba ne: Kanutshinyi to

Nunku nakasungula balume ba lungenyi lule, banuakamanya, nakabateka ku mutu kuenu, tuhita tua binunu binunu, ne tuhita tua nkama nkama, ne tuhita tua makumi atanu makumi atanu, ne tuhita tua dikumi dikumi, ne miloho bungi bua bisamba bienu

Biatangila muakuidi ne disama diakuamba kushika hashikishabo kuvuwa tshintu atshi, yeye neahande tshituha tshia tshilulu anyi tshia tshiseba anyi tshia milongo ya buludi anyi tshia milongo ya butshiama tshidi ne disama
Mana akadi bu ntete ya kolianda, akadi afuanangana ne bedola

Yeye wakasangisha bakuidi ne Bena Lewi, wakabambila ne, Yai bienu ku misoko yonso ya Yuda, nusangishe argent kudi Bena Isalele bonso ya kulongolola n ai nsubu wa Nzambi wenu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu; nudimuke bua nuenu nuenzeshe bualu ebu lukasa
Tuyai, tuangate mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ku Shilo, ulue munkatshi muetu bua kutusungilau ku tshianza tshia badi n etu lukuna
Hakatangila Bena Amona ne, Bena Sulia bakanyema, bobo kabidi bakanyema ku mpala kua Abishai, bakabuela mu musoko

Kadi bua malu au onso hayabo mu buloba bua bantu badi n abo lukuna, meme tshiena mbahidia, tshiena ngikala n abo tshiji bua kubashiha tshiendelele ne bua kushiha tshihungidi tshianyi tshinakahunga n abo, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, kadi bua bualu buabo nenvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi tshinakahunga ne bankambua babo banakahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku mesu kua bisamba bia bantu, bua meme kuikala Nzambi wabo meme ndi Yehowa
Hashishe Zêba ne Salemuna bakamuambila ne, Bika biebe, unshihe, bualu bua bu mudi mulume mbu mudi bukole buandi kabidi
Bantu ba muoyi muimpe kufila milambu yabu kudi Maweja Nangila bua kuasa ntenta wa kusambakena, bua midimu ya kutendelela, ne bua kutela bilamba bia tshijila

Padibo bitabuja ndongamu ewu kudi tshitupa tshipita bunene tshia bantu badi bakumbajija Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa, tshiôtshi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga etshi tshidi tshiteeka baminisitila mu nkwaasa
Kadi mutshi uvua pankatshi pa mitshi mikuabu uvua mutshiamakane mutue eku ne eku mu nzubu mujima wa tshijila
Davidi wakambila Gada ne, Ndi munkatshi mua malu manene: tuhone mu bianza bia Yehowa, bualu bua luse luandi ludi lunene; tshihonyi mu bianza bia bantu
Bakamusuika ne mionshi mihia mihia ibidi, bakumuka n andi ku dibue
Amu Kalebe, muana wa Yefune, ne Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, ke bavua bashale ne muoyi
Kanuakatukonka diambedi hanuakahingisha mukelenge wetu bualu kai
Manoa wakakonka muanjelo wa Yehowa ne, Dina diebe nganyi, bua tuetu tukutumbishe hashika mei ebe
Batatu kabafuidi bana babo, ne bana kabafuidi batatu abo: muntu yonso adifuile bua malu mabi andi

bulongolodi budi butangila: a b c mêyi maludiki a bungenda mushinga, mwikalamu dikuba, diaasa ne dianyisha dia kumpanyi; mêyi ne mikandu, bulongolodi bwa nzubu ya mashika; mêyi maludiki a bulongolodi ne bukookeshi bwa beena nsambu ne mêyi maludiki a mianda ya beena nsambu; d e f g h i j k l m n o bulongolodi budi butangila midimu ya badi baditambakeena; bulongolodi bwa mianda ya midimu butangila bu mudi mêyi adi aludika nsombelu wa bamfumu ne beena mudimu ,bukubi bwa beena mudimu,tuludiki tudi tutangila dikuba dia bantu mu musoko ne nangananga, tuludiki tudi tutangila dikubisha dia bantu ne dipangila dia mudimu, kadiyi dielela menji; bulongolodi bwa mianda ya bubanji butangila mêyi adi atangila majimba, bia mwinshi mwa buloba ne mafuta a bia mwinshi mwa buloba, matanda, bifidi bia midilu ne dilama dia makookeshi a kwa Nzambi; bulongodi budi butangila bufuki mu lungenyi ne midimu ya bianza; bulongolodi budi butangila manga ne midimu ya londapu, didimwija ku masaama, bu mudi mankenda a mubidi, mankenda a miaba ya tshinsangansanga ne dikuba dia bamamu ne bâna, bulongolodi butangila mudimu wa balambi ba manga, disumbisha dia manga, dibweela dia mu ditunga dia benda ne dipitshilamu, tuludiki twa mianda ya bukole ne makanda a mubidi tutangila matunga abidi ne tutangila bukwa matunga, bulongolodi budi butangila mankenda ku mudimu, ditwangaja dipiluke dia biâpu bia manga ne diabanya dia bangangabuka; dîyi didi ditangila mianda ya masungulangana; bulongolodi butangila dilamba, diludika, dibiikidisha, dipatula ne disumbisha dia maluvu makola mengula; bulongolodi butangila dilamba, dibiikidisha ne dipatula ne disumbisha dia maluvu makolesha ne adi kaayi makolesha; bulongolodi butangila difula, dibiikidisha ne dipatula ne dipitshisha dia biamwa bia mvita; bulongolodi butangila dimitshisha dia mukaji ku biamwa , diludika dia mamanya a pa bivuba ne a pa ditentemuna dia bitupa bia mubidi ne bia misunya ya mubidi; bulongolodi butangila beena tshimwangi,badibo bipata ne badi banyeema; bulongolodi butangila diangatshibwa ku midimu ya manga ne ku midimu mikwabo ne ditambakana
Wakusangana bualu bubi kai munda mua muntu webe musangu wonso unakadi n ebe tô ne lelu, bua meme tshiyi kuluangana ne bena lukuna ba mukelenge wanyi

Biafuilanganabo bua tshintu tshionso, nansha ngombe nansha mpunda nansha mukoko nansha bilulu nansha bintu bikuabo bidi bantu bamba ne, Ebu mbualu bua bantu baye kudi balumbuluishi, muntu udi balumbuluishi bahishe yeye neafute mukuandi bintu misangu ibidi
Mutuangaji angate tshintu tshimue tshia ku mulambu ne ku mulambu bua kulambula Maweja Nangila
Yeye waka tuma nyunyu wa nkutshi bua kumanyeye ne mai akahueka ha buloba
Kanutahi mputu ham bidi henu bua kujinga n ai bantu bafue, kanutahi nsalu ham bidi henu meme ndi Yehowa
Nomba Mikenji ya Kuditshiha Mose wakambila bakadi ku mutu kua bisamba bia Bena Isalele ne, Edi ndî diakutuambila Yehowa
Meme nakakuashila nsubu bua wewe wikale ne muaba wa kushikama tshiendelele
Bintu bia batuangaji Maweja Nangila kuambila Arone ne: Ndi mukupeshe mudimu wa kutangila milambu yonsu ya tshijila idi bena Izrayele bandambula
Yuda kusemena pabuipi ne Yozefe, kumuambila ne: Mukalenga, ndi musue kukuambila bualu
Nudimuke bualu bua disama dia nsudi, bua nuenu kuenza malu onso bimpe adi bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi banuyisha: bu munakabambila bobo, nuenu nuenze nunku
Kanushiminyinyi mukuenu bualu
Kadi padiye musue kudipikula, pamue ne muntu uvua mumusumbe, babale bungi bua bidimu bidi bipite, katshia bamusumbe too ne ku tshidimu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene
Malu a bana bandi balume, ne bunene bua majitu akadiye n au ne muakalongololeye nsubu wa Nzambi, monai, adi mafunda mu mukanda wa bakelenge
Yehowa wakaha Davidi bukole bua kutamba bena lukuna bandi kuonso kuakayeye
Hashishe Abimeleke Wakabikila Abalahama, wakamukonka ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi tshinyi
Wakukuta difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Onana
Bena Ismayele kuya nende mu Ejipitu
Mu bukokeshi bua Ahashawelosha, ku tshibangidilu tshia bukokeshi buandi, bakatanda mukanda bua kubanda ba mu Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema
Nenku nenusombe mu ditunga dienu talalaa
Kadi, pikala muntu amu umue mutupakane mu mpukapuka, neandambule muana wa mbuji wa tshidimu tshimue bua kudikobolola
Badi mua kumukuma mikumu makumi anai, kadi kabahitshi: biahilabo mikumu ei, muan enu neikale bu muntu wa hatuhu kunudi
Nenudie munyinyi wa bana ba balume ne ba bakaji banudi balele, bikale Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe
Bena Izrayele kudia nabu minyinyi milambuila mvidie, kukukuila ne mvidie yabu mene
Nakatuma Mose ne Alona, nakakengesha Bena Ejipitu ne malu onso anakenza munkatshi muabo; hashishe nakanuluhula
Moshe ne Arone kuya kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kumuambila ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Ebrewu, udi wamba ne: Mbimpe udipuekeshe kumpala kuanyi
Kubasanganabu basombe ku muelelu wa mayi manene makunze, pabuipi ne Pi Hahirote, batangilangane ne Baale Sefone
Bualu mmupete, kabidi mmutekemene amu ku difutu adi
Kalongo kisambombo : Bidi bitangila lwendu lwa tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa
Yakobe kuambila bena diku diende ne bantu bende ne: Dilongololayi
Sheshebasâ wakalua n au onso, hakumuka bakadi mu buhika ku Babulona bua kuyabo ku Yelushalema
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu nkayende, neende kumpala kuenu
Tshiluilu tshivua ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Yuda kupita kumpala, bena mvita bambule dibendela diabu
Samuele Davidi ne Abigayila Samuele wakafua; Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangisha, bakamujinga, bakamujika mu nsubu wandi mu Lama
Butumbuke buvua metre umue ne desimetre itanu
Yeye wakamuebesha ne, Udi musue kuya kudiye lelu bua tshinyi
Ebeyatâ wakalua kudi Davidi ne efoda

Yehowa neanuvuisbe bu mitu, kena unuvuisha bu mikila; nuenu nenuikale anu ku mutu, kanuena nuikala hanshi, binuatumikila mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, indi nnuambila lelu, binuayenza; binuikala kanuyi nusesuka lelu ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi ku mei andi nnuambila, bua kuya kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu

Kadi mpindiewu wewe mubutule bena Izrayele bonsu musangu umue, bisamba bikuabu bivua bimane kumvua lumu lua bukole buebe, nebiambe ne: Maweja Nangila wapangi mua kufikisha bena Izrayele mu ditunga divuaye mubalaye
Yeye wakihata bena Sodoma mu buloba, wakumusha mpingu yonso yakenza batatu andi

Bantu bamwela diboku mulu Bwa bwimpa bwenda Yoyoyo Kemayi Muntu wa bwela mu cyalukamu Kusekiseki mwineba Maria Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Kabulu kwamba kusekiseki mwineba Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Wewa muswe kucina maalu Sanka olonda meyi ne mikandu ya Mulopo Kwema dinanga munda mwebe Unanga Nzambi webe kumpala kwa bionso Unemeke baledi bembe Kuvualakanyi kantu ka mukwebe shabana eyo Mukàjì wa benda kelengi
Mvua kabidi ne dikopu dia mukalenga ku bianza
Kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete ndia Dikisha, bualu ndituku dia tshijila dia Maweja Nangila
Hashishe, habueleye mu nsubu wa kulaleye tulu, wewe uta ngile muaba udiye mulale, wewe ubuelemu umushe bilulu ku makasa andi ulale biebe ne yeye neakua, mbile tshiudi mua kuenza

Bulelela, nsubu wanyi kena nunku ku mesu kua Nzambi, kadi yeye wakahunga n anyi tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele, tshilongolodibue mu malu onso, ne tshijadikibue, bualu bua tshidi luhandu luanyi luoso ne disua dianyi dionso, yeye kena ubidiundisha, anyi
Munkatshi mua bana ba bakuidi bakadi babake bakashi ba bende bakasangana bantu nunku: ba bana ba Yeshua, muana wa Yozadaka, ne bana babo Mâseya ne Eliezê ne Yaliba ne Gedaliya
Balaame ewu, ke muana wa Beyore, uvua mu musoku wa Petore, mu Mezopotamiya
Nenutshimune bena Anake, bantu bale ba bukole, badi bantu bakuabu batshina, bamba ne: Kakuena udi mua kukandamana kudi ndelanganyi ya Anake
Abimeleke kubikidisha Izake, kumukonka ne: Wewe mumanye bimpe ne: Rebeka mmukajanyi, uvua unshima ne: mmuanetu wa bakaji, bua tshinyi
Bantu ba bungi bakadisangisha ku Yelushalema bua kudiabo bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene mu ngondo muibidi; tshisumbu tshiakadi tshinene
Nubivuluke, nubienze; bualu ebu budi lungenyi luenu ne budimu buenu ku mesu kua bantu badi bunvua mikenji ei yonso, badi bamba ne, Bulelela, bantu aba banene badi ne lungenyi ne budimu
Bu munuakaheta bintu bimpe bionso biakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku Yehowa neanutumine malu mabi onso tô ne hanubutuleye mu buloba ebu buimpe buakanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kanungu ka Nkoselu wa tshilumbu yônso badi bamufunda mu mukanda ne bumvwija tshidibo bakosela nanku
Bena Isalele, bitudilu bienu bidi bimpe
Mvua muambule ku bianza mabue avua ne mikenji ya ndondu
Uziya wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika hohamue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi
Dilolo nenuambe ne, Tudi basue butuku butshie bualu bua buowa budi bunukuata mu mitshima yenu, ne bua malu anudi batangila ku mesu
Yeholama wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu muanda mukulu
Kumukaye muaba awu
Mitshi yenu ne bintu bienu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba nebikale bia mikumbi
Wakajuka, wakadia, wakanua, wakaya mu bukole bua bidia abi tô minya ne matuku makumi anai tô ne ku Holeba, mukuna wa Nzambi
Mu Kohata muakadi diku dia Bena Amalama ne dia Bena Yisehâ ne dia Bena Hebelone ne dia Bena Uziele au mmeku a Bena Kohata

Ndi nkutendekena ne, Wamba biebe ne, Meme ndi muan abo wa bakashi, bua meme mpete diakalengele bua bualu buebe, ne mutshima wanyi wikale ne muoyo bua bualu buebe Hashishe hakalua Abalama mu Ejipitu, Bena Ejipitu bakatangila ne mukashi wakadi mulengele be
Buloba bua Gilada buakadi bua bana ba balume bakuabo ba Manashe
Ke Maweja Nangila kuambila Yakobe ne: Pingana kuenu, mu diku dia baledi bebe
Mutuangaji apande nyunyi awu mu tshiadi amutanyinyike
Amu bobu nebikale banusomba
Bumuka mu Ore Ngidngade, kuyabu ku Yotbata

Ku Aloê udi ku muelelu wa tshibanda tshia Ânona ne ku musoko mukuabo udi mu tshibanda tô ne ku Gilada, katuakasangana musoko umue wakatuhita bukole bua kûnyenga; Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafua misoko yonso mu tshianza tshietu; anu buloba bua Bena Amona, katuakalua ha buihi n abu; buloba buonso bua dishiya dia kasulu ka Yaboka, ne misoko ya ku mikuna ne miaba yonso yakatukanda Yehowa, Nzambi wetu

Tuhanza tunai tuakadi tuzola ne bilongo bia amande ne tshihunga tshia or ne tshilongo, tshihunga tshia or tshiakadi hankatshi ha mahu abidi, hankatshi ha mahu abidi, hankatshi ha mahu abidi, ku mahu asambombo
Yehowa wakunyua mei enu hanuakadi basombe n anyi; ne Yehowa wakangambila ne, Nakunvua mei a bantu aba, akukuambilabo; mei onso akuambabo adi mimpe
Ekesode Mulau wa Mikumbi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, bualu bua nakakolesha mutshima wandi ne mitshima ya bantu bandi bua kulesha bimanyinu bianyi munkatshi muabo
Nganyi udi bu wewe, udi ne butumbi bua tshijila, udi utshinyisha bantu ne bienzedi bia butumbi, udi wenza malu a kukema
Abrahame kushala mu ditunga dia bena Peleshete matuku mulongulongu
Gada muprofete wakambila Davidi ne, Kushadi mu musoko wa ngumbu nansha, Umuke biebe, uye mu buloba bua Yuda, Davidi wakumukaku, wakaya mu ditu dia Helete
Nunku miloho yakaya ku musoko ne musoko ya mu Efelayima ne Manashe tô ne ku Zebuluna; kadi bobo bakabaseka, bakabalonda
Nuenu nuakalua ha buihi, nuakimana kuinshi kua mukuna; mukuna wakatema kahia tô ne mu diulu, ne midima mikole ne matutu
Biabika muena mashimi bua kutumpila mukuabo bua malu mabi akadiye wenza, nunku bubidi buabo badi batandangana, nebimane ku mesu kua Yehowa ne ku mesu kua bakuidi ne balumbuluishi ba mu matuku au
Muakuidi neamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, neoshe dianyi bu mulambu udi ulua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Bule bua mukeluba mukuabo buakadi coudées dikumi: bakeluba aba babidi bakadi bunene bumue, ne mushindu umue
Esawu kuya ku Seyire
Yuda kuamba ne: Mvua mutumine mukaji ewu mbuji umvua mumulaye
Bualu bua kahia kakatemeshibua mu tshiji tshianyi, kadi katema tô ne mu Muaba wa Bafue, kadi kosha buloba ne bintu biakadiundamu, kadi kosha makunshi adi muinshi mua mikuna mile
Bana babidi aba kuandamuna tatuabu ne: Mulumiana ewu kavua mua kuangata muanetu wa bakaji ku bukole, bu mukaji mudisombele to
Kadi Oholibama uvua mulele bana basatu: Yewusha, Yalame ne Kora

Bakabenga mikenji yonso yakabambila Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, bakadienzela mpingu ya tshiamu tshiakafulabo, tuana tua ngombe tubidi mene mene; bakadienzela Bashela, bakatendelela bintu bionso bia mu diulu, bakakuatshila Bâla mudimu kabidi
Nunku mukelenge wa Edome wakahidia bua Bena Isalele bahite butshika buandi, nunku Bena Isalele bakasesuka kuakadiye
Yakobe kupampakana bikole, bowa kumuenzabu
Bakalenga aba bavua baluishangane banayi kua batanu
Mvua musungule bena Izrayele bua bikale bantu ba tshijila

Hakumukabo kudiye bualu bua bakamushiya ne disama dikole , bantu bandi mene bakamuelela tshifufu, bualu bua mashi a bana balume ba Yehoyada muakuidi, bakamushiha mu bulalu buandi, wakafua; bakamujika mu musoko wa Davidi, kadi kabakamujika mu nkita ya bakelenge

Solomo wakabala bantu binunu makumi muanda mutekete bua kutualabo majitu, ne binunu makumi muanda mukulu bua kutahabo mitshi ku mikuna, ne tuhita binunu bisatu ne nkama isambombo bua kuikalatu ku mutu kuabo
Hashishe wakahueka, wakadila mu mai a Yadene misangu muanda mutekete bu muakadi dî dia muntu wa Nzambi; musunyi wakahingana bu wa muana mukese, wakadi muakane
Nanku tuma diyi lukasa bua bantu bumushe bimuna biabu ne bintu biabu bionsu bidi mu mpata, bualu bantu ne bintu bikale mu mpata nebifue ku mabue a mvula
Kulongololabu bimenga ebi bimpe, kubikolesha ne bimana
Nanku yonsu wa kutudi, uvua sangana muikale ne dikopu adi, asangane kufua anyie
Kudingidi mukuenu
Kubipatabu too ne ku Oba, luseke lua ku mutu kua Damase
Mu dinda, nupingane ku nzubu yenu

Monai, Bena Isalele bonso bakalua kudi mukelenge, bakamuebesha ne, Bualu kai bana betu, Bena Yuda, bakakeba, bakasambula mukelenge ne bonso ba mu nsubu wandi ne bantu bonso ba Davidi dia munemu dia Yadene

Kanungu ka Badi bênza bilumbulwilu bia nsambu ya pankatshi pa beena mwabo bôbo nkayabu bikumbajangana kudi tubadi na tubinadi twa basivila ne twa basalayi tuteeka mu bukookeshi bwa Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika
Mose wakatuma bantu bua kutentekelabo buloba bua Yazê, ne bakanyenga misoko ei kabidi, bakihata Bena Amole bakadimu
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Kumuki aha tô ne hanalua ne matabisha anyi a kuteka ku mpala kuebe
Arone aye muaba kampande wa tshijila, wowe mayi pambidi, avuale bilamba bikuabu
Mu ngondo wa kumudilu ne ku dituku dia dikumi ne anai dilolo nenudie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene to ne ku dituku dia makumi abidi ne dimue dilolo
Lebeka wakunvua bakambila Isaka Esau muan andi mei au Esau wakaya mu budimi bua kukebeye ntole, ne bua kuhinganeye n andi
Bilema bionsu bidibu benzamu, nebibakuate amu bobu
Angata bintu biebe bia bulembi, buta ne miketa
Muntu yonso udi uhidia kujinga mu mutshima wandi dituku adi nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Mutuangaji atume diyi bua bakosele muminu wa nyunyi umue pa luesu lua dibumba, luikale ne mayi a mu mpokolu
Nunku Yehowa wakashiya bisamba abi bia bantu mu buloba, kakabihata lubilu; yeye kabidi kakabafila mu tshianza tshia Yoshua
Bakumukaku, bakaya ku Gudugoda; ku Gudugoda bakaya ku Yotebata, muakadi buloba bua tusulu tua mai
Mose wakaya ne bualu ebu ku mpala kua Yehowa
Nensungule bana ba mikoku bonsu badi ne matoba, nansha mipolu pambidi, nansha badi ne mubidi mufike, ne bana ba mbuji bonsu badi ne matoba nansha mipolu pambidi, bua bikale difutu dianyi
Ke yeye uvua mutshimune bena Madiyane mu mpata ya Mowabe
Nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, ne bantu bandi bonso mu tshianza tshietu kabidi; tuakabashiha, nansha muntu umue wakashala

Hakambila Yoshua bantu nunku, bakuidi muanda mutekete bakadi baya ne mpungi muanda mutekete ya nsengu ya bimpanga ku mpala kua Yehowa, bakahita, bakela mpungi; mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa wakabanda ku nyima
Kulondolola Hilama Udi Wanyisha Davidi Sam
Yozefe kuinyika muanende muanabute ne: Menashe, wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu mmumpe tshipua muoyi bua makenga anyi, ne bua dishiyangana dianyi ne bena kuetu
Muntu udi utaha mukuabo mputa nebamuenzele muomumue mputa ku mputa, disu ku disu, dinu ku dinu bu muakenzeleye mukuabo nebamuenzele yeye
Nabota wakambila Ahaba ne, Yehowa ampidishe bua meme kukuha buhianyi bua batatu banyi
Mose wakambila Alona ne bana bandi balume ne Bena Isalele bonso nunku
Nenuikale ne kanyinganyinga mu mioyi yenu

Bobo bakanyenga buloba buandi, ne buloba bua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, bakelenge babidi ba Bena Amole, bakadi dishiya dia Yadene kudi diba dihatuka; ku Aloê udi ku butshika bua tshibanda tshia mai a Ânona tô ne ku mukuna wa Sileona dina dikuabo ne Hêmona , ne buloba buonso bua Alabâ dishiya dia Yadene ku esete tô ne ku dishiha dia mai a Alabâ kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisega
Bana ba Gibâ, makumi tshitema ne batanu
Padi muntu musue kulambula Maweja Nangila nzubu, mutuangaji neafue mushinga wa nzubu awu
Dutelonone Lufu lua Mose Mose wakaya ku mpata ya Moaba ku mukuna wa Nebo, ku mutu kua Pisega, kuakadi kutangilangana ne Yeleko
Muana wa bakashi wa Palô wakamuambila ne, Wangate muana eu, umungamushile mabele, nenkufute Mukashi wakangata muana, wakamuamusha mabele
Kanulu ne tshintu tshidi tshitonda Yehowa mu nsubu muenu bua kufuanangana n atshi: nuhidie tshintu atshi, nuikale n atshi lukuna; atshi ntshintu tshibihe tshia tshijila
Hakambabo Yotama bualu ebu, yeye wakaya, wakimana ha mutu ha mukuna wa Gelizima, wakabandisha dî diandi, wakabambila ne, Nuenu bena Shekeme, nungunvuile, bua Nzambi anufuile
Kadi katumushipi nansha
Nennukengeshe
Yeye wakadi ne mpala lukunjila kunjila, wakadi ne mesu mimpe, wakadi muakane kumona
Matuku a bungi mamane kupita, mukaji wa Yuda, muana wa Shuwa, kufila
Hakatangila bantu bakadi bamumanye diambedi ne, Monai, yeye udi wamba dî dia Nzambi ne baprofete, bakakonkangana ne, Bualu ebu buakulua kudi muana wa Kishi budi tshinyi

Nakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa matuku makumi anai bu munakenza diambedi, tshiakadia bidia, tshiakanua mai, bualu bua mibi yenu muakenza, hanuakenza bualu ebu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufuisha tshiji
Nanku anu Maweja Nangila nkayende kubanyoka, kubabutula bonsu nkong
Kuinyika muana awu dina dia Yuda

Hakumuka bantu mu ntenta yabo bua kusabuka Yadene, bakuidi bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei bakadi ku mpala kua bantu; hakalua bantu bakadi batuala mushete mu Yadene, ne bakatua bakuidi bakadi batuala mushete makasa abo ku muelelu wa mai bualu bua mai a Yadene atu ahita ha mutu ha bibungubungu mu ngondo yonso ya kuhuola , hashishe mai akadi ahueka ku mutu akimana, akimana dibula kule ku Adama, musoko udi ku luseke lua Saletana, ne mai a kumanda akadi ahueka ku dishiha dia Alabâ, ku Dishiba dia Luehu, akahanduluka; ne bantu bakasabuka buludiludi ne Yeleko
