Bahingishe malonga a or ne a argent mu nsubu wa Nzambi, akangata Nebukadenesâ mu ntempelo udi mu Yelushalema, akalueye n au ku Babulona; baye n au kabidi mu ntempelo udi mu Yelushalema, bateke dilonga ne dilonga mu muaba wadi; bateke mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Tshidi tshilondolola Bukalenga bunene, kumpanyi ya mbulamatadi pamwe ne nzubu ne midimu ya Mbulamatadi
Wakenza kabidi mabaya makumi abidi a kuteka ku luseke lua ku nôde, ne masoso a tshiamu tshia argent makumi anai, masoso abidi mu dibaya dimue masoso abidi mu dibaya dikuabo
Kuena ne bua kubuelela mukaji wa bana benu mu nzubu to, bualu udi upia mikiya
Nanku panuafika mu ditunga didi Maweja Nangila munupe, divuaye mulaye bankambua benu, bu mudiye mununange, Yeye neanusankishe
Numuke bintu bulelela; mitshima yenu kayinyingaladi, hanuamuhabi; bua bualu ebu Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Yeye wakasangakena n andi mu muaba wa hatuhu, mu tshihela muakadi luhehele nkayalu; yeye wakamunyunguluka, wakamulama bimpe, wakamuenzela bu kamonyi ka disu diandi
Kadi wewe Moshe ushale pabuipi nanyi, bua nkuambile meyi ne mikenji bionsu bia kumanyisha bena Izrayele, bua babikumbaje mu ditunga dindi mbapesha
Mose ne Alona bakenza bu muakamba Yehowa, Alona wakabisha mulangala, wakakuma mai akadi mu musulu, ku mesu kua Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi, mai onso akadi mu musulu akakudimuka mashi
Ira kupingana kudi Yuda, umuambila ne: Tshiena musangane mukaji awu to
Kadi Yehowa kena muanze kunuha mitshima ya kumanya n ai ne mesu a kutangila n au ne matshu a kunvua n au tô ne ku dituku edi
Nuyidie muaba wa tshijila
Lubena ikale biandi ne muoyo, kafu nansha, bantu bandi kabikadi banya banya
Yeye nkayandi wakahita ku mpala kuabo, wakakukuila hanshi misangu muanda mutekete to ne hakasemeneye ha buihi ne mukulu andi
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Ku tshikondo etshi, hakumbana ngondo yebe, wewe neukongoluele muana wa balume
Hakashika argent yonso ya mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ya mu buloba bua Kanana, hashishe Bena Ejipitu bonso bakalua kudi Yosefe, bakamuambila ne, Utuhe bia kudia, netufuile ku mesu kuebe bualu kai
Neutuludike
Yehowa wakabisha balumbuluishi, bakabasungila mu bianza bia bakadi babahaula

Kadi witabushe kutendelela ne kutendekena kua muntu webe, Yehowa Nzambi wanyi, bua wewe kunvua dî ne kulomba bidi muntu webe ulomba ku mpala kuebe; bua mesu ebe atabale, atangile ku nsubu eu munya ne butuku, ku muaba eu mene uwakalaya bua kutekamu dina diebe; bua wewe kunvua kulomba kudi muntu webe ulomba ku muaba eu
Pashishe kuambilabu Yakobe ne: Tangila udi uvua ne bimuna wawa, ke muanende wa bakaji Rakele
Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, avudishibue disanka, ku tshibangidilu tô ne kunshikidilu
Aba mbana ba Zilepa, wakaha Labana muan andi mukashi Lea, yeye wakalelela Yakoba bana aba dikumi ne basambombo
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Mukelenge wetu udi wamba mei au munyi
Bantu bakadi mu disangisha bakatumaku balume ba bukitu binunu dikumi ne bibidi, bakabambila ne, Yai bienu, nushihe Bena Yabesha gilada ne miele ya nvita, ne bakashi ne bana bakese
Mu tshisaka tshivua pa mutu pa bionsu, muvua mikata tente ivua mukalenga munange
Bimenga biabu bidi bialabale

Tunkanunuina tua Alona Kadi Alona ne bana bandi ba balume bakafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ne ku tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi ne ya midimu yonso ya mu muaba wa tshijila ne ya kubuikila n ai mibi ya Bena Isalele bu muakadi mikenji yonso yakela Mose, muntu wa Nzambi
Kuangataye matempu onsu a mu Ejipitu, kadi nangananga matempu mimpe nkama isambombu

Solomo wakimana ku mpala kua tshioshelu tshia Yehowa ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso, wakolola bianza biandi kulu, wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, kakuena nzambi mukuabo bu wewe mu diulu anyi hanshi ha buloba: utu wamana bihungidi ne luse lujalame kudi bantu bebe badi benda ku mpala kuebe ne mitshima yabo yonso; wakajadika ne muntu webe Davidi tatu wanyi mulayi uwakamulaya; bulelela, wewe udi wamba bualu mukana muebe, utu wabumana ne tshianza tshiebe, bu muwakuenza lelu eu
Lote mumane kushiyangana ne Abrame, Maweja Nangila kuambila Abrame ne: Kenzakana, tangila ku mutu kua ditunga ne kuinshi kuadi, kudi diba dipatukila ne kudidi dibuelela
Kadi Nadaba ne Abihu bakafua diambedi tatu wabo kayi muanji kufua; kabakadi ne bana nansha; nunku Eleazâ ne Itamâ bakenza mudimu wa buakuidi
Balume bonso ba mu musoko wabo nebamukume ne mabue tô ne hafueye: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu; ne Bena Isalele nebunvue, nebatshine
Kadi kakosa tshilumbu mu bululama ne kikala kangata ne mushinga mianda yônso idi mwa kwambulwisha bantu bônso anyi muntu nkayende
Bamue kuambula bia bungi, bakuabu kuambula bikese

Mukelenge wakabuela mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne Bena Yuda bonso ne bantu ba mu Yelushalema ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne bantu bonso, ne banene ne bakese; yeye wakababadila mei onso a mu mukanda wa tshihungidi wakasanganabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Nuenu ba bisamba bionso, sankai ne bantu bandi, bualu bua yeye nealombe mashi a bantu bandi, neasombuele badi n andi lukuna, udi umusha dihila dia buloba ne dia bantu bandi
Basemena, kudimanyishaye, wamba ne: Meme ndi muanenu Yozefe, unuvua bapane bua baye nanyi mu Ejipitu
Nunku Yakoba wakaha Esau bidia ne tshiteku, yeye wakadia, wakanua, wakabika, wakaya, nunku Esau wakahatula bintu bia buan a bute
Yehowa neafile tshisumbu tshia masalayi a Bena Isalele mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Nunku yeye wakabenga kuanua, A mmalu akenza bena bukitu basatu
Yeye wakelela bakuidi, bana ba Alona, mukenji bua kuyifila kudi Yehowa ha tshioshelu
Dutelonone Kanushihedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ngombe anyi mukoko bidi kabiyi biakane, anyi tshintu tshikuabo tshidi tshibi; bualu ebu budi bundu ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yakobe udi ufua Yakobe kuambila bana bende ne: Nkadi nkeba kulonda bankambua banyi
Bonsu ne: Enze
Mu tshidimu etshi tshia disanka dinene nenuhingane muntu yonso ku buloba buandi muntu yonso ku buloba buandi
Ubande biebe ku mutu kua Pisega, bandisha mesu ebe ku luseke lua ku wesete ne lua ku nôde ne lua ku Sude ne lua ku esete, tangila ne mesu ebe, bualu bua wewe kuena usabuka Yadene eu
Muntu awu apingaje tshintu atshi amu bu mu watshi, asakidile kabidi ne tshia bitanu tshimue tshia mushinga wa tshintu atshi
Kadi bantu bakuabo balembakane bakakonkangana ne, Muntu eu neatusungile munyi
Yosefe wakamuambila ne, Eku nkujingulula kua tshilota tshiebe, matamba asatu adi bu matuku asatu
Benyi babidi kutungunuka ne luendu kuya ku Sodome
Kadi batentekedi babidi, Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, ne Kalebe, muana wa Yefune, kubungama, kudipanda bilamba
Muntu yonso wakatshina di dia Yehowa munkatshi mua bena mudimu ba Palô wakatuma bantu bandi, bakasangisha bimuna biandi mu nsubu

Yehowa neanuhadishe, neanutumme bufofo, nenufue mikemu mu mitshima yenu; nenububute munda munya bu mudi muntu mufofo ububuta mu midima; kanuena nuenda dikasa dimpe mu nshila yenu, nebanutatshishe, nebanuibe, kakuena muntu udi mua kunusungila
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, badi batangila mukanda wa tuludiki twa mumana kukumbana
Yehowa wakatangila bualu ebu, wakadi n abo tshiji, bualu bua mateta a bana bandi balume ne a bana bandi bakashi
Wa bana ba Bani, Shelomita, muana wa Yosifiya; bakadi n andi bakadi balume lukama ne makumi asambombo
Ndi mukukuatshile mudimu bidimu makumi abidi
Halua dituku dinudi nusabuka musulu wa Yadene bua kubuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hashishe nenjadike mabue manene, nenuashinguile ne nshimete

Kanudi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu tshia dikumi tshia manvua enu, anyi tshia nvinyo yenu mihia mihia, anyi tshia manyi enu, anyi tshia ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu: nansha milambu yenu mudi nuditshiha n ai, nansha bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, nansha milambu idibo bakuha: kadi nubidie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule, ne wewe ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muhika webe mulume ne muhika webe mukashi, ne Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu: nuikale ne disanka ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Nuakunyunguluka mukuna eu musangu mule, yai bienu ku nôde
Nunku bukelenge bua Yehoshafata buakadi ne ditalala; bualu bua Nzambi wakamuha ditalala mu nseke yonso
Muntu mukuabu kena mua kufika pabuipi nenu to
Bena Isalele bakalekela kuihata Bena Peleshete bakalukila, bakahaula tshitudilu tshiabo
Ehuda wakatula muele wa nvita musakisha nseke ibidi, bule buau buakadi coudée umue; yeye wakaubuesha mu mukaba muinshi mua bilulu biandi ha lukundu lua ku tshianza tshia bukole

Nuenu nuakuitabusha Yehowa bu Nzambi wenu lelu, nuakuamba ne, Tuetu netuende mu nshila yandi, netutumikile mei andi ne mikenji yandi ne mikandu yandi, netunvue dî diandi; ne Yehowa wakanuitabusha bu bantu ba buhianyi buandi bu muakanulayeye, bua nuenu nutumikile mikenji yandi yonso, ne kunubandisha ku mutu kua bisamba bionso biakafukeye mu butumbi ne mu dina ne mu buneme; bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bu muakuambeye
Yeye Wakenza nunku
Yehowa wakatuela mikenji ei, bua tuetu tutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bua yeye atuenzele bimpe matuku onso, bua tuetu tuikale ne muoyo utudi n au lelu eu

Ekesode Kakamanya bantu ne, Mose wakashala ku mukuna musangu mule, bakadisangisha kudi Alona, bakamuambila ne, Bika biebe, utuenzele nzambi idi mua kuya ku mpala kuetu, bua muntu au Mose, wakalua n etu mu Ejipitu, katuena bamanye bualu buakumukuata
Yehowa udi ukuambila kabidi ne, Meme nenjadike nsubu webe
Uliya wakumuka ku nsubu wa mukelenge; mukelenge wakamutumina bia kudia
Bena Izrayele kutshimuna Oge, bana bende, ne tshiluilu tshiende, kushipa bonsu, kubanyenga ditunga
Wakantuma bualu kai
Bana balume ba Sei: Lotana ne Shobala ne Sibiona ne Ana ne Dishona ne Ezê ne Dishana
Bualu muoyi wa tshintu udi mu mash atshi
Bena Isalele bakavula bintu bia kudilengesha n abi ku mukuna wa Holeba tô ne ku mpala kuakadibo baya
Tshikondu atshi bantu bale ba kafiondu bavua pa buloba
Yeshaya wakabambila ne, Nuambile mukelenge wenu ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanutshinyi mei anuakunvua akumpenda n au bantu ba mukelenge wa Ashû

Bualu bukuabo, usungule munkatshi mua bantu bonso balume badi ne lungenyi lule, badi batshina Nzambi, bena bulelela, badi bakina mbueshilu, ubateke ku mutu kua bantu bu bakokeshi ba bantu tshinunu ne ba bantu lukama ne ba bantu makumi atanu ne ba bantu dikumi
Matu akatshibudibua, kakamanya mua kuya ku Tâshishi
Nanku, nkala ne tulongu tukese bikale anu bia tshiamu tshia mpawungi nkayatshi
Moshe kubabadika muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile

Aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Bena Holi, mukelenge Lotana ne mukelenge Shobala ne mukelenge Sibiona ne mukelenge Ana ne mukelenge Dishona ne mukelenge Eze ne mukelenge Dishana, aba mbakelenge ba Bena Holi mu buloba bua Sei

Malu Makole Neakuate Bashihi ba Mikenji Kadi binuikala kanuyi nunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi yonso ne mei bindi nnuambila lelu, hashishe milau ei yonso neyilue kunudi, neyinukuate
Bena Izrayele nebandamune bonsu ne: Enze

Nenudie bidia bia disanka dia bitandatanda tô matuku muanda mutekete, hanuashikisha kusangisha bintu ku tshishihuidi ne ku tshikaminu: nenuikale ne disanka hanuadia bidia ebi, ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muntu webe mulume ne muntu webe mukashi ne Muena Lewi ne muenyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi mu misoko yenu
Mukulu andi, muana wa bakashi, wakambila muana wa bakashi wa Palô ne, Nye kukubikidila muamushi wa muana wa mu bakashi ba Bena Ebelu, alue kukuamushila muana mabele, anyi
Kabiela nu bwîlà Mulopo mu mpangà bantu
Bua nuenu kuvuluka mikenji eyi kashidi, nuyisuike ku maboku enu ne mu mpala yenu
Nunku nakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa matuku makumi anai, bualu bua Yehowa wakamba ne, Nembashihe
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, mu malu onso akambila Yehowa Mose, nunku bakashikama ku mabendele abo, ne bakaya ku mpala ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo
Biamu bia mpawungi bionsu bivua bena Izrayele balambule bua kuasa muaba wa tshijila, bivua kilo ne grame , bilondeshile tshipimu tshivuabu natshi muaba wa tshijila
Pavua Moshe ubuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kuyukila ne Maweja Nangila, uvua umvua diyi dia Maweja Nangila, difumina pankatshi pa Bakerubine babidi, bavua pa tshibuikidiji tshia mushete wa ndondu
Kakuakadi musoko umue wakahunga dî bua kuikala talalâ ne Bena Isalele, anu Bena Hiwi bakadi bashikama mu Gibeona; bakayinyenga yonso anu ku nvita
Hanuabuela mu budimi bua manvua bua mukuenu, nudi mua kutula manvua mu tshianza, kadi kanutahi manvua a mukuenu ne muele

Kanuenzedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku bualu bua bobo badi benzela nzambi yabo malu onso mabi adi atonda Yehowa; bualu bua bobo badi boshila nzambi yabo bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi mene mene ha kahia
Kanuitabushi tshintu tshia mbueshilu, bualu bua tshintu tshia mbueshilu tshidi tshifofomesha muntu udi ne mesu matabale, tshidi tshikudimuna mei a muntu muakane
Bana ba Shobale ke Akane, Manahate, Ebale, Shefo ne Oname

Abalama wakangata mukashi wandi Salai, ne Lota, muana wa muan abo, ne bintu biabo bionso, ne bantu bonso bakahetabo mu Halana, bakaya mu nshila wa ku buloba bua Kanâna, bakafika mu buloba bua Kanâna Abalama wakalala mu buloba, wakalua ku Shekeme, kuakadi mutshi wa telebinta wa mu Mole Bena Kanana bakadi mu buloba tshikondo atshi
Hashishe mukelenge Hezikiya wakabika hatshiatshia, wakasangisha bantu banene ba mu musoko, wakabanda n abo ku nsubu wa Yehowa
Hakambeye dî edi, tshiji tshiabo tshiakashika kudiye
Bena Peleshete bakaluangana kabidi; Elehanana, muana wa Yaî, wakashiha Lami, muan abo ne Goleyata, Muena Gata; mulabi wa difuma diandi wakadi bu mutshi udibo bakuma n au bilulu
Nvula yakaloka ha buloba munya ne bufuku tô matuku makumi anai
Nanku bena Merari bavua ne mudimu wa kulama bimpe bintu bionsu ebi
Nomba Buluka Udi Ubikila Belâma Bena Isalele bakaya ku luendu, bakashikama mu mpata wa Moaba dishiya dia mai a Yadene, batangilangana ne Yeleko
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu a
Nsongalume pende mmukuate nsongakaji, mumane kubangila awu, ku bukole, mumubuelele mu nzubu
Meme nda Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bua kuikala Nzambi wenumeme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Udi ulesha buakane kudi bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila, udi musue kuha benyi bintu bia kudia ne bintu bia kuluata
Hamba Muprofete malu mu dina dia Yehowa ne malu au kaena menjibue, au mmalu adi Yehowa kayi mumuambile; muprofete au wakatuambila, kanumutshinyi
Kanuedianganyi meji a bintu bienu, bualu bua bintu bimpe bionso bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu mbienu

Kadi hakafua mulumbuluishi, hashishe bobo bakalukila ku nyima, bakatamba batatu abo kuenza bibi, hakalondabo nzambi mikuabo bua kuyenzela mudimu ne bua kuyinamina; kabakalekela bienzedi biabo bibi anyi tshitshu tshiabo
Pavua Yakobe musombe muaba awu, Rubene kubuelela Bila, mukaji mupika wa tatuende, mu nzubu
Ke mundi musue ne: bikale bantu ba tshijila matuku onsu
Ku tshibangidilu tshia dishikama diaboku kabakatshina Yehowa; nunku Yehowa wakatuma nyama ya ntambue munkatshi muabo, yakashiha bakuabo babo
Tshisamba tshia Yuda tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Shela, ndelanganyi ya Shela; dia bena Perese, ndelanganyi ya Perese; dia bena Zera, ndelanganyi ya Zera

Bualu bua nudi bamanye bu mutuakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne mutuakahita munkatshi mua bisamba biakadi mu nshila; ne nuenu nuakatangila malu mabi abo ne mpingu yabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue ne ya tshiamu tshia argent ne tshia or yakadi munkatshi muabo; bua muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu, nansha mulume nansha mukashi nansha diku dia bantu nansha tshisamba, udi akudimuna mutshima wandi kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kukuatshila nzambi ya bisamba abi mudimu; ne bua muji udi ukuama mamuma a mulungu ne a bululu kawikadi munkatshi muenu
Amalama wakabaka Yokebede, muan abo wa bakashi ne tatu wandi, ne yeye wakamulelela Alona ne Mose, bidimu bia Amalama biakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete
Kanubenzedi bibi to

Bualu bua yeye wakahandu tula Bena Isalele kudi nsubu wa Davidi; bakadisunguila Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, mukelenge wabo; Yalobama wakasesuisha Bena Isalele kudi Yehowa, wakabenzesha bualu bubi bunene
Nudimuke, kanufidi milambu ya kuosha mu miaba yonso mudi nutangila; kadi muaba udi Yehowa Usungula munkatshi mua bisamba bienu, nenufileku milambu yenu ya kuosha, nenuenzeku mei onso anakunuambila
Bakosha misoko yabo yakadibo bashikamamu ne bitudilu biabo ne kahia

Kadi Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona, wakahidia bua tuetu tuhite mu buloba; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanyengabasha meji andi, wakakolesha mutshima wandi, bualu bua kumufila mu tshianza tshienu, bu muakenzeye lelu
Moshe kupatula makombu onsu avua mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu uvua mutekemene bikole Potifare ewu
Yeye wakahingasha kahita ka bena maluvu mu mudimu wandi kabidi, ne yeye wakaha Palo luhanza luandi mu tshianza tshiandi kabidi
Davidi wakamba ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, Yehowa nkayandi neamushihe; dituku diandi dia lufu nedilue anyi yeye neaye mu nvita, neafue
Mpindiewu nebakubikile ne: Izrayele

Solomo wakatumina kulama dî ne, Wewe udi mumanye ne, Tatu wanyi Davidi kakamanya mua kuasa nsubu bua dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, bualu bua nvita yakadiye n ai ku nseke yonso tô ne hakateka Yehowa buonso buai muinshi mua makasa anai
Mose wakabambila ne, Imanai, nganji kunvua dî kudi Yehowa bua bualu buenu
Hakatangila bakelenge batanu ba Bena Peleshete bualu ebu, bakahingana ku Ekelona dituku adi
Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga tshidi kabidi mwa kutalula bujitu bwa muntu kansanga udi mu Bukalenga bunene pa ditabija dia mukanda wa didiombola
Bakashi benji ba mudimu wandi ba lungenyi bakamukudimuna dî; yeye mene wakadikudimuina dî, wakamba ne, Kabena basangana bintu biakunyengabo kudi bena lukuna, anyi
Aba bonso bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo

Kanudi tshintu tshidifuile: nudi mua kuha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu atshi, yeye atshidie; anyi nudi mua kutshihanyisha muntu wa bende; bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bualu bua Bena Peleshete bakalua kuluangana n anyi ne Nzambi wakandekela, kena muitabe kundi kabidi nansha kudi baprofete nansha ku bilota: nunku nakukubikila bua wewe kummanyisha tshindi mua kuenza
Mose wakabambila ne, Muntu kabishiyi tô ne dinda
Nutahulule bintu bituha bibidi, tshituha kudi bena nvita bakaya mu nvita ne tshikuabo kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele
Ndondu awu udi bualu buende ne bua ndelanganyi yende, udi ubenza batuangaji bua kashidi
Diulu nedikale bu tshiamu tshia mitaku ku mutu kuenu, ne buloba nebuikale bu tshiamu mu makasa enu

Au mmahianyi akabanyabo kudi Eleazâ muakuidi, ne kudi Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, ne kudi bakadi ku mutu kua bisamba bia Bena Isalele, hakelabo nshobo mu Shilo, ku mpala kua Yehowa, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kutendelelamu
Badi Bafila Bintu Biabo Hashishe, tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele tshionso tshiakumuka ku mesu kua Mose
Wakashiya mikoko ai mikese mu tshihela kudi nganyi

Bavua banuenzela bibi ne muoyi wa lukinu, mu tshilumbu tshia ku Peyore ne mu tshia Kozbi, muana wa mfumu wa bena Madiyane, ufuile mu tshipupu tshivua tshienzeka bua ditendelela dia mvidie wa ku Peyore
Wakenza nkanu ya or mai ya kuteka ku matumba anai, ibidi ku luseke lumue, ibidi ku luseke lukuabo
Tunkanunuina tuebe netuikale bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba netumuangalale ku wesete ne ku esete ne ku nôde ne ku sude bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bualu buebe ne bua tunkanunuina tuebe
Mutshima wa Yehowa wakanyingalala bualu bua yeye wakafuka bantu ha buloba, kanyinganyinga kakadi mu mutshima wandi
Etshi ke tshimanyinu tshia kashidi tshia pambidi penu, tshidi tshijadika ndondu udi pankatshi panyi nenu
Yuda uvua umuambisha, bualu kavua mumanye ne: mmukaji wa muanende Ere to
Nanku kukuatshilaye kabidi Labane mudimu bidimu muanda mutekete bikuabu
Kadi nuvuiuke Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua yeye utu wanuha bukole bua kuangata n abu biuma; bua yeye akashe n enu tshihungidi tshiandi tshiakahungeye ne batatu benu: bu bualu buakuenjibua lelu
Nanku kabena ne bua kumuteka pa nkayende to
Tshiena mubanyenge tshintu, nansha mpunde mene
Yoaba wakanyemena mu Ntenta wa Yehowa, wakakuata ku nsengu ya tshishihelu
Alona wakasaku, bakamujika; ne Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, wakenza mudimu wandi wa buakuidi
Yonatana wakamuambila ne, Bualu ebu kabuikadi kûdi
Nenuikale ne milau mu bisaka bienu ne mu malonga anudi nuenzelamu mampa
Pashishe neushiye buloba
Davidi wakabanda bu mu dî dia Gada diakamba Yehowa
Moshe kumukuata ku mukila, kumonaye ukadi ne dikombu mu bianza
Nenubitumikile ne muoyi mujima, ne bukole buenu bonsu
Batuadi ba majitu bakadi Akuba ne Talemona ne bana babo bakadi balame bibi bia musoko bakadi lukama ne makumi muanda mutekete ne babidi
Tshibangidilu Yakobe udi uya mu Ejipitu Yakobe kubanga luendu ne bena diende bonsu, kabidi ne bintu bionsu
Balumbuluishi Yefeta, Muena Gilada, wakadi muena nvita wa bukitu, wakadi muana wa mukashi wa masandi; Gilada wakalela Yefeta
Munda mua nsubu muakadi mabaya a cèdre masonga ne maoshi ne bilongo, onso akadi a cèdre, nansha dibue dimue diakamueneka ku mesu
Shupima kabidi, ne Hupima, bana ba balume ba Ili, ne Hushima, muana wa Ahe
Arone alame mukenji ewu kashidi ne ndelanganyi yende yonsu
Wakudia mamuma a mutshi unakukuambila ne, Kudi, anyi

Hakelanganeye meji, yeye wakabenga kukuata Môdekai nkayandi, bualu bua bakamumanyisha bua tshisamba tshia Môdekai; nunku Hamana wakakeba bua kushiheye Bena Yuda bonso bakadi mu bukelenge bua Ahashawelosha, ba mu tshisamba tshia Môdekai mene
Bakatekahu muonshi wa bleu muhindakana, bakatshisuika ha tshilulu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kahita kakaya kubikila Mikaya, kakamuambila ne, Mona, baprofete bonso badi bambila mukelenge mei mimpe mukana mumue; ndi nkusengelela ne, Di diebe dikale bu diabo, wambe biebe mei mimpe
Kanuikadi ne luse kudi batumpidianganyi aba: nebafile muoyo ku muoyo, disu ku disu, dinu ku dinu, tshianza ku tshianza, dikasa ku dikasa
Mvidi Mukulu kumuela lupemba mu malu onsu
Tuhita tua Palô tuakakuma bantu bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele, tuakamba ne, Bualu kai kanuena nushikisha mudimu wenu ne makelela ne lelu bu munuakenza diambedi
Hakashika matuku muanda mutekete mai akavulangana ha buloba
Abrahame udi wipata Agare ne Ismayele Muana awu kukola, kulekela diamua mabele
Lote kupatuka mu nzubu, kuinjila tshiibi, kubambila ne: Bana betu, ndi nnusengelela ne: kanuenzedi bantu aba bibi nanku to
Hashishe nakela mukenji, bakalengesha nsubu; nakahingashamu malonga a mu nsubu wa Nzambi ne milambu ya bukula ne manananshi
Nunku nutumikile mikenji ne malu ne mei binakunuambila lelu, nubienze
Meme nakadimusha balumbuluishi benu tshikondo atshi ne, Unvuai bilumbu bia bana benu, nulumbulule bilumbu bia muntu ne muan abo mulume ne muenyi udi n andi biakane
Esau wakashikama mu mukuna wa Sei Esau udi Edome

Yehowa neanunzuluile masanka adiye n au mu diulu bua kunulokeshila nvula ha buloba mu tshikondo tshia nvula, ne bua kunuvudishila disanka mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu; nuenu nenusombeshe bisamba bia bungi bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nusomba bintu kudibo
Yeye wakabuela mu nsubu, wakadijidila tshibi, bubidi buabo ha nkayabo, wakatendelela Yehowa
Bahika ba Shaula bakamumanyisha ne, Davidi wakadi wamba nunku

Mose wakabikila Yoshua, wakamuambila ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima, bualu bua wewe uyaya ne bantu aba mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu babo bua kubahabu; ne wewe neubahianyishe buloba abu
Nebanuambile munudi mua kukosa tshilumbu atshi
Eliyabe, muana wa Palu, uvua ne bana balume basatu: Nemuyele, Datane, ne Abirame
Bienzedi bia Asa bikuabo biakenzeye ne bukole buandi buonso ne malu onso akenzeye ne misoko yakaseye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Muaba awu kuenzaye tshilambuilu tshikuabu, utendelela Mvidi Mukulu, utela dina dia Maweja Nangila
Kadi nuvuiuke Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua yeye utu wanuha bukole bua kuangata n abu biuma; bua yeye akashe n enu tshihungidi tshiandi tshiakahungeye ne batatu benu: bu bualu buakuenjibua lelu
Pikala mushipianganyi musakile muntu ne muoyi wa lukinu, mumuase tshintu ne muoyi mubi, nansha mumushipe ku mituutu, mushipianganyi awu mmuena tshibawu
Mulume kuandamuna ne: Pangumvu mikuma yebe mu lupangu, buowa kungenza, meme kubutama, bualu ndi butaka
Ndi ngendakana nebe matuku onsu
Bobo bakamukudimuna ne, Netukuhetu ne disanka

Kadi bakuidi bakatamba bukese, kabakamanya mua kûbula biseba bia milambu yonso ya kuosha; nunku bana babo Bena Lewi bakabakuatshisha tô ne hakamanabo mudimu wonso ne hakadijidila bakuidi bonso; bualu bua Bena Lewi bakadi ne mitshima miakane bua kudijidila bakahita bakuidi kudifila
Genese Nzambi Udi Uhunga Tshihungidi ne Noa Nzambi wakasankisha Noa ne bana bandi, wakabambila ne, Nulelangane, nukumbane ba bungi, nuikale ha buloba buonso
Bienzela muntu munga muntu bibi, Nzambi neamulumbuluishe, kadi bienzela muntu Yehowa bibi, nganyi wamuakuila
Maweja Nangila kuitaba bivua Moshe umulomba
Yehoaza, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Nuakunyunguluka mukuna eu musangu mule, yai bienu ku nôde
Umuandamune ne: Mbia muena mudimu webe Yakobe

Mukalu wa ku luseke lua ku nôde wakadi ku tshinkonya tshia mai tshiakadi kunshikidilu kua Yadene; mukalu wakabandila ku Bete hogola, wakayila ku nôde kua Bete alabâ; mukalu wakabandila ku dibue dia Bohana, muana wa Lubena; mukalu wakabandila ku Debî ku tshibanda tshia Akola, wakayila ku nôde kudi kutangilangana ne Gilegala udi kuinshi kua mukuna wa Adumima, udi ku muelelu wa musulu wa ku sude; mukalu wakayila ku mai a Ene shemeshe, wakashiha ku Ene logele; mukalu wakabandila ku tshibanda tshia muana wa Hinoma tô ne ku luseke lua Bena Yebuse ku sude eu udi Yelushalema mene ; mukalu wakabandila ku mutu kua mukuna udi ku mpala kua tshibanda tshia Hinoma ku wesete, udi kunfudilu kua tshibanda tshia Bena Lefa ku nôde; mukalu wakadi ku mutu kua mukuna tô ne ku mushimi wa mai a Nefetoa, tô ne ku bimenga bia ku mutu kua mukuna wa Efelona; mukalu wakayila tô ne ku Bala eu udi Kîyata yalima mene ; mukalu wakanyunguluka ku Bâla ku wesete ku mukuna wa Sei, wakayila ku luseke lua mukuna wa Yalima lua ku nôde eu udi Kasalona mene , wakahuekela ku Bete shemeshe, wakanyunguluka ku Timena; mukalu wakayila ku luseke lua Ekelona lua ku nôde; mukalu wakayila tô ne ku Shikelona, wakaya tô ne ku mukuna wa Bâla, wakahatuka ku Yabenêle; kunshikidilu kua mukalu kuakadi kukala kua mai manene
Netutule muele wa mvita, tubabunde bonsu
Batuangaji badi mua kufika pabuipi nanyi, kadi bumushe mikiya

Muakuidi wakamuambila ne, Muele wa nvita wa Goleyata, Muena Peleshete, uwakashiha mu tshibanda tshia Ela, udiku, udi mujingila mu tshilulu ku nyima kua efoda; biwasua kuwangata, uwangate, bualu bua kakuena muele mukuabo kunoko
Yeholama, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Diba adi mutangidi wa balongolodi ba maluvu a mukalenga kuambila mukalenga ne: Mukalenga, lelu ndi ntonda bubi bumvua muenze
Bobo bakangata bintu bia Mika biakenzeye ne muakuidi wakadiye n andi, bakalua ku Layisha, kudi bantu bakadi talalâ ne kabayi ne bualu, bakabashiha ne miele ya nvita, bakosha musoko ne kahia
Hashishe mitshi yonso yakambila mutshi wa meba ne, Lua biebe, utukokeshe
Elisha wakamuambila ne, Wangate buta ne mikete; wakangata buta ne mikete

Milambu ya ku budisuile bua balombodi Bamfumu ba bena mvita bavua balombola bisumbu bia bantu tshinunu nansha lukama, kudisangisha kudi Moshe, kumuambila ne: Tuabadiki bena mvita batuvua nabu mu mvita: muntu nansha umue kena mufue to
Nebabueje milonda ku tshilambuilu bua kutshiambuilaku
Kakamuambila ne, Wewe, muntu wa Nzambi, mukelenge udi wamba ne, Uhueke biebe
Bonsu ne: Enze
Kadi Yoaba ne Abishai bakalonda Abinê ku nyima; hakafikabo ku mukuna wa Ama udi ku mpala kua Gia mu nshila wa ku tshihela tshia Gibeona, diba diakabuela
Lua ne bantu aba, tubashihe
Wakenzaku tshioshelu wakabikila mua ba au ne, Ele betele bualu bua mu muaba eu Nzambi wakamueneka kudiye hakadiye unyema ku mesu kua mukulu andi
Kadi pikala bena Izrayele kabayi bakuitaba bua bishima bibidi ebi, utunte mayi a mu musulu wa Nile, witshikije panshi
Palô neko wakasungula Eleyakima, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge mu muaba wa Yoshiya, tatu wandi; wakamuidika dina dikuabo ne, Yehoyakima; yeye wakumusha Yehoaza, wakamutuma mu Ejipitu, wakafuilamu

Mukashi wakadi ne mutshima mulengele ne kalolo munkatshi muenu wakatshina mua kuihata makasa ha buloba bualu bua kalolo ne kanemu kakatamba, neikale ne disu dibi kudi mulume udiye munange, ne kudi muan andi mulume ne kudi muan andi mukashi, ne kudi muana muhia muhia wakaleleye ha binu biandi ne kudi bana bonso hadiye mulele; yeye neabadie mu musokoko bua kuhanga kua bia kudia mu ditshintshimika ne ditata bidi bena lukuna banutatshisha n abi ku misoko yenu
Abinê wakamukudimuna dî ne, Bu mudi mutshima webe ne muoyo, mukelenge, tshiena mumanye
Kumuambilaye ne: Wambile bena Izrayele, basungule mu buloba buabu bimenga, ne miaba ya kudishila bimuna biabu, babipeshe bena Levi
Bualu bua nakutshina difik a munda ne tshiji tshikole biakadi Yehowa n abi bua kunushiha
Nakaha Maki Gilada
Enza biebe nkanu ya or ibidi, uyiteke ku luseke lua tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi tshituangane ne efoda
Hashishe, Solomo wakashila Kemosha, bundu bua Bena Moaba, tshitendelelu ha mutu ha mukuna udi ku mpala kua Yelushalema, ne tshia Moleke, bundu bua Bena Amona
Bubanji buonsu bua mu ditunga dimpe edi, diakalenga dia Mvidi Mukulu udi mu tshipuka, bipueke pa tshisamba tshia Yozefe, udi Mvidi Mukulu musungule mfumu wa bana babu
Hanuaya kusangana mba ne bantu badi banukengesha mu buloba buenu, nenuele mpungi bikole, nenuikale nuvulukibua ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusungidibue kudi bantu badi n enu lukuna
Badi Basangula Balumbuluishi Ek
Nakanuambila nunku, kanuakangunvuila; kadi nuakadi ne budisu, nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, nuakadiyila ku mikuna
Yeye wakenza malu mabi, bualu bua yeye kakajadika mutshima wandi bua kukebeye Yehowa
Nakaluhula bankambua benu mu Ejipitu, bakatua kukala kua mai manene; Bena Ejipitu bakalonda bankambua benu ne makalu ne tubalu tô ne ku Dishiba Dikunze
Hakatuteye ha mai, mai akahanduluka eku ne eku; Elisha wakasabuka
Mulambu wa mushindu awu, udi upisha muaba wanyi wa tshijila mikiya, upepeja dina dianyi dia tshijila

Bilulu bia ku luseke lumue lua tshibi biakadi coudées dikumi ne itanu, ne makunshi asatu ne nkanu isatu, luseke lukuabo luakadi nunku kabidi, bilulu tô ne ku coudées dikumi ne itanu ne makunshi asatu ne nkanu isatu
Netubabutule
Yeye udi butumbi buenu, yeye udi Nzambi wenu, wakanuenzela malu manene ne a kukema anuakatangila ku mesu

Muntu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kudiakwila yeye nkayende anyi bwa kubiikila mumulumbulwidi udiye mudisungwile, ne biônso abi, mu bitupa biônso bia ndumbulwilu ku tubadi, mwikalamu dikebulula dia bampulushi ne diela dia nkonku kumpala kwa kufika ku tshilumbulwilu
Maweja Nangila udi unutumina diyi bua nuenu bena Izrayele, kumusha tshiadi ne tshibelu bia nyama inudi nulambula bu mulambu wa bobumue
Nanku kanuakufua to
Malaya Nuenu balaye Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu tshintu tshia mapiku, numulambule tshintu atshi lukasa
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Davidi wakatuma bantu kudi Abigayila bua kumuangateye bu mukashi wandi
Dilolo dikuabo hakabika Davidi ku bulalu buandi, yeye wakadi wendakana ku mutu kua nsubu wa mukelenge; hakadiye ku mutu kua nsubu, yeye wakatangila mukashi wowa mai; wakadi mukashi mulengele kumona
Meme ndi ngumvua tshidi Mvidi Mukulu wamba
Muena Peleshete au wakadi usemena ha buihi dinda ne dilolo wakamuenekamueneka matuku makumi anai
Nebasakidile kabidi mbuji wa mpumbu bua mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Balombodi ba bena Izrayele bateke bianza pa mutu wa ngombe awu
Nudi mua kudisumbila bia kudia kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kudia; nenudisumbile mai a kunua kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kunua
Tshibangidilu Yakobe udi utuma bana bende mu Ejipitu Yakobe umvua ne: biakudia bidi mu Ejipitu, kuambilaye bana bende ba balume ne: Nukadi basombe tshianana, kanuyi ne tshinudi nuenza

Yeye wakabambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nuambile muntu wakantuma kundi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, meme nentume malu makole ku muaba eu ne kudi bena buloba abu bu mudi mei onso adi mafunda mu mukanda eu wakabala mukelenge wa Yuda
Misoko neyikale bu binyemenu kudi musombuedi, mushihi wa mundi kafu biandi tô ne himaneye ku mpala kua tshisumbu tshia bantu bua kumulumbuluishabo
Padi muntu ne bualu, aye kudi Arone ne Ure, banudi nushala nabu
Yeye ulualua mu nshila bua kusangakena hebe, ne hakatangileye, yeye neasanke mu mutshima wandi

Mose wakashikisha kuambila Bena Isalele bonso mdi â onso; yeye wakabambila kabidi ne, Tekai mei onso anakunuambila lelu mu mitshima yenu, mei onso a mikenji mene mudi nuambila bana benu bua bobo kuyenza

Nunku binuenza bulelela ne buimpe, hanuakuteka Abimeleke mu bukelenge, ne binuenzela Yelubâla ne ba mu nsubu wandi bimpe, ne binuamufuta bu muakadi difutu diandi; bualu bua tatu wanyi wakanuluila nvita, wakamba kunufuila ne muoyo wandi, wakanusungila mu bianza bia Bena Midiyana; ne nuenu nuakabika ku mpala kua nsubu wa tatu wanyi lelu, nuakushiha bana bandi balume makumi muanda mutekete ha dibue dimue, nuakateka Abimeleke, muana wa mukashi, muenji wa mudimu wandi, mu bukelenge ku mutu kua bena Shekeme, bualu bua yeye udi muan enu binuikala benzele Yelubâla ne ba mu nsubu wandi bualu bulelela ne buimpe lelu, nusanke bualu bua Abimeleke ne yeye asanke bualu buenu kabidi; kadi binuikala kanuyi benze bimpe, kahia kahatuke kudi Abimeleke bua kuosha bena Shekeme ne ba mu nsubu wa Milo; kahia kahatuke kabidi kudi bena Shekeme ne kudi ba mu nsubu wa Milo bua kuosha Abimeleke kabidi
Ashedodo ne bimenga ne misoko yabi; Gaza ne bimenga ne misoko yabi; ku kasulu ka Ejipitu tô ne kukala kua mai manene

Mukelenge wanyi wakuntuma kûdi bua kukuambila ne, Anu katataka bansongalume babidi ba bana ba baprofete ba ku mikuna ya Efelayima bakafika kundi; ndi nkusengelela ne, Bimpe ubampele ntalanta wa argent ne bilulu bibidi bitambe buimpe
Mutuangaji munene angate mashi makese, abuele nawu mu ntenta
Bua bukole bua tshiyole atshi, mu Ejipitu bantu kabakumanya kabidi ne: kuikala ne biakudia bivule nkuikala munyi
Bukokeshi ne bukole bidi mu tshianza tshiebe, nunku kakuena muntu udi mua kukukolela
Ke bena Izrayele kuditshipa kudi Maweja Nangila, bamulaya ne: Tuetu batshimune bantu aba, netubutule kabidi bimenga biabi bionsu
Matuku onsu adiye mudijidile, kena mua kusemena pabuipi ne tshitalu, nansha tshia tatuende, tshia mamuende, tshia muanabu wa balume nansha wa bakaji, bualu udi mua kupeta mikiya
Diakamue tshisumbu tshianyi kubanduluka kuimana
Bankambua betu kale bavua baye mu Ejipitu
Neubangile mukashi kadi munga muntu nealale n andi; newase nsubu kadi kuena ushikamamu; neukune budimi bua nvinyo, ne kuena udia mamuma abu

Yeye wakenda mu nshila yonso ya tatu wandi Asa; yeye kakasesuka mu nshila yandi, Wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa; kadi yeye kakumusha bitendelelu bia ku mikuna; bantu bakatshidi bafila milambu ne musenga wa manananshi ha mutu ha mikuna

Kanuikadi ne kansungusungu hanualumbulula bilumbu; nunvue dî dia muntu mukese ne dia muntu munene muomumue; kanutshinyi mpala wa muntu; bualu bua kulumbulula kua bilumbu kudi kua Nzambi: tshilumbu tshidi tshihita bukole, nulue n atshi kundi, meme nentshiunvue
Biafila balume aba bu mudi bantu bonso bafue, anyi biabakuata bualu bu mudibu bukuata bantu bonso, nunku Yehowa kena muntume
Bualu bua ban a bute bonso ba mu Isalele mbanyi, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, mu dituku dinakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu nakabajidila kundi

Ndi mumutangile kadi tshiena mumutangile katataka, ndi mumumone kadi yeye kena ha buihi, Mutoto nebiluhuke kudi Yakoba, ne dikombo dia bukelenge nedibike munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, nedikume ku matshika a Moaba, nedishihe bana bonso ba Shete
Anu Nowa ne bantu bavuaye nabu mu buatu kushala ne muoyi
Kanuenji bu munudi nuenza kunoko lelu, benza muntu yonso anu malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi; bualu bua kanuena banze kubuela mu dikisha ne buhianyi bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha

Eleazâ, muana wa Dodai, Muena Ahoa, wakamulonda, umue wa bena bukitu basatu bakadi n abo Davidi, hakafuna Bena Peleshete bulobo bakadi badisangisha bua kuluangana nvita, hakumuka Bena Isalele; yeye wakajuka, wakashiha Bena Peleshete tô ne bakateketa diboko diandi, ne tshianza tshiandi tshiakala mata tshilabi tshia muele wandi wa nvita: Yehowa wakabayuisha luhandu lunene dituku adi; bantu bakalonda ku nyima kuandi anu bua kuhaula bintu

Kadi bikala bualu ebu bulelela, kabakamusangana ne bimanyinu bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama, hashishe nebalue ne mushikankunde eu ku tshibi tshia nsubu wa tatu wandi, ne balume ba mu musoko nebamukume ne mabue tô ne hafileye, bualu bua yeye wakuenza bualu bua tshikama mu Isalele, wakuenza bu mukashi wa masandi mu nsubu wa tatu wandi: nunku nenûmushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Tshilema tshia mushindu ewu katshiena ne bua kuenzeka mu Izrayele to
Wakufuma kudi kunyi

Nomba Mikenji ya Maboko ne Bakashi Bahianyi Bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ba diku dia Bena Gilada, muana mulume wa Makî, muana mulume wa Manashe, wa meku a bana balume ba Yosefe, bakalua kudi Mose ne kudi bakelenge ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ba mu Isalele, bakamba ne, Yehowa wakela dî kudi mukelenge wetu bua kutahulula buloba bua buhianyi ku nshobo, Yehowa wakela dî kudi mukelenge wetu kabidi bua kuha buhianyi bua Selofehada muan etu mulume kudi bana bandi bakashi
Meme ndi mua kudisha bantu aba bonso munyinyi kudi kunyi
Wewe newangate tshimpanga tshia tshijila, ulambe munyinyi watshi ne mai a kahia mu muaba wa tshijila
Hakanumusha Yehowa ku Kadeshe bânea ne, Yai bienu, nuhiane buloba bunakanuha; hashishe nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kanuakamuitabusha, kanuakunvua di diandi
Amiyele, muana wa Ngemali, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dane
Utuangashe bilulu bitanu ha buabi, ne utuangashe bilulu bisambombo ha buabi, tshilulu tshisambombo netshikale tshihitakane ku mushiku wa tshitendelelu

Bakelenge Solomo Udi Ubaka Muana Mukashi wa Palô Solomo wakahunga tshihungidi ne Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, wakangata muana mukashi wa Palô, wakalua n andi ku musoko wa Davidi tô ne hakashikisheye kuibaka nsubu wandi ne nsubu wa Yehowa ne lumbu luakadi lunyunguluka Yelushalema
Mikenji ei kayena dishiya dia mai manene, bua nuenu nuambe ne, Nganyi watusabukila dishiya dia mai manene bua kulua n ai kutudi ne bua kutunyuisha bua tuetu kuyenza
Nutumikile mei anyi onso ne mikenji yanyi yonso, nubienze, meme ndi Yehowa
Balake kuya ne Balaame ku lusongu lua mukuna wa Pisga muaba wa kutentekela
Dituku adi, buloba kupandika, kubajibikila pamue ne Kora
Ba bana ba Melali: ba Yâziya, Beno, ne Shohama ne Zakû ne Ibeli
Palo wakambila Yosefe ne, Mu tshiota tshanyi nakamona meme muimane kukala kuamusulu, nakamona ngombe muanda mutekete yakadi ne manyi a bungi, yakabanda mu mai, yakadia mashinde malehe
Mukelenge wakakumbasha argent ne or mu Yelushalema bu mabue; ne mitshi ya cèdre yakadi bu mitshi ya sycomore ya mu bibanda, bualu bua bungi buabi
Yokshane ke tatuende wa Saba ne wa Dedane

Nunku Yehowa udi Wamba bualu bua mukelenge wa Ashû ne, Yeye kena ufika ha buihi ne musoko eu, kena welaku mukete umue, kena umueneka ku mpala kuau ne ngabu wandi, kena wela mushiki wa buloba ku musoko eu
Yehowa neanuihate ku mesu kua bena lukuna benu; nuenu nenuye kudibo mu nshila umue, kadi nenunyeme ku mesu kuabo mu nshila muanda mutekete; nebanuendakashe munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia ha buloba
Bena Izrayele bonsu bavuabu babadike bavua bantu balume
Yuda wakambila bana babo ne, Hatuashiha muan etu, ne hatuasokoka mashi andi, netushale ne tshintu kai
Nengolole tshianza tshianyi, nembakengeshe ne malu a kukema; ne ku nyima kua malu â yeye neanulekele
Â mmeku a, Bena Lewi ku bikondo biabo
Hashishe nuenu nuakangambila ne, Tuakuenzela Yehowa bibi, netuye, netuluangane, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Hakatshiabu bakabika Bena Ashedodo, monai, Dagona wakadi mudishinde mutue mpala hanshi ku mpala kua mushete wa Yehowa
Hanuabuela mu budimi bua manvua bua mukuenu, nudi mua kutula manvua mu tshianza, kadi kanutahi manvua a mukuenu ne muele
Binuikala nusesuka bua kulekela kulonda ku nyima kuandi yeye neabashiye mu tshihela, yeye neashihe bantu aba bonso

Mu makanyika mafila kudi mêyi a ditunga, bidi biambulwisha, mu dîba dia ditalala, ku ditantshisha dia bubanji, dia nsombelu wa bantu ne dia bunkambwa pamwe ne ku dikuba dia bantu ne bintu biaabo Kanungu ka Bilwilu bidi bia ditunga dijima
Mukashi wakabika, wakaya mu nshila wandi, wakavula tshilulu tshiandi tshikudika, wakaluata bilulu bia mu lufuila kabidi
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakamûmusha mu bukelenge mu Yelushalema, wakafutshisha bena buloba ntalanta ya argent lukama ne wa or kabidi
Yeshuluna, kakuena mukuabo bu Nzambi, udi ushikama biandi mu diulu bua kukukuatshisha: bulengele buandi budi ku mutu kua matutu
Bualu bobu nkayabu mbadikebele lufu
Nenubale mbingu muanda mutekete: ku tshikondo tshinudi nuhuole bintu nenubange kubala mbingu ei muanda mutekete

Ba Bena Lewi: Shemaya, muana wa Hashuba, muana wa Azelikama, muana wa Hashabeya wa bana ba balume ba Melali; ne Bakabaka, Heleshi ne Galela ne Mataniya, muana wa Mika, muana wa Zikeli, muana wa Asafa, ne Obadaya, muana wa Shemaya, muana wa Galala, muana wa Yedutuna, ne Belekiya, muana wa Asa, muana wa Elekana, bakadi bashikama mu misoko ya Bena Netofa
Kuena ne bua kulambula bana bebe kudi mvidie wa Moleke to, bualu udi upepeja dina dianyi
Abrahame ukenzakana, kumonaye mukoku wa tshimpanga, nsengu yatshi mipatame mu mutshi
Nanku kabena ne bua kushipa mulume nansha mukaji to, bualu mukaji utshivua mupika

Yeye wakabuelamu ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi, wakabasangisha mu muaba munene wa ku esete, wakabambila ne, Unvuai dî dianyi, nuenu Bena Lewi; nudijidile, nujidile nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, umushai bukoya buonso budi mu nsubu wa tshijila
Bilamba abi bikale bilamakaja ne nkanu ne milonda ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Bakalua kudi mukelenge
Nubikile bena mutumba nenu pa mukuna wa tshijila, bua kulambulamu milambu bu mudi mikenji yamba
Shaula wakambila Bena Kena ne, Yai bienu, umukai munkatshi mua Bena Amaleka, bua tuetu katunushihi n abo; bualu bua nuenu nuakafuila Bena Isalele luse hakaluhukabo mu Ejipitu
Elazare, muana wa balume wa mutuangaji Arone, ke uvua mfumu mukulu wa bena Levi bonsu
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi, ne bua wewe ukume dikasa dimpe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha
Mu tshidimu tshisatu tshia bukelenge bua Hoshea, muana wa Ela, mukelenge wa Isalele, Hezikiya, muana wa Ahaza, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakabanga kukokesha

Bena Peleshete bakadisangisha bua kuluanganabo nvita ne Bena Isalele, bungi bua bena makalu buakadi binunu makumi asatu, ne bua bakadi babanda ha nyima ha tubalu buakadi binunu bisambombo, ne bungi bua bantu bakadi benda hanshi buakadi bu nsenga ya ku muelelu wa mai manene; bakalua, bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo mu Mikemasha ku esete kua Bete awena

Shaula wakakeba kuasa Davidi difuma dimusompoke dikuate mu tshimanu tshia nsubu; kadi Davidi wakehela, wakumuka ku mesu kua Shaula, difuma diakakuata mu tshimanu tshia nsubu; Davidi wakanyema, wakahanduka butuku ebu
Umuamine manyi ha tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha, ne ha bintu biatshi bionso, ujidile tshioshelu tshioshelu netshikale tshijidila
Tuakabajimisba, bu munuakenzela Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona; tuakahaula misoko yonso yakadi ne bantu, ne bakashi ne bana bakese
Nomba Badi Batuma Batentekedi Dikumi ne Babidi ku Kanâna Dut
Bana ba Azemaweta, makumi anai ne babidi
Dutelonone Lufu lua Mose Mose wakaya ku mpata ya Moaba ku mukuna wa Nebo, ku mutu kua Pisega, kuakadi kutangilangana ne Yeleko
Bualu mu thisuku amu, nansha nsongakaji muele mbila, muntu kavua mua kumueneka bua kumusungidila to
Bena Isalele bakaha Bena Lewi bimenga ebi ne miaba ya ku matshika bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nunku Yehoshabata, muana mukashi wa mukelenge Yeholama, mukashi wa Yehoyada muakuidi bualu bua yeye wakadi muan abo mukashi dî Ahazaya wakamusokoka kudi Atalaya; nunku yeye kakamushiha

Anji kuikala ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima: udimuke bua kutumikila mikenji yonso yakakuambila muntu wanyi Mose; kusesuka ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi, nunku newikale ne diakalengele kuonso kuwaya
Nulekele dishima ne kudingila bena kuenu malu, bua kubakengesha
Neenze bionsu bidi bikengela bua kujikija mikiya idi ku tshilambuilu
Mukelenge Kolesha kabidi wakalua ne malonga akadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa akalua n au Nebukadenesâ ku Yelushalema, akadiye muteke mu nsubu wa nzambi wandi

Hashishe mukelenge Ahashawelosha wakambila Esetê, mukelenge mukashi, ne Môdekai, Muena Yuda, ne, Monai, nakamana kufila ba mu nsubu wa Hamana kudi Esetê, bakamana kumuowa yeye ku tshiowelu bualu bua yeye wakalenga Bena Yuda ne tshianza tshiandi
Labane kuandamuna Yakobe ne: Kabena mua kusela Rakele kudi mulume mukuabu to
Mona, nenkusangishe diatshimue ne bankambua bebe, neubuele mu lukita ne ditalala; mesu ebe kaena amona malu makole andi ntuma ku muaba eu ne kudi bantu badi bashikamamu
Eliya wakamba ne, Ya, wambile Ahaba ne, Longolola dikalu diebe, uhueke biebe bua nvula kakukandi

didi dikosoloja makookeshi pankatshi pa bukalenga Mianda idi anyi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene anyi ku bukookeshi bupalakaja bwa bukalenga bunene ne polovensa, anyi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa
Bualu ebu nebuikale bu tshimanyinu ku tshianza tshiebe ne bu tshivulukidi hankatshi ha mesu ebe, bua dî dia Yehowa dikale mukana muenu, bualu bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole

Dishiya dia Yadene mu buloba bua Moaba, Mose wakabanga kubamanyisha bua mikenji ne, Yehowa Nzambi wetu wakatuambila mu Holeba ne, Nuakumana kushikama musangu mule mu mukuna eu: bishai luendu luenu, yai bienu ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, ne ku miaba yonso idi hehi n abo mu Alabâ ne mu mikuna ne mu bibanda, ne mu luseke lua ku Sude, ne hehi ne muelelu wa mai manene, mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna ne mu Lebanona tô ne ku musulu munene dina diau Pelata
Padi ditoba didi ku tshimana dikale dikunze nansha difike, kabidi diumbule tshimana, mutuangaji apatuke, injile, akange ku nzubu aku matuku muanda mutekete
Bualu bua yeye wakashihela nzambi ya mu Damaseke yakamubutula milambu; yeye wakamba ne, Bualu bua nzambi ya Bena Sulia yakabatatshisha, nunku nenyishihele milambu bua yoyo kukuatshisha meme
Kubuelabu mu ditunga luseke lua kuinshi
Meme nennuambuluishe ne meku enu onsu
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen

Ku nyima kua makenga onso atuakakenga bua malu mabi etu ne kuhila kuetu kunene, bualu bua wewe Nzambi wetu kuakatamba kutukengesha bu muakadi mibi yetu, ne wakutushila difuka edi dia bantu, netushihe mikenji yebe kabidi bua kubuelakana ne bantu aba mu malu abo a bundu munyi
Eu wakamba ne, To, muana mufue mmuana webe, ne udi ne muoyo mmuana wanyi
Woshe bintu bionsu abi, bua bikale mulambu wa kuosha wa dipembu dimpe udi unsankisha meme Maweja Nangila

Muntu wa Nzambi wakambila mukelenge ne, Nansha, biwampa tshituha tshia nsubu, tshiena nya n ebe, tshiena ndia, tshiena nnua mu muaba eu; bualu bua Yehowa wakandimusha ne, Kudi bidia, kunu mai, kuhinganyi mu nshila uwakafumina
Numulombe: alekele kulokesha mvula wa makubakuba ne mabue, bualu mbimane kuntonda
Kadi Wambile Yoshua dî, ushindike mutshima wandi, umukoleshe; bualu bua yeye neasabuke ku mpala kua bantu aba, neabahianyishe buloba budi utangila

Hakabidikishabo ne tshihiminu, muntu wakadi usangisha bia bungi bintu kabiakashala kudiye, ne muntu wakadi usangisha bikese kakadi ne nzala, muntu ne muntu wakadisangishilabi bu muakamanyeye mudiadieye
Kanuena mua kuimanyika mpingu ayi, nansha kujidila mabue
dijaadika dia bweena mukanda, bufuki ne bufudi bwa bintu ne mukanda wa njikijilu;

Nunku wakahingana kudi muntu wa Nzambi, yeye ne tshisumbu tshiandi tshionso, bakimana ku mpala kuandi; wakamuambila ne, Katataka ndi mumanye ne, Kakuena Nzambi mukuabo ha buloba buonso anu mu Isalele; nunku ndi nkusengelela ne, Wangate kuha kudi muntu webe
Kabidi bua wewe kujadika ne: ndi mulame bantu banyi nansha mu ditunga diebe mene, tshiakutuma njiji mu Ngoshene to, bualu mmuaba udibu basombe
Kuinaku Yuda kusela muana wa bakaji wa Shuwa, muena Kenaane
Arone kuela dikombu panshi, mukalenga ne bantu batangile
Yoshua wakamututshila mpala hanshi, wakamutendelela, wakamukonka ne, Mukelenge wanyi udi Wambila muntu wandi tshinyi
Hashishe Sihona wakalua kutudi ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu nvita ku Yahasa
Bene hadada wakanyemena mu musoko, wakabuela mu tshisokomenu munda mua nsubu
Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu etu, anukumbashe tô ne hanuahita bungi buenu bua katataka misangu tshinunu, anusankishe bu muakunulayeye
Ezela Udi Ubadila Bantu Mikenji ya Nzambi Hakalua ngondo wa muanda mutekete, Bena Isalele bakadi mu misoko yabo

Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakajidila tshisamba tshia Lewi, bua kutualabo mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne bua kuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kamuenzela mudimu, ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina diandi, bu mudibo benza lelu
Muntu yonsu udi utshipa tatuende nansha mamuende, badi ne bua kumushipa
Hakunvia Balaka lumu ne, Belâma wakalua, wakaya kusangakena n andi ku tshimenga tshia Moaba, tshidi ku muelelu wa mai a Amona, ku butshika bua buloba buandi mene
Nuikale ne bukole ne mitshima ya dikima, kanubatshinyi, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, yeye mene uyaya n enu; yeye kena unuhanga, kena unulekela

Wakamuha kabidi umue wa mikanda yakafundabo mu Shushana wakadi ne mukenji wa kubabutula mufundamu, bua kûlesheye Esetê; wakamuambila dî diandi kabidi bua kuyeye kudi mukelenge bua kumuakuila ne bua kuakuileye bantu bandi ku mesu kuandi

Nuhingane kundi ne muan enu, muan a mukala, hashishe nemmanye ne, Kanuena batentekedi nudi bantu ba mei a bushuwa nunku nempingashe muan enu mu bianza bienu, nenumanye mua kuendulula mushinga mu buloba
Mvidi Mukulu ke udi mubapatule mu Ejipitu, mubapatule ne bukole bu bua nyama wa mbowa
Muntu wa Nzambi wakadila
Yeye udi Dibue; mudimu wandi wonso udi muakane, bualu bua nshila yandi yonso idi milulame: Nzambi wa kalolo udi kayi ne bubi, udi ne malu makane a bushuwa
Papita matuku asatu, mukalenga neabandishe mutu webe, akulembeleje ku mutshi mule
Makenga onsu neanukuate, nukenga bikole too ne panuabutuka bonsu, bualu nuvua babenge kuitaba ne kukumbaja meyi ne mikenji bia Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Butumbi bua Yehowa buakikala ha mukuna wa Sinai, ne difutu diakaubuikila matuku asambombo Dituku dia muanda mutekete yeye wakabikila Mose munkatshi mua ditutu
Bualu kai wewe wakunyema mu musokoko kuakungambila, bua meme kukutuma ne disanka ne misambu ne biombelu
Pashishe mikiya yende neyijike
Bualu bua bakuabo bakamba ne, Tuetu ne bana betu balume ne bana betu bakashi tudi ba bungi; tuangate blé bua tuetu kudia, tuikale ne muoyo
Nuenu nuvuluke ne nuakadi bahika mu buloba bua Ejipitu; bua bualu ebu nakunuelela mukenji eu
Hakambabo ne, Yeye kena kunoko, yeye wakatshihisha ba mu bukelenge abu ne tshisamba atshi bua kuambabo ne, Katuena bamusangane
Malu Adi Nzambi Ulomba Katataka, nuenu Bena Isalele, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi musue nuenu nuenze malu kai
Ne mashi au neabuikidibue

Nudimuke bienu, kanuhu muoyo bua tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiakahungeye n enu: kanudisongidi luhingu anyi tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu tshimue tshiakanuhidisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi bu kahia kadi kashidisha bionso, udi Nzambi wa mukau
Arone ne bana bende kutenteka bianza pa mutu wa tshimpanga atshi

Bikala Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muleheshe matshika enu, bu muakudi tshiheye kudi bankambua benu, bianuheye buloba buonso buakalayeye bankambua benu; binuatumikila mukenji eu, undi munuelele lelu, binuawenza, bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi; hashishe nenusungule misoko mikuabo isatu ha mutu ha misoko ei isatu
Nanku kabakufua to
Nshobo yakakuata Yonatana
Kadi Davidi kakamanya mua kuyaku bua kuebesheye Nzambi bualu bua yeye wakadi utshina muele wa mata wa muanjelo wa Yehowa
Ndi ngelangana meji ne, Yeye udi ukeba kuntekela diyoyo
Lehabama wakaya ku Shekeme, bualu bua Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangishaku bua kumuhingisha mu bukelenge

Hakahinganeye mu bukelenge, ne hakabangeye kushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge, yeye wakashiha bonso ba mu nsubu wa Bâsha; kakashiya muana mulume mu nsubu wandi, nansha mu nsubu ya bana babo nansha mu nsubu ya balunda bandi
Kadi bantu babi bonso nebikale bu meba adibo bimasha, bualu bua kabena bamanye mua kuakuata ne tshianza

Hanuahanga kuluangana, muakuidi neasemene ha buihi ne bantu, neabambile ne, Bena Isalele, unvuai, nuakusemena hehi ne bantu badi n enu lukuna bua kuluangana n abo lelu: kanuikadi ne mitshima mitekete, kanuikadi ne buowa, kanuzakadi, kanubatshinyi; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila, bua kuluangana ne badi n enu lukuna ne bua kunusungila
Moshe kufikila balombodi bonsu ba bena mvita, bavua baya kuluangana ne bena Madiyane munda, nansha ba bena mvita tshinunu, nansha ba bena mvita lukama
Nutumikile, nunvue mei onso anakanuambila: nunku nenukune dikasa dimpe ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima tshiendelele, hanuenza malu adi mimpe ne makane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bana balume ba Kohata: Amalama, Yisehâ, Hebelone, Uziele, banai
Mvidi Mukulu kufuka bimunyi binene bibidi: diba bua kutokesha mu munya, ngondu bua kukenkesha butuku

Bobo bakadila kudi Yehowa, bakamba ne, Tuakenza bibi, bualu bua tuetu tuakalekela Yehowa, tuakakuatshila Babâla ne Bashatelota mudimu; kadi katataka utusungile mu bianza bia badi n etu lukuna, ne tuetu netukukuatshile mudimu
Bakatuenzela bimpe mu Ejipitu, nunku Yehowa neanuhe munyinyi, nenudie

Nakaha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada buloba buonso ku Gilada tô ne ku hankatshi ha tshibanda tshia Ânona tô ne ku kasulu ka Yaboka ku butshika bua Bena Amona; ne buloba bua Alabâ kabidi ne tshibanda tshia Yadene ku Kinelete tô ne ku dishiha dia Alabâ, Dishiba dia Luehu, kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisega ku esete
Bangindile, bualu dituku disatu meme nempueke ku mukuna wa Sinayi, bena Izrayele bonsu batangile
Pashishe ditunga adi dimane kuitaba Maweja Nangila, nenupingane kuenu, kanuyi ne tshilumbu kudi Maweja Nangila, nansha kudi bena Izrayele
Mueyelu wanyi udi munda muende, bua ikale muntu wa lungenyi ne meji, mumanye mua kuenza midimu mishilangane
Kanutshinyi ku mesu kuabo, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi munene udi uvuisha ditshina dikole
Tshisamba kai tshidi ne mikenji ne mei majalame bu mikenji ei yonso inakateka ku mpala kuenu lelu

Bualu ebu kabuena butamba bakole ku mesu kuebe, hawamulekela, bualu bua yeye wakakuenzela mudimu bidimu bisambombo udi utamba muena mudimu wa difutu misangu ibidi; hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanusankishe mu malu onso anudi nuenza
Mose wakalua, wakambila bantu mei onso a musambu eu mu matshu abo, yeye ne Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna

Bakashi benu ne bana benu bakese ne bimuna bienu nebishale mu buloba buakamba Mose dia munemu dia Yadene; nuenu bantu bakole bonso ba dikima nuhite ku mpala kua bana benu bavuale bintu bienu bia nvita, bua kubakuatshisha; tô ne haha Yehowa bana benu dikisha, bu muakunuheye, ne hangatabo kabidi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mubahe; ku nyima nenuhingane ku buloba buenu buakanuha Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, dishiya dia Yadene kudi kuhatuka diba, bua nuenu kubuangata
Shaula wakashila Yehowa tshioshelu; tshiakadi tshioshelu tshia diambedi tshiakashileye Yehowa
Davidi wakashiha kabidi Hadadezê, muana wa Lehoba, mukelenge wa mu Soba, hakayeye bua kujadika bukelenge buandi buakadi ku musulu wa Pelata

Netuitabushe anu bua bualu ebu, bua buonso buenu nulue bu tuetu, ne balume bonso ba munkatshi muenu batengudibue, hashishe, netufile bana betu ba bakashi kunudi, ne tuetu netuangate bana benu ba bakashi, netuikale n enu netuikale bu bantu bamue
Nengikale mmuambila malu, yeye umanyisha bena Izrayele bionsu bingikala mumumanyishe
Biakusumbishabo Muena Ebelu mulume anyi Muena Ebelu mukashi, yeye neakukuatshile mudimu bidimu bisambombo; kadi hafika tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete wewe neumulekele
Bena Izrayele bakuabu bonsu bavua pabuipi nabu, bumvue mbila ya miadi yabu, kunyemabu ne bowa, bamba ne: Buloba budi mua kutujibikila petu
Kadi tangila muntu webe Kimehama; aye biandi ne mukelenge wanyi, umuenzele budi buimpe kûdi
Ke mumvua munuambile diyi dia Maweja Nangila ne: bintu ebi nebabidie amu kudi Arone ne bana bende ba balume

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Ahiezê, muana mulume wa Amishadai
Yosefe wakumuka ku mpala kua Palô, wakendakana mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Mei au anakukuambila lelu eu ikale mu mutshima webe; wewe newayishe bana bebe, wewe neusombelele n abo bua mei au, hawashikama mu nsubu webe, ne hawenda mu nshila, ne hawalala, ne hawabika

Nungashile tshishihelu tshia buloba, nufile ha mutu hatshi milambu ya kuosha, ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, ne mikoko yenu ne ngombe yenu, ku miaba yonso kundi nnuvuluisha dina dianyi, nendue kunudi, nennusankishe
Paudi mumukebe kuyi mumusangane, nanku alame bintu bidiye nabi abi
Kena mua kunua maluvu a buanji, kena mua kunua mayi a tumuma tua mvinyo, kena mua kudia tumuma tua mvinyo tubishi, nansha tume
Tshibangidilu Izake kubikila Yakobe, kulayangana nende, umuambila ne: Kuena mua kusela mukaji wa bena Kenaane to
Mpindiewu ngaleledi Abrahame muana wa ku bukunda buende
Meme ndi mfuisha bantu, mbalama ne muoyi
Bualu mu mashi ke mudi muoyi
Bualu bua mushete wa Nzambi wakadi ne Bena Isalele tshikondo atshi
Hashishe, Samuele wakangata dibue, wakadimanyika hankatshi ha Misepa ne Shene, wakaditeka dina ne, Ebene ezê, Wamba ne, Yehowa wakaluatshisha tô ne lelu
Sadoka muakuidi ne Natana muprofete bamueleku manyi ha mutu bua kumubuesha mu bukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele; elai mpungi, nuambe ne, Mukelenge Solomo ikale ne muoyo tshiendelele
Nyama yonso idi ne mikono mihanduluke ne idi kayiyi mihingishilula bintu mukana udi mubi kunudi, muntu yonso udi ulenga tshianza ham bidi hai neikale ne bukoya
Bienzedi bia Zimeli bikuabo biakenzeye, ne tshitungu tshiakatungileye, kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele, anyi
Davidi wakafua tshiji bualu bua Yehowa wakenzela Uza nunku; yeye wakabikila muaba au ne, Pelese uza tô ne ku dituku edi
Bushuwa, kuena mutufikishe mu ditunga didi ne biakudia bia bungi to
Kuvudi mukashi bilulu hatshidiye ne tshijila tshia kulela kuandi
Meme nenkufute
Kabidi muntu kena mua kutatshisha muanabu bua kufutaye dibanza adi to
Wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa bu muakenza Davidi, nkambua wandi
Messager wakafika kudiye, wakamuambila ne, Bakalua ne mitu ya bana balume ba mukelenge
Ei idi mikenji yakela Yehowa kudi Mose bua mulume ne mukashi wandi, ne bua tatu ne muan andi mukashi udi mu nsubu wandi mu bunsongakashi buandi
Bidimu bia Shete bidi nkama tshitema dikumi ne bibidi
Kadi wewe wimane biebe hehi n anyi, nenkuambile mei onso, ne mikenji ne malu bindi musue wewe kubamanyisha, bua bobo babienze mu buloba bundi nnuha
Kadi pikala bayende tshina wa mukaji kayi musue kumupiana, mukaji neaye kudi bakulu ba mu tshimenga
Kadi tuetu, tshisamba tshia Maweja Nangila, nuatufikishi mu tshipela emu bua tshinyi
Bakabisha luendu luabo ku Sukota, bakashikama mu Etama, ku butshika bua tshihela
Mutuangaji aye ne nyunyi awu kumpala kua tshilambuilu
Kanusuiki ngombe ne mpunda ku mutshi wa tshikokedi umue
Kadi misangu yonsu idibu babuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena ne mashi a nyama wa mulambu bua kukobolola nawu bantu muaba wa tshijila, kabena mua kudia munyinyi wa nyama awu
Belâma wakitaba kudi miloho ya Balaka ne, Biampa Balaka nsubu wandi mûle tente ne argent ne or, tshiena mumanye mua kuhidia dî dia Yehowa Nzambi wanyi, bua kuenza bualu bukese anyi bualu bunene
Kadi udi muibe mpingu ya mvidie indi ntendelela bua tshinyi
Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakamufila mu tshianza tshietu; tuakabashiha ne yeye ne bana bandi balume ne bantu bandi bonso
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu mmungambuluishe
Bena Isalele bakatamba kulua bahele bualu bua Bena Midiyana; ne Bena Isalele bakadila kudi Yehowa
Hashishe Shaula wakabika, wakahueka ku tshihela tshia Zifa, wakadi ne bantu binunu bisatu bakasunguleye munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua kukebeye Davidi mu tshihela tshia Zifa
Bamushipe

Tuhunge tshihungidi ne Nzambi wetu bua tuetu tûmushe bakashi aba bonso ne bana bakalelabo, bu mudi lungenyi lua mukelenge wanyi ne lua aba bonso badi bazakala ku mukenji wa Nzambi wetu; tuenze bualu ebu bu mukenji
Ubifile kudi bena Levi bilondeshile midimu idibu nayi
Yai, muana mulume wa Manashe, wakangata luseke luonso lua Âgoba tô ne ku butshika bua Bena Geshû ne Bena Mâka, wakidika buloba bua Bashana bu dina diandi ne, Hawota yai tô ne ku dituku edi
Hashishe mukelenge Davidi wakatuma bantu bakamûmusha mu nsubu wa Makî, muana wa Amiele, wa mu Lo debâ
Kadi tshidimu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene, badi ne bua kupingaja nzubu awu anu kudi muenaye
Eli wakamba ne, Ebu mbualu bua Yehowa; enze biandi malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi
Nudisange kabidi bua kunnemeka, anu bu munuvua badisange dituku dia kumpala
Uvua mumane kutshimuna kabidi mu tshimenga tshia Edreyi, Oge, mukalenga wa Bashane, uvua muase ku Ashetarote
Meyuyayele kulela Metushayele
Davidi ne Bena Isalele bonso bakimba misambu ne bisanji ne nzenze ne nkumbi ne makasa ne mpungi ne bukole buabo buonso
Hashishe muan a bute udi mukashi eu ulela nebamuidike dina dia muan abo wakafua; bua dina diandi kadijiminyi mu Isalele
Ke mukalu wenu wa ku mutu wa ditunga
Nuenu benze nanku, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu neanusankishe mu bionsu binudi nuenza
Mukelenge wakatudisha tshianana, anyi
Bidi bibaluluke bu bibanda, bu bibunda bidi hehi ne musulu, bu mitshi ya aloe yakakunabo kudi Yehowa, bu mitshi ya cèdre idi hehi ne mai
Bidimu muanda mutekete bilondangane, ditunga dia Ejipitu divua ne biakudia bipite bungi
Tuakabajimisba, bu munuakenzela Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona; tuakahaula misoko yonso yakadi ne bantu, ne bakashi ne bana bakese
Nunku ubuele mu nsubu, wewe ne bana bebe balume, winshile tshibi, uhongolole manyi mu biasu abi bionso; hûla tshiasu tente, utshiteke ha buatshi
Yeye wakahatuka ne bantu bakadimu, wakabatuma ku mudimu ne scies ne nkasu ya biamu ne bisui
Muntu nansha umwe, tshianana udi upeta dinyooka dia dipangila dia ditunga, kêna mwa kubiumbusha mu njila wabi bwa kumwenzelabio yêye nkayenda mudimu to
Nubidile anu mu nzubu, kanupatuki ne munyinyi pa mbelu
Muntu yonso utu wenza malu au, malu au mabi, udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Neupete tshiakudia tshiebe anu ku tshisululu tshia mu mpala muebe, too ne pawapingana mu buloba bundi mukufuke nabu
Bibilu binudi ne bua kuenza mu Izrayele Fuanyikija ne
Kanutetshi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munda bu munuakamuteta mu Masa

Bena Ejipitu bakatuenzela bibi, bakatukengesha, bakatuenzesha mudimu mukole; ne tuetu tuakadi la kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua betu, ne Yehowa wakulua dî dietu, wakatangila makenga etu ne mudimu wetu ne majitu etu

Yehowa kakateka luse luandi kunudi, kakanusungula bualu bua nuenu nuakahita bantu bakuabo bungi; nuenu nuakatamba bantu bonso bukese; kadi bualu bua Yehowa udi munusue ne bualu bua yeye utu watumikila mulayi wakalayeye batatu benu, Yehowa wakanuhatula ne tshianza tshikole, wakanuhikula mu nsubu wa lukanu, ne mu tshianza tshia Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu
Wakaya n andi mu mpata wa Sofima, ku mutu kua Pisega, wakasa bioshelu muanda mutekete, wakosha mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga ku tshioshelu ne ku tshioshelu

Samuele wakakudimuna Shaula dî ne, Meme ndi mumonyi wa malu; ya ku mpala kuanyi ku mukuna bualu bua bûdi n abu mbua kudia n anyi bidia lelu; kadi hatshiabu nenkutume, nenkuambile malu onso adi mu mutshima webe
Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kakunyua mei a Belâma; kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakudimuna mulau ulua disanka dienu, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusua
Numanye bienu lelu, bualu bua tshiena ngakula ne bana benu badi kabayi bamanye, badi kabayi banze kutangila malu akanuyishabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yeye wakebesha Yehowa bualu buandi, wakamuha bintu bia kudia ne muele wa nvita wa Goleyata, Muena Peleshete
Kadi kabena babisangana to

Hashishe bena buloba bakatekesha maboko a Bena Yuda, bakatatshisha mu mudimu wabo, bakatatshisha bantu anu bua kubahumbishabo matuku onso a Kolesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa, tô ne ku bukokeshi bua Dayawesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa

Kadi bikala muntu udi unvua mei a mulau eu udiamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Meme nengikale ne ditalala nansha binalonda tshitshu tshia mu mutshima wanyi, bua kutenteka dikuatshika ha mutu ha nyota, Yehowa kena umubuikidila bubi buandi, kadi tshiji tshia Yehowa ne mukau wandi nebimueneke kudi muntu eu ne milau yonso idi mifunda mu mukanda eu neyimukuate, ne Yehowa nenjimishe dina diandi muinshi mua diulu
Abimeleke wakambila Isaka ne, Umuka kutudi, bualu bua wewe udi ututamba bukole
Divuba kumuka ku musonga wa ntenta

Yeye wakalamba munyinyi muimpe wa dihembu kabidi, wakalua n au kudi tatu andi, yeye wakambila tatu andi ne Tatu anyi abike biandi adie munyinyi wa ntole wa muan andi, bua mutshi ma webe unvudishile disanka
Batanu benu nebihate bantu lukama, ne bantu benu lukama nebihate binunu dikumi bia bantu, badi n enu lukuna nebafue ku muele wa nvita
Maluyu abu a mvinyo, adi bu lulengu lua nyoka
Solomo wakadi ne nsubu ya tubalu tua makalu andi binunu makumi anai, ne bantu bakenda ha nyima ha tubalu binunu dikumi ne bibidi

Ekesode Besalele ne Oholiaba nebenze mudimu wa mu tshitendelelu, ne bantu bonso badi ne lungenyi mu mitshima yabo tente nebenze mudimu eu bu muakuamba Yehowa, bobo bakadi Yehowa uhesha lungenyi ne meji bua kumanyabo mua kuenza midimu yonso ya mu tshitendelelu

Asahele, muan abo ne Yoaba, wakadi wa bantu aba makumi asatu; ne Elehanana, muana wa Dodo, wa mu Beteleheme, Shama, Muena Haloda, ne Elika, Muena Haloda, Helese, Muena Palati, ne Ila, muana wa Ikeshe, Muena Tekoa, Abiesê, Muena Anatota, ne Mebunai, Muena Husha, Salemona, Muena Ahoa, ne Mahalai, Muena Netofa, Helebe, muana wa Bana, Muena Nefota, ne Itai, muana wa Libai wa mu Gibea wa Bena Benyamina, Benaya, Muena Pilatona, ne Hidai wakafuma ku tusulu tua mu Gâsha, Abi alabona, Muena Âba, ne Asemaweta, Muena Bâhuma, Eliaba, Muena Shâlebona, bana ba Yashena, Yonatana, Shama, Muena Halala, ne Ahiyama, muana wa Shala, Muena Alala, Elifelete, muana wa Ahasabai, muana wa Mâka, ne Eliyama, muana wa Ahitofele, Muena Gilona, ne Heselo Muena Kâmele, ne Pâlai, Muena Âba, Igala, muana wa Natana wa mu Soba, ne Bani, Muena Gada, ne Seleke, Muena Amona, ne Nahalai, Muena Bêlota, batuadi ba ngabu wa Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, ne Ha, Muena Yitela, ne Galeba, Muena Yitela, ne Uliya, Muena Hiti: buonso buabo bakadi bantu makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete

Nakidikisha bujitu bua ntalanta ya argent nkama isambombo ne makumi atanu, nakayiteka mu bianza biabo; ne malonga a argent, bujitu bua ntalanta lukama; ne or, bujitu bua ntalanta lukama; malonga a or makumi abidi, bujitu bua dariques tshinunu; ne malonga abidi a tshiamu tshia mitaku akadi a mushinga mukole bu or mene

Bualu bua ndi mumanye ne, Ku nyima kua lufu luanyi nenutambe kudisangisha ne kusesuka mu nshila unakunulesha; malu mabi neanukuate mu matuku atshidi ku mpala; bualu bua nuenu nenuenze malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufikisha munda bua mudimu wa bianza bienu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubandamuna ne: Nuenu, nudi bena lulengu ba kalandamusenga
Nutumikile, nuenze malu onso ne mei onso anakuteka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kumubanjija
Asululayi tshimenga tshia mukalenga Sihone

Dutelonone Mose Udi Udimusha Bena Isalele bua Kutumikilabo Yehowa Katataka, nuenu Bena Isalele, unvuai mei ne mikenji bindi musue kunuyisha, bua nuenu kubienza bua nuikale ne muoyo, nubuelemu, nuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, unuha
Davidi wakebesha Yehowa ne, Nenye kuluangana ne Bena Peleshete, anyi
Kadi binuikala kanuyi baditshiha, bualu ebu kabuena bubi kunudi
Bena Merari nebenze midimu eyi: kuambula mabaya onsu a nzubu wa tshijila, makunji ne bitaku biawu; kuambula makunji a ku lupangu ne bitaku biawu, milonda ne mionji ne bintu bionsu bidibu nabi mudimu
Udi ufuisha ne mamuebe bundu, bualu udi muledi webe
Nunku nenumushe mashi adi kâyi ne tshilumbu munkatshi muenu hanuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa

Tuakanyenga buloba ebu ku tshikondo atshi, ku Aloê mu tshibanda tshia Ânona, ne tshituha tshia mikuna ya Gilada ne misoko idimu, nakaha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada: ne tshituha tshikuabo tshia Gilada ne misoko ya bukelenge bua Oga wa mu Bashana nakaha tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe: luseke luonso lua Âgoba, misoko yonso ya mu Bashana
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nebashihe muntu au bulelela bantu bonso nebamukume ne mabue ku butshika bua tshitudilu

Bualu bua hanakamana kulua n abo mu buloba bunakalaya batatu abo, budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, ne hakamanabo kudia, kukuta ne kuvunda, hashishe nebakudimune mitshima yabo bua kutendelela nzambi mikuabo, nebayikuatshile mudimu, nebampetule, nebashihe tshihungidi tshianyi

Bikaleye mubaka kudi mulume hatshidiye ne kuditshiha kuandi anyi mei makuabo akaditshiheye n au ne biunvua mulume wandi ne biahuweye mu dituku diakunveye kuditshiha kuandi, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso nebijalame

Mose wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Yehowa wakamana kuhikula Besalele, muana mulume wa Uli, muana mulume wa Hû wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, wakamûsha tente ne Nyuma wa Nzambi ne lungenyi lule lua kuenza n alu midimu yonso, ne lua kulongolola n alu mudimu muimpe wa bintu bia or ne bia argent ne bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mudimu wa kusonga mabue ne wa kusonga mabaya ne midimu yonso ya bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Kulondolola Nzambi Udi Uhunga Tshihungidi ne Davidi Sam

Biafila muntu mulambu eu bua kubakidila Nzambi, yeye nealue kabidi ne mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi, ne mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene miela manyi ha mutu, ne mikata ya bukula bubotesha budi busangisha ne manyi
Elona, Muena Zebuluna, wakafua; bakamujika mu Ayalona mu buloba bua Zebuluna

Shaula wakadi mushikame kunfudilu kua buloba bua Gibea muinshi mua mutshi wa grenade udi mu Migelona: bantu bakadiye n abo bakadi bu balume nkama isambombo: ne Ahiya, muana mulume wa Ahituba, muan abo ne Ikaboda, muana mulume wa Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eli, muakuidi wa Yehowa wa mu Shilo, wakadi n andi muluate tshilulu tshia efoda
Dikenga dindi nkuatshisha bantu bebe kadiakukuata banyi meme
Ndelanganyi ya Esawu, idi misombe mu mikuna ya Seyire, ne bena Mowabe, badi basombe mu Are, mbamane kuitaba bua tupitshile muabu
Mei onso akaluhuka mukana muena nuenze bu munuakuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, binuakumulaya mukana muenu
Mikenji mishilangane idi itangila mana Moshe kubambila kabidi ne: Biakudia ebi, nubidie bijika anu dituku dimue

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakatuadishila disanka mu malu onso anuakenza ne tshianza tshienu; yeye wakamanya ngendu yenu mu tshihela etshi tshinene; mu bidimu ebi makumi anai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakadi n enu; kanuakakengela tshintu
Hakafikeye kudi Solomo, yeye wakamuambila malu onso akadi mu mutshima wandi
Bihanga ne mahu a tshitekelu biakadi bia tshituha tshia or tshimue, bakatula bintu bionso ne tshiamu tshia or nkayandi
Mukelenge wakanyunguluka, wakavudishila Bena Isalele bonso disanka; Bena Isalele bonso bakadi bimane kulu

Ke bena Izrayele kuya kuasa ku ditunga dijima adi, kutuadijila ku tshimenga tshia Aroyere, tshidi ku muelelu wa musulu wa Amone, too ne ku mukuna wa Ermone, udibu babikila kabidi ne: Siyone, ditunga dijima dia luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, too ne ku Mayi manene a luepu, kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisga
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kubikila mulume, kumukonka ne: Udi penyi
Pikala ngombe mutue nsongalume nansha nsongakaji nsengu mumushipe, muena ngombe neapete dinyoka dia momumue

Bakulu bonso ba mu musoko eu udi utamba ha buihi ne muntu mufue, nebuvuwe bianza biabo ha mutu ha kana ka ngombe kadi ne nshingu waku mutshibula mu tshibanda; bobo nebitabe ne, Bianza bietu kabiakamatshisha mashi au, mesu etu kaena mâmone
Kanungu ka Butontolodi bwa beena tshidiidi budi bwanyishibwa mu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Nunku wewe kuena ujuka ha bulalu bûdi mulale, kadi neufue bulelela
Di dia Yehowa kudi Mose ne Alona Mose wakahingana kudi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Yehowa, wewe wakenzela bantu aba bibi nunku bualu kai

Hilama, mukelenge wa Tulo, wakatuma bantu bandi kudi Solomo; bualu bua yeye wakunyua lumu ne, Bakamuela manyi bua kumubuesha mu bukelenge mu muaba wa tatu wandi; bualu bua Hilama wakananga Davidi matuku andi onso
Bantu bonso ba ha buloba bakakeba Solomo bua kunvuabo lungenyi luakateka Nzambi mu mutshima wandi
Yeye kena tatu wenu wakanuafuka, wakanuenza, wakanujadika, anyi
Nenjule tshiiji tshiabu, ne bantu badi kabayi ne lungenyi
Ebu mbuhianyi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Shimeona ku meku abo
Natana wakambila mukelenge ne, Wewe, mukelenge wanyi, wakuamba ne, Adoniya neakokeshe ku nyima kuanyi, neashikame mu nkuasa wanyi wa bukelenge, anyi
Kulamunaye lubala lumue mu lubadi luende, kupingajapu munyinyi

Bena Isalele kabakadi ne Nzambi mulelela tô musangu mule, kabakadi ne muakuidi wa kubayisha, kabakadi ne mikenji ya Nzambi; kadi mu ntatu yabo hakakudimunabo mitshima yabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, bobo bakamuheta
Nakihata bakadi n anyi lukuna, nakabashiha, tshiakalukila kabidi tô ne hanakabashiha
Mmumue ne: Mua bana , bualu yeye udi mamu wa bonsu badi ne muoyi

Neafue mulambu wandi bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, neumushe dianyi didi dibuikila bintu bia munda ne dianyi dionso didi ha mutu ha bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi didi ha mutu hatu hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma kabidi neabiumushe
Bakatuma buatu bunene bua kusambula ba mu nsubu wa mukelenge, ne bua kuenza n abu bu muakasueye
Mukashi au wakumuka kudiye, wakahingana ku nsubu wa tatu wandi ku Beteleheme yuda, wakalalaku ngondo mai mijima

Nutume umue wa munkatshi muenu, alue biandi ne muan enu, muan a mukala kunoko, netunusuike mionshi buonso buenu, netutete mei enu, bua kumanya ne, Nudi nuamba mei malelela, anyi bualu bunakuditshiha ku muoyo wa Palo ne, Nudi batentekedi, nebuikale bulelela
Bipupu abi, nebikuate anu bantu badi banukina
Hanuakuna matamba a mitshi yenu ya olive bua mamuma ahone, kanuakumi tshiakabidi; neashale a benyi ne a bana ba nshiya ne a bakashi ba mu lufuila
Davidi wakamuebesha ne, Nenye ku musoko kai
Bakenza bibuiku bikuabo ku mutu kua bibumba bia makunshi; bakenzahu mamuma a grenades nkama ibidi mu milongo minyunguluke tshibuiku tshikuabo

Bana betu bakatekesha mitshima yetu, bakamba ne, Bantu aba badi batuhita hunene ne bule; misoko yabo idi minene, ne mpangu yai ya mabue idi miye mulu mule; bualu bukuabo, tuakatangilamu bana balume ba Bena Anaka
Bana babu ne Yozefe kumumuena utshidi ku bule, kayi muanji kufika padibu nansha
Tshilamba tshia kulembeleja mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta, tshikale tshitela bimpe ne buanda bua ndanda busambakaja ne bua miosa ya nyama bufikuluke, bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzuu
Nunku nuakashikama mu Kadesha matuku a bungi, nudi bamanye bungi bua matuku anuakashalamu
Nyuma wakashala kudibo, bakadi ne mena abo mafunda, ka dî kabakaya ku Ntenta, bakamba di dia Nzambi mu tshitudilu

Muana mulume wa munkatshi muenu, hafikeye matuku muanda mukulu, neatengudibue, muana mulume yonso wa ku bikondo bienu bionso, yeye udi muledibue mu nsubu wenu, anyi yeye udibo basumba kudi ba bende ku argent, udi kayi kankanunuina kebe
Mikenji Idi Isuika Bena Tshimbambila Muntu udi ukuma mukuabo, udi umushiha, nebamushihe yeye bulelela
Tangilai, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakateka buloba ku mpala kuenu: yai bienu, nubuhiane, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu enu; kanutshinyi, kanuikadi ne buowa

Tshimuangi Moshe ne Arone badi bamonangana ne mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu Malu onsu aa mamane kupita, Moshe ne Arone kuambila mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Izrayele udi wamba ne: Ulekele bantu banyi, baye kuenza tshibilu mu tshipela bua kuntendelela
Tudi bafike bua kusomba munemu, bualu ku Kenaane kudi tshiyole tshikole, tshiumisha too ne bisosa bia kudisha bimuna bietu
Moshe ne Elazare kuteka bintu bionsu bia tshiamu tshia mpawungi, bivuabu bafile kudi balombodi ba bena mvita abi, mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bua Maweja Nangila ikale uvuluka bena Izrayele
Meme ndi njinga ne: Maweja Nangila apeshe bena Izrayele bonsu Mueyelu wende bua bikale bonsu bambi

Lota wakabanduluka, wakamona mpata ne bibanda bia musulu wa Yadene, ne tusulu tuakadi kuonso diambedi Yehowa kayi muanze kushiha Sodoma ne Amola, mpata au wakadi bu tshibundu tshia Yehowa, wakadi bu buloba bua Ejipitu, hawaya mu nshila wa ku Soa
Solomo wakasomba ne Bena Isalele bonso, ne tupitene tua bantu tshinunu ne tua bantu lukama, ne balumbuluishi bonso, ne bantu banene bonso ba mu Isalele, ne bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo
Mvidi Mukulu kumuandamuna ne: Meme ndi nebe
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndiku, mukelenge wanyi
Kadi Lemeke nebamusombuele misangu makumi muanda mutekete
Balake kuenza bionsu abi
Mpindiewu panuikala bitabe bua kukumbaja dijinga dia mfumuanyi, nansha panuikala babenge, nungambile patoke bua mmone tshindi mua kuenza

Tuakanyenga buloba ebu ku tshikondo atshi, ku Aloê mu tshibanda tshia Ânona, ne tshituha tshia mikuna ya Gilada ne misoko idimu, nakaha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada: ne tshituha tshikuabo tshia Gilada ne misoko ya bukelenge bua Oga wa mu Bashana nakaha tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe: luseke luonso lua Âgoba, misoko yonso ya mu Bashana
Mu nseke yonso ne mu misoko yonso yakafika mikanda ya mukenji, Bena Yuda bakadi ne musangelu ne disanka, bakalongolola bia kudia bia disanka, bakadi ne dituku dimpe
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu wa tatuebe Izake mmunkandike butuku bua lelu ne: Udimuke, kukengeshi Yakobe ku bualu nansha bumue
Yeye wakamukudimuna dî ne, Ndi Muena Ejipitu, muhika wa Muena Amaleka; mukelenge wanyi wakashiya bualu bua disama diakankuata matuku asatu mahite
Yeye udi ulama ndondu wende too ne ku ndelanganyi tshinunu
Numubikile, alue biandi kudia bidia
Bakelenge Eliya Udi Uhingana kudi Ahaba Hakahita matuku a bungi, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Eliya mu tshidimu tshisatu ne, Ya, udimueneshe kudi Ahaba, ne meme nendokeshe nvula ha buloba
Hashishe Nyuma wakatulukila Amasai, wakadi ku mutu kua bantu makumi asatu, yeye wakamba ne, Tudi bantu bebe, Davidi; tudi ku luseke luebe, wewe muana wa Yishai
Bumuka mu Kibrote Taawa, kuyabu ku Asherote
Wewe ndaku, ufikishe bantu muaba umvua mukuambile, mutumibue wanyi neakulombole
Mesa a kulambuila Mvidi Mukulu mampa Pashishe, wenze mesa a mutshi wa ndunga
Bantu badi bamba malu malelela, babenga mabuejila ubateke bakulu badi ku mutu kua bantu tshinunu, lukama, makumi atanu too ne kua bantu dikumi
Yehowa neanuhingashe mu Ejipitu kabidi mu matu mu nshila unakanuambila ne, Kanuena numutangila kabidi
Ke muvuabu bumuke kabidi balondangane bimpe ku diku ne ku diku, ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba
Nunku Yotama wakalua muena bukole bualu bua yeye wakalongolola nshila yandi ku mpala kua Nzambi wandi

Nakamumanya bua yeye ayishe bana bandi ne ba mu nsubu wandi bimpe, bua bobo baye mu nshila wa Yehowa bua kuenza malu makane ne malulame, nunku Yehowa neamanye mua kuenzela Abalahama malu onso akamuambileye
Yozefe kubandamuna ne: Bu munudi kanuyi ne makuta, tushintakajayi bimuna bienu ne biakudia
