Mikumbi yakamuangalaka buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, yakatamba bungi, kakuakadi mikumbi bu ei diambedi, ne mikuabo bu ei kayena ilua kabidi
Bana ba balume ba Kohata; Amalama, Yisehâ ne Hebelone ne Uziele
Nensankishe bantu badi bakuvudishila wewe disanka, nengele muntu mulau udi ukuela wewe mulau Bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bua bualu buebe
Enza nkanu ya or mai, ne teka nkanu ku mikolo mai ya mesa
Kutekabu bantu balume bonsu ba mu tshimenga atshi panshi
Mbimpe kumukandika bua kuolodi tshianza tshiende ku mutshi wa muoyi
Badi batukuma, batuamba bua kuenza madiotu
Panudi nunowa biakudia, kanuena mua kukosa too ne miepu idi kumpenga kua budimi to
Abalahama wakalela Isaka

Yeye wakalota tshiota, wakamona tshibandilu tshi shimika hanshi ne mutu watshi wakateka to ne mu diulu ne mona banjelo ba Nzambi bakadi babandahu, bahuekahu: Wakamona ne Yehowa wakadi muimane ku mutu watshi, wamba ne Ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Abalahama, kaku webe ne Nzambi wa Isaka buloba budi ulalahu nenkuhebu wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe
Bakadi n etu lukuna bakamba ne, Kabena bamanye bualu, kabena batutangila tô ne hatuamueneka munkatshi muabo bua kubashiha ne bua kubalekesha mudimu
Umue wa bansongalume ba Yoaba, wakadi muimane ha buihi handi, wakamba ne, Muntu yonso udi musue Yoaba, udi ku luseke lua Davidi, alonde biandi Yoaba

Hakashikisheye kubambila mei a onso, buloba buakahandika muinshi mua makasa abo, buloba buakubulula mukana muabu, buakabamina ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu yabo ne bantu bonso bakalamata Kola ne bintu biabo bionso

Mu dîba adi, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi mwa kulunguluja nansha mukanda uvwabo beenza kudi Kasumbu kakese kasanga ka bantu bûngi bwa momumwe, nansha mukanda wa ndekeelu uvwatshi tshielele tukanda, mushintulula pikalabio bienzeka kudi diakajilula dia dîyi dimwe anyi a bûngi adibo banyisha kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe
Ya, wambile Yalobama ne
Mutuangaji angate nyunyi umue wa ku idi muntu mufile, kamanda nkutshi nansha nkudimba, alambule nyunyi umue bu mulambu wa kudikobolola, mukuabu bu mulambu wa kuosha
Bualu bua difutu dia Yehowa diakadi ha mutu ha nsubu mu munya, ne mu butuku kahia kakadihu, ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso mu ngendu yabo yonso

Nomba Badi Babala Bungi bua Bena Isalele ku Sinai Yehowa wakambila Mose mu tshihela tshia Sinai, mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ku dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo muibidi mu tshidimu tshibidi tshia kuluhuka kuabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne, Ubale bungi bua Bena Isalele bonso, ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena a balume, muntu ne mundi, wewe ne Alona nubange kudi balume bonso ba mu Isalele bakahita bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu, nubale buonso buabo ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu badi bamanye mua kuya mu nvita

Kanulumbuluishi bantu ne dilumbuluisha didi kadiyi diakane; kanutangidi mpala ya bantu; kanuitabushi bintu bia kunubueshilabo n abi; bualu bua bintu bia kunubueshilabo n abi bidi bifofomesha mesu a muena lungenyi, bidi binyanga dilumbuluisha didi diakane
Maweja Nangila, bena Izrayele aba mbantu bebe, baudi mudisunguile, bauvua mupikule, mupatule mu Ejipitu ku bukole ne ku makanda ebe mapite

Hanuatshintshimika musoko musangu mule, hanualuangana n abo bua kûnyenga, kanushihi mitshi ya tumuma ne tusui; nudi mua kudia tumuma atu, kanushihi mitshi, bualu bua mitshi ei idi bu bantu banudi uluangana n abo, anyi

Mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji udi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, mukenji umue udi wisuika, muakindi udi ufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu neangate tshituha tshia munyinyi tshidi tshishale
Bantu ba mu Mikemasa lukama ne makumi abidi ne babidi
Kututangidi tuetu bu badi ne tshilumbu tshia lufu lua muntu ewu to
Abalahama wakabela Abimeleke bualu bua dina dia mai diakanyengabo kudi bahika ba Abimeleke ku bukole
Nanku butuku bujima baluishi kabavua mua kupetangana

Hashishe balume aba batanu bakumuka, bakafika ku Layisha, bakatangila bantu bakadimu, bu muakashikamabo mu miaba mikole ne Bena Sidona, kabayi ne bualu; kakuakadi muntu mu buloba abu wakadi ne bukokeshi bua kubadisha bundu mu malu abo; bakadi kule ne Bena Sidona, kabakadi babuelakana ne bantu bakuabo

Bana balume ba Amalama: Alona ne Mose; Alona wakadi mujidibue bua yeye ajidile bintu bia tshijila, yeye ne bana bandi balume tshiendelele, bua kuoshelabo Yehowa musenga wa manananshi, ne bua kumukuatshilabo mudimu ne bua kuvudishilabo bantu disanka mu dina diandi tshiendelele

Wa kafila bu mulambu wandi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Netanele, muana mulume wa Sua
Kadi panuabenga mutudi tuamba, tuetu netuangate muanetu wa bakaji, tuye nende
Tshisamba tshionsu tshia bena Izrayele netshilame buloba buabu bimpe
Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi,mianda idi ilonda eyi idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene:
Kabidi bantu bonsu nebapingane ku nzubu yabu anu bimpe, bumvuangane
Nunku Davidi wakaya, wakumusha mushete wa Nzambi mu nsubu wa Obeda edome, wakalua n au ku musoko wa Davidi ne disanka
Tatuabu Yetro kubakonka ne: Lelu munudi bapingane lukasa nanku mmunyi
Genese Buhidia bua Bantu Nyoka wakatamba nyama yonso yakafuka Yehowa Nzambi bidimu
Bena Benyamina tshinunu bakadi n andi, ne Siba, muena mudimu wa Shaula, ne bana bandi balume dikumi ne batanu, ne bena mudimu bandi makumi abidi bakadi n andi; bakasabuka Yadene ku mesu kua mukelenge
Mmubutule mu mayi tubalu ne bavua babandapu
Hanubikilabo kudi Palo, yeye neanukonke ne, Nudi benji ba mudimu kai
Pashishe kuambilaye muena mudimu uvua ne tshisumbu tshia kumpala ne: Wewe musambakene ne mukuluanyi Esawu, yeye mukuebeje ne: Udi muena mudimu wa nganyi
Ngalambulu ngombe mulume umue, ne mukoku wa tshimpanga umue, pa tshilambuilu tshionsu
Nunku bantu kabakalabula bia kudia
Hashishe nuenu nuakangambila ne, Tuakuenzela Yehowa bibi, netuye, netuluangane, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Bualu mu Ejipitu, panuvua nukuna ntete, nuvua numbula mikidi bua kufikishisha mayi mu budimi amu, bu mudibu benza mu lupangu lua biseki
Uvua nkambua wa bimbi ba bisanji ne bedi ba nshiba
Bubidi buabo bakahunga tshihungidi ku mpala kua Yehowa; Davidi wakashala muitu, Yonatana wakahingana ku nsubu kuandi
Tshintu tshionsu tshidi bena Izrayele bafila kundi bua kashidi ntshiebe wewe kabidi
Katataka, muan anyi, Yehowa ikale n ebe; wikale ne diakalengele, wibakile Yehowa, Nzambi webe, nsubu bu muakuambeye bualu buebe
Ke mukalenga kutabuluka ku tulu, kujadika ne: ndi mulote bilota
Wakenza nunku mu misoko ya Manashe ne Efelayima ne Shimeona tô ne ku Nafatale, wakabibutula

Hashishe tshiji tshikole netshinkuate dituku adi, ne meme nembalekele, nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo ne bobo nebajimishibue; ne matata ne makenga a bungi nealue kudibo; bobo nebambilangane dituku adi ne, Malu â mabi onso kaena alua kutudi bualu bua Nzambi wetu kena munkatshi muetu, anyi
Kadi Wambile Yoshua dî, ushindike mutshima wandi, umukoleshe; bualu bua yeye neasabuke ku mpala kua bantu aba, neabahianyishe buloba budi utangila
Nanku nenganyishe mupuya muimpe wabi
Ne yeye wakashiminyina muntu webe kudi mukelenge wanyi; kadi mukelenge wanyi udi bu muanjelo wa Nzambi, wenze malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuebe
Kanulambi muana wa mukoko mu mabele a mamu wandi
Wakenza makunshi a acacia anai, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku makunshi, akadi ne bitubuidi bia or, wakenza nkanu yau mai ya tshiamu tshia argent
Palô Wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakamba ne, Yai bienu, nushihele Nzambi wenu nyama mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Tshisamba tshia Ngade tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Sefone, ndelanganyi ya Sefone; dia bena Agi, ndelanganyi ya Agi; dia bena Shuni, ndelanganyi ya Shuni, dia bena Ozni, ndelanganyi ya Ozni; die bena Eri, ndelanganyi ya Eri; dia bena Arode, ndelanganyi ya Arode; ne dia bena Areli, ndelanganyi ya Areli
Nunku Abinê Wakafika kudi Davidi mu Hebelone ne bantu makumi abidi bakadi n andi
Abalama wakambila Lota ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Katutandanganyi, balami ba bintu bietu kabatandanganyi, bualu bua tudi bana ba muntu umue
Solomo kabidi udi ushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge

Lewitiki Masanka Adi Alonda Batumikidi ba Mikenji Kanusongi mpingu, kanujadiki luhingu lua tshiamu tshiakafulabo, anyi dikunshi anyi dibue diakasongabo mu buloba buenu bua kubmamina, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Adare, wa mu tshimenga tshia Pawu
Padi muntu udia biakudia bia tshijila kayi mumanye, udi ne bua kufuta mutuangaji bintu bikuabu bungi bua bintu bivuaye mudie
Tshisamba tshionsu, netshipeshe bena Levi bungi bua bimenga, bilondeshile bunene bua buloba buatshi

Hakaluabo ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ku musoko wa Davidi, Mikala, muana wa bakashi wa Shaula, wakatangila ha disoso dia nsubu, ne hakamoneye Davidi uja maja utuhika, yeye wakamulengulula mu mutshima wandi
Balake kuya luseke lukuabu
Nunku ntshidi ne bua kudila kudi mukelenge kabidi bualu kai
Nebateke kabidi tshiseba tshikole tshia nyama wa nkonga pa mutu pa bionsu ebi
Bena Nfiondo Badi Bashihibua kudi Bena Davidi Kul
Mvidi Mukulu mmuleje patoke bubi buetu
Dielulula LUFU LUA MOSHE Yoshuwa udi upingana Moshe Moshe kuambila kabidi bena Izrayele bonsu ne: Mpindiewu mbakumbaji bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi
Hashishe bana babo ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi bakalua, bakamuangata, bakaya n andi, bakamujika hankatshi ha Solea ne Eshetaola, mu majambu a Manoa, tatu wandi
Kadi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu kavua musue kuteleja Balaame nansha
Tshianza tshiandi tshiakololeye kudiye, tshiakafubidila, yeye kakamanya mua kutshikonya kabidi
Bena Moaba bakatamba kutshina bantu, bualu bua bungi buabo; mitshima ya Bena Moaba yakanyingalala bualu bua Bena Isalele
Kuenzabu makopa ku tshilamba tshia ndekelu tshia tshisumbu tshia kumpala tshia bilamba
Mukelenge wakela mukenji bua kuenzabo nunku; mukenji eu wakafuma mu Shushana, bakalembelesha bana balume ba Hamana dikumi ku tshiowelu atshi

Mu dituku diakashimikabo nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ntenta wa dimanyisha dia Yehowa, ditutu diakabuikila nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ku dilolo tô ne ku dinda diakakenka bu kahia ha mutu ha nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Mikaya wakamuambila ne, Biwahingana talalâ, bulelela, Yehowa kena mungambile bualu
Eliyabe, muana wa Palu, uvua ne bana balume basatu: Nemuyele, Datane, ne Abirame
Samuele wakajinguluila bantu mushindu wa bukelenge, wakafunda mu mukanda, wakauteka ku mpala kua Yehowa

Kulondolola Malu Akenza Asa a Kulengesha n Au Bukelenge Buandi Nyuma wa Nzambi wakatulukila Azaya, muana wa Odede; wakaya kusangakena ne Asa, wakamuambila ne, Unvuai, Asa ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina; Yehowa udi n enu, hantshidi n andi; binuamukeba, nenumuhete; kadi binuamulekela, yeye neanulekele
Anyi bikaleye mumukume ne mutshi mu tshianza, ne biafileye, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu, nebashihe mushihi wa muntu
Kanungu ka Beena tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka badi ne mwânzu wa batshipwita ba ditunga
Hakafikabo ku tshituilu tshia Atada, tshidi dishiya dia Yadene, bakadila muadi mukole, baka jinga tatu wandi to matuku muanda mutekete
Pawaye mulale, kulotaye tshilota
Esau wakamuambila ne, Tuyai bietu, meme nenye ku mpala kuebe
Munyinyi wa mafuta onsu awu, ke udi mutuangaji umusha kabidi padiye ulambula milambu ya bobumue
Tuvua amu bamuandamune ku nkonku yende yonsu
Badi babakengesha bikole ne tshikisu
Ditangilula dia Dîyi dikulu diônso didi dipatshila anyi difikisha ku dikepeesha dia makookesha ne madilekelela a muntu, anyi kudikepeesha dia makookeshi a polovensa ne misoko didi dikandikibwa
Hashishe, Yehowa wakamatshisha mu Sodoma ne Amola soufre ne kalua bia mu diulu kudi Yehowa
Kumukokeshi ne tshianza tshikole, kadi utshine Nzambi webe
Bakumuka mu Elima bakashikama hehi ne Dishiba Dikunze
Lufu kua Eleazâ Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona, wakafua; bakamujika mu mukuna wa Pinehasa, muan andi mulume, wakamuhabo mu buloba bua Bena Efelayima
Batekepu mabulu a munyinyi, mutu ne mafuta a nyama
Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa wakanusungula munkatshi mua bantu bonso ba ha buloba bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi
Wakambila muena mudimu wandi kabidi ne, Lua, tusemene ha buihi ne umue wa miaba ei; netulale nansha mu Gibea nansha mu Lama
b Sedekiya wakatombokela mukelenge wa Babulona
Shaula nealue bu lumu luakunvua muntu webe, anyi

Bena Lewi neitabe, nebambile bantu bonso ba mu Isalele ne dî dikole ne: Muntu yonso udi usonga luhingu anyi udi wenza luhingu ne tshiamu tshiakatulabo kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule, udi kujadika mu musokoko, ntshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, udi ne mulau

Nuenze anu malu adi makane ne mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa; bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nubuele ne nuhiane buloba buimpe buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu, bua kunuihatshila bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna ku mpala kuenu, bu muakamba Yehowa
Tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi ne kwambulwisha mwa kupeta ngenyi idi itangila tshidiidi tshia kwenza ne idi itangila mêyi adi ditunga mwa kweela

Muntu mukuabo kikadi mu ntenta wa kusangakena hayeye kufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi mu muaba wa tshijila ne bubi bua ba mu nsubu muandi ne bubi bua Bena Isalele, tô ne hahatukeye mu nsubu
Biangatshile dituku adi, nebabikile diku dia muntu awu ne: Diku edi ndia muntu uvuabu bakopole tshisabata
Bena Eme bakashikamamu diambedi, bantu banene, bantu ba bungi, bule bua Bena Anaka: badi bababikila kabidi ne, Bena Lefa, bu Bena Anaka; kadi Bena Moaba bakababikila ne, Bena Eme
Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia mu polovensa katshiena mwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene to
Palô wakabika mu butuku, yeye ne bantu bandi bonso, ne Bena Ejipitu bonso, muadi munene wakadi mu Ejipitu, kamuakadi nsubu wakadi kayi ne mufue
Shelumiele, muana mulume wa Sulishadai, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia bena Shimeona
Tshisamba tshia Shimeyone:
Maweja Nangila, udi mfumu wa kashidi ne kashidi tshiendelele

Shaula wakatuma ba messager bua kukuatabo Davidi; kadi hakatangilabo tshisumbu tshia baprofete bamba dî dia Nzambi ne Samuele muimane ku mutu kuabo, Nyuma wa Nzambi wakatulukila ba messager ba Shaula, bobo bakamba dî dia Nzambi kabidi
Kumukeye mu nsubu wandi, yeye udi mua kuikala mukashi wa munga muntu
Yakoba wakamukuatshila mudimu to bidimu muanda mutekete bualu bua Lakele, ne bidimu ebi biakadi bu anu matuku makese bualu bua dinanga diakamunangeye n adi
Kutondabu bantu bonsu bavua bashadile panyima, kubashipa
Muaba wa Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu awu, nenusanke bonsu, nuenu, bana benu ne bena mudimu benu
Bamfumu ba meku kulambula mabue a mushinga mukole a onikse ne mabue makuabu a kuteka mu tshilamba tshia efode tshia mutuangaji munene, ne mu tshilamba tshiende tshia pa tshiadi
Mutuangaji akobolole muena tshibawu anu mushindu ewu bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse bua tshibawu tshivuaye muenze atshi
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Kanutshinyi, bualu bua Nzambi wakulua bua kunuteta, ditshina diandi dikale ku mpala kuenu, bua nuenu kanuenji malu mabi

Bualu bua nudi bamanye bu mutuakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne mutuakahita munkatshi mua bisamba biakadi mu nshila; ne nuenu nuakatangila malu mabi abo ne mpingu yabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue ne ya tshiamu tshia argent ne tshia or yakadi munkatshi muabo; bua muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu, nansha mulume nansha mukashi nansha diku dia bantu nansha tshisamba, udi akudimuna mutshima wandi kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kukuatshila nzambi ya bisamba abi mudimu; ne bua muji udi ukuama mamuma a mulungu ne a bululu kawikadi munkatshi muenu
Tshisamba tshinudi kanuyi bamanye nebadie bintu biakadiunda mu buloba bualu bua mudimu wenu; nebanunyange, nebanudiate matuku onso; malu anudi nutangila ku mesu neanuhadishe

Uvuluke bantu bebe, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba; kutangidi tshitshu tshia bantu aba anyi buhidia buabo anyi mibi yabo, bua bena buloba buwakatuhatula kabambi ne, Bualu bua Yehowa kakadi ne bukole bua kulua n abo mu buloba buakahaneye ne bualu bua yeye wakadi n abo tshiji, yeye wakalua n abo mu tshihela bua kubashiha
Nusungule muntu wa munkatshi muenu, alue biandi kundi
Bonsu ne: Enze
Meme nendue n enu mu buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, nennuhebu bu buhianyi ndi Yehowa
Nanku Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neanusankishe mushindu ewu: Bantu badi mu tshimenga, nansha badi mu misoku, Maweja Nangila neabele lupemba
Mêyi a ditunga adi ateela mêna a mpetu mikwabo ya mu musoku ne mushindu wa kuyabanya
Nunku nakanyunguluka, nakahueka mu tshibanda, ne mukuna wakadi utema ne kahia; ne mabue abidi a mei a tshihungidi akadi mu bianza bianyi bibidi
Ebu kambualu bukuabo anu kunyingalala kua mutshima
Bualu bua bisamba ebi binudi nuihata nunku bakadi bunvue mei a bena dijimbu ne a batempi ba mbuku; kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kena witabusha bua nuenu nuenze nunku
Mutentekedi wakamba ne, Ndi ngelangana meji ne luendu lua muntu udi ku mpala ludi bu lua Ahimasa, muana wa Sadoka

Nakulua hanshi bua kubasungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu, ne bua kubaluhula mu buloba abu, ne bua kulua n abo mu buloba buimpe ne bunene, mu buloba budi ne mabele ne buitshi bia bungi, mu muaba wa Bena Kanana ne wa Bena Hiti ne wa Bena Amole ne wa Bena Pelese ne wa Bena Hiwi ne wa Bena Yebuse
Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, uvua wambuluisha Moshe bituadije ku buana, kuelaye diyi ne: Mfumuanyi Moshe, ubakandike, kabenji nanku
Yeye wakamba ne, Wangate muan ebe mulume, muana umuehele, ûdi munange, Isaka mene, uye biebe mu buloba bua Moliya, umufileku bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kalua, ha mutu ha mukuna undualua kukulesha
Diumvwangana edi didi mwa kwangata lwidi lwa diambulwisha
Bena Isalele Bafile Bintu kudi Yehowa Ek

Bintu bidi bidimenena mu tshidimu tshia kubanda kua buloba nebikale bintu bienu bia kudia, bintu biebe ne bia muhika webe mulume ne bia muhika webe mukashi ne bia muena mudimu webe ne bia muenyi udi ushikama n ebe ne bia bimuna biebe ne bia nyama yonso idi mu buloba buebe bintu bionso biakadimenena nebikale bintu bia kudia
Muana eu Samuele wakadiunda ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kuendi masandi
Kakunyua Zebula, mukelenge wa mu musoko, mei a Gala, muana wa Ebede, tshiji tshiandi tshiakadi tshikole
Kanubandi ku tshioshelu tshianyi ha tshibanda, bantu kabatangidi butaka buebe

Nusakidile milambu eyi ku mulambu wa kuosha wa ku dituku dionsu: Dituku dibidi: nundambule ngombe dikumi ne ibidi, mikoku ya tshimpanga ibidi, bana ba mikoku dikumi ne banayi, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijimu, kabidi ne mbuji wa mpumbu umue

Mukelenge wakabikila Yehoyada muakuidi, wakamuambila ne, Wewe kuakuenzesha Bena Lewi bua bobo balue ne milambu ya Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, kudi Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema ne ba mu nseke yonso ya Isalele, mu ntenta wa bumanyishi bishi
Kutumaye nyunyi wa tshikololu, kunyungulukatshi too ne pamuenekela buloba bume
Kadi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kuenza kabidi tshitunu

Nzambi wakamba ne, Bintu bidi bikenka bikale mulu mua diulu bua kutahulula munya kudi butuku, bikale bua bimanyinu ne bua bikondo ne bua matuku ne bua bidimu, bikale bu minda mulu mua diulu bua kutokeshayi ha buloba, bualu buakenjibua
Kadi kanuena mua kudia mashi a nyama to
Wewe mubatshipe, misangu mikuabu ndi mua kubatshimuna, kubipata mu ditunga
Ke muvua Mvidi Mukulu mujikije mudimu wa kufuka diulu ne buloba nanku

Hashishe Davidi wakambila messager ne, Bûdi n abu mbua kuambila Yoaba ne, Bualu ebu kabunyingalashi mutshima webe, bualu bua muele wa nvita udi ushiha muntu ne muntu; anji kukolesha nvita yebe ku musoko, ubutule; ukoleshe mutshima wandi nunku
Nudi bamanye bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila muenze
Bualu bua meme nengambe dina dia Yehowa: tumbishai bunene bua Nzambi wetu
Kanulu kudi Yehowa ne mulambu wa bukula budi busangisha ne luevene, kanuoshi luevene anyi buitshi bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa
Yoshua wakambila bakuidi ne, Ambulai mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei, nusabuke ku mpala kua bantu
Nansha nanku, pa dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene, padibio bisumpakaja, badi mwa kupwekesha tshipungu etshi ku matuku mwanda mukulu
Mutuangaji awu neabuele ne mukaji awu muaba wa tshijila bua kumuteka kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Kadi misoko ya Bena Lewi ne nsubu ya mu misoko yabo, Bena Lewi badi mua kuyihikula hasuabo
Matunga menyi a baluishi babu awu neababutule
Ebu mbuhianyi bua Bena Lubena ku meku abo, ne bimenga ne misoko yabi
Nakatekamu mushete wa Nzambi muakadi tshihungidi tshia Yehowa tshiakahungeye ne Bena Isalele
Kuyaye ne mukajende Sarayi, ne Lote muana wa muanabu, kabidi ne bapika bavuaye musumbe mu Arane ne bintu bionsu
Davidi udi mua kukuambila dî kai dikuabo
Dutelonone Diulu, teleja matshu, nengambe, buloba bunvue mei a mukana muanyi

Muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu udi utambisha muan andi mulume anyi muan andi mukashi mu kahia, nansha mutempi wa mbuku, nansha muena dijimbu nansha muena bilengulengu, nansha muena buloshi, nansha musesuishi wa bantu ne miloû yandi, nansha mutendeledi wa bakishi, nansha muena muhongo, nansha muena lubuku lua muzangu
Kunyima kua lufu luebe bena Izrayele nebatendelele mvidie idibu batendelela kudi bantu benyi badi mu ditunga dinuabuela
Mose wakamba ne, Ebu mbualu buakamba Yehowa bua nuenu nuenze, ne butumbi bua Yehowa nebumueneke kunudi
Bakumuka mu Makehelota bakashikama mu Tahata
Moshe kumvua buowa, kudiambila ne: Bualu ebu bakadi babumanye
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bela wakalela bana ba balume: Adâ ne Gela ne Abihuda ne Abishua ne Nâmana ne Ahoa ne Gela ne Shefufana ne Hulama
Kanuena mua kumufuila luse, kanuena mua kumuakuila
Nzambi wakamba mei â onso ne, Ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu nsubu wa buhika
Hakamutangila tatu wa mukashi, yeye wakadi ne disanka bua kusangakena n andi

Yoaba Udi Ushiha Abinê Monai, bantu ba Davidi ne Yoaba bakahingana mu kuhaula kua bintu, bakalua ne bintu bia bungi; kadi Abinê kakadi ne Davidi mu Hebelone, bualu bua yeye wakamana kumutuma, wakaya biandi talalâ
Meme nenteke bundu buanyi kudi kunyi
Mvidi Mukulu udi ulombola bantu bende Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu mumane kulekela bena Izrayele, Mvidi Mukulu kena mubaleje njila wa tshikosu wa mu ditunga dia Peleshete to
Meme tshiena mulele muana
Kuambilaye Yozefe ne: Mvidi Mukulu wa bukole buonsu uvua mummuenekele ku Kenaane mu musoku wa Luze, mungele lupemba
Bintu bionsu bidi bena Izrayele bandambula bia mu ditunga diabu mbiebe wewe ne bia bena diku diebe bonsu badi kabayi ne mikiya
Muena mudimu wa Abrahame kulondela Izake bionsu bivuaye muenze mu luendu
Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Mona, nakamana kulua kudi
Aba mbantu bakasabuka dishiya dia Yadene mu ngondo wa kumudilu hakadi musulu mûle muhatuke mu mielelu yau; bakihata bantu bonso bakadi mu bibanda ku esete ne ku wesete

bilongelu bikulu ne bilongelu bikwabo bia mianda ya mamanya, mamanya mapiluke anyi a midimu bidibu bâsa anyi bambulwisha kudi Bukalenge bunene anyi kudi makalenga a polovensa ne bidi mêyi a ditunga mâmba ne bidi ne diambulwisha bwa ditunga dijima;

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Kabahu Yehowa Muoyo Nudimuke, kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne malu anakunuambila lelu: hanuadia bintu bia bungi, hanukuta, hanuasa nsubu mimpe ne hanuashikamamu, hakumbana ngombe yenu ne mikoko yenu ne havulangana biamu bienu bia argent ne bia or, ne havulangana bintu bienu bionso; hashishe nudimuke, kanudisu mu mitshima yenu, kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu; wakanulombola mu tshihela tshinene tshibi, tshiakadi ne nyoka isuma bu kahia ne tuminyiminyi, ne buloba budi kabuyi ne mai; wakanuhatula mai mu dibue dikole; wakanuisha ne mana mu tshihela, adi batatu benu kabayi bamanye; bualu bua kunuhuekesha ne kunuteta, bua kunuenzela bimpe mu matuku a kunshikidilu kuenu: kanuambi mu mitshima yenu ne, Tuakudiangatshila biuma ebi bionso ne bukole bua bianza bietu
Tshianana nebikale bena tshibawu, amu bua biakudia
Nenuikale ne disanka bua bana banudi nulela, ne bua bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba, ne bua kukumbasha kua nyama yenu ne bimuna bienu ne mikoko yenu
Mose wakafunda mikenji ei, wakayifila mu bianza bia bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne kudi bakulu bonso ba mu Isalele
Nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nuditshihe kudi dina diandi
Muntu yonso udi uhidia dî diebe, kayi unvua mei audi umuambila, nebamushihe; anji kuikala ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima
Maweja Nangila anuleje mpala wa mimuemue, anufuile luse
Nennutabalele bua nutante, nulele bana ba bungi
Kadi bakuabo ba Bena Yuda ne ba Bena Benyamina bakashikama mu Yelushalema
Bantu ba mu Betele ne Ai, nkama ibidi ne makumi abidi ne basatu
Nanku dilaya dionsu didi mukaji musela ulaya, nansha padiye uditshipa bua kujila tshintu, bayende udi mua kujadika, nansha kushipa dilaya diende, nansha mutshipu wende
Mose ne Alona bakumuka ku mesu kua bantu, bakaya ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bakatua mpala yabo hanshi

Muntu udi muakane neasangishe butue buonso bua muana wa ngombe, neabuteke ku butshika bua tshitudilu ha muaba mutoke, nebabulamine tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele bu mai a kulengesha hau bubi eu udi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi

Yeye wakafila milambu ha tshioshelu tshiakenzeye mu Betele mu matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondo wa muanda mukulu, mu ngondo wakasunguleye mu mutshima wandi; wakasungula didiku diakadia Bena Isalele bidia bia disanka; wakosha musenga wa manananshi ha tshioshelu kabidi
Shaula ne bobo ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi mu tshibanda tshia Ela, baluangana ne Bena Peleshete
Nebaudie ne mampa adi kaayi mela buanga, kabidi ne biseki bia buanji
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona mei a kuya n au kudi Bena Isalele ne kudi Palo, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, bualu bua kuhatula Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Pashishe kulejaye Maweja Nangila milambu ya bintu bia mu madimi
Bana hadibo balela mu tshikondo tshisatu badi mua kubuela mu disangisha dia Yehowa
Yeye neatuale muana mulume wa ngombe ku butshika bua tshitudilu, neamuoshe ha kahia bu muakenzeye ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa kumudilu eu udi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu bonso
Bualu bua wewe wakahidia dî dia Yehowa yeye kabidi wakakuhidia bua wewe kuikala mukelenge
Alona wakasaku, bakamujika; ne Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, wakenza mudimu wandi wa buakuidi
Nunku umuambule, umuele mu muaba eu, bu mu dî dia Yehowa
Pashishe, muena Izrayele awu umushe mutu ne mafuta, akosolole munyinyi
Elisha wakabambila ne, Eu kanshila nansha, kammusoko nansha; nundonde, meme nennufile kudi muntu unudi nukeba

Tuakanyenga buloba ebu ku tshikondo atshi, ku Aloê mu tshibanda tshia Ânona, ne tshituha tshia mikuna ya Gilada ne misoko idimu, nakaha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada: ne tshituha tshikuabo tshia Gilada ne misoko ya bukelenge bua Oga wa mu Bashana nakaha tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe: luseke luonso lua Âgoba, misoko yonso ya mu Bashana
Bena Yuda bonso ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne bantu bonso bakafuma mu Isalele, ne bantu ba bende bakadi bafume mu buloba bua Isalele bakashikama mu Yuda, bakasanka
Neubangile mukashi kadi munga muntu nealale n andi; newase nsubu kadi kuena ushikamamu; neukune budimi bua nvinyo, ne kuena udia mamuma abu
Kanuenji malu mabi aa to
Nuvuluke bienu bienzedi bia kukema biakuenzeye, malu andi a kukema, ne dilumbulula dia mukana muandi, nuenu tunkanunuma tua Isalele muntu wandi, nuenu bana ba Yakoba, bantu bakasunguleye
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi, anyi yeye neatekeshe mitshima ya bantu bakuabo
Nemeka tatuebe ne mamuebe, nanku neulale bidimu bia bungi pa buloba bundi meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu webe mukupeshe
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Biwaditshiha kundi mu dina dia Nzambi ne, Tshiena nkushiha, tshiena nkufila mu bianza bia mukelenge webe, nennulombole kudi tshisumbu etshi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nakutangila bantu aba, mona, badi ne buhidia bukole, nunku kumpumbishi nansha, tshiji tshianyi tshikale tshikole kudibo, neashihe, kadi nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshinene
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu udi nenu
Hashishe yeye wakamuambila ne, Bantu ba kale bakadi ne lusumuinu ne, Bulelela, nebakonke lungenyi ku Abele, nunku bualu nebushike
Bakalamika mabaya a cèdre ha mutu ha makunshi makumi anai ne atanu: dikumi ne atanu ku mulongo ne ku mulongo
Numanye bienu lelu, nubueshe bualu ebu mu mitshima yenu ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi wa mu diulu ne hanshi ha buloba kabidi: kakuena mukuabo

Wakamba ne, Eu newikale mushindu wa mukelenge udi unukokesha: neangate bana benu ba balume, neabateke bu bena makalu andi ne badi benda ha nyima ha nyama yandi ya tubalu; bobo nebalumbile lubilu ku mpala kua dikalu diandi; yeye neabasunguile tupitene tua bantu tshinunu bantu tshinunu, ne tua bantu makumi atanu makumi atanu; neabueshe bakuabo mu mudimu wa kuihila madimi andi ne wa kunowa bintu biandi, ne wa kumuenzela bintu bia nvita ne bintu bia makalu andi
Bena Peleshete bakabikila babuki ne batempi ba mbuku, bakabakonka ne, Netuenze tshinyi ne mushete wa Yehowa
Genese Yosefe Udi Ujinguluila Palô Tshiota Tshiandi Hakahita bidimu bibidi bijima, Palô wakalota tshiota, yeye wakadi muimane hehi ne musulu

Ebu mbungi buabo bu muakadi nsubu ya batatu abo: bua Bena Yuda, tupitene tua binunu bia bantu: Adena wakadi kapitene ne bena bukitu binunu nkama isatu bakadi n andi; ku nyima kuandi Yehohanana wakadi kapitene ne bantu binunu nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mukulu bakadi n andi; ku nyima kuandi Amasaya, muana wa Zikeli, wakadifila kudi Yehowa; bena bukitu binunu nkama ibidi bakadi n andi
Nuikale bantu ba tshijila, bualu meme ndi wa tshijila
Nenshipe kabidi bamuanabute ba bimuna
Yoshua wakabaha budishikaminyi, wakahunga n abo tshihungidi, bua bobo bikale ne muoyo; bakelenge ba mu Isalele bakaditshiha kudibo
Mukelenge Solomo wakakudimuna mamu wandi ne, Udi ulombela Adoniya Abishaga, Muena Shunama, bua tshinyi
Bualu bua kahia aka kanene nekatuoshe; bitunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, kabidi, hashishe netufue
Nenusangishe bintu bionso bia musoko mu musesu, nenuoshile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musoko ne bintu ebi bionso; musoko eu newikale musasula tshiendelele, kabena bawasaku kabidi

Lupetu Bafidi ba bulongama Midimu ya Mbulamatadi a kabujima Dibutula dia tshisamba Bukalenga bunene Dijadikila , dishiindikila Dipangila dia ditunga Kasaala, musanzu Tshilema Lumu, mwanda mupiamupia, dimanyisha Bululame Tshilumbulwilu Bukalenga bwa bandumbulula,bukalenga bwa bakoshi ba nsambu,lukoongu lwa Tubadi tukoshi twa nsambu twa beena mwabo

Bualu bua hanakamana kulua n abo mu buloba bunakalaya batatu abo, budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, ne hakamanabo kudia, kukuta ne kuvunda, hashishe nebakudimune mitshima yabo bua kutendelela nzambi mikuabo, nebayikuatshile mudimu, nebampetule, nebashihe tshihungidi tshianyi
Muakuidi neangate tshisaka mu bianza bienu, neatshiteke hanshi ku mpala kua tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kuambaye kabidi ne: Bantu batumbishe Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa Sheme

Bobo nebanutshintshimike ku bibi bienu bionso tô ne hahona ngumbu yenu yonso inuakueyemena mu buloba buenu buonso; bobo nebanutshintshimike ku misoko yenu yonso mu buloba buonso budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Nudi mua kulombela bantu ba bende bintu ebi; kadi bintu bionso bidi muan enu mulume n abi, nuenu nenubilekele
Bana ba batuadi ba bintu: bana ba Shaluma ne ba Atê ne ba Talemona ne ba Akuba ne ba Hatita ne ba Shobai, buonso buabo bakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne tshitema
Nenkuvudishile tunkanunuina tuebe, netuikale bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba, nunku biamanya muntu mua kubala dinfuenkenya dia buloba, hashishe, tunkanunuina tuebe netubadibue kabidi
Nunku bakangata makalu abidi ne tubalu, mukelenge wakatuma bantu ku nyima kua Bena Sulia ne, Yai, nutangile bualu ebu
Nunku nuenu nenufile mulambu wa bia dikumi bionso binudi nuangata kudi Bena Isalele bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, wewe neuhe Alona muakuidi mulambu eu wa bintu bidibo banyukula kudi Yehowa
Kanuangatshi bintu bia buhikudi kudi muntu wakasemena ku musoko wa kunyemena, bualu bua kumuhingisha ku buloba buandi to ne hafua muakuidi munene
Yakobe kumuka ku Bersheba

Bikaleye kayi ne mushinga wa muana wa mukoko, yeye neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, nansha nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi nansha mputu nyunyu ibidi, nyunyu umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Kuinyikaye muana awu dina ne: Shimeyone
Mapangadika a Minisitila kavulambedi badi baatwa tshiâla tshibîdi ku dia bakaji, padibo bienzeka, kudi baminisitila badiye wimikila dikumbaja dia mapangadika awu
Ke mutuvua bakuate bimenga bionsu bivua pa mikuna, buloba bua Ngilaade ne bua Bashane, too ne ku Salka ne Edreyi, bimenga bia mu bukalenga bua Oge, mu ditunga dia Bashane
Kadi tshintu tshiakadiunda ku muonshi wa tumuma tua nvinyo, kanu nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, kadi tshintu tshidi katshiyi tshimpe; enze biandi malu onso anakamuambila
Nanku udi ne bua kumuka mu mitanda, kuya kusomba pa nkayende

Esetê Bena Yuda Badi Babutula Bena Lukuna Babo Mu ngondo wa dikumi ne ibidi, ngondo wa Adâ mene, mu dituku dia dikumi ne asatu dia ngondo eu, bakamba diba dia kumana mukenji wa mukelenge kufika, mu dituku diakatekemenabo kudi bena lukuna ba Bena Yuda bua kubakokeshabo kadi bualu buakakudimuka, ne Bena Yuda bakakokesha bena lukuna babo , Bena Yuda bakadisangisha mu misoko yabo mu nseke yonso ya mukelenge Ahashawelosha bua kukuatabo honso bakasua kubenzela bibi; nansha muntu wakamanya mua kuimana ku mpala kuabo, bualu bua ditshina diabo diakakuata bantu bonso
Abrahame ne Sara bakavua bakole bakulakaje, Sara mumane kupita diba dia buledi, katshiyi umona tshijila tshia bakaji
Wewe Nzambi wetu, kuakihata bena buloba aba ku mpala kua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, kuakabuha bana ba Abalahama, mulunda webe, tshiendelele, anyi
Kadi bantu bonso ba mu buloba bakashiha bantu bonso bakelela mukelenge Amona tshifufu; bena buloba aba bakasungula Yoshiya, muana wandi, mukelenge mu muaba wandi
Nenuikale ne disanka hanuabuela mu nsubu, nenuikale ne disanka hanualuhukamu
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udibo bakwata badi ne tshia kumwambila diakamwe tshidibo bamukwatshila ne tshivwabo bamufundila, ne biônso abi, mu mwakulu udiye umvwa

Bakenza disoso munda mua tshibuiku ne tshibuiku, bunene buadi buakadi coudée umue; bakalengesha ha nyima ha disoso edi bu muakenzabo bitekelu tô ne ku coudée umue ne tshituha; bakasonga bilongo ku mishiku yadi, bakaditahulula nseke inai, kabiakadi tshijengu
Yeye kakuntuma kudi bantu badi bashikame ha mutu ha lumbu, bua bobo hadie tunvi tuabo, banue menyi abo diatshimue n enu, anyi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Lubena, Elisu muana mulume wa Shedeu
Kulondolola Masalayi a Davidi Aba mbantu bakatua kudi Davidi ku Sikelaga hakadiye musokome bualu bua Shaula, muana wa Kishi; bakadi munkatshi mua bena bukitu bandi, bakadi bakuatshisha bandi mu nvita

Nudi nudiata milambu yanyi ya kuosha ne bintu bidibo bafila kundi binakanuelela mikenji yanyi bua bualu buabi, ne udi utumbishe bana bebe ba balume ku mutu kuanyi bua kudidiundishabo ne bintu bidi bitamba bulengele bia milambu yonso ya bantu banyi Bena Isalele bualu kai
Nenuikale ne disanka mu misoko yenu, nenuikale ne disanka mu madimi enu
Padi Arone wasa tshifulu atshi, pandi ntshimona, nengikale mfuila bena Izrayele luse nansha bobu batupakana padibu bantuadila milambu
Gideona wakabanda mu nshila udi uyila kudi badi bashikama mu ntenta ku esete kua Noba ne Yogebeha, wakashiha musumba wabo, bualu bua musumba wakadi mu muaba mukole
Bobo bakangata ku bianza bia Mose bintu bionso biakafua Bena Isalele ne disanka bua kuenza n abi bintu bionso bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Mukalu wabo wa ku nôde wakadi ku Yadene: mukalu wakabanda ku nôde ku Yeleko, ne ku mikuna ya ku wesete; wakahatuka ku tshihela tshia Bete awena

Kanubengi muenyi anyi bana ba nshiya dilumbulula didi diakane; kanuangatshi bilulu bia mukashi wa mu lufuila bu tshieya: nuvuluke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhikula: bua bualu ebu nakunuelela mukenji eu

Nunku nudifuanyikishile bifuanyikishi bia masungu enu ne bifuanyikishi bia mpuku yenu idi misusule buloba buenu: nenuambike Nzambi wa Isalele butumbi bitabusheye bua kuhehesha tshianza tshiandi kunudi ne kudi nzambi yenu ne ku buloba buenu
Kujidila kua Ban a Bute Nenujidile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ban a bute balume ba ngombe ne ba mikoko; kanuenzeshi ban a bute ba ngombe mudimu, kanukoshi ban a bute ba mikoko miosa
Kalongu kisâtu : Bidi bitangila makayi ne mapangakana
Solomo, muana wa Davidi, wakakoleshibua mu bukelenge buandi; Yehowa Nzambi wandi wakadi n andi, wakatamba kumuvuisha bunene
Kadi wewe usonge buatu bua mutshi wa budimbu, ubukosolole tuzubu munda
Yai bienu, enzai mudimu, katuena tunuha bisonsa, kadi nuenu nenulue ne bungi bua tushola bu mutuakuamba
Yosefe Mubandishibue bu Muloho wa Bena Ejipitu Bualu ebu buakadi buimpe ku mesu kua Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi bonso
Dipembu diayi nedinsankishe
Mukenji wa Tshia Dikumi Nufile kudi Yehowa tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso binudi nuhuola ku tshidimu ku tshidimu

Nuenu nutumikile mei andi ne mikenji yandi, bu munakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne disanka ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima, ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu ha buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha tshiendelele
Isalele udi ushikama biandi talalâ, mpokolo wa Yakoba udi ha nkayandi mu madimi a blé ne a nvinyo mihia mihia: ne matutu andi adi amatshisha dibungi

Kanudi mampa anyi manvua akoshabo mu kahia, anyi manvua mabishi dituku edi diambedi kanuyi banze kufila milambu yenu kudi Nzambi eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso mu nsubu yenu yonso
Bena Isalele, nuenu nudi ne disanka, banganyi badi bu nuenu basungidibue kudi Yehowa
Yai bienu, nudikebele bisonsa kunudi mua kubisangana, kadi kabena bahuekesha mudimu wenu
Rakele kuamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu mmumbingishe
wa Gela, wakaluhuka, wenda umuhenda hakatshidiye ulua
Biasua Yehowa, yeye udi mumanye mua kutangila bubi buakungenzeleye; Yehowa udi mumanye mua kungenzela bimpe bua bihendu biandi biakumpendeye n abi lelu
midimu ne bisalu bia bantu bônso idi yambulwisha polovensa ne misoko;
Kadi yeye wakahingasha tshianza tshiandi, ne mona, muana mukuabo wakaluhuka
Mayi avua apatuka munda mua buloba ke avua abupesha tshitalela
Bena Amaleka ne Bena Kanâna badi ku mpala kuenu, nunku nenufue ku miele ya nvita, bualu bua nuenu nuakuhidia kulonda Yehowa, nunku Yehowa kena wikala n enu
Bana ba Atê wa Hezikiya, makumi tshitema ne muanda mukulu
Nebambe ne: Maweja Nangila anuele lupemba, anulame
Bobo nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, wakabahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua meme kuikala munkatshi muabo, ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo
Batentekedi badi bamanyisha Moshe bivuabu bamone Matuku makumi anayi mamane kupita, batentekedi kujikija mudimu wabu
Diba dia kulela dikumbana, kamuvua kabidi mpata to
Hashishe yeye wakahueka ne Pula, muena mudimu wandi, tô ne kunfudilu kua bena nvita bakadi mu tshitudilu
Nebapange bukole bua kuluangana mvita
Abalahama ne Yishemaele, muan andi mulume, bakatengudibua dituku dimue
Kuandamunaye Abrahame ne bena Iti bavua basombe ku tshibuelelu tshia tshimenga bonsu bateleja ne: Ndi nkusengelela ne: tshiena nkusumbisha budimi ne lubuebue to
Dituku adi Yakobe kuela bana abu lupemba, wamba ne: Bua kujingila bantu diakalenga, bena Izrayele nebatele mena enu, bamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu anusankishe bu muvuaye musankishe Efrayime ne Menashe
Muntu mulenge muntu udi ne mikiya, udi ushala pende ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Siba wakambila mukelenge ne, Mona, yeye udi mu nsubu wa Maki, muana wa Amiele, mu Lo debâ

Aba mbena bukitu ba munkatshi mua bena nvita: Asahele, muan abo ne Yoaba, Elehanana, muana wa Dodo wa mu Beteleheme, Shamota, Muena Halola, Helese, Muena Pelona, Ila, muana wa Ikishe, Muena Tekoa, Abiezê, Muena Anatota, Sibekai, Muena Husha, Hai, Muena Ahoa, Mahalai, Muena Netofa, Helede, muana wa Bâna, Muena Netofa, Itai, muana wa Libai wa mu Gibea, wa bana ba Benyamina, Benaya, Muena Pilatona, Hulai, wa ku misulu ya Gâsha, Abiele, Muena Âba, Azemaweta, Muena Bahaluma, Eliaba, Muena Shâlabona, bana balume ba Hashema, Muena Gizona, Yonatana, muana wa Shage, Muena Halala, Ahiama, muana wa Sakâ, Muena Halala, Elifala, muana wa Ula, Hefê, Muena Mekelata, Ahiya, Muena Pelona, Heselo, Muena Kâmele, Nâlai, muana wa Ezebai, Yoele, muan abo ne Natana, Mibehâ, muana wa Hageli, Seleke, Muena Amona, Nahalai, Muena Belota, muambudi wa ngabu wa Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, Ila, Muena Yitela, Galeba, Muena Yitela, Uliya, Muena Hiti, Zabada, muana wa Ahalai, Adina, muana wa Shiza, Muena Lubena, mukelenge wa mu Bena Lubena, ne bantu makumi asatu bakadi n andi, Hanuna, muana wa Mâka, ne Yoshafata, Muena Mitena, Uziya, Muena Ashetelata, Shama ne Yiyele, bana ba balume ba Hotama, Muena Aloê, Yediele, muana wa Shimeli, ne Yoha muan abo, Muena Tiso, Eliele, Muena Mahawa, ne Yelibai ne Yoshawia ne bana ba balume ba Elenâma, ne Yitema, Muena Moaba, Eliele ne Obeda ne Yâsiele, Muena Mesobaya

Bualu bua binuatumikila mikenji yonso Nakanuambila bua kuyenza bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi yonso, ne bua kulamata kudiye, hashishe Yehowa neanuihatshile bisamba ebi bionso ku mpala kuenu, nenuhiane buloba bua bisamba bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole

Pikala Kasumbu kakese kasanga ka bantu bûngi bwa momumwe kakayi kafika ku dianyisha mukanda umwe anyi pikala mukanda ewu kabayi bawanyisha mu mushindu udibo balongolola kudi tulongo twapitshi etu, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi tshiangata mapangadika bwa kashidi
Neoshe dianyi dia mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ha tshioshelu

Wewe newambile muan ebe wa balume mu matshu, ne muana wa muan ebe wa balume, malu anakuenza mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne bimanyinu bianyi binakuenza munkatshi muabo, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Mishimi ya mu mai manene ne bibi bia mu diulu kabidi biakadi bikandibua, ne nvula ya mu diulu yakalekeshibua
Arone uvua ne bana ba balume banayi: Nadabe, Abiku, Elazare ne Itamare
Bakuabo babo bakadi balami ba bintu bia mu nsubu, ne bivuadi bionso bia mu tshitendelelu, ne ba bukula bubotesha, ne ba nvinyo, ne ba manyi, ne ba musenga wa manananshi, ne ba bintu bia muhuya muimpe
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Efelayima bakadi binunu lukama ne muanda mukulu ne lukama lumue ku bisumbu biabo

Au mmalu akenza Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakadi ne dina dinene munkatshi mua bantu banene basatu; yeye wakatamba bantu makumi asatu butumbi, kadi yeye kakalua munene bu bantu aba basatu bakadi ku mpala; Davidi wakamuteka ku mutu kua bena nvita bakadi ha buihi n andi
Muntu yonsu kuela dikombu diende panshi
Kabena banowa blé lelu, anyi
Bikala mulambu wandi wa kuosha wa nyunyu, yeye neafile nansha nyunyu wa nkutshi nansha mputu nyunyu
Shaula wakabambila ne, Nusankishibue kudi Yehowa, bualu bua nuenu nuakanfuila luse
Kadi bua munyinyi wa nyama wa mulambu wa bobumue, baudie ujika onsu anu dituku dimue, kauladi to
Wikale Mvidi Mukulu muambe ne: ke udi muibe awu, bua tshintu tshimue neafute bintu bibidi
Tukanda badi batweela padibo babiikila dîna dîyi dikola, anyi tshianza muulu, anyi pa disomba ne dijuuka kulu ,anyi pa kabeji ka muntu pa nkayenda,anyi ku mushindu wa biamwa bia nzembu
Pamvua ne mikiya, tshiena mutshilenge, nansha mutshilambule bua muntu mufue
Dielulula Bena Izrayele ntshisamba tshia Maweja Nangila Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neanufikishe mu ditunga dinudi ne bua kukuata
Kanuakupeta biakudia pa madimi enu to
Uhe muntu webe mutshima wa lungenyi bua kulumbuluila n au bantu bebe ne bua meme kumanya mua kujingulula hankatshi ha malu mimpe ne malu mabi: bualu bua udi mua kulumbuluila bantu bebe banene nganyi
Bualu bua bonso ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba nebafue; nenshihe bana balume bonso ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba, ne badishikamine ne bahika, badi mu Isalele
Numanye bienu lelu, bualu bua tshiena ngakula ne bana benu badi kabayi bamanye, badi kabayi banze kutangila malu akanuyishabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bia Kudia Bimpe ne Bidi Kabiyi Bimpe Lew
Wakalua ne tshimpanga tshikuabo, tshimpanga tshia kujidila kua bakuidi; Alona ne bana bandi balume bakatentekasha bianza biabo ha mutu ha tshimpanga

Bikalaku mushikankunde utshidi kamama, udi mubangila kudi mulume, ne muntu mukuabo udi usangakena n andi mu musoko, udi ulala n andi; hashishe nebalue n abo bubidi buabo ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko au, nenubakume ne mabue tô ne hafuabo; mushikankunde, bualu bua yeye kakadila hakadiye mu musoko, ne mulume, bualu bua yeye wakanyanga mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu

Shafana secrétaire wakahingana kudi mukelenge, wakalua ne dî kudi mukelenge ne, Bantu bebe bakangata argent yakadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, bakayifila mu bianza bia badi ku mutu kua bena mudimu mu nsubu wa Yehowa

Mukelenge wakambila Esetê mukelenge mukashi ne, Bena Yuda bakashiha ne bakabutula bantu balume nkama itanu ba mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa mu Shushana ne bana balume ba Hamana dikumi; bakenza tshinyi mu nseke mikuabo ya mukelenge
Hakabika muena mudimu wa muntu wa Nzambi dinda dionso, wakaluhuka, wakatangila tshisumbu tshia masalayi ne tubalu ne makalu tshiakanyunguluka musoko
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Nemmanye dî didi Yehowa kayi mutuambile munyi
Balaame kuandamuna ne: Mbafiki
Hakadi muana ne muoyo, wewe wakadila, wakajila bia kudia; kadi hakafua muana, wewe wakajuka, wakadia bia kudia
Nenuvulangane, bu muvuaye mulaye bankambua benu
Hadiundisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matshika enu muakanulayeye, ne nuenu nenuambe ne, Netudie munyinyi, bualu bua mitshima yenu idi misue kudia munyinyi; nudi mua kudia munyinyi udi mitshima yenu misue
Baledi ba Rebeka kuanyisha bua Rebeka ne ndeji wende, uvua mumukoleshe, baye ne muena mudimu wa Abrahame, kabidi ne bonsu bavuaye muende nabu
Eyi ke ndelanganyi ya Ismayele, muana wa Abrahame, uvuaye mulele ne Agare, muena Ejipitu, uvua ukuatshila Sara mudimu
Kuvualaye tshiakabidi bilamba biende bia lufuila abi

Bantu Badi Basomba ku Matshika a Yelushalema Bena Yuda bakuabo bakashikama mu Kîyata âba ne mu misoko yau ne madimi au, ne mu Dibona ne mu misoko yau, ne mu Yekabesele ne mu misoko yau, ne mu Yeshua ne mu Molada ne mu Bete pelete, ne mu Hasâ shuala, ne mu Bê sheba ne mu misoko yau, ne mu Sikelaga, ne mu Mekona ne mu misoko yau, ne mu Enelimona ne mu Solea ne mu Yâmuta ne mu Zanoa ne mu Adulama ne mu misoko yai, ne mu Lakisha ne mu madimi au, ne mu Azeka ne mu misoko yau
Nuenu nenuhidie balume bakuabo, anyi
Kumunyengabu ditunga diende dijima, bituadije ku musulu wa Amone kuinshi, too ne ku musulu wa Yaboke ku mutu, too ne ku mikalu mikolesha ya bena Amone, luseke ludi diba dipatukila
Dutelonone Lufu lua Mose Mose wakaya ku mpata ya Moaba ku mukuna wa Nebo, ku mutu kua Pisega, kuakadi kutangilangana ne Yeleko
Bavua bumvue bualu ebu ne mu nzubu wa mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Ungashile bioshelu muanda mutekete, undongoluele balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete ne bimpanga muanda mutekete
Kabeena mwa kupiisha muntu nansha umwe,nansha mu mushindu kaayi, ne bwaalu mmupeta lungenyi lwa nanku to
Uvuluke ne wewe wakadi muhika mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakubikula: ka nunku ndi nkuelela mukenji eu lelu
Umuleje kudi mutuangaji Elazare, ne kudi bena Izrayele bonsu, bua bajadike ne: yeye ke udi upingana pa muaba webe
Bakabala Bena Benyamina ku dituku adi ba ku misoko yabo bu bantu binunu makumi abidi ne bisambombo bakadi ne miele ya nvita, ku mutu kua Bena Gibea nkama muanda mutekete bakasungulabo
Hashishe yeye wakabambila ne, Yai, numubikile
Hawamulekela, kumutumi ne bianza bituhu; umuhe bintu bia bungi munkatshi mua mikoko yebe, ne bia bintu biwakuhuola ne bia nvinyo; bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, mukusankishe, wewe neumuhe
Kadi bualu ebu budi anu bualu bukese ku mesu kua Yehowa; yeye neafile Bena Moaba mu bianza bienu kabidi
Kanuenji nzambi mikuabo bua kuikala hehi n anyi nzambi ya tshiamu tshia argent anyi nzambi ya tshiamu tshia or, kanuyenji
Kadi paudi ubenga bua kumulekela, ndi nshipa muanebe wa balume muanabute
Nungenzele meme Maweja Nangila tshibilu
Mutentekedi wakamba ne, Messager wetu wakafika kudibo, kadi kena uhingana
Aba mbana balume ba Gêshona bakabalabo ku meku abo, buonso buabo bakenza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona bu muakamba Yehowa
Nanku Maweja Nangila kena unupa ditunga edi bua buakane buenu to
Tshibangidilu Badi benza madilu a Yakobe Yozefe kupukila tshitalu tshia tatuende, kudila, binsonji bimatshila tatuende mu mpala
Lelu eu bidimu bianyi bidi makumi muanda mukulu; ndi mumanye mua kujingulula ne bidi bimpe ne bidi bibi, anyi

Yeye wakasa bibumba mu tshihela kabidi, wakimba mena a mai, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne bimuna bia bungi; Wakenza nunku mu bibanda ne mu mpata kabidi; yeye wakadi ne bidime ne balami ba mionshi ya tumuma tukese mu mikuna ne mu maloba mimpe; bualu bua yeye wakananga mudimu wa budimi, Uziya wakadi ne bena nvita ba bungi, bakaya bua kuluangana mu bisumbu biabo bu muakabatahulula Yeiele mufundi ne Mâseya kahita, bakadi mu bianza bia Hananya, kapitene kakuabo ka mukelenge
Yeye wakadimusha Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima; bualu bua wewe neulue ne Bena Isalele mu buloba bunakabalaya; meme nengikale n ebe
Muntu ne mundi wakela mulangala wandi hanshi, wakakudimuka nyoka, kadi mulangala wa Alona wakatuma milangala yabo
Bienzeke nanku
Bakambila Davidi ne, Bena Yabesha gilada bakajika Shaula
Wakatuma kapitene kakuabo ne bantu bandi makumi atanu
Bena Lewi bakimana ne bintu bia misambu bia Davidi, ne bakuidi bakadi ne mpungi
Yuda kuandamuna ne: Mukalenga wetu, tshitudi mua kuamba ntshinyi bua kukujadikila mutudi babinge
Kuena ne bua kubuelela mamuebe mu nzubu to, kufuisha tatuebe bundu

Nzambi wakamba ne, Tuenze muntu ne tshifuanyikishi tshietu mufuanangane n etu, balue bakokeshi ba minyinyi ya mu mai manene ne ba nyunyu ya mulu, ne ba bimuna, ne ba buloba buonso, ne ba tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi

Bikala muntu muenze bualu bubi bua lufu, ne badi bamushiha, nebamuowe ku mutshi; kabashiyi tshitalu tshiandi ku mutshi butuku bujima, bamujike anu dituku adi mene; muntu yonso muowa ku mutshi udi muedibue mulau kudi Nzambi; kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Bavua baluisha Kedorlayomere, mukalenga wa bena Elame, Tidale, mukalenga wa bena Ngoyime, Amrafele, mukalenga wa bena Babilone, ne Ariyoke, mukalenga wa bena Elazare
Kadi kanukepeshi mudimu wabu
Dina dia Muena Isalele wakashihabo ne mukashi wa Bena Midiyana diakadi Zimeli, muana mulume wa Salu, mukelenge wa nsubu ya batatu abo ya Bena Shimeona
Kuibi
Bafika ku Dane, Abrame kuabanya bantu bende mu bisumbu
Anu madimi a batuangaji kaavua mu dina dia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu to
Hezikiya eu kakumusha bioshelu biakadi ku mutu kua mikuna, kakelela Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema mukenji ne, Nenutendelele ku mpala kua tshioshelu tshimue, nenuoshelehu musenga wa manananshi, anyi
Yeye wakabambila ne, Mika wakangenzela nunku ne nunku, wakambuesha mu mudimu, nakalua muakuidi wandi
Nunku Yoaba wakatuma Uliya kudi Davidi
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Tshiakakusengelela bua kulua kundi, anyi
Muan abo ne Tapenese wakamulelela muana mulume dina diandi Genubata; Tapenese wakamujidike mabele mu nsubu wa Palô; Genubata wakadi mu nsubu wa Palô munkatshi mua bana bandi ba balume
Bakasa musoko, bakasanka mamu
Nunku hambila ba ha mutu habo bantu mei au, nebasungile tuhita tua kutoka ku mutu kua bantu

Muhika wandi wakangata nyama ya tumelo dikumi mu tshisumbu tshia tumelo bia mukelenge wandi, wakaya ne biuma bia mukelenge wandi bia mishindu yonso mu tshianza tshiandi, wakabika, wakaya ku buloba bua Mesopotamia, ku musoko wa Naho
Musambu wa Mose Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bonso mei a musambu eu mu matshu abo, tô ne hakashikisheye
Hanuahuola bintu binuakakuna mu buloba, kanuhuodi ku matengu a madimi, kanusangishi bintu bionso binudi nuhuola
Bantu bakangata bidia bia mampa diambedi luevene kaluyi luanze kubuelamu, ne binu bidibo benza n abi mampa bakabikuta mu bilulu biabo, bakabiteka ha maha abo
Kadi nudi mua kulomba bintu bia kasombela, anu kudi muenyi udi munkatshi muenu
Bakamukudimuna ne, Tudi bamumanye
Wewe wakumpa ngabu wa luhandu luebe; lutulu luebe luakunvuisha munene
Nuenu nuakalua ha buihi, nuakimana kuinshi kua mukuna; mukuna wakatema kahia tô ne mu diulu, ne midima mikole ne matutu
Nakanyunguluka, nakahueka ku mukuna, nakateka mabue mu mushete unakenza, adimu bu muakangambila Yehowa, Bena Isalele bakumuka ku Belota Bene yâkana, bakaya ku Mosela
Nudimuke, kanulekedi Muena Lewi tô matuku onso anudi nushala mu buloba buenu
Tuvua baye bonsu kunowa bia mu madimi
Nunku bantu bonso badi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, Wihata ku mpala kuetu, netubakokeshe mene
Nengele bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba lupemba mu dina diende
Kadi biwamba bualu ebu, hashishe tuetu netubinge bua mutshihu uwakututshihisha n au
Bintu bionsu bivua ku tshitekelu tshia muendu, bivua bienza ne kilo makumi asatu ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi menemene
Ku Tabela ne Masa ne Kibelota hatawa nuakafuisha Yehowa tshiji
Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi wa nzambi mikuabo, udi Mukelenge wa bakelenge, Nzambi munene ne mukole, udibo batshina, yeye katu watangila bantu ne kansungusungu, kena witabusha matutu
Mukelenge wakambila umue wa ba tuhita tuandi ne, Umuhingishile bintu bionso biakadiye n abi diambedi ne bintu bionso biakadiunda mu madimi andi katshia umukamu tô ne katataka
Bana ba Hasena bakasa luseke lua ku tshibi tshia minyinyi ya mu mai; bakajadika makunshi, bakateka bibi bialu ne milonda yabi ne biamu biabi

Obadaya wakatamba kutshina Yehowa bikole, bualu bua hakakeba Izebele kushiha baprofete ba Yehowa, Obadaya wakangata lukama lua baprofete, wakasokoka makumi atanu mu nyongolo makumi atanu mu nyongolo, wakabadisha bidia, wakabanuisha mai

Yeye wakamba ne, Nakanûmusha mu Ejipitu, nakalua n enu ku buloba bunakalaya bankambua benu; nakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha tshihungidi tshinakahunga n enu tshiendelele; nuenu kanuhungi tshihungidi ne bena buloba ebu; nutonkole bioshelu biabo
Bena Amaleke ne bena Kenaane badi kunuyaya aku

Yeye wakamba ne, Nakamona Bena Isalele bonso batangadishibue ha mutu ha mikuna bu mikoko idi kayiyi ne mulami; Yehowa wakamba ne, Bobo kabena ne mukokeshi, nunku bahingane muntu ne muntu ku nsubu wandi ne ditalala
Nanku, muntu yonsu nansha tshintu tshionsu tshidi tshilenga bintu abi, netshipete dinyoka
Bakangata ngombe wakabahabo, bakamulongolola, bakabikila dina dia Bâla ku dinda tô ne ku munda munya, bamba ne, O, Bâla, utunvuile
Yeye wakasa musoko, wakanyunguluka tô ne ku Milo; ne Yoaba wakalongolola tshituha tshikuabo tshia musoko tshiakashala
Bawoshe mu kapia
Bena Izrayele nebitabe malu audi ubambila
Mei onso akaluhuka mukana muena nuenze bu munuakuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, binuakumulaya mukana muenu
Neatendelele mpingu ya mvidie ya mabue, ne ya mitshi misonga, inudi kanuyi banji kumanya ku bankambua benu too ne mpindiewu
Dutelonone Bikala bantu babidi batandangane, ne haluabo bua kulumbuluishibua, balumbuluishi nebalumbulule tshilumbu tshiabo; ku nyima nebabingishe muntu muimpe ne nebahishe muntu mubi
Bualu munyinyi wa mulambu wa nanku udi wa tshijila menemene
Yehoshafata wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika diatshimue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi; Yeholama muan andi wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Tshiena muhunge n enu nuenu nkayenu tshihungidi etshi ne kuditshiha eku, kadi ne muntu yonso udi muimane ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, lelu, ne muntu yonso udi kayi muimane n etu lelu
Hashishe Abashaloma wakabikila Yoaba bua kumutumeye kudi mukelenge; kadi yeye wakahidia kulua kudiye; yeye wakamubikila tshiakabidi, kadi yeye wakahidia kulua
Wakumukaku, wakaya kuluisha Bena Debî
Mpindiewu, ndi nnuambila nuenu mikenji eyi
Kadi muntu kafiki mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu wenu kayi ne tshintu tshia kumulambula to
Bena Isalele bakatangila bualu bukole buakenzela Yehowa Bena Ejipitu, ne bantu bonso bakatshina Yehowa, bakeyemena Yehowa ne muntu wandi Mose
Kakuena udi mua kubala bungi bua bena Izrayele, kakuena udi mua kubadika ndelanganyi ya Yakobe

Kulondi ku nyima kua tshisumbu tshia bantu tshinene bua kuenza malu mabi, kuikadi bu mu manyi wa bualu munkatshi mua bantu badi basangisha dî diabo bua kudibingisha mu tshilumbu tshidi ka tshiyi tshilelela
Padi Arone mumane kuenza bionsu bidi bikengela bua kudikobolola ne kukobolola bena diku diende pamue ne bena Izrayele bonsu, neapatuke mu ntenta, asemena ku tshilambuilu tshidi kumpala kua ntenta
Kanuena mua kubakengesha to
Yeye neafile bakelenge babo mu bianza bienu, nuenu nenjimishe mena abo hanshi ha buloba; kakuena muntu umue udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuenu tô ne hanuabashiha bonso
Shaula wakamba ne, Nuambile Davidi ne, Mukelenge kena ukeba biuma bia dibaka anu tukoba tua Bena Peleshete lukama: bua kusombuela bena lukuna ba mukelenge
Genese Dibutuka dia Sodoma ne Âmola Banjelo aba babidi bakafikaku Sodoma dilolo Lota wakadi ushikama ku tshibi tshia ku Sodoma
Yeye wakalala n andi butuku abu
Bia Kudia Bimpe ne Bidi Kabiyi Bimpe Lew
Wewe neushimike tshitendelelu bu mudi tshileshilu tshinakukulesha mu mukuna
Kanungu ka Dîyi didi dipeta bwenzeji matuku makumi asatu panyima pa dipatuka diaadi mu tshibejibeji tshia mbulamatadi, amba amu dioodio dilongolola mushindi mukwabo
Nunku tuakahita bana betu, bana ba Esau, bakadi bashikama mu Sei, mu nshila wa ku Alabâ ku Elata to ne ku Esione gebê
Nanku mudimu wa bena Kekate mu ntenta wa kusambakena ngwa kuambula bintu bia tshijila
Munkatshi mua lupangu muvua mutshi wa muoyi ne mutshi wa kujingulula malu mimpe ne mabi
Yuda uvua mumushe Tamare, bua muanende wa balume Shela kavu kufua muvua bakulu bende bafue
Noa wakadi ne bidimu nkama isambombo hakaloka nvula ha buloba
Bumuka mu Obote, kuyabu ku Ye Abarime, ku mikalu ya bena Mowabe
Rakele kuinyika muana awu dina ne: Naftali
Kanusedianganyi nabu
Hakalueye kudiye, yeye wakamuenzesha bua kulombeye tatu wandi budimi; mukashi wakatuluka ha nyima ha mpunda wandi: Kaleba wakamukonka ne, Udi musue tshinyi
Newikale muendakanyi pa buloba, kuyi ne muaba wa kusomba
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Tshiena mua kunutuala nkayanyi: Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakunukumbasha ba bungi, ne monai, lelu nudi bu bungi bua mitoto ya mulu
Wakajadika tshiowelu ku tshianza tshia balume tshia ntempelo ku luseke lua ku sude esete
Pashishe, ku mabaya onsu ne mitshi, ulamikaku tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Dituku dia muanda mutekete, nusukule bilamba bua kumusha mikiya yenu
Wewe ne Arone, nuvua bangenzele bibi bitambe, bena Izrayele bonsu bamone, mu Kadeshe mu tshipela tshia Tsine, bua tshilumbu tshia mayi a ku Meriba
Bavua bashala mu lukanu mataku makumbane
Nuakulekela Dibue diakanufuka, nuakuhua Nzambi wakanulelesha muoyo

Biabuikila bena buloba mesu abo kudi muntu au hafileye bana bandi kudi Moleke, kabayi bamushihe, meme nengumushe mesu anyi kudi muntu au ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu muandi, nemmumushe ne bantu bandi bonso badi benza handi malu a masandi ne Moleke, munkatshi mua bana babo
Yeye wakela di diandi nunku kudi muntu muibidi ne muisatu ne kudi bonso bakadi balonda ne bisumbu bia bintu ne, Nuambile Esau nunku hanuasangakena n andi

Hakashikisha Boaza kudia ne kunua, ne mutshima wandi wakadi usanka, yeye wakabuela nu nsubu, wakaya kulala kundekelu kua bisumbu bia orge, wakabuelamu bitekete bitekete, wakumusha bilulu ku makasa andi, wakalala
Bana ba Lama ne Geba, nkama isambombo ne makumi abidi ne umue
Yeye wakasangakena n andi mu muaba wa hatuhu, mu tshihela muakadi luhehele nkayalu; yeye wakamunyunguluka, wakamulama bimpe, wakamuenzela bu kamonyi ka disu diandi
Bakenza nunku ku dituku ku dituku, bakasangisha argent ya bungi
Dibadika dia bantu edi, divua dienzeka bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Misangu yonso hakafikeye ku musoko, wakayaku bua kudia
Hakatshiabu nyuma mubi mulume kudi Nzambi wakatulukila Shaula bikole, yeye wakalubakana mu nsubu muandi; Davidi watamba tshisanji ne tshianza tshiandi bu muakadiye wenza ku dituku ku dituku
Nakamulomba muana eu, ne Yehowa wakamana kumpa kulomba kuanyi kunakumulomba: nunku nakumuhingisha kudi Yehowa; nakumufila kudi Yehowa matuku onso adiye ne muoyo
Angata dikombu diuvua mupandulule nadi musulu wa Nile adi

Bintu bituakadia bia dituku dimue biakadi ngombe umue ne mikoko ya manyi isambombo; bakandambila nsolo; tuakanua nvinyo yonso musangu umue bu wa matuku dikumi; kadi mu malu â onso tshiakalomba bia kudia bia gouverneur bualu bua mudimu wakadi bujitu kudi bantu aba
Nzambi webe, kadi wakuhingana, wakudia, wakunua mu muaba wakakuambileye ne, Kudi bitua, kunu mai, nunku kabena bajika mubidi webe mu lukita lua bankambua bebe
Tshibangidilu Izake udi wela Yakobe lupemba Izake mumane kukola mukalakaje, mesu ende kaavua amona kabidi bimpe to
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bobo bakamba dî dimpe
Yeye wakamuambila ne
Nunku Mose wakafunda musambu eu dituku adi, wakauyisha Bena Isalele
Lewitiki Kulama kua Muinda Ek
Mu mushiku wa mbelu wa lupangu, muikale tshilamba tshia bule bua metre dikumi, tshitela ne buanda bua ndanda ne bua miosa ya nyama bufikuluke, bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzuu
Kanukengeshi mukuenu, kanuibi bintu biandi, kanushadi ne difutu dia muena mudimu butuku tô ne dinda
Yeye wakalonda ku nyima kua muntu wa Nzambi, wakamusangana mushikame muinshi mua mutshi wa telebinta
Bakamba ne, Udi ku Dotana
Bualu bua hakayabo mu tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bakatangila buloba, bakahangisha mitshima ya Bena Isalele, bua bobo kabayi mu buloba buakabahabo kudi Yehowa

Tuakanyenga misoko yandi yonso tshikondo atshi, tuakahaula musoko ne musoko muakadi bantu, ne bakashi ne bana bakese: katuakashiya nansha muntu; kadi tuakadiangatshila bimuna, ne bintu biakadi mu misoko ituakanyenga
Bualu bua meme ndi mumanye kutomboka kuenu ne tshitshu tshienu: monai, hantshidi ne muoyo munkatshi muenu lelu, nuakumana kutombokela Yehowa; nenutambe kutomboka ku nyima kua lufu luanyi
Nuenu bena Levi ke badi bakolesha malu
Nanku nenushale ne muoyi bidimu bia bungi mu ditunga di vuaye mulaye bankambua benu, Abrahame, Izake ne Yakobe
kashintu, dienza dia kashintu ne bukola bwaaku bwa kujikija mabanza;

Hashishe bantu bakadi bakuatshila mukelenge mudimu bakamuambila ne, Bakebele mukelenge bansongakashi balengele batshidi tumama; mukelenge asunguile tuhita tuandi mu nseke yonso ya bukelenge buandi bua bobo basangishe bansongakashi bonso balengele batshidi tumama mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa mu Shushana; babafile mu bianza bia Hegai, muntu mutungula wa mukelenge, mulami wa bakashi ba mukelenge, bashikame mu luhangu lua bakashi, babahe bintu bia kubalengesha n abi
Bana ba Halima, tshinunu tshimue ne dikumi ne muanda mutekete
Vulukai, kanuhu muoyo bu munuakafuisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiji mu tshihela; ku dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu tô ne hanuakafika ku muaba eu, nuakahidia Yehowa
Kanusongi mpingu, kanuzodi bimfuanyi, bia tshintu nansha tshimue
Biangatshile ku dituku dibidi too ne dia muanda mutekete, nundambule dituku dionsu bimuna bidi kabiyi ne bulema pambidi, pamue ne milambu mikuabu
Nenudie munyinyi nunku ne bilulu bienu biela mikaya, ne bisabata ku makasa ne mulangala ku bianza bienu nenudie munyinyi lubilu, bualu ebu budi kuhita kua Yehowa
Kutangidi panyima, kuimanyi pa muaba
Reyuma mukaji mukuabu wa Nahore, uvua mulele bana ba balume aba banayi: Teba, Ngahame, Tahashe ne Maaka

Samuele Buhidia bua Shaula, Nzambi Udi Umubenga Samuele wakambila Shaula ne, Yehowa wakantuma kûdi bua kukuela manyi ha mutu bua wewe kuikala mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu bandi Bena Isalele; nunku unvue biebe mei a Yehowa
Bidimu muanda mutekete bidi kumpala eku, mu Ejipitu monsu nemuikale biakudia bia bungi
Yakobe muine udi utulonda panyima apa
Mikata wakangata luhingu, wakajadika mu bulalu, wakateka musamu wa miosa ya mbushi ku mutu kualu, wakalubuikila bilulu
Ndekela, mbanyoke
Ba mu bisamba bionso bakalua bua kunvua meji a Solomo; ba mu banfumu ba buloba, hakunvuabo lumu lua meji andi, bakulua

Mbua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne kuenda mu nshila yandi yonso, ne bua kumusua, ne bua kuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mudimu ne mitshima yenu yonso ne bukole buenu buonso, ne bua kutumikila mikenji ya Yehowa ne mei andi anakunuambila lelu bua nuenu kukuma dikasa dimpe
Kumuambilabu ne: Mbuji wa mpumbu awu, mbamane kumuosha pa tshilambuilu kudi Elazare ne Itamare, bana ba Arone bavua bashale ne muoyi
Kadi Yeshuluna wakavunda, wakatua mikumu: nuenu nuakuvunda, nudi ne mafuta a bungi, nuakusenena; hashishe yeye wakalekela Nzambi wakamufuka, wakahetula Dibue dia luhandu luandi
Semena biebe ha buihi, unvua mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, musue kubambila: utuambile bietu mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, mukuambile; tuetu netulue dî diandi, netudienze

Kanungu ka Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshibambalu tshia batshipwita mukulumpa badi babilombola ku tshimwe ku tshimwe kudi Bilo bia bantu mwanda mutekete bikalamu kudi: a mulombodi; b mulombodi tshindonda wa kumpala; c mulombodi tshindonda mwibîdi; d mulubudi; e mulubudi tshindonda; f mutangidi wa maalu a lupetu ne bulongolodi bwa munda; g mutangidi wa maalu a lupetu ne bulongolodi bwa munda tshindonda
Mabue awu avua mafuanangane ne mubidi wa tshibuashibuashi
Kubuelakanyi ne bantu babi bualu bua kuikala bu mumanyi wa malu adi kayi malelela
Mukashi mene wakamba ne, Yeye udi muan etu mulume Nakuenza bualu ebu mu buakane bua mu mutshima ne kutoka kua bianza bianyi
Hakayabo n abo ha bule umue wabo wakamba ne Nyema lubilu, bua kuhandisha muoyo webe kutangidi ku nyima kuebe, kushadi ha mpata nyema ku mikuna kufu biebe
Abashaloma wakakudimuna Yoaba dî ne, Mona, nakakubikila ne, Lua kunoko, bua kukutuma kudi mukelenge bua kumuebesha ne, Wakumbikidila ku Geshû bua tshinyi
Benze mesa ne mitshi ya kuelaku, kabidi ne bintu bionsu bidi pa mesa too ne mampa a kulambula Mvidi Mukulu
Ndi njikija matandu abu

Bantu bakumuka mu buhika bakenza nunku; bakasungula Ezela muakuidi ne bakuabo bakadi ku mutu kua biota bia batatu babo ne buonso buabo ku mena abo bakadi batahuluke, bakashikama mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa dikumi bua kulongolola bualu ebu
Ndi nnusengelela ne, Nubingambile
Kulamakajabu bilamba abi, eku bitanu eku bisambombu
Kuvudi mukashi wa muan enu mulume bilulu, yeye udi mukashi wa mua n enu mulume
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia ibidi, wakalamina or ku nseke yai yonso
Kena munusungule, bua nuikale bantu bende anyi
Bimuma ebi bionsu, kabikadi ne bulema to

Buonso buenu nudi nuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, lelu; ne ba ku mutu kuenu, bisamba bienu, bakulu benu, tuhita tuenu, ne balume bonso ba mu Isalele, ne bana benu bakese ne bakashi benu, ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, ne batatu ba nkunyi ne basunyi ba mai; bua nuenu nubuele mu tshihungidi tshidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muhunge n enu ne mu kuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muditshihe n enu lelu, bua yeye anuitabushe lelu bu bantu bandi, ne bua yeye kuikala Nzambi wenu, bu muakanuambileye, ne bu muakalayeye bankambua benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba
Wewe newenze tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi ne mutshi wa acacia
Meme kunuambula mudi nyunyi wa tshiminyi wambula bana bende pa mapuapua, kunufikisha kundi meme
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Nunku nuenze bualu, ebu bu tshilele tshienu mu ngondo watshi ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Moshe kuambula mifuba ya Yozefe
Nudimuke mu malu onso anakanuambila, kanuambilanganyi dina dia nzambi mikuabo, bantu bakuabo kabunvu dina adi mukana muebe
Mukelenge wa Edome wakalua ne bantu ba bungi, ne tshianza tshikole

Kadi bikala muntu udi unvua mei a mulau eu udiamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Meme nengikale ne ditalala nansha binalonda tshitshu tshia mu mutshima wanyi, bua kutenteka dikuatshika ha mutu ha nyota, Yehowa kena umubuikidila bubi buandi, kadi tshiji tshia Yehowa ne mukau wandi nebimueneke kudi muntu eu ne milau yonso idi mifunda mu mukanda eu neyimukuate, ne Yehowa nenjimishe dina diandi muinshi mua diulu
Ba Bena Hebelone: Hashabeya ne bana babo, bena bukitu tshinunu ne nkama muanda mutekete, bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele dishiya dia Yadene ku wesete mu malu onso a Yehowa ne a mudimu wa mukelenge
Kadi muntu nansha umue kena mua kubulula mukana mu ditunga emu, kayi ne dianyisha diebe

Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, uvua mutuambuluishe bua kukuata bimenga bionsu bivua pankatshi pa tshimenga tshia Aroyere, tshidi pabuipi ne musulu wa Amone, ne tshimenga tshikuabu tshidi mu tshibandabanda tshine atshi, too ne ku ditunga dia Ngilaade
Bantu ba mu Netofa, makumi atanu ne basambombo

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu edi, mishindu ya Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ya kumanyisha ne ya kulondolola Bukalenga bunene, kumpanyi ya Mbulamatadi, nzubu ne midimu ya Mbulamatadi idi: a lukonko lwa mukana anyi lwa pa dibeji kwikala anyi kakuyi dikokangana, kabayi balulondeshisha kudi dieela dia tukanda; b lukonko lwa pa mianda ya lelu; c dieebeja dia diumvwija; d dituma dia bantu bwa kutangilula; e diteelejibwa kudi tusumbu tukese
Bakanyika mikoko ya kuhita kua Yehowa ha kahia bu muakadi mukenji; bakalamba milambu ya tshijila mu ngesu, mu bivuadi ne mu mpanza, bakaya n ai kudi bantu bonso lukasa
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Nembafile
Nenuditatshishe bua kudima, kadi biakudia kabiakutoloka, mitshi kayakukuama bimuma

Meme ndi mbikila diulu ne buloba bu bamonyi ba bualu ne, Nakuteka muoyo ne lufu, ne disanka ne mulau ku mpala kuenu lelu: muiku nudisunguile muoyo, nenuikale ne muoyo ne nuenu ne bana benu, bua kunanga Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kutumikila dî diandi, ne bua kumulamata; bualu bua yeye udi muoyo wenu ne muvudishi wa matuku enu; nunku nenushikame mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kubahabu
Nanku nulambe biakudia munudi basue
Ba ha mutu habo nebambile bantu ne, Nganyi wakuasa nsubu muhia muhia, ne kena muanze kunjidila
Hashishe Amasaya wakatahulula bantu bakalua kudiye ku Efelayima bua kubahingisha kuabo; nunku tshiji tshiabo tshiakadia kudi Bena Yuda; bakahingana kuabo bûla ngane ne tshiji tshikole
Mu tshilota atshi Mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu kumbikila ne: Yakobe
Bena Izrayele bavua benzeja bantu mudimu kuyabu kudidila mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bamba ne: Mukalenga, tuetu tudi bena mudimu bebe
Undambile mushindu undi munange
Bidi mutuangaji wangata Padi muntu ufila nyama wa mulambu wa kuosha, tshiseba tshia nyama awu, tshishale amu tshia mutuangaji uvua mulambule mulambu awu
Badi ne mwa kunyangakaja mapa aa anu mu bitupa bilongolola kudi mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga
Dituku dia dikumi ne ditanu dia ngondu awu, nuikale nungenzela tshibilu tshia Mampa kaayi mela buanga
Kumuelabu mu tshiina tshivua katshiyi ne mayi
Kadi mu tshidimu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene, budimi nebabuangate anu kudi mfumuabu wa kumpala uvua mubupiane awu
Bualu kai nebajimishe dina dia tatu wetu munkatshi mua diku diandi bualu bua yeye kakadi ne muana wa balume

Nakasungula balami ba mutu ha bibutshilu: Shelemeya muakuidi ne Sadoka mufundi ne Pedaya, umue wa Bena Lewi, ne Hanana, muana wa Zakû, muana wa Matanaya, wakadi n abo kabidi, bualu bua bobo bakadi babadibue ne mbadi beyemenyibue; bakadi ne mudimu wa kuabanyina bana babo bintu

Aba mbashihianganyi badi mua kunyemenamu bua kuikala ne muoyo: muntu yonso udi ushiha mukuabo ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi; bu muntu wakuya ne mukuabo muitu bua kutaha nkunyi, ne hakuambeye kutaha mutshi ne kasui, ne kasui kakukuka, kakutaha muntu mukuabo, kakumushiha; muntu eu neanyemene ku umue wa misoko ei, neikale ne muoyo
Yehowa wakadi ne disanka bualu bua batatu benu, yeye wakahasua, yeye wakasungula bana babo bakabalonda ku nyima, wakanusungula nuenu mene mene munkatshi mua bantu bonso, bu mutshidi bualu lelu
Sala udi ne bidimu makumi tshitema nealele, anyi
Shaula wakamba ne, Muangalalai munkatshi mua bantu, nubambile ne, Muntu yonso alue kundi ne ngombe wandi ne mukoko wandi, netushihe, netuyidie kunoko: katuenzedi Yehowa bibi bua kudia mashi

Mose wakambila Palô ne, Wikale ne butumbi ebu kundi, ndituku kai diudi musue meme nkulombele bua kumusha biula kûdi ne kudi bantu bebe ne kudi bahika bebe ne mu nsubu yenu, bishale anu mu musulu nkayau
Bena Izrayele basabuke ku makasa kuma
Ku tshimuna tshionsu, nusakidile bukula busambakaja ne mafuta

a Sedekiya wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne tshimue hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu dikumi ne tshimue; wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa Nzambi wandi; kakadihuekesha ku mesu kua Yelemiya muprofete hakamuambileye mei a kudi Yehowa
Bana babo bakahingasheye mu muaba wabo Yoshua wakabatengula; bualu bua kabakadi batengudibue mu nshila
Yeye wakaya ku mishimi ya mai, wakelamu luehu wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakalengesha mai a; lulu ne kuhoka kua mamuma kabiena bifumaku kabidi
Nudimuke, kanulengi bintu ebi, bualu nudi mua kupia mikiya
Yeye udi uvuisha makasa anyi bu makasa a ngulungu; udi unshikika ha miaba yanyi mibanda
Mose wakadimusha bantu dituku adi mene ne, Bantu aba nebimane ha mutu ha Gelizima bua kuvudishila bantu disanka hanuasabuka Yadene: Shimeona ne Lewi ne Yuda ne Yisakâ ne Yosefe ne Benyamina
Moshe kumanyisha bena Izrayele bionsu abi
Balumbuluishi Muanjelo wa Yehowa ku Bokima Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakafuma ku Gilegala, wakaya ku Bokima
Buloha buakadi talalâ bidimu makumi anai
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hueka mu tshibanda, bualu bua bantu bebe bawakaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bakudiona
Mose wakaha tshisamba tshia Lubena buhianyi bu bungi bua meku abo
Nuikale anu ne bipimu bia bujitu biakane, ne bia bule bikumbane, bua nushale ne muoyi matuku mavule mu ditunga diavua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu kunupa
Udi mumane kutupikula
Mukelenge wakantuma ne tupitene tua masalayi ne badi benda ha tubalu
Bobo kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo; Yehowa udi buhianyi buabo, bu muakabambileye
Nunku Davidi wakasangisha bintu bia bungi diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua
Padi mukuabu ukosa mutshi, tshisuyi tshidi mua kukuka, kushipa uvuabu nende
Hakambilabo Shaula bualu ebu, yeye wakatuma ba messager bakuabo, bobo bakamba dî dia Nzambi kabidi
Kumonaye kabidi ngombe mikuabu muanda mutekete minyane ipatuka mu musulu awu, imana muaba uvua ngombe ya mubidi muimpe
Bena Isalele bonso bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose ne Alona
Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, wakadi ne lungenyi munda muandi tente bualu bua Mose wakamutentekasha bianza biandi; ne Bena Isalele bakunvua di diandi, bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Munyi munuakunkonka ne, Bualu kai budi bukutonda

Muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu udi utambisha muan andi mulume anyi muan andi mukashi mu kahia, nansha mutempi wa mbuku, nansha muena dijimbu nansha muena bilengulengu, nansha muena buloshi, nansha musesuishi wa bantu ne miloû yandi, nansha mutendeledi wa bakishi, nansha muena muhongo, nansha muena lubuku lua muzangu
Bantu bonso bakamba ne, Amen; bakatumbisha Yehowa
Nanku munkatshi muenu kamuakuikala bapele to, panuikala bitabe meyi ende, bakumbaje mikenji yende yonsu indi nnuambila lelu eyi
Hashikisha Yehowa kubihata, kanuambi mu mitshima yenu ne, Mbualu bua buakane buetu, Yehowa wakaluamu n etu bua kuhiana buloba ebu: bualu bua Yehowa udi ubihata ku mpala kuenu bualu bua bubi buabo
Dutelonone Muaba Umuehele wa Kutendelela Yehowa Â mmalu ne mei anudi ne bualu bua kutumikila mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, munuhe bua kubuhiana matuku onso a muoyo wenu ha buloba
Mikenji eyi idi yambuluisha bua kujadika ne bintu ebi mbipie mikiya, nansha kabiena biyipia
Dutelonone Bidimu Biakashalabo mu Tshihela Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze, bu muakangambila Yehowa; tuakanyunguluka mukuna wa Sei matuku a bungi
Neyidie bintu bionsu bivua bishale pa madimi, bivua mabue a mvula kaayi nenyange, too ne mitshi yonsu idi imena mu madimi enu
Nutumbile mu dina diandi dia tshijila; mitshima ya badi bakeba Yehowa isanke

Bualu bua buloba bunuyaya kuhiana kabuena bu buloba bua Ejipitu munuakumuka, bunuakakuna ntete yenu, nuakayimiamina mai nuendakana ku makasa, bu tshibanda tshia midioko; kadi buloba bunuyaya kuhiana mbuloba bua mikuna ne bibanda, buloba ebu budi bumina mai a nvula ya mu diulu, buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ulama; mesu a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, atu atangila ha buloba abu ku tshibangidilu tshia tshidimu tô ne kunshikidilu kuatshi
BIDI BITANGILA MAPA A MUNTU YÖNSO, MADIKADIDI A NSHINDAMEENU NE MAKANYIKA A MWEENA MWAABO NE A MBULAMATADI
Bu munuvua kanuyi baya ne mashi a nyama ewu munda mua ntenta wa kusambakena, nuvua mua kudila munyinyi ewu muaba wa tshijila, bu mumvua munuambile

Muntu ne mundi wakela beka umue udi tshituha tshia nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi, muntu ne muntu wakadibo babala, waka mana kuhita bidimu makumi abidi, bakadi balume binunu nkama isambombo, binunu bisatu, nkama itanu ne makumi atanu
Yozefe kubambila ne: Semenayi pabuipi nanyi
Mei au akasankisha Yehowa, bualu bua Solomo wakalomba anu bualu ebu
diambulwisha dia bashikumbata ne balema ba ku mvita;
Rakele ne Leya kuambila Yakobe ne: Tuetu katuena kabidi batekemene bintu bia bumpianyi mu nzubu mua tatu to

Hakafika Davidi ku Sikelaga, yeye wakatuma tshituha tshia bintu biakanyengeye kudi bakulu ba mu Yuda ne kudi balunda bandi; wakabambila ne, Monai diha dienu dia mu biakanyengabo kudi bena lukuna ba Yehowa
Sefora kulela muana wa balume
Ubiteke mu tshisaka tshimue, ulue n abi mu tshisaka ne muana wa ngombe ne bimpanga bibidi
Muenyi kena mua kunupesha tshimuna tshia mupaku, bua nuenu kutshindambula meme Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Ndelanganyi ya Dedane ivua nunku: Bena Ashure, bena Letushe, ne bena Leyume
Ahaba wakakonka Eliya ne, Wewe, muena lukuna wanyi, wakusangana, anyi
, Babikila mukamba wà katamuka biebè
Ebu mbualu bunudi ne bua kuenza: nushihe mulume yonso ne mukashi yonso wakamana kulala ne mulume

Yoshua wakumuka ku Makeda ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi n andi, bakalua ku Libina, bakaluisha Bena Libina; Yehowa wakabafila ne mukelenge wabo mu bianza bia Bena Isalele; wakashiha Libina ku muele wa nvita, ne bantu bonso bakadimu; kakashiyamu nansha umue; yeye wakenzela mukelenge wau bu muakenzeleye mukelenge wa Yeleko

Dibadika BENA IZRAYELE MU MPATA YA MOWABE Balake udi ubikila Balaame Bena Izrayele kuya kuasa mitanda yabu mu mpata ya Mowabe, ku muelelu wa musulu wa Yardene, luseke luawu lua kudi diba dipatukila, muaba uvua mutangilangane ne Yeriko

Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Bualu hua wewe wakuamba bualu ebu; kuakudilombela matuku a bungi, kuakudilombela bubanji, nansha mioyo ya badi n ebe lukuna; kadi wakudilombela lungenyi lua kulumbulula n alu; ka nakenza bu mudi dî diebe: nakukuha mutshima muakane wa lungenyi, nunku kakuakadi muntu bu wewe diambedi ne mukuabo kena ulonda ku nyima kuebe bu wewe
Muntu yônso udibo bafunda ne udi ne tshibawu udi anu mwânji kwikala mubingisha too ne dîba dikala dikosa dia tshilumbu dia ndekelu dileeja dipiila diende
Neubatshipe muaba awu

Nzambi wakatuma nyuma mubi hankatshi ha Abimeleke ne bena Shekeme; bena Shekeme bakayila Abimeleke ku tshitungu; bua bualu bubi buakenzeleye bana ba Yelubâla makumi muanda mutekete ne mashi abo kabidi bihingane ku mutu kua Abimeleke muan abo, nguakabashiha, ne ha mitu ha bena Shekeme bakamukolesha maboko bua yeye kubashiha
Badi Batela Malenda ku Bilulu Biabo Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele bua bobo ne tunkanunuma tuabo badienzele malenda ku bilulu biabo, ne bobo bateke muonshi wa bleu ku malenda abo
Kusabulaye ne bintu bionsu bivuaye nabi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ufunde bionsu bindi mukuambile ebi, bualu ke bidi bijadika ndondu undi mutue nebe ne bena Izrayele bonsu
Mupodianganyi wa dinu, bamupole diende
