Yeye wakanunvuisha dî diandi mu diulu bua kunumanyisha malu: wakanuisha kahia kandi kanene hanshi ha buloba; nuenu nuakunyua mei andi munkatshi mua kahia
Nunku, ya biebe, meme nengikale ne mukana muebe, meme nenkuyishe mei andi musue wewe kuamba

Hakashikishabo kuabanyangana buloba buakahanabo ku mikalu yabu, Bena Isalele bakaha Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, buhianyi munkatshi muabo: bu mu dî dia Yehowa bakamuha musoko wakalombeye, Timena tasela ku mikuna ya Efelayima; yeye wakasa musoko, wakashikamamu
Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Bualu bua wewe udi muan etu wa balume, bidi bimpe wewe unkuatshile mudimu tshianana, anyi

Yeye wakamuambila ne, Tshiena mua kuhingana n ebe bua kubuela mu nsubu webe; tshiena ndia n ebe, tshiena nnua n ebe mu muaba eu bualu bua bakungambila dî kudi Yehowa ne, Kudi bidia, kunu mai, kuhinganyi mu nshila uwakafumina
Ungambile tshiudi musue bua meme kukufuta
Bakelenge Ditomboka dia Bena Isalele Kul
Bandambule anu mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena muaba utuikala tumonangana nebe
Kuinshi kua mukaba awu, wenzeku nkanu ibidi ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi, ku luseke ne ku luseke
Noa Udi Wenza Buatu Eku nkulondolola kua malu a Noa

Yehoyada muakuidi wakahatuka ne tupitene tua bantu lukama tuakadi ku mutu kua bantu, wakatuambila ne, Muihatai hadiye wenda munkatshi mua bantu, muntu wamulonda, numushihe ne muele wa nvita; bualu bua muakuidi wakamba ne, Kanumushihi mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Kadi Shimishona wakambila tatu wandi ne, Umungangatshile, bualu bua yeye udi utamba kunsankisha bimpe
Habaka mulume mukashi muhia muhia, kayi mu bisumbu bia bena nvita, kabamutekedi bujitu bukuabo; ashale mu nsubu wandi tô tshidimu tshijima, bua kusambeye mukashi wakuangateye
Lubena ikale biandi ne muoyo, kafu nansha, bantu bandi kabikadi banya banya
Muntu mutuute mupika wende mulume nansha mukaji ne mutshi, mumushipe musangu umue, numunyoke
Kumvuanganabu nangananga bua kutendelela mvidie wa Baale, uvua ku mukuna wa Peyore
Dina diandi diakamanyibua kuonso; bualu bua Nzambi wakamukuatshisha bikole, tô ne bakalueye muena bukole bua bungi
Hamba Muprofete malu mu dina dia Yehowa ne malu au kaena menjibue, au mmalu adi Yehowa kayi mumuambile; muprofete au wakatuambila, kanumutshinyi

Mukelenge udi wamba ne, Hezikiya kanudingi, bualu bua yeye kena ne bukole bua kunusungila mu tshianza tshiandi; kanueyemenyi Yehowa bualu hua dî dia Hezikiya ne, Yehowa neatusungile, kabena bafila musoko eu mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Ashû
Uvua mumane kumuka ku tshiina tshia mayi tshia Lahayi Royi
Solomo wakitaba ku makonka andi onso; yeye kakamusokoka bualu bumue
Yonatana wakamuambila ne, Bualu ehu kabuikadiku, wewe kuena ufua; tatu wanyi katu wenza bualu bunene anyi bukese diambedi yeye kayi muanze kungambila; tatu wanyi neansokoke bualu ebu bishi
Nunku bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, wakunjadika, wakunshikika mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa tatu wanyi Davidi, wakungenzela nsubu wanyi bu muakandayeye, bulelela, Adoniya neafue biandi lelu
Ei idi nyama mudi mua kudia: ngombe ne mukoko ne mbushi, mbashi ne kabuluku ne ntole ne mbushi wa ha mpata, ne lusumbi, ne ngulungu ne mukoko wa mu mikuna

Ya dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu Dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu yonsu, nungoshile meme Maweja Nangila ngombe milume ibidi, mukoku wa tshimpanga, ne bana ba mikoku muanda mutekete, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijima
bafunda mukanda wa dilomba batumina tshimwe tshia ku Bibambalu bibidi
Bualu bavua balambule Maweja Nangila mulambu wa manananshi, avua kaayi a tshijila
Nunku Hataka wakaya kudi Môdekai mu muaba mubaluluke wakadi ku mpala kua tshibi tshia mukelenge
Kanudi mashi, nuahongolole ha buloba bu mai
Ya biebe kudi baprofete ba tatu ebe ne ba mamu ebe
Nunku Hushai, mulunda wa Davidi, wakalua mu musoko; ne Abashaloma wakabuela mu Yelushalema
Nuenu bena Izrayele, matuku malondangane asambombu kanuena mua kudia mampa mela buanga
Nenujadike ne: ki mbimpe kuntombokela meme Maweja Nangila to
Hakaluabo ku Mala kabakamanya mua kunua mai a Mala, mai akadi ne bululu, nunku balodiha muaba au ne, Mala
Bienzedi bia Zekâya bikuabo bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele

Yehowa wakashikisha dî diakambeye; bualu bua meme nakajuka mu muaba wa Davidi tatu wanyi, bua kushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge bua Isalele, muakalaya Yehowa; nakamana kuibakila dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, nsubu
Mpa buloba mpa makenga eee Kwà nganyì wètù kutwaya eee Kudi kakuyi makenga eee Bwà kudia ka kwena

Bualu bua bobo bakumpidia, bakuoshela nzambi mikuabo musenga wa manananshi, bua kunfuishabo tshiji ku bienzedi bionso bia bianza biabo; nunku tshiji tshianyi tshidi ku muaba eu, katshiena tshijima nansha
Bana balume ba Shimei: Shelomota ne Haziele ne Halana, basatu
Padi muena nzubu musue kumupikula, asakidile tshia bitanu tshimue ku mushinga uvua mutuangaji mulombe

Bena Holi bakashikama mu Sei diambedi, kadi Bena Esau bakabalonda ku nyima; bakabashiha ku mpala kuabo, bakashikama mu muaba wabo; bu muakenza Bena Isalele ku buloba bua buhianyi buabo, buakabahebua kudi Yehowa
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bana ba Ala, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mutekete ne batanu
Bitalu bienu nebikale bu bidia bia nyunyu yonso ya mu diulu ne bia nyama yonso ya ha buloba; kakuena muntu udi uyihata
Balumbuluishi Kadi dituku dikuabo, mu tshidimu tshia kuhuolabo blé, Shimishona wakaya kutangila mukashi wandi ne kana ka mbushi; yeye wakamba ne, Nembuele kudi mukashi wanyi mu nsubu

Miaba yabo yakashikamabo yakadi Betele ne misoko yakadi ha buihi, ne Nâlana ku esete, ne Gezê ku wesete ne misoko yakadi ha buihi; Shekeme ne misoko yakadi ha buihi tô ne ku Aza ne misoko yakadi ha buihi; ne ku mikalu ya Bena Manashe, Bete sheana ne misoko yakadi ha buihi, ne Tânaka ne misoko yakadi ha buihi, ne Megido ne misoko yakadi ha buihi, ne Dô ne misoko yakadi ha buihi
Bana balume ba Ladana: Yehiele wakadi kahita, ne Zetama ne Yoele, basatu
Davidi ne bantu bandi bonso bakahingana ku Yelushalema

Muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi miena mashi akaluabo n au bua ku buikila bubi mu muaba wa tshijila nebaye n ai ku butshika bua tshibi dilu, neboshe biseba biai ne munyinyi wai ne tuma tuai mu kahia
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuntangile meme, nuenze bu mungenza; ne monai, hanalua ku butshika bua tshitudilu, hashishe nenuenze bu mungenza
Sara kumvuaye buowa, kuyila wamba ne: Tshiena museke to
Kuenzaye mitshi yandunga ibidi, kuyilamikaye tshiamu tshia mpawungi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Halelabo muana kudi ngombe anyi kudi mukoko anyi kudi mbushi, yeye neikale ne mamu andi matuku muanda mutekete, ku dituku dia muanda mukulu ne matuku adi ku mpala badi mua kumufila bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia

Hashishe Shemaya muprofete wakalua kudi Lehabama ne bantu banene ba mu Yuda, bakadi badisangisha mu Yelushalema bualu bua Shishaka, wakabambila ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nuenu nuakundekela, nunku nakunushiya mu bianza bia Shishaka
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha ngombe wa mulambu ne Yehowa neawitabushe bua kubuikidila n au bubi buandi
Bavua bantu ba bukole
Nunku nakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa matuku makumi anai, bualu bua Yehowa wakamba ne, Nembashihe

Kadi nudi mua kushiha nyama ne mua kudia munyinyi ku mbelu kuenu udi mitshima yenu misue, bu mudi disanka dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, diakanusankisheye n adi; bantu badi kabayi bakane ne badi bakane badi mua kudia munyinyi wa kabuluku ne mbashi

Nunku nuenu nenutahulule nyama udi muimpe ne nyama udi kayi muimpe ne nyunyu udi muimpe ne udi kayi muimpe, kanuonyi mitshima yenu kudi nyama anyi nyunyu anyi kudi tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi binakunuhidisha bu tshintu tshidi ka tshiyi tshimpe
Bu mu dî dia Alona ne bana bandi balume Bena Gêshona nebenze mudimu wabo, nebatuale majitu abo; nuenu nenubaleshe majitu abo
Yehowa nealue n enu ne mukelenge unuakateka ku mutu kuenu kudi tshisamba tshinudi kanuyi bamanye, nansha nuenu nansha bankambua benu; nenutendeleleku nzambi mikuabo ya mitshi ne mabue
Kabeena mwa kupiisha muntu bwa bwaalu anyi bwa tshipwa mooyi tshidi tshikala tshibawu dîba divwatshio tshienzeka ne dîba dia dipiishibwa
Arone ne bakulu bonsu ba bena Izrayele, pamue ne Yetro, kudia biakudia bia tshijila abi
Yeye wakambila Abimeleke ne, Ukumbashe bena nvita bebe, uluhuke biebe
Kamuvua muena mudimu mukuabu to
Yeye wakamba ne, Shimishona, Bena Peleshete badi ham bidi hebe
Kushishaye kulala, kuikisha

Nubilame bimpe tô ne hanuidikisha bujitu buabi ku mesu kua bakuidi banene ne Bena Lewi ne bantu banene badi ku mutu kua nsubu ya bankambua babo mu Isalele ku Yelushalema mu nsubu ya munda mua nsubu wa Yehowa

Bikala muntu ne muana mulume udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, katu watumikila dî dia tatu wandi anyi dia mamu wandi, ne yeye katu wabahvuila biamukengeshaho, hashishe tatu wandi ne mamu wandi nebamukuate, nebaluhuke n andi kudi bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne ku tshibi tshia musoko; nebambile bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne, Muana wetu eu udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, kena utumikila mei etu; udi muena lumpukusu ne mukuatshiki wa maluvu
Wakatula nkanu mu muaba wa tshijila, wakayiteka ha mutu ha makunshi; wakatula bifuanyikishi bia mamuma a grenade lukama, wakabiteka ha nkanu
Nenuenzele nyama wandi wa mpunda nunku kabidi, ne bilulu biandi; nenuenzele bintu bionso bia mukuenu biakajimisheye ne wewe wakabiangula, kanubisokoki
Samuele Davidi Udi Ulama Muoyo wa Shaula ku Ene gedi Hakahingana Shaula ku mata ya ku Bena Peleshete, bakamuambila ne, Mona, Davidi udi mu tshihela tshia Ene gedi
Mukelenge wakela dî diandi, bakalua ne mabue manene a mushinga mukole, bakasa makunshi a nsubu ne mabue musonga
Bobo bakamuela tshifufu, bakamuela mabue ku mukenji wa mukelenge mene mu tshiendedi tshia mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Ubambile ne, Kanuyi, kanuluanganyi; bualu bua meme tshiena munkatshi muenu; kanuhonyi ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna
Biangatshile ku dituku adi, bena Izrayele kuboya dinda dionsu biakudia bikumbane, bua muntu yonsu kudia kuukuta
Muena Levi awu, neapete biakudia bungi budi bena Levi bakuabu bapeta
Misoko ei yonso yakadi ne mpangu mile ne bibi bikanda ne biamu; tuakanyenga misoko mikuabo ya bungi yakadi kayiyi ne mpangu
Bana ba balume ba Ashe, Yimena ne Yishewa ne Yishewi ne Belia ne muan abo wa bakashi, Sela, ne bana ba balume ba Belia, Hebê ne Malekiele
Nenkoleshe mutshima wa Palô, nennudishe bimanyinu bianyi ne malu anyi a kukema mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Edi ndî diakamba Yehowa bualu buandi: Mukashi utshidi kamama wa mu Siona wakakulengulula, wakakuseka; muana mukashi wa Yelushalema wakakukuila mutu
Kanuena ne diakalengele bishi
Udi ufuka bena kamama ne bena mahaha ne bantu badi mua kumona ne bantu badi bafofo nganyi
Yeye kuitaba ne: Ke meme ewu
Idi dishiya dia Yadene mu nshila wa kudi diba dibuela, mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna bakadi bashikama mu Alabâ, hehi ne Gilegala, hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya Mole
Bualu bua mashi adi bu muoyo wa tshintu nakanuha mashi ha tshioshelu bualu bua kunubuikidila n au bubi buenu mashi adi anubuikidila bubi bualu bua muoyo wau
Bienzedi biandi bikuabo ne malu andi onso, bia kumudilu ne bia kunshikidilu, bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa bakelenge ba Yuda ne ba Isalele
Hashishe nengumushe tshianza tshianyi, ne wewe neumone nyima wanyi; kadi kuena mua kumona mpala wanyi
Kadi bena Izrayele kutshimuna Sihone ne tshiluilu tshiende
Ke kuvua ndimi ya kapia ilakuka, iya mulu, yenza mavuba a muinshi mufike
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Bakashihela ba demon badi kabayi Nzambi nyama, nzambi idibo kabayi bamanye, nzambi mihia mihia yakamueneka anu katataka, yakadi batatu benu kabayi batshina diambedi

Nunku bikaleye mumuambile ne, Nebadianjile kuosha dianyi, hashishe udi mumanye mua kuangata bungi hudi mutshima webe musue, muhika wakamuambila ne, Nansha, biwahidia kumpa katataka, meme nengunyenge ku bukole
Nunku Abimeleke wakabika ne bantu bonso bakadi n andi, bakaya mu butuku, bakalamina ha buihi ne Shekeme, baditahulule bisumbu binai
Ivua mikile panshi, mipafikishe fitutuu

Uvuluke bantu bebe, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba; kutangidi tshitshu tshia bantu aba anyi buhidia buabo anyi mibi yabo, bua bena buloba buwakatuhatula kabambi ne, Bualu bua Yehowa kakadi ne bukole bua kulua n abo mu buloba buakahaneye ne bualu bua yeye wakadi n abo tshiji, yeye wakalua n abo mu tshihela bua kubashiha

Aba mbana balume ba Gilada: Yezê ne meku a Bena Yezê, Heleke ne meku a Bena Heleke; Aseliele ne meku a Bena Aseliele; Shekeme ne meku a Bena Shekeme; Shenuda ne meku a Bena Shenuda, Hefê ne meku a Bena Hefê
Kusungulabu munkatshi muabu bakaji bavuabu basue kusela
Wakumukaku, wakaya ku Penuele; wakabambila muomumue; ne bakelenge ba mu Penuele bakamukudimuna anu di diakamba Bena Sukota
Nuakatontolola mu ntenta yenu, nuakamba ne, Bualu bua Yehowa wakadi n etu tshiji, yeye wakatuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bua kutufila mu bianza bia Bena Amole, bua bobo batushihe
Gedaliya wakaditshiha kudibo ne kudi bantu babo ne, Kanutshinyi bantu ba Bena Kasada; nushikame mu buloba, nukuatshile mukelenge wa Babulona mudimu, hashishe malu enu neikale makane
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Muntu webe nyeye
Katataka Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, dî diwakambila muntu webe Davidi dijadikibue
Dutelonone Bunene bua Yehowa Nunku suai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numunemeke, nutumikile malu andi ne mei andi ne mikenji yandi matuku onso
Ditalala diakadi hankatshi ha Bena Isalele ne Bena Amole
Yeye wakunzulula tshibi, wakaya lubilu
Kanuena mua kutua ndondu ne bena ditunga dinudi nusomba to
Pikala Maweja Nangila wenu mudiundishe ditunga dienu bu muvuaye mulaye, nenuikale nudia munyinyi munudi basue
Kadi bantu bonso bakamba ne, Tubakume ne mabue Butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka mu ntenta wa kusambakena kudi Bena Isalele bonso
Kuasabumu

Mu tshihungu tshia bantu tshidi tshitua, bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima ne benyi badi bafuma ku buloba bukuabo, hatangilabo makenga akalua ku buloba abu ne masama onso adi Yehowa mubatumine ne buloba buonso budi bu butue ne luehu ne bintu bioshibue, kabena bakunamu tshintu, kabena bahuolamu tshintu; ne mashinde kaena amenamu: buloba budi buikala bu kubutuka kua misoko ya Sodoma ne Amola ne Adema ne Seboima yakashiha Yehowa mu tshiji tshiandi tshikole; bantu aba bonso nebambe ne, Bualu kai Yehowa wakuenzela buloba ebu nunku

Hashishe bûdi n abu mbua kumuka ku muaba au tô ne hawafika ku mutshi wa telebinta wa ku Tabô; wewe neusangileku ne balume basatu baya ku Betele bua kutendelela Nzambi, umue mutuale bana ba mbushi basatu, mukuabo muambule mitanda ya bidia isatu, ne mukuabo muambule mulondo wa nvinyo; bobo nebakuele muoyo, nebakuhe mitanda ya bidia ibidi, bûdi n abu mbua kuyangata ku bianza biabo
Padi muena Izrayele, nansha muenyi udi munkatshi muabu, udia munyinyi wa nyama mudifuile nansha mushipa kudi nyama mukuabu wa mu mpata, muntu awu neasukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi pambidi
Ku tshikondo atshi mukelenge Ahaza wakatumina mukelenge wa Bena Ashû dî bua yeye kunukuatshisha
Nualekele, apueke panshi bu mayi
Katuyi banze kudilengesha, tô ne ku dituku edi, bua mulau wakela Yehowa tshisumbu tshia bantu, nuenu nudi basue kuhambuka lelu ne kuhanga kulonda Yehowa, anyi
Nyoka wakambila mukashi ne, Kanuena nufua bulelela, bualu bua Nzambi udi mu manye ne, Hanuadia mamuma au, mesu enu neabuluke, nenuikale bu Nzambi, nenumanye malu mimpe ne malu mabi
Tshisamba kai tshidi ne nzambi ha buihi n abo bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, hanuaulukila
Ke mudi tatu mumunange ne yeye mene bikole
Nzambi wakavuluka Lakele, Nzambi wakamunvuala, wakajilula munda muandi
Nanku numushe bubi buonsu munkatshi muenu
Nganyi watusungila mu bianza bia nzambi ei ya bakole
Udi kabidi ne tshia kulama ne kutantshisha bisumbu bia bantu bidi kabiyi ne bukola pamwe ne tusumbu twa bantu twa tukesa
dikuba dia bisumbu bia bantu badi kabayi ne makanda

Nuenu nutumikile mei andi ne mikenji yandi, bu munakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne disanka ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima, ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu ha buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha tshiendelele
Hakadiye utendelela nzambi wandi Niseloka mu nsubu wandi, Adelameleke ne Shalese bakamushiha ne muele wa nvita; bakanyemena mu buloba bua Alalata
Ngade, udi bivi baluisha, udi utua nkanana, ubalondakaja
Pashishe kumukabu ne bantu, ne bimuna kabidi, ne bintu bionsu bivuabu banyenga mu mvita
Yehowa wakambila Yakoba ne, Uhingane ku buloba bua batatu ebe, ne bua bana benu, nengikale n ebe
Usaye mukoku wa tshimpanga awu, usukule bia munda ne mikonu
Kufikabu ku Mara
Ndi munusungule munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabu, bua nuikale bantu banyi meme
Hakadiye kayi mua kumusokoka kabidi, wakamuangatshila tshisaka tshia ntuhu, wakatshilaba bitume ne kamonyi, wakatekamu muana, wakatshiteka mu malenge akadi kukala kua musulu

Kanudi mampa adi ne luevene ne mulambu eu; nenudie n au mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mbia kudia bia tshivulukidi tshia dikenga; bualu bua nuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu lubilu; nunku numuke dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu matuku onso a muoyo wenu
Nentabale mesu anyi, nenteleje matshu anyi ku kulomba kudibo balomba mu nsubu eu
Ekesode Kujidila kua Ban a Bute Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Unjidile ban a bute bonso ba Bena Isalele, bonso badianjile kuledibua, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, bobo mbanyi
Ke munudi mua kuenzela mukaji yonsu padiye ulela muana wa balume, nansha wa bakaji
Bana ba bakaji ba Selofade kuitaba diyi dia Maweja Nangila divuaye muambile Moshe
Nzambi wakamba ne, Buloba bumeneshe bimenyi bionso, midioko idi yela ntete ne mitshi idi ikuama mamuma adi ne ntete yai, bu mudi mushindu wai
Bena Ejipitu bamona nanku, kutshinabu bena Izrayele bikole
Mutuangaji oshe bintu bionsu abi pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu wa dipembu dimpe moshila Maweja Nangila
Utshiteke patoke bua bantu bebe ne banyi bakose tshilumbu atshi
Dituku adi kanuenji mudimu
Hashishe Hezikiya wakambila Yeshaya ne, Dî dia Yehowa diwakungambila ndimpe
Pashishe mutuangaji neafunde meyi a mitshipu aa mu mukanda, atue mukanda awu mu mayi a bululu aa, bua miaku ayi ishale mu mayi aa
Hadiundisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matshika enu muakanulayeye, ne nuenu nenuambe ne, Netudie munyinyi, bualu bua mitshima yenu idi misue kudia munyinyi; nudi mua kudia munyinyi udi mitshima yenu misue

Yehowa wakunvua mei enu, wakadi n enu tshiji, wakaditshiha ne, Nansha muntu umue wa mu tshikondo etshi tshibi neatangile buloba ebu buimpe, bunakalaya batatu enu bua kunuhabu, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, neabutangile; nemmuhe buloba buakadiateye muinshi mua makasa andi, ne kudi bana bandi, bualu bua yeye wakalonda Yehowa bulelela
Nenuikale ne mukenji umue kudi muntu mulela munkatshi mua Bena Isalele ne kudi muenyi udi munkatshi muenu, henzeye bualu bubi ku mpukahuka
Hanuakuna matamba a mitshi yenu ya olive bua mamuma ahone, kanuakumi tshiakabidi; neashale a benyi ne a bana ba nshiya ne a bakashi ba mu lufuila
Kadi bikalaku muen andi, yeye kena ne bualu bua kumufuta
Kanumushi bualu nansha bumue
Milambu ayi, nuyilambule pamue ne inudi nundambula matuku a Dikisha
Nenusangishe bintu bionso bia musoko mu musesu, nenuoshile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musoko ne bintu ebi bionso; musoko eu newikale musasula tshiendelele, kabena bawasaku kabidi
Bakabala tshiamu tshia argent bu bungi bua bantu, ntalanta lukama ne nshekele tshinunu tshimue, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu bu muakadi nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Bantu bonsu bakukukuile
Yehowa atemeshe mpala wandi kunudi, anufuile luse
Diakalenga edi kumueneka mu bintu biende bionsu, ne mu nzubu wende ne mu madimi ende
Mubikilayi bua tudie nende
Nanku, bena Izrayele ne ndelanganyi yabu yonsu, bavuluke dituku dia Dikisha, bualu ke diumvuangana dietu nabu dia kashidi
Manashe muan andi wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Bua Lewi yeye wakamba ne, Tumima ne Ulima biebe bikale kudi ûdi musue, uwakateta ku Masa, uwakaluangana n andi ku mai a Meliba
Bobu bele meji kakese, bavua mua kutshinka kudi buenzayi buabu mua kubafikisha
Bualu bua Bena Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi muenu: bualu bua buakuidi bua Yehowa budi buhianyi buabo
Pashishe, nuangate makuta a kusumba biakudia ne makuta avuabu banupingajile mu bibombi bienu awu, bualu badi mua kuikala batupakane
Butumbi buenu, Bena Isalele, buakashihibua ha mutu ha mikuna
Hakatshidibo benda bayikila, monai, dikalu dia kahia ne tubalu tua kahia biakamueneka, biakabahandulula, ne Eliya wakabandishibua mu diulu mu nvunde
Bua kuibaka tshilambuilu atshi, mabue ikale anu kaayi masonga to
Nudi mua kudia munyinyi wa kabuluku ne wa mbashi bu mudi bakuabo badia; badi kabayi bakane ne badi bakane badi bamanye mua kudia
Panuikala kanuyi mua kumupikula, numushipe nukoyobole nshingu
Nunku muan anyi witabusha di dianyi, bika biebe, unyemene kudi Labana muan etu wa balume, udi mu Halana, ushale n andi matuku makese to ne hashika lukuna lua mukulu ebe ludiye n alu kudi
Butuku mashika avua ambuela ku muoyi, tshitabela tshingenza
Mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye bakalekela bantu
Muntu yonsu udibu babadika, alambule tshia bibidi tshimue tshia sikle bu mudibu benza muaba wa tshijila
Kupimabu biakudia bionsu abi
Nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu, nukumbaje meyi ne mikenji bia Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, bindi munumanyishe lelu
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye, wakamuambila ne, Yehowa udi n ebe, wewe muntu mukole wa bukitu
Hakimana ditutu ku mutu kua nsubu matuku a bungi, nunku Bena Isalele bakatumikila dî dia Yehowa, kabakaya ku luendu
Kuenza kua Nsubu wa Tshitendelelu Ek

Tangilai, nakuteka muoyo ne malu mimpe, ne lufu ne malu mabi ku mpala kuenu lelu; mukenji unakunuelela lelu bua kunanga Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi ne bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne mikandu yandi: nunku nenuikale ne muoyo, nenukumbane ba bungi, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu buloba bunuyaya kubuhiana
Kadi nudi mua kudia bishi, bidi kabiyi ne mikiya
Nanku meme nemfikishe bena Izrayele mu ditunga didi ne biakudia bia bungi, dimvua mulaye bankambua babu, bua badie batshionkomoka
Yeye wakalua ha buihi handi ne mukashi wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi Yoaba, anyi
Yeye wakimana ha buihi n abo muinshi mua mutshi hakadibo badia
Neasuike kabidi mukaba wa buanda bua ndanda, uvuala ne tshifulu tshienza ne buanda bua ndanda
Nuenu nudi basue kabidi kuya ne muana udi mushale ewu

Mu dituku dinudi nuhuola bintu bia kumudilu, hanuafila mulambu wa bukula buhia buhia kudi Yehowa, nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, hadi nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa bana balume ba ngombe babidi ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko tô ne ku bana ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi
Zela, Muena Atiopa, wakalua kudiye ne bena nvita binunu tshinunu ne makalu nkama isatu; wakafika ku Malesha
Bantu bandi bonso bakenda n andi hohamue; Bena Kelete bonso ne Bena Pelete bonso ne Bena Giti bonso, bantu nkama isambombo bakamulonda bafume mu Gata, bakadianjila ku mpala kua mukelenge
Udi mua kulama kabidi bintu bidi bena diku diabu bamutumina, padibu basumbisha bivuaye nabi
Ke Yakobe kuambila bana bende Shimeyone ne Levi ne: Nuangenzedi bibi, nuamfuishi bundu kudi bena Kenaane ne kudi bena Perizi
Bualu bua nakumutangila ku mutu kua mabue, nakamumona ku mutu kua mikuna, bantu aba badi bashikama ha buabo kabena babadibua munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabo
Nenuudie ngondu mujima
Bakamba ne, Butudi n abu mbua kuha Bena Benyamina badi bashala buhianyi, bua tshisamba tshimue katshijiminyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Ukuate kabidi dikombu edi mu tshianza, wenze nadi bishima
Yefeta wakalumbulula Bena Isalele bidimu bisambombo
Maweja Nangila neameneshe kabidi bisosa bia nuenu kudisha bimuna bienu
Nunku bakebesha Yehowa ne, Muntu mukuabo ulualua, anyi
Mukaji udibu babanda ne: mmuende tshiendenda Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Tuambe ne: Mukaji wa bende mmuende tshiendenda
Bukokeshi bua Yehoyakima Bak
Kukonkanganabu ne: Tshidi Mvidi Mukulu mutuenzele nunku ntshinyi

Hakakuna Bena Isalele bintu mu buloba, hashishe Bena Midiyana ne Bena Amaleka ne bantu ba ku esete bakatua kudibo, bakafila kubalesha; bakabatshintshimika, bakahaula bintu biakamena mu buloba, tô ne nakafikabo ku Gaza; kabakashila Bena Isalele tshia kudia, nansha mukoko nansha ngombe nansha mpunda
Tshintu tshi difume anyi tshidi tshihandulula kudi nyama yeye kena mua kutshidia, yeye neadinyange n atshi meme ndi Yehowa
Davidi wakaditshiha kudi Shaula

Badi babadika bena Izrayele musangu muibidi Tshipupu atshi tshimane kupita, Dibadika Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe ne mutuangaji Elazare, muana wa Arone, ubambila ne: Nubadike bantu balume bonsu ba bena Izrayele ku meku abu
Mvidi Mukulu kubiela lupemba, wamba ne: Nuluangane, nuwuje mayi manene, nyunyi ivulangane pa buloba bujima
Pashishe mukalu wenu neubende mu Ashimone, bua kufika ku musulu wa mu Ejipitu, ushiki la ku Mayi manene a pankatshi pa matunga
Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu nshila wa ku Bashana: ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakalua ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu ku Edelei

Muntu yonso udi udia tshintu tshidifuile anyi tshidi tshihandulule kudi nyama, bikaleye muledibue mu nsubu yenu anyi muenyi, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne dilolo, hashishe yeye neikale muakane
Mulambu awu kabena mua kuulamba, kuela buanga bua mampa to
Samuele Bulunda bua Davidi ne Yonatana Davidi wakanyema ku Nayota hehi ne Lama, wakaya kudi Yonatana, wakamukonka ne, Nakuenza tshinyi
Pashishe Noba kunyenga tshimenga tshia bena Kenate, ne misoku yonsu ivua pabuipi natshi
Dutelonone Tshidimu tshia Buhikudi Hahita bidimu muanda mutekete nenulekelelangane bintu
Bena Izrayele kuzonzama, kulala panshi bu nyama ya ntambue
Dituku disambombu: nundambule ngombe milume muanda mukulu, mikoku ya bimpanga ibidi, bana ba mikoku dikumi ne banayi, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijima, kabidi ne mbuji wa mpumbu umue
Kadi nuenu kanuakatumikila dî dianyi; nuakuenza nunku bua tshinyi
Wakamuitaba ne, Yeye wakungambila ne, Wewe neusangale bulelela
Tshianza tshia Bena Isalele tshiakadia, ne tshiakahuela Yabina, mukelenge wa Kanâna, tô ne hakabutulabo Yabina, mukelenge wa mu Kanâna
Kole, muana wa Yimena, Muena Lewi, mulami wa tshibi tshia ku esete, wakadi ku mutu kua bintu bia disanka biakafilabo kudi Nzambi, bua kuabanyanganeye milambu ya Yehowa ne bintu bia tshijila
Munazi neabeye nsuki ya ha mutu ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena neangate nsuki, neayiteke ha kahia kadi kuinshi kua mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala

Bena Peleshete Badi Banyenga Mushete wa Tshihungidi Bena Isalele bakaya bua kuluangana mata ne Bena Peleshete, bakatula tshitudilu tshiabo hehi ne Ebene ezê; Bena Peleshete bakatula tshitudilu tshiabo mu Afeka
Bualu uvua mutuambile ne: Meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Mose Wakangata makalu ne ngombe, wakabifila kudi Bena Lewi
Nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Nansha nanku, bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kututangila ne dîsu dikole, bilondeshila bulongolodi bufila kudi mêyi a ditunga
Bule bua mbalanda wakadi ku mpala kua nsubu buakadi coudées makumi abidi bu butshiama bua nsubu; butshiama buandi buakadi coudées dikumi
Mikenji mishilangane Mukaji kena mua kuvuala bilamba bia mulume
Muaba onsu udi muntu awu usomba, nansha bulalu budiye ulala, bidi anu bipia mikiya
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Kadi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kena mulekele bena Izrayele to, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mumupeshe muoyi wa tshitunu
Bakatatshisha Bena Isalele bonso bakadi dishiya dia Yadene mu buloba bua Bena Amole budi mu Gilada bidimu dikumi ne muanda mukulu
Muntu udi uhenda tatu andi anyi mamu andi, nebamushihe bulelela
Ba bana ba Imê: Hanani ne Zebedaya

Hakunvua Bena Isalele bonso lumu ne, Yalobama wakahingana, bakamubikila mu disangisha diabo, bakamuvuisha mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele bonso; anu tshisamba tshia Yuda tshiakalonda ba mu nsubu wa Davidi

Mesu enu akatangila bualu buakenza Yehowa bualu bua Bâla peô; Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakashiha balume bonso munkatshi muenu bakalonda Bâla peô; kadi nuenu bakalamata Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nudi ne muoyo lelu eu
Dikanga dia midimu ya tshibidilu anyi ya pa bwaayi badi badindija kakuyi ditontolola bwa kumona mwa kulonda, pikalabio bienzeka, bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka
Nunku bantu bonso bakaya kuabo bua kudiabo ne bua kunuabo ne bua kutuminabo bantu bakadi hatuhu bintu bia kudia ne bua kusankabo, bualu bua bobo bakajingulula mei akabambilabo
Nganyi wa munkatshi mua nzambi yonso ya bisamba wakasungila buloba buabo mu tshianza tshianyi, bua Yehowa amanye mua kusungila Yelushalema mu tshianza tshianyi
Kanuvua basue bua ndeje bena Izrayele tshijila tshianyi
Ku dituku dionsu, mutuangaji ikale uteka nkunyi pa tshilambuilu dinda, utekepu ne milambu ya kuosha bangabanga ne kuoshilapu munyinyi wa mafuta wa milambu ya bobumue
Tangilai, nakateka disanka ne mulau ku mpala kuenu lelu
Bena Isalele bakuabo bonso ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bakadi mu misoko yonso ya Yuda, muntu ne muntu mu buhianyi buandi

Dutelonone Malu Adibo ne bualu bua Kuenza bua Kuheta Buhikudi ne Masanka Halua malu au onso kunudi ne disanka ne mulau, binakuteka ku mpala kuenu, ne hanuayuluka malu au munkatshi mua bisamba bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unutuma munkatshi muabi, ne hanuakudimuna mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mei andi ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso, bu munakunuambila lelu, ne nuenu ne bana benu; hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neakudimune buluka buenu, neanuleshe luse, neahingane kunudi, neanusangishe ba munkatshi mua bantu bonso muakanumuangalasha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Munyinyi wa nyama unu vua balambula Maweja Nangila dilolu dia dituku dia kumpala, nuudie, ujika anu dituku adi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne bana bandi balume ne Bena Isalele bonso ne, Muntu yonso wa mu nsubu ya Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele udi ufila mulambu wa kuditshiha, anyi mulambu udi mutshima wandi musue kufila, anyi mulambu mukuabo udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia, biasueye kufila mulambu udi Yehowa muitabushe, afile mulume udi kayi ne tshialua wa munkatshi mua ngombe anyi mikoko anyi mbushi

Kanungu kinâyi Badi mwa kutapulula polovensa ne bitupa bia teletwala bidikadila bipiabipia pa kukosolola anyi kusambakaja bia kale bilondeshile makanyika mafila kudi Dîyi dikulu ne kudi mêyi a ditunga
Yoasha wakadi ne bidimu muanda mutekete hakababangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi anai; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Sibeya wa mu Bê sheba
Yeye wakadi ne bana babo, bana halume ba Yehoshafata: Azaya ne Yehiele ne Zekâya ne Azaya ne Mikaele ne Shefataya; aba bonso bakadi bana ba Yehoshafata, mukelenge wa Yuda
Kuluishabu kabidi bena Ori bavua ku mukuna wa Seyire, kubipata too ne ku Ele Parane pabuipi ne tshipela
Milambu ya kuosha ku dituku dionsu Milambu ya kuosha pa tshilambuilu matuku onsu ikale ya mushindu ewu: woshe bana ba mikoku babidi ba tshidimu tshimue, umue dinda, mukuabu dilolu
Meme nakadimusha balumbuluishi benu tshikondo atshi ne, Unvuai bilumbu bia bana benu, nulumbulule bilumbu bia muntu ne muan abo mulume ne muenyi udi n andi biakane
Bualu uvua munyange lumu lua nsongakaji wa bena Izrayele
Nanku anu bantu balume ba ku ndelanganyi ya Arone, ke badi mua kudia bukula bua mulambu abu
Kulondolola Tunkanunuina tua Adama Gen
Nenvuishe mikete yanyi bu mukuatshiki wa maluvu bualu bua mashi abo, ne muele wanyi wa nvita neudie munyinyi wabo ne mashi a bafue ne a bena lukanu, ne mitu ya bukelenge ba bena lukuna
Kanuena mua kuteka mabue mu ditunga dienu, kuazola bua kuatendelela to
Nzambi wakambila Noa ne, Etshi ntshimanyinu tshia tshihungidi tshinakujadika hankatshi hetu ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo ha buloba
Nuvuluke matuku a diambedi, nuelangane meji a bidimu ne bikondo bia bungi: webeshe tatu webe, ne yeye neakuleshe; ne bakulu benu, bobo nebakuambile
Kadi ndi nkusengelela ne: Kutunyoki bua bubi butudi benze
Kutshitumabu kudi tatuabu ne mukenji, bamba ne: Kenketa tshilamba tshitudi bangule etshi
Bena buloba bakangata Yehoaza, muana wa Yoshiya, bakamuela manyi ha mutu, bakamusungula mukelenge mu muaba wa tatu wandi
Wewe, muntu wa Nzambi, wakufuma mu Yuda, anyi
Wakaya ne mukanda kudi mukelenge wa Isalele, wamba ne, Hawabala mukanda eu, Umanye ne, Nakakutumina muntu wanyi Nâmana, bua wewe kumuondaha disama diandi dia nsudi
Misoko ya Yuda Ebu mbuhianyi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Yuda ku meku abo

Nunku tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudi Amasaya, yeye wakamutumina muprofete, wakamuambila ne, Wewe wakakeba nzambi ya bantu yakadi kayiyi ne bukole bua kusungila n abu bantu babo mu bianza biebe bishi
Bualu bua Shaula wakamba ne, Tshiena musue kumulenga tshianza, kadi Bena Peleshete bamulenge bianza
Kadi nebambenge too ne ku diba kaayi

Nomba Buhianyi bua Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Mose mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko ne, Wele mukenji kudi Bena Isalele, bua bobo bahe Bena Lewi misoko ya kushikamamu bu buhianyi buabo, bobo bahe Bena Lewi kabidi tshituha tshia buloba budi bunyunguluka misoko ei

Yehowa wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole ne diboko diandi diolola ne malu makole ne bimanyinu ne malu a dikema; wakalua n etu mu muaba eu, wakatuha buloba ebu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi

Nuafunda ha minoko ya nsubu yenu, ne ku mishiku ya mpangu yenu; nunku nebavudishe matuku enu ne matuku a bana benu mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu bua kubahabo matuku onso atshidi diulu ha mutu ha buloba
Ana ewu ke uvua musangane mpokolu wa mayi mu tshipela, pawaye udisha mpunde ya tatuende Sibeyone

Padi tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia mpetu tshivwabo bafila mu tshipungu tshianyisha kudi Dîyi dikulu, kabayi batshielela tukanda kumpala kwa diunzulula dia tshikondu tshipiatshipia, mulombodi wa ditunga udi utshilondeshisha, mu dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene, dikala dishintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, kayi upwa mooyi makumbaja meelela tukanda kudi Tshibambalu ne Tshimbambalu
Mose wakambila Alona mei onso akamuambila Yehowa ne bimanyinu bionso biakamuheye
Kungambilaye kabidi ne: Bangayi luendu
Tobiya, Muena Amona, wakadi hehi n andi, wakamba ne, Babanda mubuabua ha mutu ha lumbu lua mabue ludibo basa udi mua kulushimbula
Dibadika Bena Izrayele badi bafika mu Tabera Dituku dikuabu bena Izrayele bavua bajana Maweja Nangila bikole
Ke mikenji inudi ne bua kulama nuenu, ne ndelanganyi yenu kashidi

Mose wakambila Alona ne Eleaza ne Itama, bana bandi balume bakadi bashala, ne, Nuangate mulambu wa bukula udi ushala munkatshi mua milambu idibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia, nûdie ne bintu bidi kabiyi ne luevene hehi ne tshioshelu, bualu bua tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia tshijila, nenudie mu muaba wa tshijila, bualu bua etshi ntshintu tshiebe ne tshia bana bebe balume munkatshi mua milambu idibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia, bualu bua Yehowa wakangambila nunku
Bualu nsongalume wa mu tshimenga atshi uvua mubafuishe bundu, mubuelele muanabu wa bakaji mu nzubu ku bukole
Hakamona Bena Isalele bonso ne, Mukelenge kena witabusha dî dietu, bobo bakebesha mukelenge ne, Tuetu tudi ne luseke luetu lua bintu mu Davidi kudi kunyi
Mvidi Mukulu wa nkambua wanyi Abrahame, ne Mvidi Mukulu uvua mukuatshishe tatu wanyi Izake bowa, kayi mungambuluishe, uvua mua kumpingaja kuetu bianza bitupu
Mu ngendu yabo yonso, hakabandishibua difutu ha mutu ha nsubu, Bena Isalele bakadi babanga luendu
Abalahama wakangata mikoko ne ngombe, wakabika kudi Abimeleke, bubidi buabo bakafua ndondo
Mei au anakukuambila lelu eu ikale mu mutshima webe; wewe newayishe bana bebe, wewe neusombelele n abo bua mei au, hawashikama mu nsubu webe, ne hawenda mu nshila, ne hawalala, ne hawabika

Mutuangaji alamune mafuta onsu a ngombe awu: bu mudi mafuta adi malamate ku bia munda, tuonyi tubidi ne mafuta onsu adi malamateku, mafuta adi malamate ku mulemba, ne lutandatanda ludi ku mutshima, ludibu balamuna pamue ne tuonyi
Nunku Yehowa wakatekesha Bena Atiopa ku mpala kua Asa ne kua Bena Yuda; Bena Atiopa hakanyema
Eliya wakambila kapitene ka bantu bandi makumi atanu ne, Bingikala muntu wa Nzambi, kahia kafume mu diulu, kakuoshe ne bantu makumi atanu badi n ebe
Papita Maweja Nangila bua kushipa bena Ejipitu, neamone mashi adi kulu kua tshiibi ne ku mabaya adi ku nseke yatshi

Muntu ne muntu wakadi ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu ne bia lin, ne bia miosa ya mbushi ne biseba bia bimpanga bitua mu mai makunze kunzû, ne biseba bia nkonge ya mu mai, wakalua n abi
Nunku ku dituku adi wakajadika mei â bu mukenji mufunda ne mujalame kudi Bena Isalele tô ne ku dituku edi
Bualu bua nenusabuke Yadene bua kubuelamu ne bua kuhiana buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha; nenubuhiane, nenushikamemu
Udi wenza amu mudiye wamba
Hanukonka bana benu ne, Nudi nuenzela tshilele etshi tshinyi

Bimenga bia kunfudilu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Yuda ku mukalu wa Edome ku Sude biakadi Kabesêle ne Edê ne Yagû, ne Kina ne Dimona ne Adada, ne Kedeshe ne Hasô ne Yitenana, ne Zifa ne Teleme ne Bealota, Hasôhadata ne Keliyota heselona eu udi Hasô mene , Amama ne Shema ne Molada, Hasâ gada, Heshemona, Bete pelete, ne Hasâ shuala ne Bê sheba ne Bizeyoteya, Bâla ne Iyima ne Eseme, Eletolada ne Kesila ne Homa, ne Sikelaga ne Mademana ne Sanesana, ne Lebaota ne Shilihima ne Ayina ne Limona: bimenga bionso bidi makumi abidi ne tshitema ne misoko yabi
Bobo nebanusombeshe bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nubasombesha bintu; bobo nebikale bu mitu, nuenu nenuikale bu mikila
Nakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakajidibua kudi Yehowa, ne malonga â adi majidila kabidi, ne argent ne or bidi bifidibue bu muakadi disua dia mitshima kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu
Bisamba ebi bidi bitendelela nzambi yabo munyi
Bisamba bionsu bidi bitangalaka mu bidila nansha ku mielelu ya mayi manene mbifume ku ndelanganyi ya bana aba
Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu nshila wa ku Bashana: ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakalua ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu ku Edelei
Nanku, padi Arone wimane kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, mena awu ikale amueneka pa makaya ende, bua meme Maweja Nangila ngikale nnuvuluka amu kunuvuluka
Kanulondi bibidilu bia bena buenzayi, nansha bobu ba bungi
Shaula wakadi utshina Davidi bualu bua Yehowa wakadi n andi, ne wakadi mumuke kudi Shaula
Kadi Yehoshabata, muana mukashi wa mukelenge, wakangata Yoasha, muana wa Ahazaya, munkatshi mua bana ba mukelenge bakadi bashihibue, wakamusokoka ne mulami wandi mu nsubu wa bulalu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ungakuile kudi mukelenge Solomo bualu bua yeye kena ubenga dî diebe bua yeye ampe Abishaga, Muena Shunema, ikale mukashi wanyi
Badi Bakuata Yehoyakina bua Kuya n Andi mu Babulona Bak

Kanudi mampa adi ne luevene ne mulambu eu; nenudie n au mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mbia kudia bia tshivulukidi tshia dikenga; bualu bua nuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu lubilu; nunku numuke dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu matuku onso a muoyo wenu
Nanku nebatshinke mushinga wa bionsu abi, bilondeshile nkanu idi muaba wa tshijila
Butshia dinda, Yakobe umona Leya, kukemaye bikole
Ubapeshe buloba buvua tatuabu ne bua kupeta

Mu matuku au kabidi nakamona ne Bena Yuda bakadi babake bakashi ba Bena Ashedodo ne Bena Amona ne Bena Moaba; bana babo baledibue bakakula tshituha tshia muaku wa Bena Ashedodo, kabakamanya mua kuakula muaku wa Bena Yuda, kadi bakakula miaku ya bantu ne ya bantu
Telejai
Muntu udi ubikumbaja, nebimupeteshe muoyi
Kuamiaminaye Arone, ne ku bilamba biende
Nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nuditshihe kudi dina diandi
Mukelenge wakakonka ne, Udi mu tshiendedi nganyi
Hanuaditshiha ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kanuhangi kushikisha mitshihu yenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nealombe bua nuyishikishe; ne bualu ebu nebuikale bubi kunudi binuahanga kuyisbikisha
Wakasa nsubu milungakashe mu lumbu luakadi lunyunguluke ntempelo ne muaba wa tshijila kabidi; wakenza nsubu ku nseke yonso
Nuvuluke ngondo wa Abiba bua kutendelela kuhita kua Yehowa wenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu butuku mu ngondo wa Abiba
Tuetu tudi bu benyi ku mesu kua tatu etu nansha

Dikengesha dia Badi Batela Dina dia Yehowa Tshitelatela Muana wakadiku, mamu wandi wakadi Muena Isalele ne tatu andi wakadi Muena Ejipitu wakaluhuka munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, muana mulume eu wa mukashi wa Bena Isalele wakasangana ne Muena Isalele mukuabo mu tshituilu, muana mulume wa mukashi wa Bena Isalele wakateta dina dia Yehowa tshitelatela, wakamuhenda, ba kalua handikudi Mose
Bena Levi kabena ne tshiabu tshitupa tshia buloba, bu mudi bisamba bikuabu bia bena Izrayele natshi to

Padi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Izrayele munusungule munkatshi mua bena Izrayele bakuabu bua nuenu kusemena pabuipi nende, kuenza mudimu muaba wa tshijila, kuyukila nende mu dina dia bena Izrayele bonsu, ki mbualu bunene budiye munuenzele anyi
Bua nuenu kusomba biakane mu ditunga dienu, ne kujikija buenzayi bua kushipa muntu udi kayi ne bualu, kanuena mua kufuila muena tshibawu luse to, numushipe

Yehowa wakamba ne, Nengendeshe buimpe buanyi buonso ku mesu kuebe, nemmanyishe dina dianyi dia Yehowa ku mpala kuebe; nengikale ne dinanga kudi bantu bandi musue kuikala ne dinanga, nendeshe luse kudi bantu bandi musue kulesha luse
Nufile tshia dikumi, mmumue ne: tshintu tshimue tshia ku bintu dikumi binudi banowe
wewe newenze malu manene, neutambe bulelela

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Gamaliele, muana mulume wa Pedasû
Hashishe mukelenge wakakonka ne, Yeye udi ukeba kukuata mukelenge mukashi ku bukole ku mesu kuanyi mu nsubu wanyi, anyi
Ke mumvua mudinyoke
Bakasabuka Yadene, bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo ku Aloê, ku luseke lua tshianza tshia balume tshia musoko tshiakadi munkatshi mua tshibanda tshia Gada mu nshila wa ku Yasê
Ndi mukuenzele mudimu bidimu dikumi ne binayi, bua kusela bana bebe ba bakaji babidi, pashishe bidimu bisambombu bikuabu bua kupeta bimuna
Balaame kuela kasala, wimba ne: Meme ndi Balaame, muana wa Beyore, umvuayi tshindi ngamba
Ku nyama yonsu anu wewe newikale ukoka difu panshi, kabidi neudie buloba matuku onsu audi ne muoyi
Hakadi Noa ne bidimu nkama itanu, Noa wakalela Shema, Hama ne Yafete
Meme nkayanyi ndi mua kutuala malu enu ne bujitu buenu ne kutanda kuenu munyi

Bialueye ne nyama mubi udibo kabayi mua kudia bu mulambu kudi Yehowa, yeye neateke nyama ku mpala kua muakuidi, ne muakuidi neatuangane handi mushinga bikala nyama muimpe anyi mubi, nyama neikale wa mushinga wakadiye ne muakuidi
Aba mba mu bana balume ba Gada bakadi tupitene tua masalayi; wakatamba buhuekele wakadi ku mutu kua bantu lukama; wakatamba bunene wakadi ku mutu kua bantu tshinunu
Nunku nakanyunguluka, nakahueka mu tshibanda, ne mukuna wakadi utema ne kahia; ne mabue abidi a mei a tshihungidi akadi mu bianza bianyi bibidi
Hashishe nyuma wakalua, wakimana ku mpala kua Yehowa, wakamba ne, Meme nemmudinge
Mukenji ewu udi bua mukaji yonsu udibu babanda bua tshiendenda, nansha yeye muenze bualu bubi, mudinyange, mudinge bayende, nansha yeye kayi muenze bualu, bamubanda patupu
Yuda wakaya ne muan abo Shimeona, bakashiha Bena Kanâna bakadi bashikama mu Sefata, bakabutula musoko mene
Kanungu ka Badi bâsa Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu mu ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Kupandabu mabaya a mitshi ya ndunga, kuimanyikabu nawu nzubu wa tshijila
Eliya wakambila Elisha ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ushikame kunoko, bualu bua Yehowa wakuntuma ku Yeleko
Kishi wakambila muan andi Shaula ne, Wangate umue wa bena mudimu, aye n ebe: jukai, nuye kukeba nyama ya mpunda

Bana ba Shimeona, ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo muntu ne muntu, balume bonso ku bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu, bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona binunu makumi atanu ne tshitema ne nkama isatu

Mose wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso, wakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa Palo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku mesu kuenu, ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buonso; mateta makole anuakatangila ne mesu, ne bimanyinu ne malu a kukema

Tangila, makelela ha diba edi mene nemmatshishe mabue a nvula a bungi be, kabena banze kutangila mabue a nvula nunku ku tshibangidilu tshia bukelenge bua Ejipitu tô ne katataka, Nunku utumine bantu lubilu, basangishe bimuna biebe ne bintu bionso biudi n abi mu budimi, muntu yonso ne nyama yonso bidi bishala mu budimi bidi kabiyi bihingana mu nsubu, mabue a nvula neahone ham bidi babi, nebifue

Munkatshi mua bisamba ebi kanuena nusangana ha kuikisha, anyi kua kutalasha munda mua makasa enu; Yehowa neanutumineku mitshima izakala ne mesu a buowa ne kusamina kua muoyo; nenuikale ne mpata bua mioyo yenu; nenuikale ne buowa munya ne butuku, kanuena nuikala ne ditekemena dia mioyo yenu
Wewe neufunde dina dia Alona ha mulangala wa tshisamba tshia Lewi, bualu bua wewe neusungule mulangala umue kudi muntu ne muntu udi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo

Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bakambila bakadi ku mutu kua binunu bia Bena Isalele ne, Nzambi Umue Munene, Yehowa, Nzambi Umue Munene, Yehowa, udi mumanye; Bena Isalele nebamanye biabo ne, Bikalaku ditomboka, anyi bikalaku buhidia bua kuhidia Yehowa, kanutusungidi lelu
Yosefe wakabumusha hankatshi ha binu biandi, wakatua mpala wandi hanshi
Nujimishe bantu bonso badi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ufila mu bianza bienu; kanubafuidi luse, kanutendeledi nzambi yabo; bualu ebu nebuikale bu buteyi kunudi
Moshe kubatuma bonsu mu mvita, babalombola kudi mutuangaji Pinhase, muana wa Elazare
Kanulu ne tshintu tshidi tshitonda Yehowa mu nsubu muenu bua kufuanangana n atshi: nuhidie tshintu atshi, nuikale n atshi lukuna; atshi ntshintu tshibihe tshia tshijila
Moshe kumuandamuna ne: Tuyaya bonsu pamue: bansonga betu ne bantu bakulakaje, bana betu ba balume ne ba bakaji ne bimuna bietu bionsu, mikoku, ngombe ne mbuji
Yozefe kubela bana babu ne: Kanutandianga nyi mu njila to
Enza mushonyi wa or bunene bua butshiama bua tshianza ku matshika onso, enza tshintu tshia or ku matengu onso
Hakanumusha Yehowa ku Kadeshe bânea ne, Yai bienu, nuhiane buloba bunakanuha; hashishe nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kanuakamuitabusha, kanuakunvua di diandi

Kadi pikala ngombe ne tshibidilu tshia kutua bantu nsengu, bamanyisha mfumuende, kayi utangila bu bualu, kayi umulama, nanku ngombe awu yeye mushipe muntu mulume nansha mukaji, bamuase mabue, bamushipe
Mu mushete awu, utekemu mabue andi nkupesha adi ajadika ndondu
Bangabanga ne Moshe kutuma batentekedi aba, kubambilaye ne: Nubuele mu ditunga dia Kenaane amu ku luseke lua kuinshi kua ditunga
Nunku batahike ba Bena Peleshete bakahona mu nshila wa ku Shâlayima tô ne ku Gata ne ku Ekelona
Bantu bebe mbenze tshilema
Padiye mupole muntu dinu, numupole diende
Lemeke wakabaka bakashi babidi, dina dia muadi diakadi Ada, ne dina dia tshilondi ne, Sila
Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa bidi bibweela nanku mu Tshisangilu ne bukookeshi bujima
Nenuikale bu dikema ne bu lusumuinu ne bu bihendu kudi bisamba bionso bidi Yehowa mulela munkatshi muabi
Bukalenga bunene budi butangila buludiki bwa midimu ya mbulamatadi, Bilwilu, bampulushi ne midimu ya bukubi

Bintu bionso biakadi ha buloba biakafua, ne nyunyu ne bimuna ne nyama ne bintu bionso budi bidikoka hanshi ne muntu yonso, bintu bionso biakadi ne muhuya wa muoyo munda muabi bia ha buloba bume biakafua
Nunku mukelenge kakunvua dî dia bantu; bua bualu ebu buakafuma kudi Nzambi bua kujadika dî dia Yehowa diakambileye Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, mukana mua Ahiya, Muena Shiloa
Kayena mu diulu bua nuenu nuambe ne, Nganyi neahande mu diulu bua kulua ne mikenji kutudi, ne bua kutunyuisha bua tuetu kuyenza

Munkatshi mua bisamba ebi kanuena nusangana ha kuikisha, anyi kua kutalasha munda mua makasa enu; Yehowa neanutumineku mitshima izakala ne mesu a buowa ne kusamina kua muoyo; nenuikale ne mpata bua mioyo yenu; nenuikale ne buowa munya ne butuku, kanuena nuikala ne ditekemena dia mioyo yenu
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bika, uye biebe ku mpala kua bantu, nebabuelemu, nebahiane buloba bunakalaya batatu babo bua kubahabu
Kakuena muntu udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuenu: Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke buowa ne dishina kudi bena buloba buonso bunudi nudiata ku makasa, bu muakanuambileye
Nenkuhedi
Yehoshafata, muana wa Asa, wakabanga kukokesha mu Yuda mu tshidimu tshinai tshia bukelenge bua Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele
Aba mbana balume ba Benyamina ku meku abo Bela ne meku a Bena Bela; Ashabele ne meku a Bena Ashabele; Ahilama ne meku a Bena Abalama; Shefufama ne meku a Bena Shefufama; Hufama ne meku a Bena Hufama
Mikenji eyi idi itangila muntu mulume udi ne disama dia tufina, nansha udi ne biana bipatuka mu butaka, bimupisha mikiya
Hashishe Bena Zifa bakaya kudi Shaula mu Gibea, bakamuambila ne, Davidi kena musokome n etu mu misoko ya ngumbu idi muitu ku mukuna wa Hakila udi ku Sude kua tshihela, anyi
Balumbuluishi Mpingu ya Mika ne Muakuidi Wandi Muntu wakadiku wa ku mikuna ya Efelayima, dina diandi Mika
Mukelenge wa Sulia wakamba ne, Nentumine mukelenge wa Isalele mukanda
Uvua mundame miaba yonsu imvua nya
Kabakamanya mua kubala tumelo tuabo, bungi bualu buakadi bu nsenga ya ku muelelu wa mai manene
Muntu yonso udi utentulula mukalu wa muena mutumba n andi udi ne mulau
Pâlo neko wakamuela mu lukanu mu Libela mu buloba bua Hamata bua yeye kakokeshi mu Yelushalema; yeye wakalambuisha bena buloba milambu ya ntalanta ya argent lukama ne ntalanta wa or umue
Badi mua kumukuma mikumu makumi anai, kadi kabahitshi: biahilabo mikumu ei, muan enu neikale bu muntu wa hatuhu kunudi
Milonda ya bitupa yonsu, ivua ku nzubu wa tshijila ne ku lupangu, ivua ya tshiamu tshikunze
Hakakumbana ngondo yandi, mona, bana ba mahasa bakadi munda muandi
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Meme kumona kabidi miepu ya mponda mikuabu muanda mutekete mishawuke, mifubidile ne lupepela lua mu tshipela
Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudibo, bua kubashiha munkatshi mua tshitudilu, tô ne hakafuabo buonso buabo

Bualu bua tuetu tuakubenga mikenji yebe iwakuelela bantu bebe baprofete ne, Buloba bunudi nuya bua kuhiana budi bunyanguka bua malu mabi a bena buloba ne malu abo a bundu; bakûsha buloba abu tente ne dinyanguka diabo ku mukala umue tô ne kunfudilu kuabu

Nakatuma bamessager mu tshihela tshia Kedemota kudi Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona, ne mei a ditalala ne, Witabushe bua tuetu tuhite mu buloba buebe: netuye anu mu musesu munene, katuena tusesuka ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Balombodi bakuabu ba mu bukalenga kuangata bualu abu ne mushinga, kubueja bapika babu ne bimuna biabu bionsu mu nzubu
Mikenji idi ikebela muntu lufu Muntu udi ushipa mukuabu ku mituutu, nebamushipe pende ku mituutu
Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu nshila wa ku Bashana: ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakalua ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu ku Edelei
Bobo nebatulonde tô ne hasemenabo kule ne musoko; bualu bua bobo nebambe ne, Badi batunyema, bu muakenzabo diambedi: nunku tuetu netubanyeme
Nzambi wakalambishila muena lukuna mukuabo, dina diandi Lesona, muana wa Eliada, wakanyema kudi mukelenge wandi Hadadezê, mukelenge wa mu Soba
Bana balume ba Gomê: Ashakenaza ne Difata ne Togâma
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Wenze nyoka wa tshiamu tshikunze

Kanungu ka Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi bisangila mu bukookeshi bônso misangu ibidi bwa midimu ya tshibidilu ku tshidimu: a musangu wa kumpala udi ubanga mu matuku a lwîshi ne ujika mu matuku a kashipu nkenza ; b musangu mwibîdi udi ubanga mu matuku a tshimungu mukaji ne ujika mu matuku a kaswa bitenda
Nuenu nuakangambila ne, Bualu buwakuamba budi buimpe bua tuetu tuenze
Tshimenga tshia Eshebone ntshikuate kapia
Nzambi wakadi ne nsongalume, yeye wakadiunda, yeye wakashikama mu tshihela wakalua tshilembi tshidi ne ndudi
Meme nengikale nebe
Kadi nebabanye buloba anu ku nshobo, bobo nebahiane buloba ku mena a bisamba bia batatu abo
Solomo Udi Uvuishibua Mukelenge Hashishe mukelenge Davidi wakamba ne, Umbikidile Betasheba
Bena Peleshete bakaluangana, bakahita Bena Isalele bukole: muntu yonso wakanyema lubilu ku ntenta wandi; ba bungi bakafua, bualu bua bakashiha Bena Isalele bakadi benda ku makasa binunu makumi asatu
Yehowa neabafile mu bianza bienu, nuenu ne nubenzele bu mudi mikenji yonso inakanuambila
Muena Peleshete wakambila Davidi ne, Meme ndi mbua bua wewe udi ulua kundi ne bibangu, anyi
Nanku nenulale matuku a bungi mu ditunga adi, didi ne biakudia bia bungi, divua Maweja Nangila mumane kuditshipa bua kupesha bankambua benu, ne ndelanganyi yabu yonsu
Dituku disatu: Eliyabe, muana wa Elone, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Zebulone
Balaka wakaya ne Belâma ku mutu kua mukuna wa Peô, kuakatangileye ku tshihela
Eyowa, buloba nebuikishe bua bukumbaje bungi bua bikondu bimuma kanuyi babuikishishe, diba dinuvua basombamu
Nudi bafike munemu bua kumanya miaba ya kubuelela ne mvita mu ditunga edi
Enza mahu asambombo ha tshitekelu, mahu asatu ku luseke lumue, mahu asatu ku luseke lukuabo
Binuahua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muoyo, binualonda nzambi mikuabo, binuenzela nzambi mikuabo midimu, binuayitendelela, ndi nnumanyisha lelu ne, Nenufue bulelela

Bena Isalele bakuabo ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne bimbi ba misambu ne batuadi ba bintu ne Bena Netinima bakaya n andi ku Yelushalema mu tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete tshia bukokeshi bua mukelenge Atashasete
Nanku Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wetu, kutuambuluisha
Bantu bonso bakambila Samuele ne, Ulombele bantu bebe Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua tuetu katufu, bualu bua tuetu tuakavudisha bualu ebu bubi bua kudilombela mukelenge ha mutu ha mibi yonso ituakuenza

Muana wa Arone wasungulabu bua kuenza mudimu wa butuangaji munene pa muaba wa tatuende, neavuale bilamba bia tshijila abi, matuku malondangane muanda mutekete, diba dionsu didiye ubuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kuenza mudimu
Numushihe anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu; kanumushihi anu ku dî dia mumonyi umue

Yalobama wakamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Katataka bukelenge nebuhingane kudi ba mu nsubu wa Davidi, biaya bantu aba bua kufilabo milambu mu nsubu wa Yehowa wa mu Yelushalema, nebakudimune mitshima yabo kudi Lehabama, mukelenge wabo wa mu Yuda kabidi; nebanshihe meme, nebahingane kudi Lehabama, mukelenge wa Yuda

Nunku Gada wakalua kudi Davidi, wakamuambila ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Usungule bûdi musue: bua tshiole tshikale tô bidimu bisatu; anyi bua bena lukuna bakuhite bukole ngondo isatu ne miele yabo ya nvita; anyi bua muele wa Yehowa wikale mu buloba bu tshihuhu matuku asatu, ne muanjelo wa Yehowa ashihe bantu mu nseke yonso ya buloba bua Isalele
Ke muvua maloba avuabu bapiane ashale mu tshisamba tshia tatuabu
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; yeye kakasesuka ku malu malu onso a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele, kadi utshivua wendamu
Bantu baka tontolola Mose ne, Netunue tshinyi
Tuetu kushalamu matuku a bungi
Ahaba wakabuela mu nsubu muandi mubungame ne mutshima muneme bujitu bualu bua dî diakamuambila Nabota, Muena Yizelele; bualu bua yeye wakamuambila ne, Tshiena nkuha buhianyi bua batatu banyi
Ke munudi mua kujikija buenzayi munkatshi mua bena Izrayele nanku
Bena Amole bakadi bashikama ku mikuna bakaluhuka kunudi, bakanuihata bu mbulubulu, bakanunyemesha mu Sei tô ne ku Hôma
Nunku nubueshe mei â munda mua mitshima yenu ne muoyo wenu; nuasuika ku tshianza tshienu bu tshimanymu ne hankatshi ha makiki enu
Kanubuelakanyi ne bena mulongo anyi batempi ba mbuku, kanubakebi, kunudionyi kudibo meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Shaula wakamukeba ku dituku ku dituku, kadi Nzambi kakamufila mu tshianza tshiandi

Hanuadia bana, ne bana ba bana benu, hanuashala mu buloba musangu mule, hanuona mitshima yenu bua kudisongela luhingu ne tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu, hanuenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumufuisha tshiji; ndi mbikila diulu ne buloba bu bamanyi ba bualu kunudi lelu ne, Nenujimine ha buloba bunudi nuhiana dishiya dia Yadene tshituha tshihi; kanuena nuvudishangana matuku enu ha buloba, kadi nebanujimishe bulelela

Milambu ya Dia Lumingu ne ya Ngondo Mu dituku dia Lumingu neufue bana balume ba mikoko babidi badi kabayi ne tshilema ba tshidimu tshimue, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshimue tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi, ne mulambu wa bintu bidibo banua: eu udi mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ku matuku a Lumingu, ku mutu kua mulambu udibo bafila buatshia buatshia

Bobo bakahingana kudi Yoshua, bakamuambila ne, Kambualu bua bantu bonso kuya nansha, kadi anu balume binunu bibidi anyi bisatu baye bua kuluisha Bena Ai; kuenzeshi bantu bonso mudimu eu nansha, bualu hua bobo badi bantu banya banya
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Yotama ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Ndelanganyi yebe neyivulangane bu lusenga lua pa buloba
Ya biebe, ubambile ne, Hinganai bienu ku ntenta yenu
Katuena tuhingana ku nsubu yetu diambedi Bena Isalele kabayi banze kuhiana buhianyi buabo kudi mundi ne muntu
Bakelenge ba mu Isalele, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, bakafua bintu
Kabidi bankambua benu kabavua banji kumona tshipupu tshia mushindu ewu to
Samuele Nvita yakadi hankatshi ha ba bu nsubu wa Shaula ne ba mu nsubu wa Davidi musangu mule; Davidi wakakohola, ne ba mu nsubu wa Shaula bakateketateketa
Mulume eu wakinyika mutu wandi, wakatendelela Yehowa

Itai wakakudimuna mukelenge dî ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ne bu mudi mukelenge wanyi ne muoyo, bulelela, mu miaba yonso idi mukelenge wanyi uya, nansha mu muaba wa lufu nansha mu muaba wa muoyo, muntu wandi neikaleku kabidi
Solomo wakamuambila ne, Ya ku nsubu kuebe
Nunku Mose, muinu wa Yehowa, wakafua mu buloba bua Moaba muakamba Yehowa
Nusanke bikole, bualu Maweja Nangila neanuvudijile biakudia bia bungi mu madimi enu
Dikobololayi, nuvuale bilamba bikuabu
Panudi nusombesha muenyi makuta, udi mua kunupingajila

Kadi mu bualu ebu buonso kanuakatumikila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakaya ku mpala kuenu mu nshila bua kunukebela muaba wa kushimika ntenta yenu, mu difutu dikenka kahia butuku, ne mu dî tulu dia diledi munya, bua kunulombola mu nshila unuakadi ne bualu bua kuenda

Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kena uteleja Moshe ne Arone Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Pikala mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ujinga bua numuenzele bishima, wewe Moshe wambile Arone ne: ela dikombu diebe panshi
Yehowa, ubuikile bubi bua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, bawakahikula, kuitabushi bua mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu ashale munkatshi mua bantu bebe Bena Isalele
Badi babashikika mu nkwaasa kudi olodonase wa Mulombodi wa ditunga
Kubengaye diyi dia Moshe ne Arone bu mu vua Maweja Nangila mudianjile kuamba
Hashishe wakebesha ne, Atshi ntshivulukidi tshia nganyi tshindi ntangila
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe wakatuma ba messager bua kuebesha Bâla zebuba, nzambi wa Ekelona, dî bualu bua kakuena Nzambi mu Isalele bua wewe kumuebesha dî, anyi
Bu muakajimisha Yehowa bisamba bikuabo ku mpala kuenu, nunku nuenu nenujimine, bualu bua nuenu nuakahidia kunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kuena ne bua kubuelela mukaji mu nzubu, kubuelela kabidi muanende wa bakaji, nansha muikuluende, muana wa bakaji wa muanende wa balume nansha wa muanende wa bakaji
Bena Isalele bakanyenga bimenga ebi bionso Bena Isalele bakashikama mu bimenga bionso bia Bena Amole, mu Heshebona ne mu misoko ei yonso
Mena a misoko ei akadi: Besê mu tshihela, mu muaba wa mpata, wa mu Bena Lubena; ne Lamota mu Gilada wa Bena Gada; ne Golana mu Bashana wa Bena Manashe
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mmunuvudije
Hashishe Hulama, mukelenge wa Tulo, wakafundila Solomo mukanda ne, Bualu bua Yehowa udi unanga bantu bandi, yeye wakakuhingisha mu bukelenge
Aba mbantu bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona, ne kudi bakelenge ba Bena Isalele dikumi ne babidi, muntu ku nsubu wa batatu abo muntu ku nsubu wa batatu abo
Yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakatshiangata
Kanuikadi ne biamu bibidi bia kuidikisha n abi majitu, ne tshinene ne tshikese
Wakambila tatu wandi ne mamu wandi ne, Tshiena mumumone; kena mumanye bana babo, kena mumanye bana bandi, bualu bua bobo bakatumikila dî diebe ne tshihungidi tshiebe
Hakamanabo kumujika, Yosefe ne bana babo ne bantu bakaya n andi bua kujika tatu wandi bakahingana mu Ejipitu
Yeye wakumuka mu buloba abu, wakaya mu Ashû, wakasa Ninewe ne Lehobote Ila ne Kala ne Lesene, hankatshi ha Ninewe ne Kala eu udi musoko munene
Nulame mikenji eyi kashidi, miaba yonsu inudi nusomba
Ndi musue kubavudijila makenga
Wewe neushikike Bena Lewi ku mpala kua Alona ne kua bana bandi balume, ubanyukule ku mpala kua Yehowa

Bena Netinima: bana ba Siha ne bana ba Hasufa ne ba Tabaota, bana ba Kelosa, bana ba Siaha, bana ba Padona, bana ba Lebana, bana ba Hagaba, bana ba Akuba, bana ba Hagaba, bana ba Shamelai, bana ba Hanana, bana ba Gidela, bana ba Gahâ, bana ba Leaya, bana ba Lesini, bana ba Nekoda, bana ba Gasama, bana ba Uza, bana ba Pasea, bana ba Besai, bana ba Asena, bana ba Meunima, bana ba Nefisima, bana ba Bakâhuka, bana ba Hakufa, bana ba Hâhû, bana ba Baseluta, bana ba Mehida, bana ba Hâsha, bana ba Bâkosa, bana ba Sisela, bana ba Tema, bana ba Nesiya ne bana ba Hatifa

Hakalua tshidimu tshia Noa tshia nkama isambombo ne tshimue, mu ngondo wa kumudilu ne dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo, mai onso akûma ha buloba, ne Noa wakumusha tshibuikilu tshia buatu, wakatangila ne monai, buloba buonso buakûma
Bantu bakambila Yoshua ne, Nansha, netukuatshile Yehowa mudimu
Mulambu kununkilawu Maweja Nangila mupuya muimpe
Nudimuke, kanulekedi Muena Lewi tô matuku onso anudi nushala mu buloba buenu

Binunvua lumu lua umue wa misoko yakanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kushikamamu ne, Bantu bakuabo ba tshikamakama, bakumuka munkatshi muenu, bakasesuisha bena musoko wabo ne, Tuye tuenzele nzambi mikuabo mudimu, inudi kanuyi bamanye; hashishe nenuebeshangane, nenukebe, nenukonkangane bimpe; bikala bualu bulelela, bakuenza bualu bua tshikamakama munkatshi muenu, nenushihe bena musoko aba ne miele ya nvita, nenuhaule musoko; nenushihe bimuna ne bintu bidimu ne muele wa nvita
Bilulu bienu kabiakasunsuka ham bidi henu, ne makasa enu kaena mûle bidimu ebi makumi anai
Dibadika Moshe kumanyisha bena Izrayele bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Bantu bonso bakalonda ku nyima kuandi: bonso bakadi bela nshiba, bakasanka ne disanka ditamba bunene; buloba buakahandika bua mbila yabo
Bena Peleshete bakabanga kuluangana ne Bena Isalele; hakaluanganabo, Bena Isalele bakadi batambibue kudi Bena Peleshete, bakashiha bena nvita ba Bena Isalele bu binunu binai
Bualu bua bana balume ba Atalaya, mukashi au mubi, bakadi habutula nsubu wa Nzambi, bakaha Bâla bintu bia tshijila biakadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Kadi nuenu nuakahidia bua kuyamu, nuakahidia mukenji wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Wewe nkayebe neudimuene amu mpindiewu mundi mbikumbaja
Bualu buakenjibua Buloba buakamenesha bimenyi, midioko idi yela ntete, bu mudi mishindu yai, ne mitshi idi ikuama mamuma adi ne ntete yai, bu mudi mushindu wai
Bantu bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele bakalua, bakadila kudi Palo ne, Udi wenzela bantu bebe nunku bualu kai
Lulengu elu kaluena lusokoma kundi, luteka mu tshibutshilu tshianyi, anyi

Ka nudiangatshidi tshintu tshimue tshia mulau tshia musoko au mu tshianza tshienu; nunku Yehowa nealekele tshiji tshiandi tshikole, neanuleshe luse, neanusankishe, neanukumbashe bu muakalayeye batatu benu; hanunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi yonso inakunuambila lelu ne bua kuenza malu adi makane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kumukaye mu ditunga adi, kuyaye mu Ashure
Ebeyatâ wakambila Davidi ne, Shaula wakashiha bakuidi ba Yehowa

Pikala muntu mutekeshe mpunde, ngombe, mukoku nansha tshimuna tshikuabu ku nzubu kua mukuende bua kumulamima, tshimuna atshi tshifue, tshitapike mputa nansha tshibe kabayi bajadike udi muibe, mulami awu neaditshipe kumpala kua Maweja Nangila bua kujadika mudiye kayi muangate bintu abi
Aba mbantu bakabikilabo ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, bakelenge ba bisamba bia batatu abo, bakadi ku mutu kua binunu bia Bena Isalele
Kena mua kutuma bantu mu Ejipitu bua kutusumba to
Mvidi Mukulu mmufike bua kunuteta, bua numutshine, nulekele buenzayi
Kanuena mua kuyidia, nansha kuyilenga padiyi mifue
Ne tangila, meme nenkoleshe mitshima ya Bena Ejipitu, nebayemu ku nyima kua Bena Isalele, nengangate butumbi bualu bua Palô ne bisumbu biandi bionso ne makalu andi ne masalayi andi adi enda ha tubalu

Nunku muntu wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu, ne wakadi ku mutu kua musoko ne bakulu bakadi badiundisha bana ba Ahaba, bakatumina Yehu dî ne, Tuetu tudi bantu bebe, netuenze bu mu dî diebe; katuena tudisunguila muntu bu mukelenge; enza muonso mûdi umona ne muimpe
Batele bilamba abi ne buanda bua miosa ya nyama, bufikuluke, bukunzubile, bukunze kunzuu, ne buanda bua ndanda ne bua mubidi wa mpawungi
Tatu wabo wakabebesha ne, Yeye wakaya mu nshila kai
Bana ba Elama mukuabo tshinunu ne nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu ne banai
Yeye neahingane anu mu nshila kuakafumeye; Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yeye kena ufika ha buihi ne musoko eu
Wakunuenzela nunku bua kunumanyisha ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi; kakuena Nzambi mukuabo
Numpeshe muaba, muenu munu, wa kujika muena kuanyi
Nebamushipe pende

Mose wakambila Alona ne, Semena ha buihi ne tshioshelu, ufile mulambu webe wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mulambu webe wa kuosha ha kahia, udibuikidile bubi buebe ne bubi bua bantu, ufile mulambu wa bantu kabidi bua kubabuikidila n au bubi buabo bu muakamba Yehowa
Mai manene akakuatakana mu ndondo wa mai
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia mai, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso
Mayi awu, ke avuabu bowa ku bianza ne ku makasa kudi Moshe, kudi Arone ne kudi bana bende ba balume
Kanuikadi ne Muena Edome lukuna, bualu bua yeye udi muan enu; kanuikadi ne Muena Ejipitu lukuna, bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba buandi
Muntu mukuabo wakamuambila ne, Badi mu Nayota hehi ne Lama

Nealabe mashi ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshidi mu ntenta wa kusangakena ku mesu kua Yehowa, yeye neahongolole mashi onso ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu tshia kahia tshidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Dituku dia muanda mutekete ndia Dikisha, dia kunnemeka anu meme Maweja Nangila
Netanele, muana mulume wa Suâ, wakadi ku mutu kua Bena Yisakâ
Yehowa neabenzele bu muakenzeleye Sihona ne Oga, bakelenge ba Bena Amole, bakashiheye ne buloba buabo
Tshidimu tshivua Agare mulela muana, Abrame uvua ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu ne bisambombu

Yehowa Nzambi wakambila nyoka ne, Bualu bua wewe wakuenza nunku, ndi nkuela mulau, mulau webe neutambe wa nyama yonso ya mu madimi, wewe neukoke difu diebe hanshi, neudie dinfuenkenya dia buloba matuku ebe onso
Asa wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, wakafua mu tshidimu tshia makumi anai ne tshimue tshia bukelenge buandi

Mikenji Idi Ikandika Masandi Biabaka mulume mukashi, adi ulala n andi ne udi umukina, udi wambila bakuabo mei a bundu, udi wona lumu luandi, udi wamba ne, Nakabaka mukashi eu ne hanakasangila n andi bulalu, tshiakasangana bimanyinu bu mukashi utshidi kamama; hashishe tatu wa mushikankunde eu ne mamu wandi nebaluhuke ne bimanyinu biandi bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama kudi bakulu ba mu musoko ne ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko
Buendenda mu nzubu ya kutendelela Muena Izrayele yonsu, mulume nansha mukaji, kena mua kuenda tshiendenda mu nzubu ya mvidie ya bena ditunga
Nuebeje batuangaji ba bena Levi ne balumbuluishi, badi balumbuluisha dituku adi
Yehowa wakambila Gada, mumonyi wa malu wa Davidi, ne, Ya, Wambile Davidi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ndi nteka malu asatu ku mpala kuebe; usungule bumue buau bua meme kukuenzelabu
Shimishona Udi Utamba Bena Peleshete Bukole ku Lehi Hashishe Bena Peleshete bakabanda, bakasa tshitudilu mu Yuda, bakashimika ntenta yabo mu Lehi
Bakabakuata; Eliya wakaya n abo ku kasulu ha Kishona, wakabashihelaku
Nganyi wakubangila mukashi kayi muanze kumubaka
Kanuena mua kuenza manananshi a mushindu ewu bua midimu idi kayiyi ya tshijila

Hakakumbana tshikondo tshia nsongakashi ne nsongakashi kubuela kudi mukelenge Ahashawelosha, hakashikishabo kumuenzela bu muakadi mukenji bualu bua bakashi bua ngondo dikumi ne ibidi, nunku matuku a kulengeshibua kuabo akashika; akadi nunku: ngondo isambombo bakabalengesha ne manyi a mula, ne ngondo isambombo bakabalengesha ne bintu bia dihembu dimpe ne bintu bikuabo bia kulengesha n abi bakashi ; nunku nsongakashi ne nsongakashi wakabuela kudi mukelenge; bakamuha tshintu tshionso tshikasueye hakumukeye mu nsubu wa bakashi bua kuyeye mu nsubu wa mukelenge
Yeye wakambila Yakoba ne, Undekele butuku bukadi ha kutshia
Bakenza bilulu ebi bionso ne buanda bua lin muimpe
Nunku mashi andi adi ashala ha bilamba bienu
Esawu ke nkambua wa bena Edome bonsu
Mitshi ei yakatamba bule, bakamanya mua kumona nsongo yai mu muaba wa tshijila ku mpala kua mushete; kadi kabakamanya mua kuyitangila ha mbelu; udiku tô ne ku dituku edi
Yehowa wakadi ne Bena Yuda, bakihata bakadi ku mikuna, kadi kabakamanya mua kuihata bakadi bashikama mu bibanda bualu bua bobo bakadi ne makalu a biamu
Arone kubambila ne: Umushayi tukanu tua tshiamu tshia mpawungi tudi ku matshi a bakaji benu, ne a bana benu ba balume ne ba bakaji, nutuntuadile

Unvudishile meme kabidi disanka tatu anyi Esau wa kabandisha di diandi wakadila Isaka tatu andi wakamuambila ne, Wewe neushikame mu buloba budi bukuatshika bintu bimpe, ne dibungi dia mu diulu nedikumatshile, wewe newikale ne muoyo bualu bua muele webe wa nvita wewe neukuatshile muakuny ebe mudimu hawahanduka wewe neumushe mutshi wandi wa tshikokedi ku nshingu kuebe
Nenkuhedi tô ne ku tshituha tshia bukelenge
Lehabama wakaya ku Shekeme; bualu bua Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangisha ku Shekeme bua kumuhingisha mu bukelenge
Mvua mukulaye bua kukusankisha bikole
Kulondolola Bukokeshi bua Ahazaya Bak

Pa kutangila bunene ne bukole bwa ntatu idi mitangila ditanta dia bubanji ne dia nsombelu wa bantu idi ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata diakanangana nayi, mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu mmufuka Tshipangu tshimikila mianda ya Bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bantu, tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi milomba pa mianda eyi kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga ne kudi Bukalenga bunene
Bua bualu ebu Bena Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo; Yehowa udi buhianyi buabo bu muakabambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kanukudimunyi mitshima yenu kudi mpingu, kanudienzedi mpingu ne tshiamu tshiakengululabo mu kahia ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Hashishe tshiji tshikole netshinkuate dituku adi, ne meme nembalekele, nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo ne bobo nebajimishibue; ne matata ne makenga a bungi nealue kudibo; bobo nebambilangane dituku adi ne, Malu â mabi onso kaena alua kutudi bualu bua Nzambi wetu kena munkatshi muetu, anyi
Davidi wakamba ne, Nuenu bana ba Seluya, nakanuenzela bualu kai bua nuenu nuikale bena lukuna kundi lelu
Esawu uvua tshilembi wa kalanda musenga, musue kukeba nyama mu tshisuku
Mukelenge wakumuka, ne bonso ba mu nsubu muandi bakamulonda
Kadi neashale ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Dina dia mukashi wa Abishû diakadi Abihayila; yeye wakamulelela Abana ne Moliya
Katumushipi nansha, bualu mmuanetu
Nanku mu Ngoshene muvua mushale amu bana batekete ne bimuna

Nuye anu ne bintu binuakajidila ne milambu yenu ya kuditshiha ku muaba udi Yehowa Usungula; nenufile milambu yenu ya kuosha, ne munyinyi ne mashi, ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nuhongolole mashi a milambu yenu ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nudie munyinyi wau
Ngershone uvua mulele bana ba balume babidi: Libni ne Shimeyi
Bantu ba mukelenge wa Sulia bakamuambila ne, Nzambi wabo udi nzambi wa ku mukuna, nunku bakatuhita bukole; kadi bitualuangana n abo mu mpata, tuetu netubahite bukole
Kuambilaye bantu bonsu ne: Umukayi ku ntenta ya bena buenzavi aba
Dina dianyi ne dia bankambua banyi, Abrahame ne Izake, disanguke ku bukole bua bana ba balume aba
Tshianana ndi mua kubashipa
Bena Gada bakasa Dibona ne Atalota ne Aloe ne Atalota shofana ne Yazê ne Yogebeha, ne Betenimela ne Betehalana, misoko yakadi ne mpangu ya mabue, ne mpangu ya mikoko
Aba ke bana bonsu ba balume bavua Leya mulele ne Yakobe mu Mezopotamiya
Kahia bakahatuka kudi Yehowa, kakosha mulambu ne dianyi biakadi ha tshioshelu, hakakatangila bantu bonso, bakela mbila, bakatua mpala hanshi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Hanualua mu buloba bundi musue kunuha bu buhianyi buenu ne hanateka disama dia nsudi mu nsubu wa mu buloba bua buhianyi buenu, nunku muena nsubu nealue biandi, neambile muakuidi ne, Ndi ngelangana meji ne ditoba dia disama didi mu nsubu muanyi

Biumuka Muena Lewi ku umue wa misoko ya mu Isalele, muakadiye ushikama, bua kubuela ne mutshima wandi wonso mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula, hashishe yeye neanuenzele mudimu mu dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wandi; bu mudi bana babo, Bena Lewi, batu bimana ku mesu kua Yehowa, benza
Kuselabu Mala, Tirsa, Ogla, Milka ne Nowa kudi bana ba batatuabu bakuabu, nanku kudi bantu ba ku ndelanganyi ya Menashe, muana wa Yozefe
Moshe kuambila bamfumu ba bena Izrayele ne: Mfumu yonsu ashipe bantu bende badi batendelela mvidie wa Baale, udi ku mukuna wa Peyore
Badi ditunga dijima
Lakele wakafua, bakamujika mu nshila wa ku Efelata eu udi Beteleheme
Kadi nsubu ya mu misoko idi kayiyi minyungulula ne lumbu neyikale ne madimi, nudi mua kuyihikula, ne bena nsubu nebahingane halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene
Mitshi yenu ne bintu bienu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba nebikale bia mikumbi
Mose wakasua kushikama ne mulume au, ne yeye wakaha Mose Sipola, muan andi wa bakashi
Kadi kanukoshi miepu ne muele to
Untume
Bantu ba mu tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bakashikama mu buloba; bakavulangana ku Bashana tô ne ku Bâla hêmona ne ku Senî ne ku mukuna wa Hêmona

Kadi Zelubabela ne Yeshua ne bakadi ku mutu kua biota bia batatu babo ba mu Bena Isalele bakabambila ne, Nuenu kanuena mua kuasa n etu nsubu wa Nzambi wetu; kadi tuetu nkayetu netuashile Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, nsubu bu muakatuambila Kolesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa
Rebeka kuimita difu dia bana ba mapasa

Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, teleja matshu ebe ku mei ne ku kutendelela bia muntu webe bua kunvua kudila ne kutendekena kua muntu webe kudiye utendekena n aku lelu; bua mesu ebe ikale matabale ku nsubu eu munya ne butuku ku muaba eu uwakamba ne, Dina dianyi nedikaleku; bua kunvua kulomba kua muntu webe kudiye ulomba mu muaba eu
Bantu badi n enu lukuna nebanukokele, nuenu nenudiate mikuna yabo mu makasa enu

Nuafunda ha minoko ya nsubu yenu, ne ku mishiku ya mpangu yenu; nunku nebavudishe matuku enu ne matuku a bana benu mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu bua kubahabo matuku onso atshidi diulu ha mutu ha buloba
Alona nealue ne bintu ebi mu muaba wa tshijila ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne tshimpanga tshia mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Dutelonone Nebikale ne bualu bua Kufunda Mikenji ku Mukuna wa Ebala Mose ne bakulu ba mu Isalele bakambila bantu ne, Nutumikile mikenji yonso indi nnuambila lelu
Esetê wakayikila ne mukelenge kabidi, wakahona ku makasa andi, wakamusengelela ne binsonshi ku mesu bua kukudimuneye bualu bubi buakamba Hamana, Muena Agaga, kuenzela Bena Yuda
Mvidi Mukulu udi usambakena ne Moshe pa mukuna wa Sinayi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Pingana kudi bantu, ubambile ne: Lelu ne malaba numushe mikiya, nusukule kabidi bilamba bienu
Hakadi Bena Isalele bashikama mu Heshebona ne mu misoko yabo ne mu Aloê ne mu misoko yabo ne mu misoko yonso idi ku muelelu wa mai a Ânona bidimu nkama isatu, bualu kai kuakayangata musangu au
Bualu bua meme ndi muntu muhele, ne tshiena ne butumbi
Nuabutuki
Bakamanyisha Davidi; nunku yeye wakaya ku dibue dinene, wakashikama mu tshihela tshia Maona
Kadi tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi ne bujitu kudi Bena Ashedodo, yeye wakababutula, wakabashiha ne masungu, Bena Ashedodo mene ne bakadi ku matshika abo kabidi
Bana balume ba Nafatale ku meku abo Yasele ne meku a Bena Yasele; Guni ne meku a Bena Guni; Yesê ne meku a Bena Yesê, Shilema ne meku a Bena Shilema
Yeye wakambila mukelenge ne, Lumu lunakunvua mu buloba buanyi lua bienzedi biebe ne lua lungenyi luebe luakadi lua bushuwa

Yeye wakatuma miloho kudi Belâma, muana mulume wa Beô, ku Petô udi hehi ne musulu wa Pelata ku buloba bua bantu bandi bualu bua kumubikila ne, Tangila, bantu bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu, tangila, badi batangalaka buloba buonso, badi bashikama hehi n anyi
Nunku wakaya, wakafika kudi muntu wa Nzambi ku mukuna wa Kâmele
Nengele bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba lupemba mu dina diebe ne dia ndelanganyi yebe
Patshiabu dinda nenutungunuke ne luendu luenu
Yoshua Wakenza bu muakamuambila Mose, wakasangana ne Bena Amaleka Mose ne Alona ne Hû bakaya ha mutu ha mukuna

Hashishe Esetê wakamukudimuna ne, Dikonka ne dilomba dianyi bidi nunku: bingikala ne luse ku mesu kua mukelenge, ne biasua mukelenge kuitaba ku dikonka dianyi ne kuenza bu mudi dilomba dianyi, mukelenge ne Hamana balue ku disanka dinene dindi mbalongoluela, ne makelela nengenze bu muakuamba mukelenge
Bintu bionso bia tshijila bia Bena Isalele bidibo banyukula, bidibo bafila kudi muakuidi, nebikale biandi
Kuinyikaye muana awu dina ne Zebulone
Nanku mashi adi ambuluisha bua kujimija bubi, bualu adi apetesha muoyi

Ukuate mudimu webe matuku asambombo, wenza midimu yebe yonso; kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete didi Lumingu lua Yehowa, Nzambi webe: dituku adi kuenji mudimu, nansha wewe nansha muan ebe mulume nansha muan ebe mukashi, nansha muhika webe mulume nansha muhika webe mukashi, nansha ngombe webe, nansha mpunda webe, nansha bimuna biebe, nansha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuebe; bualu bua muhika webe mulume ne muhika webe mukashi nebikishe bu wewe mene
Davidi Udi Unyenga Siona Kul
Abalahama wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakaya ku muaba wakimaneye ku mpala kua Yehowa; wakatangila ku luseke lua Sodoma ne Amola ne Mpata yonso, ne tangilai, muishi wakadi ubanda bu muishi wa tshikutu
Mêyi a ditunga adi aleeja mishindu ya kukumbaja kanungu katudi naku aka

Azemaweta, muana wa Adiele, wakadi ku mutu kua bibutshilu bia mukelenge; Yonatana, muana wa Uziya, wakadi ku mutu kua bibutshilu bia mu madimi ne bia mu bimenga ne bia mu misoko mikese ne bia mu nsubu ya mukelenge; Ezeli, muana wa Keluba, wakadi ku mutu kua mudimu wonso wa madimi; Shimei, Muena Lamata, wakadi ku mutu kua madimi a tumuma tukese; Zabedi, Muena Shefemi, wakadi ku mutu kua bintu biakakumbana mu madimi a tumuma tukese biakatekabo mu bitekelu bia nvinyo; Bâla hanana, Muena Gedê, wakadi ku mutu kua mitshi ya diye ne ya sycomore ya mu bibanda; Yoasha wakadi ku mutu kua bitekelu bia manyi; Shitelai, Muena Shalona, wakadi ku mutu kua bimuna biakadishabo mu Sifiona; Shafata, muana wa Adelai, wakadi ku mutu kua bimuna bia mu bibanda; Obila, Muena Yishemaele, wakadi ku mutu kua tumelo; Yedeya, Muena Melonita, wakadi ku mutu kua nyama ya mpunda; Yaziza, Muena Hageli, wakadi ku mutu kua mikoko
Bonso bakadi ku mutu kua bantu, ne bena bukitu bonso, ne bana balume bonso ba mukelenge Davidi bakadikokela kudi mukelenge Solomo

Kadi mundi udi kayi munyanguke, ne udi kayi muye ku luendu, udi uhidia kuvuluka kuhita kua Yehowa, nebumushe muntu au munkatshi muabo; bualu bua yeye kakafila mulambu wa Yehowa mu tshikondo tshiau, muntu au neadituadile bubi buandi
