Bakalua n andi ha nyima ha tubalu, bakamujika diatshimue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Yuda

Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakajidila tshisamba tshia Lewi, bua kutualabo mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne bua kuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kamuenzela mudimu, ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina diandi, bu mudibo benza lelu
Kanungu ka : Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka, utentemuna ne padibio bienzeka, umbusha ku mudimu, mu olodonase, banzuji ne bandumbulula pa dilomba dia Kapangu ka ku mutu ka bandumbulula
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne tshimue ne nkama itanu
Nanku bantu balume bonsu nebikale bamueneka kumpala kua Maweja Nangila misangu isatu ku tshidimu mu bibilu abi
Mvua mutue nabu ndondu, mubalaye mua kubapesha ditunga dia Kenaane divuabu basombe bu bantu benyi
Bakashihela ba demon badi kabayi Nzambi nyama, nzambi idibo kabayi bamanye, nzambi mihia mihia yakamueneka anu katataka, yakadi batatu benu kabayi batshina diambedi
Utue munu mu mashi a ngombe awu, ulabe mu matumba onsu a tshilambuilu
Bualu ntshitupa tshia tshijila menemene, bualu ntshia ku mulambu uvuabu balambula Maweja Nangila
Bakumukamu, bakashikama mu tshibanda tshia Zalede
Nanku anu bantu balume ba mu meku a batuangaji, ke badi mua kudia munyinyi awu, bualu udi mulambu wa tshijila menemene

Nebashihe ngombe webe ku mesu kuebe, ne wewe kuena udia munyinyi wandi; nebanyenge mpunda webe ku mesu kuebe ku bukole, ne kabena bakuhingishileye; nebahe badi n ebe lukuna mikoko yebe, kakuena muntu wa kunusungila
Nzambi wanyi, unvuluke bua bualu ebu kabidi, unfuile luse bu mudi bunene bua dinanga diebe
Nanku kanuakuikala ne diakalenga to

Yeye neafile mulambu eu bua muaba wa tshijila, bualu bua Bena Isalele kabena bakane, ne bualu bua disambuka diabo dia mikenji, ne bualu bua malu mabi abo onso, nênze nunku bua kulengesha ntenta wa kusangakena udi munkatshi muabo, munkatshi mua bubi buabo
Kuenzabu kabidi mabaya makumi abidi bua ku luseke lua ku mutu kua nzubu wa tshijila
Nanku tshipupu tshivua tshikuate bena Izrayele kujikatshi
Alona wakabambila ne, Nukuohole nkanu ya or idi ku matshu a bakashi benu ne a bana benu ba balume ne a bana benu ba bakashi, nulue n ai kundi

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi muprofete wandi Yehu, muana wa Hanani, bualu bua Bâsha ne bua ba mu nsubu wandi, bua malu mabi akenzeye ku mesu kua Yehowa ne bu muakamufuisheye tshiji bu muakenza ba mu nsubu wa Yalobama; bua malu au yeye wakamushiha
Bakelenge Bukokeshi bua Amasaya Kul
Yeye wakalua ne ba mu nsubu wa Zabedi ku muntu ku muntu, wakasungula Akana, muana wa Kâmi, muana wa Zabedi, muana wa Zela wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda
Nuenu kanuikadi ne luse kudi muntu eu, kadi nenumushe mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua nuenu nuikale ne diakalengele
Mukenji wa Bamonyi Kanuitabushi dî dia mumonyi umue udi utumpila mukuabo tshianana bua dihambuka diandi anyi bua bubi buakenzeye; malu neajalame anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu
Bakalua ne mushete wa Yehowa, wakauteka mu muaba wau mu ntenta wakawashila Davidi
Ku Holeba wa mu nshila wa ku mukuna wa Sei tô ne ku Kadeshe bânea, nduendu lua matuku dikumi ne dimue
Yoshua Buhianyi bua Bisamba Bidi Bishala Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangisha ku Shilo, bakashimikaku ntenta wa kusambakena; buloba buonso buakadi talalâ ku mpala kuabo
Pashishe kuenzabu mabaya makuabu abidi a pa buawu bua mu matumba adi ku mfundu kua nzubu wa tshijila
Nunku bakahana tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha ku nshekele umue, ne bihiminu bia bukula bua orge bibidi ku nshekele umue bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa
Nanku, Yoshuwa kumvua mutoyi wa bantu, kuambilaye Moshe ne: Ndi ngunwua mutoyi mukole wa bantu, baluangana mvita mu mitanda
Uvua mubenge kufika bua tshinyi
Adoniya ne bantu bonso bakadi n andi bakunvua mbila ku ndekelu kua kudia
Bana ba balume ba Seluya bakadi Abishai ne Yoaba ne Asahele, bana basatu
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Ubambile ne, Kanuyi, kanuluanganyi; bualu bua meme tshiena munkatshi muenu; kanuhonyi ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna
Unvuai Isalele, Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, udi biandi Yehowa umue; sua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ne mutshima webe wonso, ne muoyo webe wonso, ne bukole buebe buonso
Bantu bonso bakalua ne ngombe yabo butuku abu, bakayishihaku
Yehowa wakatuela mikenji ei, bua tuetu tutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bua yeye atuenzele bimpe matuku onso, bua tuetu tuikale ne muoyo utudi n au lelu eu
Udi uya penyi
Munudi mua kupola bimuma Nuenu bapitshile mu budimi bua bende budi ne mitshi ya mvinyo, nudi mua kudia tumuma bu munudi basue
Kadi bena Izrayele bonsu too ne bimuna biabu, nansha mbua mene kena mua kubabuikila to

Bia kudia bia Solomo bia dituku dimue biakadi nunku: bihiminu bia bukula bua blé makumi asatu, ne bua manvua makumi asambombo, ne ngombe ya manyi dikumi, ne ngombe ya mu madimi makumi abidi, ne lukama lua mikoko ha mutu ha ngulungu ne tubuluku ne ntole ne nyunyu ya manyi
Kadi Yozefe ne bana babu bonsu bavua Yakobe mubuele nabu mu Ejipitu kufuabu
Bakunfuisha mukau ne tshintu tshidi katshiyi Nzambi, bakunfikisha munda ne mpingu yabo ya hatuhu, meme nembafuishe mukau ne bantu ba hatuhu, meme nembafikishe munda ne tshisamba tshia bantu bahote
Neambe ne: muntu ewu udi ne mikiya
Kanuakadia mampa, kanua kanua nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bua Benyamina yeye wakamba ne, Munangi wa Yehowa neashikame n andi talalâ, utu wamubuikila matuku onso, udi ushikama hankatshi ha makaya andi
Betele uvua ku luseke ludi diba dibuelela, Ayi ku luseke ludi diba dipatukila
Tshibangidilu Yakobe udi wela bikulu bende lupemba Malu onsu aa mamane kujika, kumanyishabu Yozefe bua disama dia tatuende
Yeye wakatshunguluka, wakabatangila, wakabela mulau mu dina dia Yehowa
Enoshe mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi tshitema, kulelaye Kenaane
Bonsu babidi mulume ne mukaji bavua butaka, kadi kabayi bafua bundu
Wewe newenze nkanu ya or ibidi, uteke nkanu ei ku nseke ibidi ya tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi
Pikalabu bakese, nebafile bimenga bikese
Kulembelejaye tshilamba mu mushiku wa mbelu wa muaba wa tshijila
Nenukune mitshi ya tumuma tukese, nenuyilame bimpe, kadi kanuena nunua nvinyo, kanuena nuhuola tumuma; bualu bua bishi nebitudie
Alona wakasaku, bakamujika; ne Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, wakenza mudimu wandi wa buakuidi
Mu mushiku wa mbelu ku luseke ne ku luseke kuvua bilamba mutantshi wa metre muanda mutekete ne tshitupa
Tuyai bietu hanshi, tutompakashe muaku wabo, nunku kabena mua kunvuangana muaku wabo kabidi
Nanku ndi nkusengelela ne: unkuate meme lukole, nshale mupika webe

Yefeta wakalua ku Misepa ku nsubu kuandi; ne muan andi wa bakashi wakaluhuka bua kusangakeneye n andi ne bisanji ne bena maja; yeye wakadi muana wandi umuehele, yeye kakadi ne muana wa balume anyi muana wa bakashi mukuabo
Kadi kanuakunua maluvu ayi, kanuakupola nansha tumuma
Davidi wakatuma Abinê; wakaya biandi talalâ

Hakahita matuku asatu Abalahama wakabandisha mesu andi, wakamona muaba kule kuakua Abalahama wakambila bansongalume bandi babidi ne, Nuenu nushale kimoko ne nyama wa mpunda, tuetu netuye ne nsongalume, netutendelele, netuhingane kunudi
Kadi pikala unudi basombeshe awu mupele, yeye munueyeke tshinkutu tshiende, numupingajiletshi dituku dionsu, butuku kabuyi buanji kuila
Kadi panuikala bamusumbe ne mukajende, nubalekele bonsu babidi
Nzambi ya Sefâwayima ne ya Hena ne ya Iwa idi kudi kunyi
Nunku bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne batuadi ba majitu ne bimbi ba misambu ne Bena Netinima ne bantu bakuabo ba munkatshi muabo ne Bena Isalele bonso bakashikama mu misoko yabo
Nennuhe ditalala mu buloba, nenulale tulu, ne bantu kabena banutshinyisha, nengihate nyama mibi mu buloba buenu, ne kabena balue ne muele wa nvita mu buloba buenu
Usele mukaji wa mu ditunga adi, muana wa mansebebe Labane
Nenusungule misoko ya kunyemena isambombo
Kadi pikala mulambu awu wa bintu bilamba mu luesu, udi ne bua kuikala bukula busambakaja ne mafuta
Wenze bu mudi lungenyi luebe; kuitabushi bua mutu wandi udi ne nsuki mitoke tô ubuele mu Muaba wa Bafue ne ditalala
Hilama wakatumina Solomo dî ne, Nakunvua dî diwakuntumina, nengenze malu onso awakuamba bua mitshi ya cèdre ne ya cyprès
Uvuluke ne wewe wakadi muhika mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakubikula: ka nunku ndi nkuelela mukenji eu lelu
Bena Ebelu bakadi badisangisha ne Bena Peleshete, bakadi bafuma ku buloba buabo habuela n abo mu tshitudilu tshiabo, katataka bakakudimuka, bakadisangisha ne Bena Isalele bakadi ne Shaula ne Yonatana
Tshitupa nansha tshimwe tshia beena ditunga anyi muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kubwangata ne mbwende to
Yeye kuitaba ne: Ke meme ewu
Ebu mbuloba bua Bena Lefa

Hakafikabo, bakalua kudi Mose ne kudi Alona ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele mu tshihela tshia Palana ku Kadesha, bakalua kudibo ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso ne dî diabo, bakabalesha mamuma a buloba abu
Balake kuandamuna Balaame ne: Tshiudi ungenzela ntshinyi
Yeye wakamba ne, Bualu ebu nebuenjibue bu mu mei enu, muntu utuasangana n alu, yeye neikale muhika wanyi, ne bakuabo benu nebahanduke

Aba mbakelenge ba bisamba, bakadi ku mutu kua bantu bakabalabo bakatua ne bintu biabo ku mpala kua Yehowa makalu manene asambombo ne ngombe dikumi ne ibidi dikalu dimue kudi bakelenge babidi, ne ngombe umue kudi muntu ne mundi, bakalua n abi ku mpala kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Biakuma ngombe mulume anyi mukashi ne nsengu yandi ne biafueye, nebakume ngombe mabue, kabadi munyinyi wandi nansha, kadi muena ngombe neabinge

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ulua n enu mu buloba buimpe, buloba budi bûle tente ne tusulu tua mai, ne mishimi ya mai idi ihatuka mu mikuna ne mu bibanda; buloba bua blê ne orge ne mionshi ya tumuma ne mitshi ya nfigi ne grenade; buloba bua mitshi ya olive ne buitshi; buloba bunudi mua kudia bidia bia bungi, kanuena nukengela tshintu; buloba budi ne biamu bia tubanda, nudi bamanye mua kumbula biamu bikunze bia tubanda ku mikuna yabu
Wakadi ne biluwa bia bibi bia ha masoso a nsubu mu milongo isatu, masoso adi matangilangane mu milongo isatu
Umushe dibodi dia nyunyi ne bintu bionsu bidimu
Nulongeshe bana benu mikenji eyi, nuyitele diba dionsu, panudi nusomba ku nzubu yenu, nansha panudi nuendakana mu njila, panudi nulala nansha panudi nubika
Mu tshikondo atshi nakanuambila malu onso anudi ne bualu bua kuenza
Yoketana wakalela Alamodada ne Shelefe ne Hasâ maweta ne Yela ne Hadolama ne Uzala ne Dikela ne Ebala ne Abimaele ne Sheba ne Ofî ne Hawila ne Yobaba
Nenku mu tshikondu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene, budimi abu budi amu bupingana kudi Maweja Nangila
Hazaele Udi Ubuela mu Bukelenge bua Sulia Elisha wakaya ku Damaseke
Ke Moshe kusangisha nkanu ya kupikula nayi bungi bua bena Izrayele buvua bupite bungi bua bena Levi
Muele wa nvita neubashihe ha bula, ne buowa nebubuele mu nsubu yabo; nebashihe bansongalume ne bansongakashi batshidi tumama, ne bana batshidi bamua mabele ne bakulumpe badi ne nvi ku mitu kuabo
Mana avua mushindu wa ntete ya koriyandre, mitoke too, mafuanangane ne budimbu bua mutshi wa mbdeliyume
Nebabidie amu kudi bena diku diebe, balume ne bakaji, badi kabayi ne mikiya
Bumuka mu Alushe, kuyabu ku Refidime, muaba uvuabu kabayi mua kupeta mayi a kunua to
Yeye wakenza malu mabi onso akenza tatu wandi ku mpala kuandi; mutshima wandi kawakadi muakane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, bu muakadi mutshima wa Davidi, tatu wandi
Bakabakengesha ne mudimu mukole, mudimu wa tushola ne buloba busoha ne midimu yonso ya mu madimi
Bakadisungula
Kutomboka kudi bualu bubi bu butempi bua mbuku ne tshitshu tshidi bu kutendelela kua mpingu ne manga a hatuhu
Kubambilabu ne: Nuenu nudi ne mutu mukole
Nuenu nuelangane meji mu mitshima yenu ne, Bu mudi tatu ukengesha muan andi mulume, nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanukengesha
Ahimasa wakakudimuna ne, Hakatuma Yoaba muntu webe kûdi, nakunvua diyoyo dinene, kadi tshiakamanya muakadi bualu

Dibadika Dibaka dia bakaji badi mua kupiana Bamfumu ba ku ndelanganyi ya Yozefe ba mu diku dia Ngilaade, muana wa Makire, uvua kabidi muikulu wa Menashe, kuya kudi Moshe ne bamfumu bakuabu ba bisamba bia bena Izrayele
Kadi nebashale bua kuambuluisha bana babu batshidi ku mudimu
Ke Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Olola diboku mulu bua mvula mukole wa mabue aloke, alokele bena ditunga dia Ejipitu, bimuna biabu ne bintu bionsu bidi mu madimi
Udi ne tshinyi mu tshianza tshiebe
Pashishe nenkuele lupemba kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, tshiyi muanji kunushiya

Bualu bua mitshi yabo ya tumuma tukese idi bu mitshi ya mu Sodoma ne ya mu madimi a Amola: tumuma tuabo tudi bu nyongangandu, ne tshisumbu tshia tumuma tshidi ne bululu: nvinyo yabo idi bu lulengu lua nyoka, bu lulengu bikole lua nyoka wa ntoka
Bualu mbena tshibawu bavua badikebela lufu
Ke muaba uvuabu bajike Abrahame ne mukajende Sara, bajike kabidi Izake ne mukajende Rebeka
Nanku padi mutuangaji ulambula bintu abi kudi Maweja Nangila, buvyele bua mukaji buajiki

Tshiji tshikole tshiakakuata Davidi bua muntu au; yeye wakambila Natana ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, muntu wakenza bualu ebu udi ne bua kufua; budiye n abu mbua kumuhingishila mikoko mai bua bualu ebu buakenzeye, bualu bua yeye kakadi ne luse
Bualu bua bobo nebakudimune mutshima wa muan enu mulume, bua yeye kandondi meme bua kukuatshileye nzambi mikuabo mudimu: nunku Yehowa neanukuatshile tshiji, neanujimishe lubilu
Bualu Maweja Nangila uvua munukandike bua kupingana mu ditunga edi
Bantu bakaluhuka, bakahaula tshitudilu tshia Bena Sulia
Hushai wakambila Abashaloma ne, Dî diakukuambila Ahitofele tshikondo etshi kadiena dimpe nansha
Anu dituku adi, nenundambule kabidi mulambu wa kuosha wa muana wa mukoku wa tshidimu tshimue, udi kauyi ne bulema
Moshe kutuluka, kuya kuvua bantu, kubalondelaye bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile abi
Tuvua babenge kabidi kupitshila mu njila wa kuinshi wa mu tshibanda, ne mu misoku ya Elate, ne Eshiyone Ngebere
Yehowa wakamukudimuna dî ne, Juka, uye ku Kila, bualu bua meme nenfile Bena Peleshete mu tshianza tshiebe
Dana nealumbuluile bantu bilumbu biabo, bu tshimue tshia mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Mmutuadije kabidi ku Sodome ne Ngomore, too ne ku Adma ne Seboyime pabuipi ne Lesha
Yeye ke uvua nsenda wa biamu bishilangane bikunze ne bifike
Hashishe nuenu nuakangambila ne, Tuakuenzela Yehowa bibi, netuye, netuluangane, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Muntu uvua muambule bia bungi, kavua nabi bipite, uvua muambule bikese, uvua anu nabi bikumbane
Miloho yakumuka, yakahingana kudiye kabidi ne ditaba edi
Nanku bena Kekate kabamonyi tshintu tshia tshijila nansha katupa ka diba to
Bua Benyamina yeye wakamba ne, Munangi wa Yehowa neashikame n andi talalâ, utu wamubuikila matuku onso, udi ushikama hankatshi ha makaya andi
Kukonkaye mansebende Labane ne: Udi mungenzele nanku bua tshinyi
Nomba Bena Isalele Badi Batombokela Yehowa Bantu ba mu tshisumbu tshionso bakela dî diabo bikole, bakadila butuku abu

Ahaba wakambila Nabota ne, Umpe budimi buebe bua tumuma tukese bua meme kushala n abu bu tshibundu tshia matshitshi, bualu bua budi ha buihi ne nsubu, ne meme nenkuhe budimi bukuabo budi buhita buebe buakane, anyi biwamona ne mbimpe, nenkuhe argent bu mushinga wa budimi
Nunku kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Padi mulume ulala ne nyama, bamushipe, bashipe kabidi ne nyama awu
Kulondolola Tshihungidi Tshiakahunga Asa ne Bene hadada Bak
Nakangata mabue au abidi akadi mu bianza bianyi, nakashiha ku mesu kuenu
Kubambilaye ne: Kanuteki madilu to
Anu mu Madiyane amu, Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Eyowa, pingana mu Ejipitu, bualu bantu bonsu bavua bakuelela meji mabi mbamane kufua
Kanuditapi nsalu pambidi to
Mu tshibombi tshia muanamukala, kuena upingajamu amu makuta avuaye mutule to
Moshe ne Arone kuya kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kuenza muvua Maweja Nangila muambe
Nuenu nuakangambila ne, Bualu buwakuamba budi buimpe bua tuetu tuenze
Too ne bena mudimu benu, balume ne bakaji, badi ne bua kuikisha, bu munudi nuikisha nuenu
Uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, udijidile, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Ndelanganyi ya Kekate Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Nubadike bena Levi ba bena Kekate ku meku ne ku bisamba biabu
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakakumbana kudi Bena Yelushalema ne kudi Bena Yuda tô ne hakumusheye bonso ku mesu kuandi
Yeye wakamukukuila

Bantu aba bonso, muntu ne muntu, bakakosa matamba, bakalonda Abimeleke, bakâteka kuinshi kua nsubu, bakosha nsubu ne kahia; nunku bantu bonso bakadi mu tshibumba tshia mu Shekeme bakafua kabidi, bu bantu tshinunu ne balume ne bakashi
Nunku Davidi wakangata mulondo wa mai ne difuma diakadi ku mutu wa Shaula, bakaya

Katataka, tangilai, anu meme nkayanyi, nYeye mene, kakuena nzambi mukuabo, anu meme; meme ndi nshiha bantu, ndi mbabisha ku lufu; meme ndi ntaha bantu mputa, ndi mbondaha kabidi; kakuena muntu udi mua kubasungila mu tshianza tshianyi
Meshelemeya wakadi ne bana balume ne bana babo, bena bukitu dikumi ne muanda mukulu
Bana balume ba Lotana: Holi ne Homama; Timena wakadi muan abo mukashi ne Lotana
Pashishe kuenzabu nkanu makumi atanu ya tshiamu tshikunze, bua kulamakaja bilamba abi, bua ntenta awu amueneke bu muenza ne tshilamba tshimue

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mona, meme nakudiangatshila Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele mu miaba ya ban a bute bonso bakalelabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi: bualu bua ban a bute bonso mbanyi, mu dituku dinakashiha ban a bute bonso mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nakadijidila ban a bute bonso ba mu Isalele, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, bobo mbanyi, meme ndi Yehowa

Batangalaja amu madilu a Yakobe, Yozefe kuambila balombodi ba mu bukalenga bua bena Ejipitu ne: Ndi nnusengelela ne: Panudi bannange, nundombele kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, akumbaje dijinga dianyi edi: Tatu wanyi kayi muanji kukula muoyi, uvua munshila diyi bua meme kuditshipa bua kumujika amu mu ditunga dia Kenaane mu lukita luvuaye mumane kudilongolola
Nuenu nutumikile mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuambila; kanusesuki ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Bakabakudimuna di ne, E, udiku; monai, udi ku mpala kuenu, endeshai mpindiu, bualu bua yeye wakalua ku musoko anu lelu; bantu badi ne bualu bua kufilabo milambu lelu ku mutu kua mukuna

Hashishe bakaluhuka ne muana wa mukelenge, bakateka tshifulu tshia butumbi ha mutu handi; bakamuha mukanda wa dihungila, bakamujadika mukelenge, bakamuela manyi ha mutu handi; bakamututshila nkashi, bamba ne, Mukelenge ikale ne muoyo
Ku nyima kuandi Hananya, muana wa Shelemeya, ne Hanuna, muana muisambombo wa Salafa, bakalongolola tshituha tshikuabo
Tshiena ne tshindi mua kukuenzela kabidi mpindiewu, muananyi
Maweja Nangila umvua bijanu bienu, kufikaye munda
Dutelonone Muaba Umuehele wa Kutendelela Yehowa Â mmalu ne mei anudi ne bualu bua kutumikila mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, munuhe bua kubuhiana matuku onso a muoyo wenu ha buloba
Muadi wende kumvuika kudi bena Ejipitu bonsu
Nunku ndi nkutendekena ne, Witabushe bua muntu webe ashale kunoko bu muhika webe mu muaba wa nsongalume, ne nsongalume ahingane ne bana babo
Bana ba Hashuma, nkama ibidi ne makumi abidi ne basatu

Yeye wakayikila n abo, wakabambila ne, Binuitabusha bua meme kujika tshitalu etshi ku mesu kuanji, nungunvuile, nungakuile kudi Efelona, muana wa Sohâ bua yeye ampe lubuebue lua ku Makepela, ludiye n alu ku mpenge kua budimi buandi, yeye alumpe ku mesu kua buonso buenu ku mushinga udiye musue wa muaba wa kujikamu tshitalu
Bakidika muaba au ne, Kibelota hatawa, bualu bua bakajikamu bantu bakadi ne lukuka
Hashishe mukashi wakamuebesha ne, Meme nakalombela mukelenge wanyi muana wa balume, anyi

Kadi dî dia Nzambi diakalua kudi Shemaya, muntu wa Nzambi, ne, Wambile Lehabama, muana wa Solomo, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina bonso ne bantu badi bashala ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanuyi bua kuluangana ne bana benu, Bena Isalele: muntu ne muntu ahingane ku nsubu kuandi, bualu ebu buakufuma anu kundi meme
Nanku kabakuikala kabidi ne mikiya to

Hakabuelabo mu nsubu, yeye wakadi mulale tulu ha bulalu buandi mu nsubu wandi wa bulalu; bobo bakamutua muele, bakamushiha, bakamukosa mutu, bakaya n au; bakenda tô butuku bujima mu nshila wa ku Alabâ
Bakaluangana ne Bena Midiyana bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, bakashiha balume bonso
Muntu yonsu udi ubuelela muanabu wa bakaji wa tatuende, nansha wa mamuende, mu nzubu, asangane muena tshibawu kuenza anyi
Kena mupete mpingu mu ntenta wa Rakele to
Padi tshidimu atshi tshikumbana, uvua musumbishe budimi buende abu neabuangate
to ne ku

Malaya Pashishe Moshe kumanyisha bamfumu ba meku a bena Izrayele mikenji mikuabu ya kudi Maweja Nangila ya ne: Pikala muntu mulaye bua kulambula Maweja Nangila mulambu, nansha mutshipe bua kujila tshintu, udi ne bua kukumbaja bimpe bionsu bidiye mulaye abi
Nuenu kanuyi bamufute, yeye mudidile Maweja Nangila, nenuikale bena tshibawu
Ke muvua bena Izrayele bafike mu ditunga dia bena Amore nanku
Genese Hakatangila Lakele ne, Tshiena ndelela Yakoba bana, hashishe Lakele wakadi ne mukulu andi mukau, wakambila Yakoba ne, Umpe bana, anyi meme nenfue
Abrame kumutuadila nyama yonsu ayi, kuyipanda nseke, kuteka luseke ne luseke bitangilangane
balongolola tulasa mu Bulongolodi bwa tulasa mu ditunga dijima budi ne bilongelu bia mbulamatadi ne bilongelu bidikadila bianyisha
Bena nsudi banai bakadi bashikame ku tshibi tshia musoko; bakambilangana ne, Tudi bashikame kunoko tô ne hatuafua bua tshinyi
Biasanganabo muntu udi wiba muan abo umue wa Bena Isalele, udi umuenza bu muhika, anyi udi umuhana, hashishe nebashihe muibi: nunku nenûmusbe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
; Mfumu wa bena Shimeyone: ke Shelumiyele, muana wa Surishadayi, ne bantu bende
Yeshuluna, kakuena mukuabo bu Nzambi, udi ushikama biandi mu diulu bua kukukuatshisha: bulengele buandi budi ku mutu kua matutu
Yetelo wakasanka bua malu mimpe onso akenzela Yehowa Bena Isalele, bualu bua yeye wakabasungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu
Kadi Yeshuluna wakavunda, wakatua mikumu: nuenu nuakuvunda, nudi ne mafuta a bungi, nuakusenena; hashishe yeye wakalekela Nzambi wakamufuka, wakahetula Dibue dia luhandu luandi
Uteke nsonga ibidi ya tukanu tuhindakasha ku bilulu bia efoda bidi ha maha, ku mpala kuabi
Ashilayi bakaji benu ne bana benu bimenga, enzayi bikumbi bia bimuna bienu
Kadi pavua bena Izrayele balengame batangile mpala wa Moshe bu muvuaye ukenka, Moshe uvua ubuikila tshilamba pa mpala too ne papinganaye kabidi kudi Mvidi Mukulu
Ebi mbintu bionso bia mu mai binudi mua kudia: bintu bionso bidi ne mialala ne mabamba nudi mua kudia; kanuena mua kudia bintu bidi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba; kabiena biakane kunudi
Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudi Bena Yuda bua kubavuisha mutshima umue, bua bobo batumikile mukenji wa mukelenge ne wa bantu bandi banene ku dî dia Yehowa
Davidi Udi Utamba Bena Peleshete Bukole Sam
Akisha wakamba ne, Wakuhaula bena nganyi lelu eu
Samuele Mushete wa Tshihungidi Udi mu Buloba bua Bena Peleshete Bena Peleshete bakanyenga mushete wa Nzambi, bakalua n au ku Ebene ezê tô ne ku Ashedodo
Izake kuambila Esawu ne: Muakunyebe Yakobe mmufike kundi ne budimu bua bungi
Davidi wakambila Ônana ne, Nansha

Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa wakahueka ha mukuna wa Sinai, wakabika munkatshi muabo ku Sei, wakatemena ku mukuna wa Palana, wakamueneka munkatshi mua binunu makumi bia bantu bandi ba tshijila, wakalua kudibo ne mikenji mitema kahia mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bukole
Yozefe kuandamuna ne: Tshiena mua kuenza nanku to

Nunku uhingashe mukashi kudi mulume wandi, bualu bua yeye udi muprofete, neakulombele Nzambi bua wewe wikale ne muoyo, kadi biwahidia kumuhingasha, umanye biebe ne wewe ne bantu bonso baudi n abo nenufue bulelela
Kadi, tshisamba tshia Menashe tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Makire, ndelanganyi ya Makire; ne dia bena Ngilaade, ndelanganyi ya Ngilaade, muana wa Makire
Neboshe munyinyi ku kahia butuku abu, nebaudie ne mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, nebaudie ne matamba adi ne bululu

Bena Lewi neitabe, nebambile bantu bonso ba mu Isalele ne dî dikole ne: Muntu yonso udi usonga luhingu anyi udi wenza luhingu ne tshiamu tshiakatulabo kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule, udi kujadika mu musokoko, ntshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, udi ne mulau
Pikala mukaji mukamba, nansha uvuabu babenga ku dibaka, musue kulaya bualu, udi ne bua kukumbaja bionsu bidiye mulaye abi
Nunku nuakashikama mu Kadesha matuku a bungi, nudi bamanye bungi bua matuku anuakashalamu
Aba bakadi bana balume ba Bena Lewi bu muakadi nsubu ya batatu abo
Kadi pavuaye umona bimuna bia mashina ne bia bimpanga binyane bikuatangane, Yakobe ka vua uteka matamba a mitshi awu to

Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza, ne mu kukumbasha kua bana ne mu kukumbasha kua bimuna bienu ne mu bintu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba; bualu bua Yehowa neikale ne disanka bualu buenu, bu muakasankeye bualu bua batatu benu; binuatumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi ne mei andi bidi bifunda mu mukanda eu wa mikenji: binuakudimuka kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Yeye wakaha muntu yonso wa mu Isalele ne balume ne bakashi mutanda wa bidia ne tshihesa tshia munyinyi ne tshisumbu tshia tumuma tûme
Hakamuimbila muimbi wa tshisanji, tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakalua kudiye
Kena wa mamu to
Malu atshidi masokoka adi malu a Yehowa, Nzambi wetu: kadi malu adi masokolola adi malu etu ne a bana betu tshiendelele, bua tuetu tuenze mei onso a mikenji ei
Bana balume ba Ezê: Bilehana ne Zawana ne Yakana
Umushe bilamba bia lukanu, avuale bikuabu, asombe ku nzubu kua muntu awu, enze madilu a tatuende ne a mamuende ngondu mujima
Izake kutshinyika dina ne: Lukuna Sitna
Nunku nuenu nutumikile mei a tshihungidi etshi, nuê nze, bua nuenu nuikale ne dikasa dimpe mu malu onso anudi nuenza

Kanulondi nzambi mikuabo ya bantu badi ha buihi n enu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi wa mukau, bua tshiji tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, katshikadi kunudi, ne bua yeye kanujimishi ha mutu ha buloba

Neafile tshimpanga tshidi katshiyi ne tshilema kudi muakuidi tshia mushinga ûdi witabusha bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne muakuidi neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji buakenzeye ku mpukahuka, kayi mubumanye, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Yeye mumane kudisanga ne Mvidi Mukulu nanku, Mvidi Mukulu kumuambula, kuya nende, Enoke kayi umueneka kabidi pa buloba to
Hashishe yeye wakamba ne, Nzambi angenzele nunku ne malu makuabo ha mutu kabidi biashala mutu wa Elisha, muana wa Shafata, ham bidi handi lelu

Dutelonone Yehowa Neabuele Bisamba bia Bena Kanâna Unvuai, Isalele, nenusabuke Yadene lelu, bualu bua kuihata bisamba bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole, ne misoko minene idi ne mpangu mile idi mihite mulu, bantu banene badi bale, bana balume ba Anaka, banudi bamanye; nuakulua lumu luabo ne, Nganyi udi mua kuimana ku mpala kua bana balume ba Anaka

Bikala bakuabo bamuangalake tô ne ku ditengu dia diulu, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neabasangisheku, neabahingisheku kabidi; ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nealue n enu mu buloba bua batatu benu, ne nuenu nenubuhiane; yeye neanuenzele bimpe, neanuvudishe ha mutu ha hatatu benu
Bana benu nebikale bu bena tshiendenda mu tshihela etshi tô bidimu makumi anai, bobo nebatuale bujitu bua masandi enu, tô ne hajimina mibidi yenu mifue mu tshihela etshi
Wakatula bitekelu bia minda bia or dikumi bu muakamba mukenji wakabiteka mu ntempelo, bitanu ku tshianza tshia balume ne bitanu ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Mulume kuinyika mukajende dina ne: Eva

Nenuikale ne disanka dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu ne bana benu balume ne bana benu bakashi, ne bahika benu balume ne bahika benu bakashi, ne Bena Lewi badi ku mbelu kuenu badi kabayi ne buhianyi kunudi

Nsongalume wakamuambila ne, Meme nakalua ku mukuna wa Gileboa ku mpukahuka, ne mona, Shaula wakadi mushindamine ku difuma diandi; ne mona, bena makalu ne bantu bakadi benda ha nyima ha tubalu bakadi bamutshintshimike ha buihi
Mayi kuvulangana, kubandisha buatu kulu
Nunku tuakahita bana betu, bana ba Esau, bakadi bashikama mu Sei, mu nshila wa ku Alabâ ku Elata to ne ku Esione gebê

Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kwangata muntu mu Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu: a padiye kayi mweena Kongu; b padiye kayi uleeja ne udi ne dimanya dipiluke dia bidimu dikumi ne bitanu mu mianda ya bukoshi bwa nsambu anyi ya tshidiidi
Mutuangaji atue munu mu mashi awu, aalabe ku matumba matalame adi ku tshilambuilu tshia milambu ya kuosha
Bantu bakuabo ne bunvue, nebatshine, kabena benza malu au mabi munkatshi muenu kabidi
Akisha wakambila Davidi ne, Nenkuvuishe mulami wa mutu wanyi tshiendelele
Muntu yonsu udi usomba pa tshintu tshivua muena disama musombe, neasukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Elisha wakateka bianza biandi ha bianza bia mukelenge
Yayende wa muana awu, uvua muimanyine pa bule, bua kumona tshivua ne bua kuenzekela muana
Nenubahe kabidi bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi, ne tshia nvinyo muhia muhia, ne tshia manyi enu, ne miosa ya mikoko
Lufu lua Yoshiya Kul
Nahore mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi abidi ne tshitema, kulelaye Tera

Kadi pikala mulume mukuabu mukubuelele mu nzubu, wewe mudinyange, mudinge bayebe, Maweja Nangila akunyoke, ushale nkumba, upeta difu dia munana, bua ushale tshilejilu kudi bantu bonsu, bua batshipangane, batela dina diebe
Nanku bintu abi nebishale bia mutuangaji

Tuakanyenga misoko yandi yonso tshikondo atshi, tuakahaula musoko ne musoko muakadi bantu, ne bakashi ne bana bakese: katuakashiya nansha muntu; kadi tuakadiangatshila bimuna, ne bintu biakadi mu misoko ituakanyenga
Dîyi didi difila makanyika a mwa kulongolola nau masungulangana ne dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga
Nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nuditshihe kudi dina diandi
Yeye wakamba ne, Ulue ne tshi lulu tshiudi n atshi, utshikuate yeye wakatshikuata, ne wakamubadila bihiminu bia orge bisambombo wakamutekeye, yeye wakaya ku musoko
Nunku mukashi wakashala, wakamusha muan andi mulume mabele tô ne hakalekeleye mabele

Munkatshi mua bisamba ebi kanuena nusangana ha kuikisha, anyi kua kutalasha munda mua makasa enu; Yehowa neanutumineku mitshima izakala ne mesu a buowa ne kusamina kua muoyo; nenuikale ne mpata bua mioyo yenu; nenuikale ne buowa munya ne butuku, kanuena nuikala ne ditekemena dia mioyo yenu
Maweja Nangila udi munkathi muetu bonsu
Dituku dionsu, wikale wosha ngombe mulume bua kukobolola bantu
Mpindiewu pantshidi ne muoyi munkatshi muabu, bakabenga Maweja Nangila
Ndi mua kufuila mu njila
Teka mesa ku mpala kua tshilulu, ne teka muinda ku luseke lua tshitendelelu ludi ku Sude, neuteke mesa ku luseke lua ku nôde
Wakalamika or ku nseke yonso ya munda mua nsubu, ku mabaya ne ku bilua bia bibi ne ku bimanu ne ku bibi kabidi; bakasonga bifuanyikishi bia bakeluba ku bimanu
Pashishe neakose ngombe awu muminu
Bikala muntu mubi mukumbane bua kukumibua, hashishe mulumbuluishi neamuladike hanshi, nebamukume ku mpala kuandi; bungi bua mikumu nebuikale bu bubi buandi
Tuetu kubashipa, katuyi bashiye muntu nansha umue ne muoyi

Yehowa neanutumme tshisamba tshia kule kuakua ku ditunga dikuabo bu nyunyu wa mukanku; kanuena bamanye muaku wa tshisamba atshi; badi ne luonji ku mpala kuabo, kabena banemeka bantu banunu, kabena ne luse kudi bana batekete; bobo nebadie kukumbana kua bimuna bienu, ne bintu biakadiunda mu buloba buenu tô ne hanuajimishibua; kabena banushila kabidi manvua anyi nvinyo mihia mihia anyi manyi anyi kukumbana kua bimuna bienu anyi bana ba mikoko yenu tô ne hanuajimishibua kudibo
Tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole tshia malongu onsu atshi tshivua tshia bujitu bua Kilo , bilondeshile tshipimu tshidi muaba wa tshijila
Badipu kulambula mitshi ya ndunga ivuabu mua kuenza nayi mudimu awu

Badi Babala Mikenji ku Mikuna ya Ebala ne Gelezima Yoshua wakashila Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, tshioshelu mu mukuna wa Ebala, bu muakambila Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, Bena Isalele, bu muakafundabo mu mukanda wa mikenji ya Mose; bakasa tshioshelu ne mabue adibo kabayi banze kusonga ne biamu; bakafidilahu milambu ya kuosha kudi Yehowa ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala

Dutelonone Bintu Bifila kudi Bena Lewi Bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi, ne tshisamba tshionso tshia Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele; bobo nebadie munyinyi wa milambu ya Yehowa idibo bosha ha kahia bu buhianyi bua Yehowa

Bikalaku mushikankunde utshidi kamama, udi mubangila kudi mulume, ne muntu mukuabo udi usangakena n andi mu musoko, udi ulala n andi; hashishe nebalue n abo bubidi buabo ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko au, nenubakume ne mabue tô ne hafuabo; mushikankunde, bualu bua yeye kakadila hakadiye mu musoko, ne mulume, bualu bua yeye wakanyanga mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Bena Izrayele ne ndelanganyi yabu yonsu, balame mukenji ewu kashidi
Hakikisha mushete, yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, uhingana biebe kudi binunu bia binunu bia Bena Isalele
Nakatuma matembue ku mpala kuenu, akabihata ku mpala kuenu, bakelenge babidi ba Amole mene; ka nku muele webe wa nvita, anyi ku buta buebe
Dituku edi bakashi ba bantu banene ba mu Pelasa ne Madai bakunvua bualu buakenza mukelenge mukashi nebambile bantu banene ba mukelenge muomumue
Bena Izrayele kujuka mu dinda dionsu, kufilabu milambu ya kuosha ne ya ditua ndondu
Yeye wakambila bayandi ne, Ndi mumanye ne, Muntu eu udi muntu muakane wa Nzambi utu walua kutudi
Bâzilai wakebesha mukelenge ne, Matuku a muoyo wanyi adi bungi munyi bua meme kuya ne mukelenge ku Yelushalema
Bena Izrayele bonsu bumuke ne muena tshibawu awu muaba udi mitanda, bamuase mabue, bamushipe
Siba wakambila mukelenge ne
Nunku Mose, muinu wa Yehowa, wakafua mu buloba bua Moaba muakamba Yehowa
Kuvungululaye ntenta pa mutu pa muaba wa tshijila
Bobu bavua basombe mu Edome
Kujibikilabu ne buloba biina bia mayi bionsu, bivua bena mudimu ba tatuende Abrahame bumbule, patshivua Abrahame ne muoyi
dipeta dia bintu bwa majinga a ditunga, kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ;
Nenuikale nubatumina diyi
Nakatangila ne monai, nuakenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bubi; nuakadienzela kana ka ngombe ne biamu biakatulabo; nuakadi nusesuka lubilu mu nshila wakanulesha Yehowa
Meme ndi mmona bimpe malu masokome
Yehowa wakantumina Yelubâla ne Bedana ne Yefeta ne Samuele, wakanusungila mu bianza bia bakadi n enu lukuna ku nseke yonso; nuenu nuakashikama talalâ
Kadi meme nakanuambila ne, Nenuhiane buloba buabo, nennuhebu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nakanujidila munkatshi mua bantu bakuabo
Kadi mukashi wa Lota wakatangila ku nyima kuandi, wakakudimuka dibue dia luehu

Yakoba Udi Uluangana Bibula ne Muntu ku Peniele Butuku abu wakabika biandi wakangata bakashi bandi babidi ne bakashi babidi benji ba mudimu ne bana bandi dikumi ne umue, bakasabuka ku dilobo dia Yaboka
Bualu bua tuetu tudi benyi ku mpala kuebe, tudi anu bu bahitshi ba mu buloba bu muakadi bankambua betu; matuku etu a ha buloba adi bu mundidimbi, katuena ne ditekemena dia kushalaku
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Kadi katshia nkumanyisha bualu ebu too ne mpindiewu kuena musue kuitaba
Bonsu ne: Enze
Yeye wakamba ne Monai, diba ditshidi mulu, kandiba dia kusangisha bimuna nansha, nuishai mikoko mai, yai bienu nuyidishe
Mukalu wa Bena Lubena wakadi musulu wa Yadene ne mukalu wau
Udi upitshila mu diulu, upueka, wenda pa mavuba, anu bua kuvua kunuambuluisha
Etu ntukanunuina tuabo: muan a bute wa Yishemaele wakadi Nebayota; hashishe Kedâ ne Adabele ne Mibesama, Mishema ne Duma, Masa, Hadada ne Tema, Yetû, Nafisha ne Kedema
Nansha muntu waka batangila anyi wakamanya bualu ebu; nansha muntu wakabika ku tulu, bualu bua buonso buabo bakadi balale tulu bualu bua tulu tua kashendenda difume kudi Yehowa biaka bakuata
Yehowa udi ubavuisha buhele, ne udi ubavuisha bubanji kabidi: udi ubahuekesha, udi ubabandisha kabidi
Nebadie munyinyi wa muana wa mukoku, ne mampa adi kaayi mela buanga, ne biseki bia bululu

Dutelonone Hangata mulume mukashi bua kumubaka, ne bikala mukashi kayi muimpe ku mesu kuandi bualu bua yeye wakamusangana ne malu adi kayi mimpe, hashishe yeye neamufundile mukanda wa kushiha dibaka, neamuheu mu bianza, neamûmushe mu nsubu wandi
Beriya uvua mulele bana ba balume babidi: Ebere ne Malkiyele
Kabakuenza kabidi malu mabi a nanku to
Nzambi wakamuha malu akalombeye
dikuba dia beena musoko;
Bualu bua bintu biabo biakatamba bia bungi kabakamanya mua kushikama kaba kamue, ne buloba buakadibo bashikame buakadi bukese bualu bua bungi bua bimuna biabo
Nanku muntu udi mua kuakula bimpe nansha kushala kamama, kumvua nansha kuikala ne mapapa, kumona nansha kayi umona ku bukole bua nganyi
Bena Isalele Badi Batombokela Yehowa ku Holeba Numanye bienu ne, Yehowa kena munuhe buloba ebu buimpe bu buhianyi bualu bua buakane buenu; bualu bua nudi bantu ba tshitshu
Batuangaji bamiamine mashi a mbuji awu ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Nenutumikile meyi ne mikenji biende bimvua munumanyishe
Bualu kai udi udibuesha mu malu a bakuabo bua kudikengesha ne bua kudilenduisha n au, wewe ne Bena Yuda
Netubuelemu munyi

Ekesode Mose ne Alona Badi ku Mpala kua Palo Ku nyima kua malu â Mose ne Alona bakalua kudi Palô, bakamuambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi Wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye mu tshihela bua kudia bidia ku mesu kuanyi
Sala wakamona muana mulume wa Haga, muena Ejipitu, wakadi muledibue kudi Abalahama, wakadi useka biandi

Mu tshidimu tshia makumi anai ne mu ngondo wa dikumi ne umue ne dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo eu, Mose wakamanyisha Bena Isalele bua malu onso akamuambila Yehowa mu mikenji yakabeleleye; hakashiheye Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona, ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakadi ushikama mu Ashetalota ku Edelei

Bobo bakimana ku mpala kua Mose ne kua Eleazâ, muakuidi ne ku mpala kua bakelenge ba mu tshisumbu, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bakamba ne, Tatu wetu wakafua mu tshihela, yeye kakadi munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia Kola tshiakadisangisha kudi Yehowa, kadi yeye wakafua anu bualu bua mibi yandi, yeye kakadi ne bana ba balume nansha
Bakamujika ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi; Amasaya, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Diba adi, bantu bonsu ba mu tshimenga atshi, nebamuase mabue, bamushipa
Shaula wakakonka Yehowa lungenyi ne, Nenye kulonda Bena Peleshete, anyi
Ubatume, bakehe mukelenge webe; bumue Nyuma wa Yehowa wakabanda n andi, wakamuela ha mutu ha mukuna mukuabo anyi mu tshinga tshibanda
Kadi kupangilabu
Batatu kabafuidi bana babo, ne bana kabafuidi batatu abo: muntu yonso adifuile bua malu mabi andi
Yosefe wakasangisha argent yonso yakadi mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ya mu buloba bua Kanâna ku bintu bia kudia biakasumbabo, Yosefe wakalua ne argent yonso mu nsubu wa Palo
Hakumuka Mose ku mukuna wa Sinai ne mabue abidi a mei a dihungila mu bianza biandi, hakahuekeye nunku, Mose kakamanya ne musunyi wa ha mpala handi wakakonka bualu bua yeye wakadi usomba ne Yehowa
Yehowa neamutahulule munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bua kamuenzela bibi, bu mudi milau yonso ya tshihungidi etshi mifunda mu mukanda eu wa mikenji
Bualu ebu buakafikisha Nzambi munda; nunku yeye wakashiha Bena Isalele bakuabo
Pashishe Yakobe kuambila bena mudimu bende ne: Unguijayi mushiki wa mabue muaba awu

Yakoba wakamukudimuna ne Bidimu bia luendu lua bukole buanyi bidi lukama ne makumi asatu, matuku anyi adi makese, akadi mule tente ne malu mabi, kaena manze kufika ku bungi bua bidimu bia bankambua banyi mu luendu lua bukole buabo
Bakambila Davidi ne, Wewe kuena ubuela munemu, anu haumusha bafofo ne balema, bela meji ne Davidi kena mua kubuelamu
Mabue a nvula akashika bintu bionso bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu biakadi mu budimi, ne bantu ne nyama, mabue a nvula akashika midioko yonso ya mu budimi ne mitshi yonso
Bakumuka mu Bene yâkana, bakashikama mu Ho hadidegada Bakumuka mu Ho hadidegada, bakashikama mu Yotebata
Solomo wakalambishila bantu bidia bia disanka tô matuku muanda mutekete; Bena Isalele ba bungi bakadi n andi ku tshibuelelu tshia Hamata tô ne ku kasulu ka Ejipitu
Bungi buabo basangisha ne bana babo bakadi bayishibue bua kuimbilabo Yehowa misambu, bonso bakadi ne tshimbidi tshiakane, bakadi nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mukulu ne muanda mukulu

Bana bandi balume, Isaka ne Yishemaele, bakamujika mu lubuebue lua Makepela mu budimi bua Efelona, muana wa Soha, Muena Hiti, ku mpala kua Mamale, budimi buakasumba Abalahama kudi bana ba Hete, bakajikamu Abalahama ne Sala, mukashi wandi

Wakidikisha bujitu bua mesa a bidia bilesha, ku mesa ne mesa; ne bua argent ya mesa ne mesa; ne bua or ya bitubuidi bia munyinyi ne malonga ne makoho, ne bujitu bua or ya bihanza bionso, ne bua bihanza bia argent kabidi
Mweena lukanu yônso badi ne tshia kumwangata mu mushindu wa kulaminyina mooyo wende, bukole bwende bwa mubidi ne bwa lungenyi ne kabidi mushinga wende
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne nyama udi ne mulau
Wakadi tshilembi tshikole ku mesu kua Yehowa, bantu bakadi bamba bu lusumuinu ne, Bu Nimeloda, tshilembi tshikole ku mesu kua Yehowa
Nenukebeku mua kudihana kudi badi n enu lukuna bu bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, kadi kakuena muntu udi unusumba
Hanuasombesha mukuenu tshintu, kanuyi mu nsubu wandi bua kudiangatshila tshieya tshiandi
Kakuena muntu udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuenu: Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke buowa ne dishina kudi bena buloba buonso bunudi nudiata ku makasa, bu muakanuambileye
Merari uvua ne bana ba balume babidi: Mali ne Mushi

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi; ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi; ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Ahila, muana mulume wa Enana
Nunku ditshina dia Yehowa dikale kunudi; nudimuke bimpe bu munudi nuenza bualu bua kakuena malu mabi kudi Yehowa Nzambi wetu, yeye kena ne kansungusungu, kena witabusha bintu bia mbueshilu kudi muntu
Mu Holeba nuakafuisha Yehowa tshiji kabidi ne Yehowa wakadi n enu tshiji, wakamba kunushiha
Maweja Nangila neatuambuluishe, bu muudi utuambila emu
Moshe kukema, wamba ne: Akia
Bualu ke muaba uvuabu bajiike bena Izrayele bavua ne lukuka lua munyinyi
Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Bukula bua mu mulondo kabuena bushika, ne tuanyi tua mu kasu katuena tukeha tô ne ku dituku diatuma Yehowa nvula ha buloba
Padi muena Izrayele ulambula mbuji nansha mukoku bu mulambu wa kuosha, asungule anu mukoku wa tshimpanga, nansha mbuji wa mpumbu udi kayi bulema
Yehowa wakunvua
Yehowa, kakuena mukuabo bu wewe, kakuena Nzambi mukuabo ku mpala kuebe, bu mudi malu onso atuakunvua ku matshu etu
Nenuikale ne bintu bipite bungi: ntete ya kuenza bukula, mvinyo, mafuta, ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji

Nunku Bena Babulona bakenza Sukota benota, ne Bena Kuta bakenza Nêgala ne Bena Hamata bakenza Ashima, Bena Awa bakenza Nibehaza ne Tâtaka; ne Bena Sefâwayima bakoshila Adelameleke ne Anameleke, nzambi ya Bena Sefâwayima, bana bakalelabo mu kahia
Bonsu pamue:
Mukashi wakamba ne, Wewe wakelangana meji bua kuenzela bantu ba Nzambi nunku bualu kai
Tshituha tshidi tshishale netshikale tshia Alona ne bana bandi balume ntshintu tshidi tshitambe tshia tshijila tshia mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Bila kuimita difu, kulelela Yakobe muana wa balume mukuabu

Yabesa wakatendelela Nzambi wa Isalele wamba ne, Nakadi kusua bua wewe kunsankisha ne kulehesha mikalu yanyi ne bua tshianza tshiebe tshikale n anyi, bua wewe kundama bua tshibuedi mu malu mabi ne bua meme tshikadi ne kanyinganyinga
Izake kushala mubanji, kumuna bimuna, ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji
Hakamona Alona ne Bena Isalele bonso Mose, monai, musunyi wa ha mpala handi wakakonka, bobo bakatshina bua kulua n andi ha buihi
Pikalabu bavuile njila umue, nebanyeme bapingena mu njila muanda mutekete mishilangane
Kadi muntu nansha umue kakunusumba to
Dutelonone Bunene bua Yehowa Nunku suai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numunemeke, nutumikile malu andi ne mei andi ne mikenji yandi matuku onso

Kanuikadi ne kansungusungu hanualumbulula bilumbu; nunvue dî dia muntu mukese ne dia muntu munene muomumue; kanutshinyi mpala wa muntu; bualu bua kulumbulula kua bilumbu kudi kua Nzambi: tshilumbu tshidi tshihita bukole, nulue n atshi kundi, meme nentshiunvue
Kuenzedi muenyi bualu bubi, kumukengeshi, bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Dilomba diebe didi tshinyi
Pashishe kuelaye Yakobe lupemba
Wakenza tshintu tshia kuteka ha mutu ha nsubu ne biseba bia bimpanga bitua mu mai makunze kunzû ne biseba bia nyama ya nkonge bia kuteka ha mutu hatshi
Bua bualu ebu, Maweja Nangila neabanyenge ditunga diabu panuafikamu
Bualu bavua bumvue ne: neafike mu munya bua kudia netu
Bena Yuda bonso ne ba mu Yelushalema bakashila Yoshiya madilu

Wakalongolola muaba mutambe wa tshijila; bunene buandi buakadi bu butshiama bua nsubu coudées makumi abidi; ne butshiama buandi buakadi coudées makumi abidi; wakateka or ku nseke yonso; mushinga wandi wakadi bu ntalanta ya or nkama isambombo
Tuetu bakamba ne, Kabena mua kuyaku, bikala muakuny etu kayi muye n etu, bualu bua katuena mua kumonangana ne muntu au ku mesu bikala muakuny etu kayi n etu
Budimi abu ne lubuebue luvuamu, Abrahame kubiangata kashidi, bena Iti bonsu bamone
Ebu mbuloba bua Bena Lefa
Tuye n ebe, tuhunge tshihungidi, wewe ne meme, tshihungidi etshi tshikale bu kuditshiha kua bualu munkatshi muetu
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu

Nzambi wakatuma muanjelo ku Yelushalema bua kushiheye bantu bakadimu; ne hakambeye kushiha bantu, Yehowa wakamona, wakakudimuna mutshima wandi ku bualu ebu bubi; wakambila muanjelo wa lufu ne, Kuakushika, ukande tshianza tshiebe
Yehowa Nzambi wetu, bintu ebi bionso bituakulongolola bua kukuibakila n abi nsubu wa dina diebe dia tshijila biakafuma mu tshianza tshiebe, bionso bidi biebe mene

Yisakâ udi bu nyama wa mpunda mukole, udi ulala hankatshi ha mpangu ya mikoko, wakatangila muaba wa kulala ne, Mmuimpe wakatangila buloba ne, Mbuimpe, wakahuekesha diaha diandi bua kumema bujitu, wakalua bu muhika wa mudimu mukole
Nunku nenutahulule Bena Isalele ku bukoya buabo, bua bobo kabafu mu bukoya buabo honabo nsubu wanyi wa tshitendelelu tshidi munkatshi muabo
bukubi bwa ditunga pambelu;
Wakaladika tshiamu tshia or ha mutu ha mesa ne ku matengu onso kabidi

Muntu udi kayi muakane neangate butue bua mulambu wakoshabo bua kubuikila n au bubi, neangate mai adi ahueka mu dilonga: mundi utshidi muakane neangate mabeshi a hysope, neâtue mu mai, neamiamine ha ntenta, ne ha malonga onso, ne ha bantu bonso bakadimu, ne mundi wakalenga mifuba tshianza, anyi mundi wakafua ku muele wa nvita, anyi mundi mufue, anyi lukita, mundi utshidi muakane neamiamine mai ha mundi udi kayi muakane dî diku disatu ne dituku dia muanda mutekete, ne halua dituku dia muanda mutekete neamulengeshe, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale muakane ku dilolo
Nenku nebamuipate mu bena Izrayele, bua mashi adiye mumatshishe panshi, kayi mulonde mikenji
Bantu bakaji banuvua bakuate mu bupika benze pabu nanku
Bana ba Hebelone: Yeliya kahita, Amalia muibidi ne Yahaziele muisatu ne Yakemama muinai
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bualu bubi kai budi mu tshianza tshianyi
Nunku Nzambi wakalekesha Yabina, mukelenge wa Kanâna, ku mesu kua Bena Isalele dituku adi
Muntu yonsu udi uleja mpofu njila mubi, asangane muena tshibawu kuenza anyi
Buhianyi Buakabaha Mose Yeye kakaha tshisamba tshia Lewi buhianyi nansha; milambu idibo boshila Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ha kahia, mbuhianyi buabo, bu muakabambileye
Nengele bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba lupemba bualu buebe
Sara kuimita, kulelela Abrahame muana wa ku bukunda, mu tshikondu tshivua Mvidi Mukulu mujadike
Hashishe Yolama wakahitshila ku Saî ne makalu andi onso; bakabika butuku, bakashiha Bena Edome bakadi babanyunguluka ne tupitene tua makalu; bantu bakanyema ku ntenta yabo

Mushete wa ndondu Bena Izrayele bangenzele mushete wa mitshi ya ndunga, bule buawu buikale bua metre umue ne santimetre makumi abidi ne itanu, butshiama buawu buikale santimetre makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu, butumbuke buawu buikale kabidi santimetre makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu
Wakatuangana bilulu bitanu ha buabi, bilulu bitanu ha buabi
Solomo wakananga Yehowa, wakenda mu mikenji ya Davidi tatu wandi; kadi anu bualu bumue, yeye wakashiha nyama, wakosha musenga wa manananshi ha mutu ha mikuna
Hakadi bahika bambila Davidi mei â, mutshima wandi wakatamba kusanka bua kuikala muku wa mukelenge
Baluishi benu nebanutshimbakaje
Aba mbafumbi ba bivuadi ne bakadi bashikama mu Netaima ne Gedela; bakashikamaku ne mukelenge bua mudimu wandi
Kutshiompakajaye tshiluilu atshi
Misangu yonsu ivuabu babuele mu ntenta wa kusambakena, nansha bafike pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, bavua bowa mayi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Leya uvua ne bana ba balume basambombu: Rubene, ke muanabute, bamulonda kudi Shimeyone, Levi, Yuda, Isakare ne Zebulone
Nakambila mukelenge ne, Mukelenge ikale biandi ne muoyo tshiendelele; meme tshiena mua kubungama munyi, bualu bua musoko udi nkita ya bankambua banyi udi muhaula ne bibi biau bidi bioshibua ne kahia
Makire kulela Ngilaade
Tshisamba tshia Gada, Eleyasafa muana mulume wa Luele neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Gada
Nakadi muye ku Beteleheme yuda; katataka ntshidi nya ku nsubu wa Yehowa, ne kakuena muntu udi umbuesha mu nsubu wandi
Tuetu tudi tufuma mu ditunga dia Kenaane

Bua bualu ebu mukelenge Solomo wakenzesha bantu mudimu wa kuasabo nsubu wa Yehowa ne nsubu wandi ne Milo ne lumbu lua ku Yelushalema ne Hasô ne Megido ne Gezê Diambedi Palo, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, wakanyenga Gezê, wakawosha ne kahia, wakashiha Bena Kanâna bakadimu, wakamua bu buhianyi kudi muan andi, mukashi wa Solomo
Ku nyima kuandi yeye wakabaka Mâka, muana mukashi wa Abashaloma: yeye wakamulelela Abiya ne Atai ne ne Shelomita
Bana babo kabakamanya mua kumuitaba, bakadi batshina ku mesu kuandi
Nanku, utusumbe, usumbe kabidi ne madimi etu
Tshitekelu tshia muendu atshi, tshikale kumpala kua tshilamba tshidi tshilembeleja bua kujika muaba udi mushete wa ndondu
Yeye wakamona mukelenge muimane ha tshiambidi bu mudi tshilele tshiabo ne tupitene ne bedi ba mpungi bimane ha buihi ne mukelenge; bantu bonso bakadi hasanka, bela mpungi
Muntu ne muntu wakangata bintu biandi bia nvita; nuakamba kuya ku mikuna
Mulau wa Mashi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mutshima wa Palô udi ne tshitshu, yeye udi uhidia kulekela bantu
Hashishe Tatenai, gouverneur wa buloba budi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, ne Shetâ bozenai ne bena mulongo wabo bakenza bualu buakabambila mukelenge Dayawesha ne mitshima yabo yonso
Shimei wakashikama mu Yelushalema matuku a bungi
Bu mudi butu kabuyi mua kumusha, boshe tshintu atshi
Yolama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi
Mu tshisamba tshia Ashê, Mishala ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Abidona ne miaba ya ku matshika, Halekata ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Lehoba ne miaba ya ku matshika: bimenga binai
Bikala mulambu wa mundi wa kumuvuisha n au ditalala wa munkatshi mua mikoko wa kudia kudi Yehowa, neafue mulume nansha mukashi udi kayi ne tshilema
Bilulu bienu kabiakasunsuka ham bidi henu, ne makasa enu kaena mûle bidimu ebi makumi anai
Bana ba Elekana: Sofai muan andi, ne Nahata muan andi, ne Eliaba muan andi, ne Yelohama muan andi, ne Elekana muan andi
Haleha matuku muanda mutekete nendokeshe nvula ha buloba munya ne bufuku to matuku makumi anai, nenjimishe bintu bionso binakafuka ha buloba
Bilamba abi, wewe Moshe ubivuadike muanenu Arone ne bana bende ba balume, ubalabe mafuta, ubambike midimu yabu
Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu etu, anukumbashe tô ne hanuahita bungi buenu bua katataka misangu tshinunu, anusankishe bu muakunulayeye
Maweja Nangila neanukengeshe ne makenga makole onsu, anuvua batshine, avuaye mukengeshe nawu bena Ejipitu
Wenze kabidi mushete wa mabaya
Vulukai, kanuhu muoyo bu munuakafuisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiji mu tshihela; ku dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu tô ne hanuakafika ku muaba eu, nuakahidia Yehowa

Yosefe wakabangata bubidi buabo, Efelayima ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume ne mpala wandi mutangile ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia Isalele, ne Manashe ku tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi mutangile ku tshianza tshia balume tshia Isalele, wakabasemesha ha buihi n andi

Mu tshihungu tshia bantu tshidi tshitua, bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima ne benyi badi bafuma ku buloba bukuabo, hatangilabo makenga akalua ku buloba abu ne masama onso adi Yehowa mubatumine ne buloba buonso budi bu butue ne luehu ne bintu bioshibue, kabena bakunamu tshintu, kabena bahuolamu tshintu; ne mashinde kaena amenamu: buloba budi buikala bu kubutuka kua misoko ya Sodoma ne Amola ne Adema ne Seboima yakashiha Yehowa mu tshiji tshiandi tshikole; bantu aba bonso nebambe ne, Bualu kai Yehowa wakuenzela buloba ebu nunku
mêyi adi alongolola mianda ya malaba ne majimba, bulongolodi bwa mwaba wa kusomba, ngikadilu wa mâyi ne meetu;
Bua tshinyi udi munshime, munyeme mu musokoku, katuyi balayangane nebe
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nenkudimune mesu anyi kudibo, neutangile muikala nshikidilu wabo, bualu bua badi bena tshikondo tshia tshitshu, bu bana badi kabayi mua kueyemenyibua
Bungi bua bantu bakalaka, bateke bianza ku mishiku, buakadi balume nkama isatu; kadi bantu bonso bakuabo bakatua binu hanshi bua kunuabo mai
Neashidishe bantu bavua bashale ne muoyi mu bimenga biabu
Yoshua wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Luai kunu, nunvue mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Yehowa wakambila Ahiya ne, Tangila, mukashi wa Yalobama ulualua kukuebesha bualu bua muan andi; bualu bua yeye udi usama; nunku umuambile mei kampanda; bualu bua habueleye kudi, yeye neadifuanyikishe bu mukashi mukuabo
Dutelonone Nuenu nudi bana ba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu: kanuditahi nsalu, kanubeyi makiki enu bualu bua bantu bafue

Yehowa neanuvuisbe bu mitu, kena unuvuisha bu mikila; nuenu nenuikale anu ku mutu, kanuena nuikala hanshi, binuatumikila mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, indi nnuambila lelu, binuayenza; binuikala kanuyi nusesuka lelu ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi ku mei andi nnuambila, bua kuya kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu
Hashishe muakuidi neuvuwe bilulu ne mubidi wandi ne mai, ne ku nyima nealue biandi mu tshitudilu, neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Etshi ntshikondo tshia kuangata argent ne bilulu ne madimi a olive ne a tumuma tukese ne mikoko ne ngombe ne bena mudimu balume ne bena mudimu bakashi, anyi
Yeye wakatshisulula, wakamona muana, ne muana wakadila Yeye wakafuka muana luse, wakamba ne, Yeye udi muana wa Bena Ebelu
Kadi kabena mua kusemena pa buipi ne tshilambuilu, nansha ne muaba udi bintu bia tshijila to
Hashishe bantu banene ba mu Isalele ne mukelenge bakadihuekesha; bakamba ne
Kanuena mua kuasonga ne biamu to
Uyiteke pa mesa menza ne tshiamu tshia mpawungi nkayatshi, adi kumpala kuanyi meme, Maweja Nangila
Samuele Abashaloma Udi Utombokela Davidi Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Abashaloma wakadilongoluela dikalu ne tubalu ne bantu makumi atanu bua kuyabo ku mpala kuandi
Nakadi nkuenzela nunku dia mbedi, anyi

Yehowa neanuvuisbe bu mitu, kena unuvuisha bu mikila; nuenu nenuikale anu ku mutu, kanuena nuikala hanshi, binuatumikila mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, indi nnuambila lelu, binuayenza; binuikala kanuyi nusesuka lelu ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi ku mei andi nnuambila, bua kuya kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu
Ndi mbenga tshiji tshiabu tshikole, ndi mpidia lonji luabu kaluyi luse
Pashishe bena Levi nebafile ngombe mulume pamue ne mulambu wa bukula, busambakaja ne mafuta
Ebi mbintu bionso bia mu mai binudi mua kudia: bintu bionso bidi ne mialala ne mabamba nudi mua kudia; kanuena mua kudia bintu bidi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba; kabiena biakane kunudi
Mvidi Mukulu wa bukole buonsu udi ukuela lupemba
Bakunfuisha mukau ne tshintu tshidi katshiyi Nzambi, bakunfikisha munda ne mpingu yabo ya hatuhu, meme nembafuishe mukau ne bantu ba hatuhu, meme nembafikishe munda ne tshisamba tshia bantu bahote
Ubatelele mihanu ya lin ya kubuikila butaka buabo, mihanu neyikale ku tshimono mifike to ne ku bibelu
Nunku Yonatana wakahunga tshihungidi ne ba mu nsubu wa Davidi, Wamba ne, Yehowa neatshimone ku bianza bia bena lukuna ba Davidi
Bana hadibo balela mu tshikondo tshisatu badi mua kubuela mu disangisha dia Yehowa
Muntu yonso udi kayi ujadika mei a mikenji ei bua kuyenza udi ne mulau
Bena Isalele bakenza bibi; bakashiha tshihungidi tshinakahunga n abo, bakadiangatshila tshintu tshia tshijila, bakatshiba kabidi, bakasokoka bubi buabo; bakatshiteka munkatshi mua bintu biabo mene
Wakenza mudimu kudi kunyi
Yehowa wakamba ne, Bika, umuele manyi ha mutu, eu nyeye mene
Mêyi a ditunga adi aleeja bulongolodi, lwendu ne makookeshi a bilumbulwilu bia beena mwabo bôbo nkayabu
Hashishe Davidi wakabikila Siba, muhika wa Shaula, wakamuambila ne, Nakafila bintu bionso, biakadi kudi Shaula ne kudi ba mu nsubu wandi bonso, kudi muana wa mukelenge webe
Hashishe Yosefe wakambila bantu ne, Monai, nakunusumbila Palo lelu, nuenu ne buloba buenu ka maminu adi aha bua bualu buenu, nuakune mu buloba
Hanuabuela mu budimi bua tumuma bua mukuenu, nudi mua kudia tumuma kukuta tente, kadi kanuangatshi tumuma mu tshisaka
Hashishe wewe newikale ne diakalengele biwadimuka bua kutumikila mikenji ne mei biakambila Yehowa Mose bua Bena Isalele; wikale ne dikima ne mutshima mukole; kutshinyi, kukuatshiki buowa
Wewe uvua mundaye ne: Nenkulame, neupete dikasa dimpe
Moshe kufikisha mikenji ayi yonsu kudi Arone, kudi bana bende ba balume, ne kudi bena Izrayele bonsu
Elisha wakamumona, wakela dî diandi ne, Tatu wanyi, tatu wanyi, dikalu dia Isalele ne badi benda ha tabalu tuadi
Maweja Nangila mmumunemeshe ne bintu bia bungi: ke mikoku, ngombe, mbuji, tumelu, mpunde, biamu bitoke bia mushinga mukole, biamu bia mpawungi, ne bapika balume ne bakaji
Muntu nansha umue kakubavuluka kabidi to
Mukaji ne bana bishale bia mfumu uvua mumusumbe awu
Yehowa wakambila Samuele ne, Unvile mei a bantu mu malu onso adibo bakuambila; bualu bua bobo kabakakuhidia wewe, bakampidia meme bua meme tshikadi mukokeshi wabo
Moshe mumane kumanyisha bena Izrayele malu onsu avua Maweja Nangila muambe, kubabelaye ne: Mikenji yonsu indi nnuambila lelu eyi, nuyikumbaje
Mukashi wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Shimishona
Kadi binuikala kanuyi baditshiha, bualu ebu kabuena bubi kunudi
Bialala mukashi ne nyama, nebashihe mukashi ne nyama kabidi, mashi abi neikale ham bidi habi
Katuakudia bintu ebi mu madilu etu, katuakabilenga hatuakadi banyanguke, katuakabifila kudi bakadi mu madilu: tuakutumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu; tuakuenza malu onso akatuambileye
Nanku diba dianyi dia lufu diakumbanyi
Kulondolola Tunkanunuina tua Benyamina Benyamina wakalela Bela muan a bute wandi, ne Ashabele muana muibidi, ne Ahala muana muisatu, ne Noha muana muinai, ne Lafa muana muitanu
Bualu bua dibue diabo kadiena bu Dibue dietu nansha bikala bena lukuna balumbuluishi ba bualu
Bidi ne bukookeshi bwabo nkayabu pa bubanji, pa bantu, pa lupetu ne pa dimanya dipiluke
Bualu Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wenu, udi munkatshi muenu
Bena nvita bonso bakadi n andi bakaya, bakasemena ha buihi, bakalua ku mpala kua musoko; bakasa tshitudilu ku luseke lua nôde lua Ai; tshibanda tshiakadi hankatshi habo ne Ai
Muele wa nvita neubashihe ha bula, ne buowa nebubuele mu nsubu yabo; nebashihe bansongalume ne bansongakashi batshidi tumama, ne bana batshidi bamua mabele ne bakulumpe badi ne nvi ku mitu kuabo
Nanku bumudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu ununanga, kakunulekela, kakunubutula to
Bobo bakahueka bamulonde, bakanyenga malobo a mu Yadene akadi kudi Bena Moaba, kabakitabusha bua muntu umue asabukeku
Bana ba Yakobe kuenza bionsu amu muvua tatuabu mubashila diyi
Bualu ngondu awu ke unuvua bapatuke mu Ejipitu
Nenuhidie matuku mavule
Kadi nuenu nuakahidia bua kuyamu, nuakahidia mukenji wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Yeye wakamubandisha ha mutu ha miaba mile ya ha buloba, wakadia bintu biakaboba mu madimi, wakamunuisha buitshi buakadi mu mabue, ne manyi akadi mu mabue makole; Wakamudisha manteke a mabele a ngombe, ne mabele a mbushi, ne dianyi dia mikoko ne bimpanga bia mu Bashana ne mbushi, ne blê yakatamba buimpe, nuakanua nvinyo ya tumuma tukunze tuakadi bu mashi
disungula ne diteeka dia batangiludi ba mu polovensa, tulasa tupwekela, tubandila, twa midimu ya bianza ne twa nsungansunga;
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Bisamba ebi bidi bituhita bunene, nembihate munyi

Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kutumina bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi mukanda udiye mufunda yêye nkayende anyi mufunda mu tshibûngi bwa kubumanyisha idi mwenda munda, bukalenga abu budi ne tshia kufila diandamuna mu ngondo isatu idi ilonda
Badi mua kumukuma mikumu makumi anai, kadi kabahitshi: biahilabo mikumu ei, muan enu neikale bu muntu wa hatuhu kunudi
Bena Isalele bakamona mpala wa Mose ne musunyi wa ha mpala ha Mose wakakonka: Mose wakateka tshilulu tshikudika ha mpala handi kabidi tô ne hakayeye kusomba ne Yehowa

Nenusanke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne wewe ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muntu webe mulume ne muntu webe mukashi ne Muena Lewi udi mu musoko webe ne muenyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi munkatshi muenu, mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi
Ahila, muana mulume wa Enana, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Nafatale
Mpindiewu ukadi uditeka kabidi mfumuetu
Hashishe mukelenge wakandamuna ne, Bahe mukashi wa ku mpala muana udi ne muoyo, kabanushihi, bualu bua yeye udi muledi wandi
Mukenji ewu, bikale bawenzulula ku tshidimu tshionsu kudi ndelanganyi yenu yonsu
Kanujadiki dibue dia kutendelela didi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ukina
Kuasabu mitanda yabu kuinshi kua Migdole

Katataka nudikonke munda bua matuku adi ku nyima akadi ku mpala kuenu, katshia Nzambi wafuka bantu ha buloba, ne ku luseke lumue lua diulu tô ne ku luseke lukuabo ne, Bikalaku bualu bunene nunku, anyi bikalabo bunvue lumu lua bualu bua nunku

Mukelenge wakambila Ebeyatâ muakuidi ne, Hingane ku Anatota ku madimi ebe bualu bua udi ne bualu bua kufua: tshiena nkushiha katataka, bualu bua wewe waka tua la mushete wa Mukelenge Yehowa ku mpala kua Davidi, tatu wanyi, ne bualu bua wewe wakakenga ne tatu wanyi mu makenga onso akadiye n au
Yeye udi Dibue; mudimu wandi wonso udi muakane, bualu bua nshila yandi yonso idi milulame: Nzambi wa kalolo udi kayi ne bubi, udi ne malu makane a bushuwa
Ke padi bena Izrayele kabayi badia munyinyi wa mu tshikundukundu tshia nyama too ne ku lelu, bualu bavua bakoyobole Yakobe tshikundukundu

Bikalaku mushikankunde utshidi kamama, udi mubangila kudi mulume, ne muntu mukuabo udi usangakena n andi mu musoko, udi ulala n andi; hashishe nebalue n abo bubidi buabo ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko au, nenubakume ne mabue tô ne hafuabo; mushikankunde, bualu bua yeye kakadila hakadiye mu musoko, ne mulume, bualu bua yeye wakanyanga mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Nebibe mpunde yenu, nuenu batangile, kanuyi mua kuyipeta kabidi
Yeye wakatendelela Yehowa, wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, wewe wakenzela mukashi wa mu lufuila undi mushikame n andi bibi bua kushiha muan andi mulume, anyi
Utufuileku luse ku bionsu bitudi bakuenzele, bualu tudi bantu bebe
Messager wakafika kudi Davidi wamba ne, Mitshima ya Bena Isalele idi kudi Abashaloma
Solomo Udi Ulomba Mudimu kudi Hilama wa ku Tulo Kul
Itshikije mashi makese ku nseke ya tshilambuilu
Yehowa wakunyua mei enu hanuakadi basombe n anyi; ne Yehowa wakangambila ne, Nakunvua mei a bantu aba, akukuambilabo; mei onso akuambabo adi mimpe
Mose Udi Unyema Ejipitu Mu matuku au, hakakola Mose, yeye wakaya kudi bana babo, wakamona mudimu wabo mukole, wakamona Muena Ejipitu ukuma Muena Ebelu, muan abo
Yeye wakamba ne, Nentshihikule
Sibekai, Muena Husha wa Bena Zela, wakadi kapitene ka tshisumbu tshia mu ngondo wa muanda mukulu; mu tshisumbu tshiandi muakadi bantu binunu makumi abidi ne binai
Bivua anu Ubalombola diba dionsu
Hashishe Yosefe wakambila ba ntu bandi ne, Nubushile bibombi biabo tente ne bia kudia, nuhingashe argent wa muntu ne muntu mu tshibombi tshiandi, nubahe bintu bia kudiabo mu nshila, bakenza nunku

Hanuahuola bintu bia mu madimi enu, ne kafulaminyi kadi kanukuata bua kushiya bisumbu bikuabo mu madimi enu, kanuhinganyi bua kubiangata; nebikale bia benyi ne bia bana ba nshiya ne bia bakashi ba mu lufuila; nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu

Hashishe Esetê wakabahingisha kudi Môdekai ne dî edi ne, Ya biebe, usangishe Bena Yuda bonso badi mu Shushana, bajile bia kudia bualu buanyi matuku asatu; kabadi tshintu, kabanu tshintu tô matuku â asatu butuku ne munya; meme ne bena mudimu banyi bakashi netujile bia kudia diatshimue; hashishe nenye kudi mukelenge bu mudi kamuyi mu mikenji; binafua, nenfue
Pashishe mukalu awu neuye kumpala ufika ku bibandabanda bidi luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua dijiba dia Ngenesarete, too ne ku musulu wa Yardene, bua kushikidila ku Mayi manene a luepu
Esetê Buneme bua Môdekai Mukelenge Ahashawelosha wakalambuisha bantu ba mu buloba ne mu bisanga bia mu mai manene milambu
Yeye wakanumanyisha bua tshihungidi tshiandi tshiakanuambileye bua nuenu nuenze, mikenji ei dikumi mene mene; yeye wakayifunda ha mabue abidi
Nundambule ngombe mulume umue, mukoku wa tshimpanga umue, ne bana ba mikoku muanda mutekete, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijima, bishile
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai
Newenzele muhika mukashi muomumue

Dituku dinai bakadisangisha mu tshibanda tshia Belaka; bualu bua bakatumbishaku Yehowa; nunku bakidika muaba au ne, Tshibanda tshia Belaka tô ne ku dituku edi, Hashishe Bena Yuda ne ha mu Yelushalema bakahingana ku Yelushalema ne disanka, ne Yehoshafata wakadi wenda ku mpala kuabo; bualu bua Yehowa wakabayuisha disanka ku mpala kua bakadi n abo lukuna
Mona, tuetu tudi bena mudimu lelu eu, ne bua buloha buwakaha bankambua betu bua kudiabo mamuma abu ne bintu biabu biakane, mona, tuetu tudi bena mudimu mu buloba ebu

Nunku, mona, bantu bonso ba mu diku dietu bakadisangisha kudi muntu webe bamba ne, Ufile wakashiha muan abo bua tuetu tumushihe bua muoyo wa muan abo wakashiheye; nunku nebashihe muhianyi kabidi; nunku nebajimishe dikala dianyi dia kahia didi dishala, nebashiye bayanyi kayi ne dina hanshi ha buloba
Moshe kuela ndelanganyi ya bena Yuda lupemba, wamba ne: Maweja Nangila, bena Yuda badi bakubikila, ubateleje
Nudi mua kudia nyunyu yonso idi miakane
Davidi wakabatahulula mu milongo bu muakadi bana balume ba Lewi: Gêshona ne Kohata ne Melali

Malu awu mamane kupita, kuambilabu Abrahame ne: Bana ba balume badi Milka, mukaji wa muanenu Nahore, mulele badi muanda mukulu: muanabute udi Use, pashishe Buze, Kemuyele, tatuende wa Arame, Keshede, Azo, Pildashe, Idlafe ne Betuyele, tatuende wa Rebeka
Bobo bakamba ne, Yeye udi ushima, utuambile
Kayine kuambila Maweja Nangila ne: Dinyoka diudi mumpe ndipite bukole
Yozefe wanyi meme utshidi ne muoyi
Yozefe kuandamuna ne: Meme tshiena mua kuenza nanku to

Nunku Yehowa abuikile bubi bua muntu webe mu bualu ebu: haya mukelenge wanyi mu nsubu wa Limona bua kutendelelamu, yeye utu washindamena ku tshianza tshianyi ne meme kabidi ntu ngatua mpala wanyi hanshi mu nsubu wa Limona; hashishe hanalua mpala wanyi hanshi mu nsubu wa Limona, Yehowa abuikidile muntu webe bualu bubi ebu

Hashishe bena lukinu ne bena mampaka bonso ba bakadi baya ne Davidi bakamba ne, Bualu bua bantu aba kabakaya n etu, katuena tubaha nansha tshintu tshikese tshia bintu bi tuakanyenga anu kuhingashila muntu yonso mukashi wandi ne bana bandi bua yeye aye n abo, bumuke
Ndi musue kumuenzela mukuende wa bu yeye udi mua kumuambuluisha
Mose wakafunda mikenji ei, wakayifila mu bianza bia bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne kudi bakulu bonso ba mu Isalele

Shamagâ Udi Usungila Bena Isalele mu Bianza bia Bena Peleshete Shamagâ, muana mulume wa Anata, wakabika ku nyima kuandi, yeye wakashiha Bena Peleshete nkama isambombo ne mutshi wa kusaka n au ngombe; yeye wakasungila Bena Isalele kabidi
Samuele Mu matuku au Bena Peleshete bakasangisha masalayi abo bua kuluanganabo ne Bena Isalele
Kanulombi kudi muanenu
Kadi katangila difwilakana dia makookeshi pankatshi pa Bukalenga bunene ne Bukalenga bwenji bwa mêyi ne mikandu ne kabidi pankatshi pa Mbulamatadi ne polovensa

Matuku muanda mutekete nenufile milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, dituku dia muanda mukulu nedikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila kunudi, nenufile mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, edi ndisangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Mei onso akaluhuka mukana muena nuenze bu munuakuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, binuakumulaya mukana muenu
Meme kuambila Yoshuwa ne: Wewe nkayebe uvua mudimuene muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mutshimune bakalenga babidi ba bena Amore
Moshe kubambila ne: Mpindiewu ndi ne bua kuenza tshivua Maweja Nangila muambe
Pashishe, wambile bena Izrayele ne: tshiadi tshia mukoku wa tshimpanga ne tshibelu tshiudi muele mulu munyukule mbia tshijila
Nukumbaje mikenji yonsu indi nnuambila lelu eyi
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Yeye neanufikishe mu ditunga adi bua dishale bumpianyi buenu
Ditunga dia Kenaane divua dikese
Meme Maweja Nangila ndi njadika bualu ebu
Midimu eyi, ke itshidibu benza too ne mpindiewu
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi bialueye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neajidile nsubu wandi
Diakamue kapia kufuma kudi Maweja Nangila, kutema, kuosha milambu ya kuosha yonsu, ne mafuta a ku milambu mikuabu bivua pa tshilambuilu
Nennuipatshile bena Kenaane, bena Amore, bena Iti, bena Perizi, bena Ivi ne bena Yebusa
Mose wakadi ne tshiji kudi ba ku mutu kua bena nvita, tuhita tua binunu binunu ne tuhita tua nkama nkama, bakahingana ku nvita
Bukalenga bunene budi bulombola tshidiidi tshia Ditunga
Bantu basatu ba bantu aba banene makumi asatu bakaya kudi Davidi ku dibue dia mu lubuebue lua Adulama; bena nvita ba Bena Peleshete bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo mu tshibanda tshia Bena Lefa
Yeye wakabaheta, wakabambila mei au
Aba mbana ba balume ba Gilada, muana wa Makî, muana wa Manashe
Unvua kutendekena kua muntu webe ne kua bantu bebe Bena Isalele hadibo balomba mu muaba eu; ubunvuile mu diulu mu muaba webe ûdi mushikame; ne hau nvua, utubuikidile mibi yetu
Moshe kukumbaja bimpe bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Ahaza wakalela Yala; Yala wakalela Alemeta ne Asemaweta ne Zimeli; Zimeli wakalela Mosa; Mosa wakalela Binea; ne Lefaya muan andi, ne Eleasa muan andi, ne Asela muan andi
Bualu ebu kabuikadi kundi: mukelenge kabishi muntu wandi bua bualu ebu anyi bonso badi mu nsubu wa tatu wandi; bualu bua muntu webe kena mumanye bualu ebu buonso, ne makese ne a bungi
Bakumuka mu Kadesha, bakashikama ku mukuna wa Hô, ku butshika bua buloba bua Edome
Panuikala bumvue ne: muena Izrayele udi utendelela mvidie nanku, nukebulule bua kujadika ne: mmuenze nanku bulelela anyi
Muakuidi udi ufila mulambu wa bukula budibo balamba mu nfulu ne mu tshivuadi ne mu dilonga, yeye mene neangate bintu ebi bionso
Naomi wakambila Luta, ma muen andi, ne, Bidi bimpe, muan a nyi, bua wewe uluhuke ne bakashi benji ba mudimu bandi, kabakusa nganyi mu budimi bukuabo
Wewe neulue ne muana wa ngombe ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusambakena, Alona ne bana bandi balume nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha muana wa ngombe
Moshe kubaleja bishima
Diswika diônso anyi dipangadika diônso badi badiangata mudibio mu mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu anyi mwa Tshisangilu tshia bibambalu biônso
Mose wakafunda ngendu yabo bu mu dî dia Yehowa ei idi ngendu yabo
Njila mwibîdi : Bidi bitangila budikookeshi Kanungu kitânu Didikookesha dia ditunga didi bwaalu bwa beena ditunga
Bobo bakadi ne tukanu tua or ku matshu bualu bua bobo bakadi Bena Yishemaele
Balaame kuambila Balake ne: Asa bilambuilu muanda mutekete muaba ewu, untuadile ngombe milume muanda mutekete, ne mikoku ya bimpanga muanda mutekete
Tuakuenza lelu bu muakamba Yehowa bua kunubuikidila bubi

Dutelonone Biabika muprofete anyi mulotshi wa bilota munkatshi muenu, udi unulesha tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema; ne hashikisheye tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema bua kunubikila ne, Tuye, tulonde nzambi mikuabo mudi kanuyi bamanye, tuyenzele mudimu; kanunvu mei a muprofete au, anyi mulotshi au wa bilota; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munutete, bua kumanya ne, Nudi basue Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso
Yeye wakebesha Yehoshafata ne, Wewe neuye n anyi bua kuluangana ne Bena Lamota gilada, anyi
Bana ba Zakai, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asambombo
Dinda nenuambe ne, Tudi basue butuku buile
Kadi muntu mukuabo wakela buta buandi ku mpukahuka, wakasa mukelenge wa Isalele hakadi biamu bia nvita bituilangane
Nakanuambila nunku, kanuakangunvuila; kadi nuakadi ne budisu, nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, nuakadiyila ku mikuna

Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne wa mulambu wa bukula ne wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne wa mulambu wa kusambuka kua mikenji, ne wa tshijila tshia bakuidi, ne wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, wakambila Yehowa Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai mu dituku diakeleye mukenji wandi kudi Bena Isalele bua kufilabo milambu yabo kudi Yehowa mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Samuele wakangata Shaula ne muena mudimu wandi, wakaya n abo mu nsubu wa tshiala benyi, wakabashiha mu miaba ya butumbi munkatshi mua bantu bonso bakabikilabo bua kudia, bakadi bantu makumi asatu
Bana balume ba Shimei: Yahata ne Zina ne Yeusha ne Belia
Kadi Yehowa kena muanze kunuha mitshima ya kumanya n ai ne mesu a kutangila n au ne matshu a kunvua n au tô ne ku dituku edi
Ayi ke milongo minene idi isunguluja Dîyi dikulu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Tangila, wewe neulale tulu ne bankambua bebe; ne bantu aba nebabike, nebalonde malu a masandi a nzambi ya bende ya mu buloba buyayabo, nebandekele, nebashihe tshihungidi tshituakahunga n abo
Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakahunga n etu tshihungidi mu Holeba
Bualu ebu buakusankisha bimpe, nakasungula balume dikumi ne babidi, muntu ku tshisamba muntu ku tshisamba
Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Bilele bia Bena Buloba Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, kanuyidi bua kulonda ku nyima kua malu a bundu a bisamba abi
, Besalele Wakenza mushete wa acacia Buludi bua mushete buakadi coudées ibidi ne tshituha, ne butshiama buau buakadi coudée umue ne tshituha, ne bule buau bua mulu coudée umue ne tshituha
Kanubabundi to
Wewe neulamike tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe mu nseke yonso, ne ku mpenge kabidi
Yeye wakasangakena n andi mu muaba wa hatuhu, mu tshihela muakadi luhehele nkayalu; yeye wakamunyunguluka, wakamulama bimpe, wakamuenzela bu kamonyi ka disu diandi
Nulonde anu dilumbuluisha didi diakane, nunku nenuikale ne muoyo, nenuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Nuvua batumushe mu Ejipitu bua tshinyi
Nunku Yehowa wakatumina Bena Isalele tshihuhu; Bena Isalele binunu makumi muanda mutekete bakafua
Yeye wakambila tatu wandi kabidi ne, Bangenzele bualu ebu; bandekele ngondo ibidi bua meme kuya ne balunda banyi ku mikuna bua kujinga matuku antshidi kamama

Kanungu ka Mêyi adi Dîyi dikulu dipeesha bukookeshi bwa kwikala dîyi dilongolodi,badi baelela tukanda ne baakaja kudi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beena mu tshibambalu ne tshibambalu mu mishindu idi ilonda eyi: a tshialwa kwikala dîyi badi batshiteeka ku dijooja ne dieela dia tukanda dia Tshibambalu tshidibo bamanyisha kumpala amu padi tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu tshikumbana panyima pa ditshifila ku Bukalenga bunene; b bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ke budibo balonda

Nudimuke bienu, bua kanudidingi mu mitshima yenu, kanusesuki bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo midimu ne kuyitendelela; bualu bua Yehowa neanukuatshile tshiji, yeye neabuikile diulu ne nvula kayena iloka, ne buloba kabuena bukuama bintu; nunku nenujimishibue lubilu mu buloba buimpe buakamba Yehowa
Pashishe neaye nawu ku tshilambuilu

Bakambila Palo ne, Tuakuluila bua kushikama mu buloba ebu, katuena ne muaba wa kudisha bimuna bietu bualu bua tshiole tshidi tshikole mu buloba bua Kanana, nunku tudi tukusengelela ne, Witabushe bua bantu bebe bashikama mu buloba bua Goshene Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Tatu ebe ne bana benu bakulua kudi, buloba bua Ejipitu buonso budi ku mpala kuebe, ushikike tatu ebe ne bana benu mu buloba budi butamba buimpe bashikame mu buloba bua Goshene, ne biwamanya bantu ba lungenyi luimpe munkatshi muabo, ubateke balami ba bimuna bianyi
Yotama, muana wa mukelenge, wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu wandi ulumbulula malu a bantu ba mu buloba

Bualu ebu kabuena butamba bakole ku mesu kuebe, hawamulekela, bualu bua yeye wakakuenzela mudimu bidimu bisambombo udi utamba muena mudimu wa difutu misangu ibidi; hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanusankishe mu malu onso anudi nuenza
Pashishe, Arone ne bana bende ba balume, bimane mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena, bua uboweshe mayi a tshijila
Nubilonge, nubikumbaje
Hakatemesheye bimunyi kahia, yeye wakayituma mu madimi a blé a Bena Peleshete, nunku blé yakadi misuika mu bisumbu ne yakadi mimanyike, ne mitshi ya olive kabidi biakoshibua
Nuenu nuakangambila ne, Bualu buwakuamba budi buimpe bua tuetu tuenze
Bena Yuda bakamba ne, Bukole bua batuadi ba majitu buakukehela, bilu bia bungi bidi bishala, katuena bamanye mua kuasa lumbu
Diba adi, numupeshetshi
Kadi yeye wakimana munkatshi mua budimi, wakabusungila, wakashiha Bena Peleshete; Yehowa wakabayuisha luhandu lunene
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua bana bebe tô mu bikondo biabo bionso udi ne tshilema kena mua kulua ha buihi bua kufileye milambu kudi Nzambi wandi
Kumuinyikaye dina dia Shete
didimwija ku tshinyangu tshia makanda a bubanji;
Nakabajimisha, nakababutula, ne kabakamanya mua kubika kahidi; e, bakahona muinshi mua makasa anyi
Bikala nsuki ya muntu mituke, ne bikaleye muena dibala, yeye udi muakane
Kujidila kua Ban a Bute Nenujidile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ban a bute balume ba ngombe ne ba mikoko; kanuenzeshi ban a bute ba ngombe mudimu, kanukoshi ban a bute ba mikoko miosa
Bikaleye muvuishe malu au bu malu a hatuhu, hakunvueye, nunku yeye neamutuadile bubi buandi
Yefeta wakakonka bakulu ba mu Gilada ne, Binuaya n anyi kuetu kabidi bua kuluangana ne Bena Amona, ne biabafila Yehowa ku mpala kuanyi, nengikale mukelenge wenu, anyi
Bana balume ba Yuda, Ele ne Onana; Ele ne Onana bakafua mu buloba bua Kanâna
Samuele wakamuambila ne, Yehowa wakahanda bukelenge bua Isalele buakadi kûdi lelu, wakabuha mukuenu udi ukuhita buakane
Nungoshile ngombe milume ibidi, mukoku wa tshimpanga umue, ne bana ba mikoku muanda mutekete, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijima, nyama ayi ishile
Mukelenge wakakohola kakanu kakanyengeye kudi Hamana, wakakaha Môdekai
Hakatshiabu muan a bute wakambila muan a mukala ne, Butuku bua lelu nakulala ne tatu wanyi, tumunuishe nvinyo butuku ebu kabidi, wewe ubuele, ulale bandi, bua tuetu tulelele tatu wetu bana
Kadi Yehowa wakanusungula bienu, wakanuhatula mu tshikutu tshia kahia, mu Ejipitu mene, bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi, bu mu dituku edi
Maweja Nangila kukonka Moshe ne: Bena Izrayele nebabenge kuitaba meyi anyi ne mikenji yanyi too ne ku diba kaayi
Bakelenge bakahuwa mu Isalele, bakahuwa mene tô ne hanakabika, meme Debola mene; nakabika bu muledi wa bana mu Isalele
Uye kusokoma ku mukuna bua kuvu kubutuka
Mitshi yabu neyipatule mafuta a bungi
