Hakunvua Tou, mukelenge wa Hamata, ne, Davidi wakashiha masalayi onso a Hadadezê, mukelenge wa Zoba, yeye wakatuma Hadolama muan andi mulume kudi mukelenge Davidi bua kumuela muoyo, ne bua kumuvudishileye disanka bualu bua yeye wakadi muluangane ne Hadadezê, wakamuhita bukole; bualu bua Hadadezê wakadi uluangana ne Tou; yeye wakalua ne mpanza ya mishindu yonso ya or ne ya argent ne ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kumukonka kabidi ne: Wakujinguluidi ne udi butaka nnganyi
Kanungu ka Mikanda ya mêyi ne tuludiki idi yumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu edi, idi ishala ne bwenzeji too ne pikalabo mwa kuyikupula anyi kuyishintulula
Kadi tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete, numulekele tshianana, kayi unufuta to

Mukenji wa Kumusha Bena Amaleka Tshiendelele Nuvuluke bu muakanuenzela Amaleka mu nshila hanuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu; bu muakasangakeneye n enu mu nshila, wakashiha bantu bakashala ku nyima bakadi batekete, hanuakahanga, hanuakamba kufua mu nshila; yeye kakatshina Nzambi

Yuda wakambila Isalele tatu andi ne, Utume nsongalume n anyi, netubike, netuye, bua betu ne wewe ne bana hetu bakese bikale ne muoyo, katufu Meme nendieyeke kudiye bu tshieya mu muaba wandi, udi mua kumusombuela ku tshianza tshianyi binahanga kuhingana n andi kudi ne kumuteka ku mpala kuebe hashishe nendibadile bujitu ebu tshiendelele; bu tuetu katuyi bajanguluke nunku, tuakadi mua kuhingana kunoko tshiakabidi

Hashishe Yoshua wakambila miloho ya bantu ne, Hitshilai munkatshi mua tshitudilu, nuambile bantu ne, Dilongoluelai bia kudia, bualu bua hahita matuku asatu, nenusabuke Yadene eu, bua kuya kuangata buloba, budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bua nuenu kubuangata
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu uvua musue kukudimuna bibi abi bua bikale bimpe
Nunku Yehowa wakasungila Bena Isalele mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu dituku adi Bena Isalele bakatangila Bena Ejipitu bafue kukala kua mai manene
Hakamanya Bena Sulia ne, Bena Isalele bakatuhita bukole, bakadisangisha hamue
Lubena wakunvua tshifufu tshiabo, wakamusungila mu bianza biabo, wakamba ne, Kabamushihi

Kulumbulula Kuakane Nenudisunguluile balumbuluishi ne bafundi mu misoko yonso, idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe, ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba; bobo nebalumbuluishe bantu bilumbu biabo ne dilumbuluisha didi diakane
Mukelenge wanyi wakakonka bantu bebe ne Nudi ne tatu, anyi muan enu mukuabo, anyi
Davidi wakabuesha tshianza tshiandi mu mpaya wandi, wakambula dibue, wakadiela, wakataha Muena Peleshete mu mpala wandi; dibue diakajika mu mpala wandi, yeye wakadishinda mutue mpala hanshi
Newafunde ha minoko ya bibi bia nsubu webe, ne ha bibi bia mishiku ya luhangu luebe
Bualu panupatukila mu Ejipitu, bantu aba bavua banupale biakudia ne mayi a kunua mu luendu luenu
Kadi, mashi adi mashale, witshikije ku nseke yonsu inayi ya tshilambuilu
Pafinda mvula kulu, pambamona muanza nkongolu, nemvuluke ndondu awu
Yeye wakasangisha Bena Amona ne Bena Amaleka kudiye yeye wakaya, bakashiha Bena Isalele, bakanyenga musoko wakadi ne mabue a ngashi
Bena Edome kukandika bena Izrayele, kubajikila njila
Bisamba ebi bidi bitendelela nzambi yabo munyi
Nebayikengeshe, ishale ku bupika bidimu nkama inayi
Bakumuka mu Limona pelese, bakashikama mu Libina
Muana mukashi yonso udi ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, neikale mukashi wa umue wa mu tshisamba tshia tatu andi, nunku muntu ne muntu wa Bena Isalele neikale ne buhianyi bua batatu abo
Aba bonso mbana balume ba Davidi ha mutu ha bana balume ba bakashi bahika babakibue kudiye; Tamâ wakadi muan abo mukashi
Bimenga bisatu bia kunyemena Diba adi, Moshe kusungula bimenga bisatu luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene
Ku nyima kua malu â Bena Peleshete ba mu Gezê bakabanga kuluangana; hashishe Sibekai, Muena Husha, wakashiha Sipai, umue wa bana balume ba nfiondo; bobo bakateketa
Pashishe tshiluilu tshivua ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Rubene kubanga luendu, bena mvita bambula dibendela diabu
Nenukune maminu a bungi mu madimi, nenuhuole makese, bualu bua mikumbi neyadie

Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia bukelenge bua mukelenge Yoshiya, mukelenge wakatuma Shafana, muana wa Asalaya, muana wa Meshulama secrétaire mu nsubu wa Yehowa wamba ne, Ya biebe kudi Hilekiya, muakuidi munene, bua yeye a bale argent yakafilabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa, yakasangisha balami ba ku mbelu kudi bantu; bayifile mu bianza bia badi ku mutu kua mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa; bobo bayifile mu bianza bia bena mudimu badi balongolola miaba minya nguke mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Kadi muanjelo wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, wewe wakaseka
Mu matuku au kamuakadi mukelenge mu Isalele, muntu yonso wakenza anu malu akadi mimpe ku mesu kuandi
Yeye wakela mpungi, bantu bonso bakumuka ku musoko, bakaya muntu ne muntu ku ntenta wandi
Bavua batangilangana, bakatshila
Mu tshikondu tshidi maloba awu mu dikisha, bena Izrayele nebapete dinyoka, bualu mbabenge meyi anyi ne mikenji yanyi
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bika biebe, uhueke lubilu bualu bua bantu bebe bawakahatula mu Ejipitu, bakoneka, bakasesuka lubilu mu nshila unakabalesha; bakadienzela luhingu ne biamu biakatulabo
Eliya Udi Ulomba Nvula kudi Nzambi Eliya wakambila Ahaba ne, Juka biebe, udie, unue; bualu bua tshiona tshia nvula ya bungi tshidiku
Kadi kajadika bululama bwa ngenzelu wa masungulangana ne wa dikonkoloja dia beena ditunga

Alona nealongolole minda dilolo ne dinda ku mesu kua Yehowa ku dituku ku dituku, ku mpala kua tshilulu tshia ku muaba wa tshijila mu ntenta wa kusangakena eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso

Bikaleye muhele kayi ne bungi bua bintu biwakamubadila, nunku nebamushikike ku mpala kua muakuidi, ne muakuidi neatuangane n andi mushinga, muakuidi neatuangane ne muena kuditshiha mushinga ku bungi bua bintu bidiye n abi
Shaula ne bantu bandi bakayaku bua kumukeba

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula; ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi; ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Pagiele, muana mulume wa Okelana
Esawu kuitaba
Muntu yonso udi uhenda tatu wandi anyi mamu wandi udi ne mulau; bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete nkama ne nkama ne binunu ne binunu bakahita mu nshila; Davidi ne bantu bandi bakalonda ku nyima ne Akisha
Nulame mikenji eyi kashidi miaba yonsu inudi nusomba

Yakoba wakaditshiha ne Bikala Nzambi n anyi, biandameye bimpe mu nshila mundi nya ne biampeye bintu bia kudia ne bia kuluata, bua meme kuhingana kabidi ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi talala, hashishe Yehowa neikale Nzambi wanyi, ne dibue edi dinakuimanyika nebikale bu nsubu wa Nzambi ne bintu bionso biwampa nempingashe tshia dikumi kudi bulelela

Nanku nuambuluishe bena Izrayele bakuabu, too ne pikala Maweja Nangila mubafikishe mu ditunga didiye ubapesha didi dishiya, luseke ludi diba dibuelela lua musulu wa Yardene, bua kupetabu dikisha bu munudi bapete nuenu
Mvidi Mukulu kuandamuna ne: Meme musangane bantu bakane makumi anayi ne batanu, tshiakubutula tshimenga to
Kadi bukole buenu nebukepele
Au mmatuku a kudia bidia bia Yehowa, matuku a tshijila andi musue wewe ubamanyishe ku bikondo biau

Kanungu ka Mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu a dituma dia dijinga dia kwenzeja dîyi, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi mwa kulomba kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa dijooja dia tshiakabidi dia dîyi anyi dia tumwe tunungu twadi
Abrahame uvua musombe mu mushiku wa mbelu wa kazubu kende ka ntenta diba dia munda munya
Kanuibi
Badi Bahita Bena Isalele Bukole ku Hôma Nom
Moshe kuteka mampa a kulambula pa mesa apu, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Nudie mampa awu matuku muanda mutekete malondangane

Kadi Yoshua wakasungila Lahaba, mukashi muena tshiendenda, ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi ne bintu bionso biakadiye n abi; yeye wakashikama munkatshi mua Bena Isalele tô ne ku dituku edi, bualu bua yeye wakasokoka batentekedi bakatuma Yoshua bua kutentekela Yeleko
Kanuena ne bua kukuata mudimu dituku adi to
Moshe ne Elazare kuya kudi bena Izrayele mu mpata ya Mowabe, ku muelelu wa musulu wa Yardene, dishiya dia Yeriko
Bantu bakadinyangisha kudiye, kabena bu bana bandi, bakahambuka, malu abo akanyanguka, akalua manyongoboka
Meku onsu a bena Yuda aa avua ne bantu balume
Nanku padi muntu ushipangana, anyemene mu tshimue tshia ku bimenga ebi bisatu bua kusokoma
Bena Melali ku meku abo bakangata tshiabo tshituha munkatshi mua tshisamba tshia Lubena ne mu tshisamba tshia Gada ne mu tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, bimenga dikumi ne bibidi
Nunku Yehowa wakanfuta ku buimpe buanyi, ne ku butoke kunakadi n abu ku mesu kuandi
Mukelenge wakatshungulula mpala wandi, wakavudishila Bena Isalele bonso disanka; Bena Isalele bonso bakimana
Hangela bianyi mpungi, meme ne bonso badi n anyi, hashishe nuenu kabidi nuele mpungi ku matshika onso a tshitudilu, nuambe ne, Bualu bua Yehowa ne bua Gideona
Nuenu bakumbaje mikenji eyi, matuku onsu atshidi diulu kulu ne buloba panshi, nenushale ne muoyi, nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu, mu ditunga divua Maweja Nangila mulaye bankambua benu
Hakatshiabu, bakashikama Mose bua kulumbuluila bantu bilumbu, bantu bakimana ku mpala kua Mose dinda tô ne ku dilolo
Muntu yonso utu wenza malu au, malu au mabi, udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Nanku wewe Moshe neumone mua kumanyisha muanebe wa balume ne muikuluebe mundi mulembakaje bena Ejipitu, muenze bishima bionsu ebi mu ditunga diabu
Undambile nyama mushindu undi munange
Nyoka ya lulengu Bena Izrayele kumuka ku mukuna wa Ore
Bana ba balume ba Yoshiya: Yohanana muan a bute wandi, Yehoyakima muana muibidi, Sedekiya muana muisatu ne Shaluma muana muinai
Nanku bua bintu bionsu bidi muntu ulambula Maweja Nangila bua kashidi, kabena mua kubipana nansha kubipikula to, bu mudi muntu, nyama nansha budimi bupiana
Ke Maweja Nangila kutuambila bua tukumbaje meyi ne mikenji biende bionsu
Kusukulaye kabidi bia munda ne bikonu, kubitenteka pa milambu mikuabu ya kuosha ivua pa tshilambuilu
Yeye kubatuma kudi Yozefe, ubandamuna bonsu ne: Lombayi kudi Yozefe
Nuditengule mu mitshima yenu, kanuikadi bantu ba tshitshu kabidi

Bualu bua muntu udi ne tshilema kena mua kulua ha buihi muntu mufofo anyi tshibombo anyi muntu udi ne diulu dibatama anyi tshioka tshitambe bule, anyi muntu udi ne dikasa ditshibuka anyi udi ne tshianza tshitshibuka anyi muntu udi ne nyima mutuntamana anyi muntu mushunguke anyi udi ne disu disama anyi udi ne mpusu anyi udi ne bilamulamu anyi udi ne mihesa yandi mitshibuke, muntu wa munkatshi mua bana ba Alona muakuidi udi ne bintu ebi ham bidi handi kena mua kulua ha buihi bua kulaleye mulambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, yeye udi ne tshitema, kena mua kudia mulambu kudi Yehowa
Wewe neutelele bana balume ba Alona bikowelu ne mikaba ne bifulu bia butumbi ne buimpe
Nunku bantu ba bungi bakadisangisha hamue, bakajibika mishimi ya mai yonso ne musulu mukese wakadi muhitshile mu buloba, bamba ne, Bakelenge ba Ashû badi ne bua kulua kusangana mai a bungi bishi
Meme ndi nkulonda bitekete bitekete, bilondeshile luendu lua bana ne lua bimuna bindi nabi, too ne patuapetangana mu ditunga dia Seyire

Belâma wakambila Nzambi ne, Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, mukelenge wa Moaba, wakantumina dî ne, Bantu bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu, bakatangadika buloba buonso, lua biebe, ubangelele mulau, hashishe nemmanye mua kuluangana n abo, nembihate
Newafunde ha minoko ya bibi bia nsubu webe, ne ha bibi bia mishiku ya luhangu luebe

Mikenji ya tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Mikenji ya tshibilu tshia Dipita dianyi idi nunku: Muntu muenyi kena mua kudia biakudia bia Dipita dianyi to
Yakobe kubambila kabidi ne: Diba ditshidiku
Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua mundi wakenza bualu ku mpukahuka ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Kutuadijaye kulomba Mvidi Mukulu wamba ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa mfumuanyi Abrahame, lelu ndi nkusengelela ne: ungendeshe diakalenga, ukumbaje biuvua mulaye mfumuanyi Abrahame
Kadi Amasa kakadimuka bua muele wakadi mu tshianza tshia Yoaba; yeye wakamutua muele mu mbale, ne mala andi akahatuka hanshi; yeye kakamutua tshiakabidi, wakafua
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nenkudimune mesu anyi kudibo, neutangile muikala nshikidilu wabo, bualu bua badi bena tshikondo tshia tshitshu, bu bana badi kabayi mua kueyemenyibua
Bavua balembeleja bilamba amu mushindu awu
Zilepa, muena mudimu wa Lea, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume mukuabo Lea wakamba ne, Ndi ne disanka, ne bakashi nebambikile ne, Muena disanka Wakamuidika dina ne, Ashe
Tubale Kayine uvua ne muanabu wa bakaji, dina diende Naama
Nanku nudi mua kudia bimuma biayi
Bena mu matunga ikale Maweja Nangila munutume, nebakuatshike bonsu bowa, bua bionsu bidi binuenzekela
Nenukune maminu a bungi mu madimi enu
Mushete wa Mei a Tshihungidi Ek
Yehowa kakahunga tshihungidi etshi ne batatu betu, kadi wakatshihunga anu n etu buonso buetu badi ne muoyo lelu eu
Dituku divua Tamare ulela, bantu kumona ne: nealele bana ba mapasa
Kadi Bena Isalele bonso ne Bena Yuda bakananga Davidi, bualu bua yeye wakaya ne wakalua ku mpala kuabo

Tshimuangi DIBAKA DIA NZUBU WA MVIDI MUKULU Dituku dia Dikisha Moshe kubikila bena Izrayele bonsu, kubambila ne: Telejayi mikenji idi Maweja Nangila mutume bua nuenu kukumbaja: Nuenze mudimu matuku asambombu

Tshimuangi Yetro udi umonangana ne Moshe Yetro, mutuangaji wa mu Madiyane, tatuende muenu wa Moshe, kumvua ye lumu lua bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu muenzele Moshe ne bena Izrayele pawaye mubapatule mu Ejipitu
Mutuangaji amiamine mashi a nyama awu pa tshilambuilu tshidi kumpala kua ntenta
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Dituku dia matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondo eu wa muanda mutekete nebikale dituku didibo badia bidia bia mu bitandatanda tô matuku muanda mutekete

Halua Yehowa n enu mu buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana, hanuihatshileye bisamba bia bungi ku mpala kuenu, Bena Hiti ne Bena Gîgashi ne Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse, bisamba muanda mutekete bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole; habafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu bianza bienu, nenubashihe; hashishe nenubajimishe ha buloba: kanuhungi n abo tshihungidi, kanubaleshi luse, kanubakanganyi n abo, kanubakishi muan enu mukashi kudi muana wabo mulume, kanuangatshidi muana wenu mulume mukashi kudibo
Kadi pikala bayende mubenge bionsu abi dituku mene didiye umanya bualu, udi ushipa bivua mukajende mulaye
Yeye wakajidila muntu yonso wakadi musue, bua bakuidi bikale mu bitendelelu bia ha mikuna
Mu Holeba nuakafuisha Yehowa tshiji kabidi ne Yehowa wakadi n enu tshiji, wakamba kunushiha
Umue wa bantu bandi wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge wetu, kakuena muntu; kadi Elisha, muprofete wa mu Isalele, udi wamhila mukelenge wa Isalele mei audi wamba mu nsubu webe wa bulalu
Bobo nebenze bungi bua tushola buakenzabo diambedi, kanuena nuhuekesha mudimu, nansha kakese, bualu bua bobo badi bafuba, badi bamba ne, Tudi basue kuya kushihela Nzambi wetu nyama
Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kakunyua mei a Belâma; kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakudimuna mulau ulua disanka dienu, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusua
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuipata muntu mu lupangu lua Edene bua aye kudima buloba, bualu buloba ke buvuaye mumufuke nabu
Wa Bena Hebelone: Yeliya wakadi kahita ka Bena Hebelone mene bu muakadi bikondo bia batatu abo
Neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô matuku onso a disama diandi, yeye kena muakane, neashikame ha nkayandi ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Natana wakambila Davidi bu muakadi mei â onso, ne bu muakadi tshikena kumona etshi
Kuendi masandi
Tshisamba tshia Dane tshivua anu ne diku dimue dia bena Shuhame, ndelanganyi ya Shuhame
Bualu bua Yehowa wakahangidisha bua kukudimuna mei mimpe akamba Ahitofele bua Yehowa enzele Abashaloma bualu bubi
Mu Ejipitu, tuvua bimpe bitambe
Mukenji wa Tshia Dikumi Nufile kudi Yehowa tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso binudi nuhuola ku tshidimu ku tshidimu

Nebalue ne tshibelu tshidibo bakuha ne tshiadi tshidibo banyukula hohamue ne dianyi dia milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ku mesu kua Yehowa etshi ntshintu tshiebe ne tshia bana bebe balume tshiendelele, bu muakamba Yehowa
Bena Lewi bakadilengesha ku bubi buabo, bakuvuwa bilulu biabo, Alona wakabanyukula bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, Alona wakadia mulambu wa kubabuikidila n au bubi, bualu bua kubalengesha
Mu mitanda kamuikadi mikiya Panuikala mu mitanda, nuluangana ne baluishi benu, nuepele bionsu bidi mua kunukebela mikiya
Yehowa, ubuikile bubi bua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, bawakahikula, kuitabushi bua mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu ashale munkatshi mua bantu bebe Bena Isalele
Udi wangata mapangadika mu mukanda wa olodonase
Palô wakamba ne, Nennulekele, nuye mu tshihela bua kushihela Yehowa Nzambi wenu nyama, kadi kanuyi kule, nundombele Nzambi
Mefibosheta wakadi ne muana wa balume, nsongalume, dina diandi Mika
Kutelabu kabidi tukaba tua kusuika tshilamba tshia efode tshia mutuangaji munene
Asatu ku luseke, asatu ku luseke lukuabu
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshimue tshia bukelenge bua Yolama, muana wa Ahaba, Ahazaya wakabanga kukokesha mu Yuda
Bualu bua tshiakashikama mu nsubu ku dituku dinakumuka ne Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu tô ne mpindiu, kadi nakendakana anu mu ntenta ne mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Biashikama muenyi mu buloba buenu, kanumuenzedi bibi

Memukana wakitaba ku mesu kua mukelenge ne bantu banene ne, Washeti, mukelenge mukashi, kakenzela anu mukelenge nkayandi bibi kadi wakenzela bantu banene bonso ne bantu bonso ba mu nseke yonso ya mukelenge Ahashawelosha bibi kabidi
Yuda wakangatshila Ele muan andi, muan a bute, mukashi dina diandi Tama Ele, muan a bute wa Yuda wakadi muntu mubi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Yehowa wakamushiha
Muanabute kulela muana wa balume, kumuinyika dina ne: Mowabe
Bimunyi abi bikale bimanyinu bia matuku, bidimu ne bikondu bia bibilu, bikale kabidi bitokesha pa buloba bujima
Hashishe mu tshikondo tshidi bakelenge baluhuka bua kuluanganabo, Yoaba wakaya ne masalayi andi, wakahaula buloba bua Bena Amona, wakatshintshimika musoko wa Laba
Kadi kanudi mashi, bualu bua mashi adi muoyo; kanudi muoyo ne munyinyi hohamue
Nuikale bu mutudi emu
Ndelanganyi ya Menashe neyikale tshisamba tshinene

Nudimuke bienu, kanuhu muoyo bua tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiakahungeye n enu: kanudisongidi luhingu anyi tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu tshimue tshiakanuhidisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi bu kahia kadi kashidisha bionso, udi Nzambi wa mukau
Kadi bena Izrayele bakuabu bonsu bateke madilu bua bantu bavua Maweja Nangila mushidishe ne kapia
Nenudie bidia bia disanka dia mbingu ei muanda mutekete ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne diha didi mitshima yenu misue kufila mu bianza bienu, bu muakanuvudishila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, disanka
Kavua muitabe bivuabu bamuambile to
Pashishe kuyaye wenda utula mu bitupa bishilangane too ne kuinshi kua ditunga dia Kenaane
Bena Izrayele bakavua bafue ku tshipupu atshi binunu makumi abidi ne binayi
Bilongolola dia Didia dia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila Moshe kubikila bakulu bonsu ba bena Izrayele kubambila ne: Muntu yonsu asungule muana wa mukoku nansha muana wa mbuji bua meku enu
Bena Ejipitu kuangata matempu abu a mvita, tubalu ne bena mvita, kulonda bena Izrayele
Tshiakukukuatshila mudimu bualu bua Lakele, anyi
Yuda kumuinyika dina ne: Perese, mmumue ne: Tshidibamba
Nemwulangane
Abashaloma wakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Lungenyi luakatuambila Hushai, Muena Aka, ludi luhita lua Ahitofele buimpe
Nuvuluke Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, nukumbaje meyi ne mikenji biende, bindi nnuambila lelu ebi
Yeye wakenda mu nshila ya Asa tatu andi, kakasesukamu, wakenza malu akadi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa
Muntu mulenge mayi awu, neikale kabidi ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Kadi bua kumuka ku Kadeshe Barneya, kufika ku musulu ewu, tuvua banenge mu njila bidimu makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu
Bena Isalele bakabikila bidia abi ne, Mana Tshiakadi tshintu tshitoke tô bu ntete ya conandre, tshiakadi tshintu tshia kutua kuimpe bu mikata mienza ne bintshi
Nanku meme kunua mayi

Yakalua kudi Belâma, yakamuambila ne, Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, udi wamba ne, Kuitabusha bua bualu buonso bukuhumbishe bua kulua kundi, bualu bua meme nenkuhe butumbi bunene, nengenze mei onso audi wamba, lua biebe, ndi nkusengelela, ungelele bantu aba mulau
Mikete yanyi neitampakane mashi, muele wanyi neukose munyinyi
Bana ba Nafatale, Yasele ne Guni ne Yese ne Shilema
Pashishe, ujidile bena Levi bua bikale banyi meme Maweja Nangila, pa muaba wa bamuanabute bonsu ba bena Izrayele
Hashishe nakanuambila ne, Kanuikadi ne buowa, kanubatshinyi
Meme nakanuambila ne, Nuakulua ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, buloba budi Yehowa mutuhe
Pikale boya bua muaba awu butokoloke, kabidi muaba awu mondoke, mutuangaji neajadike ne: muntu awu udi ne disama dia nsudi

Bakambila Bena Benyamina ne, Yai bienu, nualamine mu madimi a tumuma tukese; numone ne halua bana bakashi ba mu Shilo bua kujabo maja, nuluhuke mu madimi a tumuma tukese, ne muntu ne muntu adiangatshile mukashi wandi munkatshi mua bana bakashi ba mu Shilo, aye biandi mu buloba bua Benyamina
Wakangata makalu nkama isambombo masungula, ne makalu onso makuabo a mu Ejipitu ne tuhita tua makalu onso
Yeye wakadi n abo musokome mu nsubu wa Nzambi bidimu bisambombo; Atalaya wakadi ukokesha mu buloba
Bakabakudimuna ne, Bifuanyikishi bia or bitanu bia masungu ne bifuanyikishi bia or bitanu bia mpuku bu bungi bua hakelenge ba Bena Peleshete, bualu bua dikenga diodimue diakanukuata ne bakelenge benu
Kanukengeshi bakashi ba mu lufuila anyi bana ba nshiya
Bakaya ne Yosefe mu Ejipitu
Witabushe bua meme nsabuke, utangile buloba buimpe budi dishiya dia Yadene, mukuna au muimpe, ne Lebanona

Mose wakatendekena Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, wakamba ne, Yehowa, bualu kai tshiji tshiebe tshidi tshitambe bukole kudi bantu bebe bawakaluhula mu buloba bu Ejipitu ne bukole bunene ne tshianza tshia bukole
Bakelenge Bukokeshi bua Yoshiya Kul
Hakamba diba kubuela, tulu tukole tuakakuata Abalama monai, buowa bua midima buakamukuata

Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila bilwilu Kanungu ka Mu bilwilu mudi bilwilu bia pabuloba,bilwilu bia mu lupepela, bilwilu bia mu mâyi ne midimu yabi mibikwatshishi; bidi ne mudimu wa kusungidila bujima bwa tshipaapu tshia ditunga ne mikalu yadi
Bana ba Mushi: Mali ne Edê ne Yelemota, basatu
Hakaha Nzambi wa mu diulu bisamba buhianyi buabi, hakatahululeye bantu, wakadika mikalu ya bantu bu mudi bungi bua bana ba Isalele
Yonatana udi mushihibue ha mutu ha mikuna yenu
Bintu bionso bidi muntu udi kayi muakane ulenga bianza nebikale bu bintu bidi kabiyi biakane, ne muntu udi ubilenga tshianza neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo

Ka nudiangatshidi tshintu tshimue tshia mulau tshia musoko au mu tshianza tshienu; nunku Yehowa nealekele tshiji tshiandi tshikole, neanuleshe luse, neanusankishe, neanukumbashe bu muakalayeye batatu benu; hanunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi yonso inakunuambila lelu ne bua kuenza malu adi makane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yeye wakamuambula, wakaya mu musoko, mamuen andi wakatangila biakahumbululeye yeye wakahatula, wakamuha biaka shiyeye hakukuteye
Yeye udi ummuenekela pandi mmukukuila
Muntu webe udi mumanye mua kulabula bintu bidiye udia ne bidiye unua, anyi
Nunku tuakashikama mu tshibanda tshitangilangane ne Bete peô
Muana wa masandi kabuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa; ne tunkanuniuna tuandi kaubuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa tô ne hahita bikondo dikumi

Kadi Yehowa wakadimusha Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda mukana mua muprofete yonso ne mua mumonyi yonso ne, Kudimunai mitshima yenu ku malu mabi enu; nutumikile mikenji yanyi ne mikandu yanyi bu mudi mikenji makelela bankambua benu mukana mua bantu banyi baprofete
Muprofete wakamuambila ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua wewe wakalekela mu bianza biebe muntu unakasua kushiha, nunku nebalombe muoyo webe ku muoyo wandi ne bantu bebe ku bantu bandi
Nunku kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Nunku nakenzela mushete wa mitshi ya acacia, nakasonga mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi, nakabanda ku mukuna ne mabue abidi mu tshianza tshianyi
Muntu yonsu kusangana mu tshibombi tshiende makuta ende
Tuakulua kabidi ne argent mikuabo bua kusumba bia kudia, katuena bamanye muntu wakahingasha argent ei mu bibombi bietu
Dibaya dionsu divua ne bitaku bibidi
Mona, lelu mesu ebe adi amona bu mutu Yehowa mukufile mu tshianza tshianyi mu lubuebue; bakuabo bakungambila ne, Umushihe
Abimanshe muaba udibu bimansha butu luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua tshilambuilu
Muana wa balume wa Shamai wakadi Maona; Maona wakadi tatu wa Bete sû
Tatu wandi wakamudila

Mu dituku dia muanda mutekete bana balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete, ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai bu mudi mukenji wamba; ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Esawu mumane kuya mu tshisuku bua kukebela tatuende nyama, Rebeka kuambila muanende Yakobe ne: Ngumvu tatuebe wambila Esawu ne: Uye mu dikeba, unshipele nyama
Hanuasombesha mukuenu tshintu, kanuyi mu nsubu wandi bua kudiangatshila tshieya tshiandi
Bikala mulambu wandi wa kuosha wa muana wa ngombe, neafile mulume udi kayi ne tshilema, neamushihele ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, ne Yehowa neamuitabushe

Bulelela, bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ne muoyo, yeye nguakunkanda bua meme tshikuenzedi bibi, bu wewe kuyi mulue kundi lubilu lelu, bulelela, Nabala kakadi kushala ne tshintu, nansha muana mulume umue tô ne hatshiabu
Kukuata lukole Dibue didi muntu upela nadi biakudia, nansha mpelu wa dibue adi, kanuena mua kubikuata lukole to

Nanku, bakalenga ba bena Sodome ne ba bena Ngomore, ba bena Adma, ba bena Seboyime ne ba bena Bela badibu babikila kabidi ne bena Soware , kudilongolola bua kuluangana mvita mu tshibandabanda tshia Sidime
Diulu nedikale bu tshiamu tshia mitaku ku mutu kuenu, ne buloba nebuikale bu tshiamu mu makasa enu
Bantu bakambila Shaula ne, Yonatana, nguakadi Usungila Bena Isalele ne luhandu elu lunene, neafue biandi, anyi
Nudi mua kulombela bantu ba bende bintu ebi; kadi bintu bionso bidi muan enu mulume n abi, nuenu nenubilekele
Wewe Moshe, ukumbaje malu onsu andi mukuambile lelu aa
Kanuenji bilele bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu bunuakadi bashikame, kanuenji bilele bia mu buloba bua Kanâna bundualua kunuha, kanulondi mikenji yabo
Kadi muanjelo wa Yehowa kakamueneka kudi Manoa anyi kudi mukashi wandi kabidi

Nudimuke bienu, kanuhu muoyo bua tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiakahungeye n enu: kanudisongidi luhingu anyi tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu tshimue tshiakanuhidisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi bu kahia kadi kashidisha bionso, udi Nzambi wa mukau
Bishale bua bakaji bakamba, bana ba nshiya, ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu
Miendu ayi, ikale itema butuku ne munya muaba undi meme Maweja Nangila
Yeye wakumusha nzambi ya bende ne luhingu luakatekeye mu nsubu wa Yehowa, ne bioshelu biakaseye ku mukuna kuakadi nsubu wa Yehowa ne mu Yelushalema, wakabimasha ku mpenge kua musoko
Muntu yonso udi kayi ujadika mei a mikenji ei bua kuyenza udi ne mulau
Mose wakambila Yoshua ne, Utusunguile bantu baye kuluangana ne Bena Amaleka

Kadi bikala Yehowa wenza bualu buhia buhia, ne buloba bubulula mukana muabu bubamina ne bantu bonso hadibo n abo, ne bobo baya ku Muaba wa Bafue hatshidibo ne muoyo, nunku nenumanye ne bantu aba bakalengulula Yehowa
Miriyame kuambila bena Izrayele ne: Imbilayi Maweja Nangila musambu: mmuleje bukole budiye nabu, mmubutule tubalu ne bavua babandapu
Moshe kubambila ne: Panudi nukumbaja bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila munuambile bua kuenza, yeye neadileje kunudi ne butumbi buende
Bena Peleshete bakaluangana nvita ne Bena Isalele; Bena Isalele bakanyema ku mpala kua Bena Peleshete, bakadishinda hanshi bafue ku mukuna wa Gileboa
Yeye wakashala ne Yehowa minya makumi anai ne mafuku makumi anai; wakajila bia kudia ne mai a kunua

Kadi Yehowa wakambila Davidi tatu wanyi ne, Wewe wakenza bimpe hawakela meji mu mutshima webe bua kuashila dina dianyi nsubu; kadi wewe kuena mua kungashila nsubu; kadi muana webe mulume udi uluhuka munda muebe, yeye neashale dina dianyi nsubu

Dutelonone Bintu Bifila kudi Bena Lewi Bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi, ne tshisamba tshionso tshia Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele; bobo nebadie munyinyi wa milambu ya Yehowa idibo bosha ha kahia bu buhianyi bua Yehowa
Nulame mukenji ewu kashidi

Mituutu ne mputa Pikala bantu babidi batandangane, umue utuuta mukuabu bikole ne bisusu, nansha mumuase dibue, pikala uvuabu batuuta mushale mu bulalu usama, kayi mufue, nansha mushale utebuka ne mutshi, wendakana pambelu, mututshianganyi awu neafute amu tshibawu, bua matuku avua mubedi mushale mu bulalu ne bua kumondapisha too ne pumvuaye bimpe

Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Bisamba bibidi bidi munda muebe, bisamba bibidi bia bantu nebiluhuke munda muebe tshisamba tshimue netshitambe tshisamba tshikuabo bukole, ne mukulu neakuatshile muakuny andi mudimu
Pashishe neajikije mikiya ya mukaji awu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, bua kumukobolola ku mikiya ya tshijila tshiende tshia bakaji
Hakatshidiye wakula nunku, Yonatana, muana wa Ebeyatâ muakuidi, wakafika kudibo; Adoniya wakamuambila ne, Buela biebe, bualu bua wewe udi muena kalolo, udi ulua ne lumu luimpe
Bena mudimu bebe ne banyi kabena mua kutandangana to, bualu tudi bantu bamue
Hashishe Labashake wakimana, wakela dî diandi bikole nu muaku wa Bena Yuda, wakamba ne; Unvuai dî dia mukelenge munene wa Bena Ashû
Nanku ubape buloba bua bupianyi mushindu umue ne bana babu ne tatuabu ba balume
Bana ba balume ba Shekaniya: Shemaya
Kampande awu kumuandamuna ne: Udi musue kumanya dina dianyi bua tshinyi

Bia momumwe Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa tshidi mwa kufila bukookeshi, biumukila ku dîyi, kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa bwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa
Bakaya ku luendu luabo, ditshina dia Nzambi diakadi ku misoko yakadi ha buihi n abo, ne bena musoko kabakalonda bana ba balume ba Yakoba

Utumikile mei a Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua kuenda mu nshila yandi, ne bua kulamata mikenji yandi ne mei andi onso ne mikandu yandi ne mianda yandi yonso bu mudibi bifunda mu mikanda ya Mose, bua wewe wikale ne diakalengele mu malu onso audi wenza, ne mu nshila yonso ludi wenda; bua Yehowa kujadikeye di diandi diakangambileye ne, Bikala bana bebe badimuke mu nshila yabo, benda ku mpala kuanyi mu bulelela ne mitshima yabo yonso ne mioyo yabo yonso, hashishe, wewe kuena uhanga muntu wa kushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Isalele tshiendelele
Ku luseke luandi lukuabo bakalongolola kudi Shaluma, muana wa Halohesha, mukokeshi wa tshituha tshia luseke lua Yelushalema, yeye ne bana bandi ba bakashi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Olola tshianza pa mayi manene, bua mayi apingane, abutule bena Ejipitu ne tshiluilu tshiabu
Kadi bintu bikuabo bidi ne mahuahua ne bidi ne mikolo mai bidi bibi kunudi

Mu tshidimu tshia kumudilu tshia Kolesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa, bua kushikishabo dî dia Yehowa diakambeye mukana mua Yelemiya, Yehowa wakatabulusha mutshima wa Kolesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa; nunku yeye wakela mukenji ku nseke yonso ya bukelenge buandi, wakaufunda kabidi ne, Kolesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa, udi Wamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mu diulu, wakumpa makelenge onso a ha buloba; nyeye wakungelela mukenji bua meme kumuashila nsubu mu Yelushalema, udi mu buloba bua Yuda
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; wakalonda mu nshila wa malu mabi a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele; yeye kakasesukaku nansha
Katuena tunua mayi a mu ditunga dienu to
Kanungu ka Mbênza tshisangilu tshia ba Nguvenêla ba polovensa
Mubidi wa Miriyame kawena mua kunyanguka, ufiondoka makoba bu wa muana mufuile munda
Yeye wakatula milemu bu mudibo hatula nshinga wa mitshi ya diamba, hautuabo kahia
Kena mumone muntu mukuabu to
Rubene kuambila tatuende ne: Mpesha Binyamine

Bana ba balume ba Elepâla: Ebê ne Mishama ne Shemede, wakasa Ono ne Lodo ne misoko yakadi ha buihi; Belia ne Shema, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo ba Bena Ayalona, bakihata Bena Gata mu nvita; ne Ahio ne Shashaka ne Yelemota ne Zebadaya ne Alada ne Edê ne Mikaele ne Yisepa ne Yoha, bana ba balume ba Belia; Zebadaya ne Meshulama ne Hiziki ne Hebê ne Yishemelai ne Yizela ne Yobaba, bana ba balume ba Elepâla; ne Yakima ne Zikeli ne Zabedi ne Elienai ne Ziletai ne Ebele ne Adaya ne Belaya ne Shimelata, bana ba balume ba Shimei; Yishe pana ne Ebê ne Ebele ne Abidona ne Zikeli ne Hanana ne Hananya ne Elama ne Anetotiya ne Yifedeya ne Penuele, bana ba balume ba Shashaka; ne Shameshelai ne Shemaya ne Atalaya ne Yalesheya ne Eliya ne Zikeli, bana ba balume ba Yelohama
Bualu ebu kabuena bunusankisha
Bumuka ku Obote, kufika ku Iye Abarime, mu tshipela tshivua luseke luvua diba dipatukila lua Mowabe
Kanuena mua kumpitshishila diba to

Yeye wakangata tupitene tua bantu lukama ne bantu banene bonso ne bakokeshi ba bantu ba mu buloba, bakafuma ne mukelenge mu nsubu wa Yehowa; bakabuela ku tshibi tshia ku mutu mu nsubu wa mukelenge, bakashikika mukelenge mu nkuasa wa bukelenge
Mukuna awu batshidi baubikila too ne mpindiewu ne: Pa mukuna ewu Maweja Nangila neatupeshe
Nubiele mu bibombi bienu bua kutuadila muena Ejipitu awu
Pashishe Arone ne Ure kumukuata ku maboku, ewu eku, mukuabu eku, babandishe maboku too ne ku dilolu

Mikenji Idi Ikandika Masandi Biabaka mulume mukashi, adi ulala n andi ne udi umukina, udi wambila bakuabo mei a bundu, udi wona lumu luandi, udi wamba ne, Nakabaka mukashi eu ne hanakasangila n andi bulalu, tshiakasangana bimanyinu bu mukashi utshidi kamama; hashishe tatu wa mushikankunde eu ne mamu wandi nebaluhuke ne bimanyinu biandi bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama kudi bakulu ba mu musoko ne ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko
Nunku nuenu kanuakantuma kunoko, kadi Nzambi wakantuma; nyeye wakanvuisha bu tatu wa Palô ne mukelenge wa nsubu wandi wonso, ne mukokeshi wa buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Nunku bakasangisha ku bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba, bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba, bena nvita binunu dikumi ne bibidi
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha muana wa ngombe wa mulambu wandi, neamushihe ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebamiamme mashi ku tshioshelu
Kadi Davidi wakahanduka ku mesu kuandi misangu ibidi
Bakuidi bonso badi balue hehi ne Yehowa badijidile, bua Yehowa kabashihi
Nunku bintu bionsu ebi nebishale bia mutuangaji uvua mumiamine mashi ku tshilambuilu
Hakaluangana Bena Amona ne Bena Isalele nunku, bakulu ba mu Gilada bakaya kuangata Yefeta ku buloba kua Tobo; bakambila Yefeta ne, Lua biebe, wikale kapitene ketu bua tuluangane nvita ne Bena Amona
Binuenda mu nshila mdi muhidie, kanuyi nunvua mei anyi, meme nendiundishe makenga enu mahite mibi yenu misangu muanda mutekete
Kadi bena Avi, bavua basombe mu misoku ya mu ditunga dia Ngaza, bavua bababutula kudi baluishi bafumine ku Kaftore
Mulongu muibidi uvua ne dibue dia grenate, dia safire ne dia mbongu
Lulelu lua Leya kukoseka
Muan a Ngombe wa Or Dut
Bakamuambila ne, Uye biebe; bualu bua Nzambi neafile musoko mu bianza bia mukelenge
Kuimanaye pankatshi pa bantu bavua bamane kufua, ne batshivua ne muoyi
Nebadie munyinyi mu nsubu umue, kanuhatuki ne munyinyi ku nsubu, kanutshibudi nansha mufuba umue
Nuvuluke bu muakenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Miyama mu nshila hanuakalubuka mu Ejipitu
Enza bintu bu nsengu ya ngombe ku matumba anai, enza nsengu ne dibaya dimue, lamika tshiamu tshia mitaku ku nseke yonso

Dielulula DIYUKI DIA KUMPALA DIA MOSHE Mukanda ewu udi utuambila malu avua Moshe muyukile ne bena Izrayele bonsu, patshivuabu luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, mu tshipela tshidi pabuipi ne Sufe
Bualu ebu kabuena bufunda mu mulunda wa Yashâ, anyi
Salai wakadi nkumba, kakadi ne muana nansha
Bualu bua Môdekai wakadi muntu munene mu nsubu wa mukelenge, ne lumu luandi luakafika ku nseke yonso; bualu bua muntu eu Môdekai wakadiundadiunda mu butumbi buandi
Kadi mesu enu akatangila malu manene onso akenza Yehowa
Leya kuamba ne: Ndi ne dikasa dimpe be
Davidi wakambila Akisha ne, Wewe neumanye bu mudi muntu webe musue kuenza
Numanye bienu lelu, nubueshe bualu ebu mu mitshima yenu ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi wa mu diulu ne hanshi ha buloba kabidi: kakuena mukuabo
Tuvua tusuika bisumbu bia bikunyibua bivua ne ntete ya kuenza bukula
Eliya wakangata muana, wakatuluka n andi mu muaba wandi, wakabuela n andi mu nsubu, wakaya n andi kudi mamu wandi; Eliya wakamuambila ne, Tangila, muana webe udi ne muoyo
Ke kuoshaye mafuta awu pa tshilambuilu
Kavua mulele muana wa balume to
Bana ba Yosefe, Manashe ne Efelayima, bakangata buhianyi buabo
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, Yehowa neatume matembue munkatshi muabo, bantu badi bashala nebasokome, tô ne hafuabo ku mpala kuenu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Ya, uhane manyi au, umane dibanza diebe, ne wewe ne bana bebe balume nuikale ne muoyo ku bidi bishale
Bena disangisha bonso bakatumina Bena Benyamina bakadi ku dibue dia Limona dî dia kubadisha n adi ditalala
Ku luseke lumue lua tshipela etshi kuvua tshimenga tshia Parane, ku luseke lukuabu kuvua bimenga ebi: Tofele, Labane, Asherote ne Di Zahabe
Mu matuku avuavua, mutuangaji udibu balaba mafuta, bamujidila bua kupingana tatuende ku mudimu wa mutuangaji munene, ke udi mua kunukobolola, kujikija mikiya yenu
Nsongalume wakadiku wa mu Beteleheme yuda, wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, wakadi Muena Lewi; wakasombaku
Ke bikulu ba Esawu bavuabu balele kudi Elifaze, muana wa mukajende Ada
Nupeshe mutuangaji Arone ne ndelanganyi yende bintu abi, bualu ke bintu binudi ne bua kubapesha matuku onsu too ne kashidi
Mukalu ewu neutungunuke too ne ku Ribla, luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua Ayine

Bualu bua Môdekai, Muena Yuda, wakadi muntu muibidi ku nyima kua mukelenge Ahashawelosha, ne wakadi munene munkatshi mua Bena Yuda, wakadi muitabushibue kudi tshisumbu tshia bana babo, mukebe diakalengele dia bana babo, muambile bana babo mei a ditalala
Amu Yozefe uvua mumane kudianjila mu Ejipitu
Bantu bonso ba ha buloba nebamanye ne, Nuenu nudi nubikidibua ku dina dia Yehowa; bobo nebanutshine
Kadi meme nganyi ne bantu banyi mbanganyi, bua tuetu tuakadifidila bintu bietu nunku
Malenda ku bilamba Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu, nutele malenda ku mielelu ya bilamba bienu ne buanda bufikuluke
Delila wakambila Shimishona ne, Diambedi wewe wakunseka, wakungambila anu mashimi, ungambile mudibo mua kukusuika

Bualu bukuabo, Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bua bualu buenu, wakaditshiha ne, Wewe kuena mua kusabuka Yadene ne kubuela mu buloba abu buimpe budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bu buhianyi buenu; kadi bûdi n abu mbua kufuila mu buloba ebu, kuena mua kusabuka Yadene; kadi nuenu nenusabuke, nenuhiane buloba abu buimpe
Ke bavua balambula musenga wa kamonya

Bikala muntu ne muana mulume udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, katu watumikila dî dia tatu wandi anyi dia mamu wandi, ne yeye katu wabahvuila biamukengeshaho, hashishe tatu wandi ne mamu wandi nebamukuate, nebaluhuke n andi kudi bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne ku tshibi tshia musoko; nebambile bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne, Muana wetu eu udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, kena utumikila mei etu; udi muena lumpukusu ne mukuatshiki wa maluvu
Nuenu benze nanku, biakudia bienu nebivulangane

Kanuenzedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku bualu bua bobo badi benzela nzambi yabo malu onso mabi adi atonda Yehowa; bualu bua bobo badi boshila nzambi yabo bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi mene mene ha kahia
Hashishe bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele biakalua kudi Davidi mu Hebelone, bakamuambila ne, Mona, ludi mifuba ya mifuba yebe ne misunyi ya mu misunyi yebe
Nsongakaji kupongolola lukasa mayi avua mashale mu mulondu mu luuvu

Nanku mu ditunga dia Mowabe, luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, Moshe kutuadija kulongesha bena Izrayele mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu, ubambila ne: Mvidi Mukulu udi umusha bena Izrayele ku mukuna wa Sinayi Patuvua ku mukuna wa Sinayi

Bena Isalele bakakonka Yehowa bualu bua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa wakadiku mu matuku au, ne Pinehasa, muana wa Eleazâ, muana wa Alona, wakadi muimane ku mpala kua mushete mu matuku au , bamba ne, Netuye bua kuluangana ne bana betu Bena Benyamina kabidi, anyi nealekele
Nuoshe makunji a tshijila
Tshiena muhunge n enu nuenu nkayenu tshihungidi etshi ne kuditshiha eku, kadi ne muntu yonso udi muimane ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, lelu, ne muntu yonso udi kayi muimane n etu lelu
Hashishe muan a bute udi mukashi eu ulela nebamuidike dina dia muan abo wakafua; bua dina diandi kadijiminyi mu Isalele

Hashishe bakadisangisha kundi, muntu ne muntu, bakadi bazakala bua mei a Nzambi wa Isalele bualu bua bubi bua bantu aba bakumuka mu buhika; nakashikama hanshi ntua mikemu tô ne ku diba dia kufila mulambu wa ku dilolo
Maweja Nangila kuenza bishima bishilangane bivua bikuatshisha bantu bowa
Yeye wakamba ne, Uhe bantu aba, badie
Bakadiku mu matuku a Yoyakima, muana wa Yeshua, muana wa Yozadaka, ne mu matuku a Nehemiya gouver neur, ne a Ezela muakuidi ne mufundi
Nunku Mukelenge Yehowa, wewe udi Nzambi, ne mei ebe adi a bushuwa, wewe wakalaya muntu webe bualu ebu buimpe
Nenuikale bu dikema ne bu lusumuinu ne bu bihendu kudi bisamba bionso bidi Yehowa mulela munkatshi muabi
Ismayele mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete, kulondaye bankambua bende mu lufu

Bena Benyamina bakaluhuka bua kuluangana ne bantu, bakumuka ku musoko basemena kule; bakabanga kubashiha bu muakenzabo misangu mikuabo mu nshila minene, nshila umue udi ufuma ku Betele ne nshila mukuabo udi ufuma ku Gibea, ne mu tshisuku kabidi; bakashiha Bena Isalele bu makumi asatu
Agare kuimita difu
Bakamuha argent makumi muanda mutekete ya mu nsubu wa Bâla belita; ne Abimeleke wakafuta n ai bantu bahote ne ba hatuhu bakamulonda
Nzambi Wakenza nunku butuku abu; bualu bua miosa yakadi miume nkayai, ne mume wakadi ha buloba buonso

Mose wakamba ne, Netuye ne bana bakese ne bantu banunu, ne bana betu ba balume ne bana betu ba bakashi, netuye ne mikoko yetu ne ngombe yetu, bualu bua tudi ne bualu bua kudia bidia ku mesu kua Yehowa
Nenunyane, nupeta mubidi luya ne biuja
Helabo mpungi umue, bakelenge ne bantu ba ku mutu kua binunu bia Bena Isalele nebadisangishe kûdi
Hakalua tshikondo tshidi bimuna bimita mafu, nakabandisha mesu anyi mu tshiota, nakatangila ne mbushi ya bimpanga yakadi ne matoba yakaya kudi mashina a mbushi akadi ne mihola mihola ne matoba matoba
Nuenu nenuikale bu bantu bajidila kundi kanudi munyinyi wakahandabo kudi nyama ya mu mpata, nuwele kudi mbua
Bakulu bonso ne bantu bonso bakamuambila ne, Kunvu dî diandi nansha, kuitabushi nansha
Buloba kupuka, kubajibikila ne meku abu, ne ntenta yabu, ne bantu bonsu bavua baditue ku tshiabu, bena Izrayele bonsu batangile
Nebanutshine
Kanungu ka Bintu bia muntu nkayende bidi bia kuneemekibwa bikole
Bakelenge ba Edome bakukema, balume bakole ba Moaba badi bazakala, bantu bonso ba mu buloba bua Kanana bakujimina

Nehemiya Bena Lukuna Badi Bahetela Bifufu Hakambilabo Sanebalata ne Tobiya ne Gesheme, Muena Alabâ, ne bena lukuna betu bakuabo ne, Yeye wakumana lumbu, ne kakuena muaba mushimbuke mushaleku kadi ku tshikondo atshi tshiakanza kuela bibi bionso ku lumbu , Sanebalata ne Gesheme bakantumina dî ne, Lua, tusangakene n ebe mu umue wa misoko ya mu mpata wa Ono
Oholibama, mukaji mukuabu wa Esawu, uvua muana wa Ana
Davidi wakadi mushikame mu tshihela tshia Zifa mu ditu
Kana wakambila Ebele muakuny andi bualu ebu Hashishe hakadibo mu budimi, Kana wakabika ku mpala kua Ebele muakuny andi, wakamushiha
Kuangataye ku bukole bumuanabute buanyi
Mpasu ayi neyikile panshi, ipafikishe fitutuu
Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu ke kadi kamanyisha dibumbusha adio
Yeye wakadi umuambila ne, Muntu webe udi wa mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele
Tangilai, nakateka disanka ne mulau ku mpala kuenu lelu
Nuenu nenuhingane, nenutumikile dî dia Yehowa, nenuenze mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu
Nunku Davidi wakaha Ônana nshekele ya or nkama isambombo bua muaba wandi
Kumpala kua tshifulu, kuvua kulamika tshitata tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi, tshifuane tshilongu, bilondeshile mikenji ya Maweja Nangila

Nuenu nenudie bana banuakalela, munyinyi wa bana benu balume ne wa bana benu bakashi bakamuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bualu bua kanyinganyinga kadi kanukuata bua ditshintshimika dia misoko yenu ne bua makenga adi bena lukuna benu banukengesha n au
Isaka wakambila Abalahama, tatu andi ne, Tatu wanyi, yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku, muan anyi Isaka wakamba ne, Tangila kalua ne nkunyi bidiku, kadi muana wa mukoko wa kuosha ha kalua weba
Nenuikale ne milau mu kukumbasha kua bana ne mu bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba ne mu kukumbasha kua bimuna ne kua mikoko
Bena Levi bonsu kusemena kudi Moshe
Yeye neikale kûdi bu musangalashi wa muoyo ne bu mudishi wa mu bununu buebe, bualu bua mamuen ebe, udi mukusue, udi muhite bana ba balume muanda mutekete buimpe kûdi, nguakamulela
Kadi Sihona kakitabusha bua Bena Isalele bahitshile mu buloba buandi; kadi Sihona wakasangisha bantu bandi bonso, bakatula tshitudilu tshiabo mu Yahasa, bakaluangana ne Bena Isalele
Buloba ebu buonsu nenkupeshabu kashidi ne ndelanganyi yebe
Yishai wakatatshisha Shama ku mpala kuandi

Wakenza tshioshelu tshia musonga wa manananshi ne mabaya a acacia, buludi bua tshi buakadi coudée umue, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudée umue, bakidikisha nseke yonso ne luidi lumue, bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées ibidi, wakenza nsengu yatshi ne tshituha tshijima
Neatue munu mu mashi awu, aamiamine ku tshilambuilu atshi misangu muanda mutekete, bua kujikija mikiya ivuaku, bua bubi bua bena Izrayele ne bua kutshijidila tshiakabidi
Kadi mitshi mudi bamanye ne kayena ne tumuma, nudi mua kuyikosa; nuase n ai bibumba bia nvita ku butshika bua musoko wa badi banuluisha to ne hanuabahita bukole
Hashishe bakabika, bakadisangisha
Buonso buabo ne banene ne bakese bakela nshobo bu muakadi nsubu ya batatu abo, ku tshibi ne ku tshibi

Mu tshihungu tshia bantu tshidi tshitua, bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima ne benyi badi bafuma ku buloba bukuabo, hatangilabo makenga akalua ku buloba abu ne masama onso adi Yehowa mubatumine ne buloba buonso budi bu butue ne luehu ne bintu bioshibue, kabena bakunamu tshintu, kabena bahuolamu tshintu; ne mashinde kaena amenamu: buloba budi buikala bu kubutuka kua misoko ya Sodoma ne Amola ne Adema ne Seboima yakashiha Yehowa mu tshiji tshiandi tshikole; bantu aba bonso nebambe ne, Bualu kai Yehowa wakuenzela buloba ebu nunku
Muntu awu mumane kukungula nsuki, mutuangaji neamupeshe diboku dia mukoku wa tshimpanga dimane kulamba, kabidi ne mukata mulamba kabayi bela buanga wa mu tshisaka, kabidi ne kampa
Tshivua mumanye ne: wewe ke uvua muimane mu njila kumpala kuanyi
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke milau ei yonso ham bidi ha bena lukuna ne badi n enu tshiji, bakadi banukengesha

Bana balume ba Alona bakamulesha mashi, yeye wakatua munu wandi mu mashi, wakâlaba ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu, wakalongolola mashi ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu, kadi yeye wakosha dianyi ne tumuma ne lukutu lua mutshima bia mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ha tshioshelu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, Yehowa neatume matembue munkatshi muabo, bantu badi bashala nebasokome, tô ne hafuabo ku mpala kuenu
Dutelonone Mose Udi Uvudishila Bisamba bia Bena Isalele Masanka Â mmasanka akavudishila Mose, muntu wa Nzambi, Bena Isalele, diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua

Buloba ebu buakadi buloba bua Bena Lefa: Bena Lefa bakashikamamu diambedi; kadi Bena Amona badi bababikila ne, Bena Zamazuma, bantu bakole, bantu ba bungi, bule bua Bena Anaka; kadi Yehowa wakabashiha ku mpala kuabo, bobo bakabalonda ku nyima, bakashikama mu muaba wabo; bu muakenzeleye bana ba Esau, bakadi bashikama mu Sei, hakashiheye Bena Holi ku mpala kuabo; bobo bakabalonda ku nyima, badi bashikama mu muaba wabo tô ne ku dituku edi
Dilongu dionsu diondoke divua ne bujitu bua grame
DIYUKI DIBIDI DIA MOSHE Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu
Tshiena mumanye mua kuowamu mai, ngikale muakane, anyi
Pikala malu onsu andi mmuambile manuenzekele, nuenu babuele mu dikenga, nenupingane kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, bua kumutumikila

Nunku bungi bua Bena Isalele buakabalabo ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita mu Isalele bungi bua buonso buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu nkama isambombo ne bisatu ne nkama itanu ne makumi atanu
Masungulangana badi baenza kudi bantu bônso, kaayi kansungansunga, muntu yônso weela kakanda pa nkayenda
Mose wakababala bu mu dî dia Yehowa
Yehowa, ubuikile bubi bua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, bawakahikula, kuitabushi bua mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu ashale munkatshi mua bantu bebe Bena Isalele
Wakambila tatu wandi ne mamu wandi ne, Tshiena mumumone; kena mumanye bana babo, kena mumanye bana bandi, bualu bua bobo bakatumikila dî diebe ne tshihungidi tshiebe
Nganyi udi bu wewe Yehowa, munkatshi mua nzambi mikuabo
Nunku Davidi wakavudishila Yehowa disanka ku mpala kua bantu bonso; Davidi wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele tatu wetu, wikale ne disanka tshiendelele
Balumbuluishi Badi Baluisha Bena Benyamina Hashishe Bena Isalele bonso bakaluhuka bafume ku Dana tô ne ku Bê sheba ne ba mu buloba bua Gilada, bakadisangisha bu muntu umue kudi Yehowa ku Misepa
Nunku Davidi wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso hamue ku Shihô, kasulu kakese ka ku luseke lua Ejipitu tô ne ku tshibuelelu tshia Hamata, bua kuangatabo mushete wa Nzambi ku Kîyata yalima
Nakangata mabue au abidi akadi mu bianza bianyi, nakashiha ku mesu kuenu

Uliya wakambila Davidi ne, Mushete wa Yehowa ne Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda bidi mu ntenta; ne mukelenge wanyi Yoaba ne bantu bonso ba mukelenge wanyi badi ne tshitudilu tshiabo mu madimi, nunku bundi n abu mbua kubuela mu nsubu wanyi bua kudia ne bua kunua ne bua kulala ne mukashi wanyi, anyi

Hakatangila Yakoba Lakele, muana wa Labana, muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi, ne mikoko ya Labana muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi, Yakoba wakasemena ha buihi, wakumusha dibue diakadi ku mushiku wa dina, wakanuisha mikoko ya Labana, muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi
Amasa wakadi mubunguluke mu mashi andi munkatshi mua nshila
Yakoba wakatuma di wakabikila Lakele ne Lea mu budimi buakadi bimuna biandi, wakabambila ne, Ndi ntangila ne mpala wa tatu enu kena bu muvueye diambedi kadi Nzambi wa tatu wanyi wakadi n anyi
Kadi pavuaye utshiumusha, tshivua tshitokesha bu busu bua ndanda kudi disama dia nsudi
Mikenji ya Mankenda Hanuaya kuluangana ne badi n enu lukuna, hashishe nudikande mu malu mabi onso
Yeye neafile bakelenge babo mu bianza bienu, nuenu nenjimishe mena abo hanshi ha buloba; kakuena muntu umue udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuenu tô ne hanuabashiha bonso
Tshisamba tshinene netshipete muaba munene, tshikese muaba mukese
Bu mudibio nanku, pa kulonda bimanyinu bia tshikondo tshieetu, Dîyi dikulu dia lelu edi didi dipatula mwanda mupiamupia pa kuleeja dikala dia momumwe dia mulume ne mukaji
Katataka, Yehowa Nzambi, witabushe bua mulayi webe kudi Davidi tatu wanyi ujadikibue; bualu bua wewe wakumpingisha mu bukelenge ku mutu kua bantu badi bungi bua dinfuenkenya dia buloba
Ndi nnona muele wanyi wa mvita, ndi ndumbuluisha bantu, mbanyoka
Neumushe dianyi dionso, neadioshe ha tshioshelu
Nendiundishe mashinde mu madimi enu bua nuenu kudisha bimuna bienu; nenudie, nenukute
Wa kabifila mu bianza bia bahika bandi, tshisumbu ha buatshi tshisumbu ha buatshi, wakabambila ne Sabukai ku mpala kuanyi, nushilangane muaba hankatshi ha tshisumbu ne tshisumbu
Mukelenge Lehabama wakasangisha dî ne bantu banunu bakadi bimane ku mpala kua tatu wandi Solomo hakadiye ne muoyo ne, Nuenu nudi nungambile lungenyi kai lua kukudimuna n alu bantu aba
Kanumufikishi munda, kanumutombokedi
Bakalua ne bantu bakakuatabo ne bintu biabo bionso kudi Mose ne kudi Eleazâ muakuidi ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, ku tshitudilu tshiakadi mu mpata ya Moaba, hehi ne Yadene ku Yeleko
Neupete biakudia, amu wewe muluangana mvita, newikale mupika wa muakunyebe Yakobe
Katataka, Yehowa, tuakulua ne bintu biakaboba diambedi mu buloba buwakutuha
Biwasua kusangisha bantu hohamue, wewe newele mpungi, kadi kuedi bikole nansha
Samuele wakalumbulula Bena Isalele matuku onso a muoyo wandi
Kulondabu njila wa mu tshipela bua kuya luseke ludi Mayi manene makunze
Dikombo dia bukelenge kadiena diumuka kudi Yuda, tshibangu tshia bukokeshi katshiena tshiumuka hankatshi ha makasa andi to ne halua Shilo, ne bantu bonso nebakukukuile
Yuda wakatuma muana wa mbushi mu tshianza tshia mulunda wandi, Muena Adulama, bua kuangateye tshieya tshia keyekeye mu tshianza tshia mukashi, kadi yeye kakamusangana
Muntu wa kutudi nansha umue kena mua kukupala lukita luende bua ujike muena kuebe to
Yeye wakamuha mishimi ya mai yakadi ku mutu ne yakadi kuinshi
Yosefe wakamona bana ba Efelayima to ne ku bikondo bisatu, bakalela bana ba Mala, muana wa Manashe, ha binu bia Yosefe kabidi
Tuetu tuakadi tuiba argent anyi or mu nsubu wa mukelenge webe munyi
Kakunyua Shaula ne Bena Isalele bonso mei a Muena Peleshete, bakakema, bakatamba kutshina
Tshianana nudi mua kufua kabidi bua mibi yabu yonsu
Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele mikenji eyi
Tatu andi muenu, tatu wa mukashi mene, wakamuhumbisha ne yeye wakalalaku matuku asatu; bakadia, bakanua, bakalalaku

Bena Izrayele kuleja Moshe bintu bionsu bivuabu benza bua nzubu wa tshijila: ntenta wa kusambakena ne bintu bionsu bivuaku: nkanu, mabaya, mitshi, makunji ne bitaku biawu; bilamba bia kubuikila pa mutu pa ntenta bia biseba bia mikoku ya bimpanga bilaba kakula, bia biseba bia nyama wa nkonga wa mu mayi, kabidi ne tshilamba tshia kulembeleja pankatshi pa muaba wa tshijila ne muaba wa tshijila menemene; mushete wa ndondu udi ne mabue a mikenji, pamue ne mitshi yawu, ne tshibuikidiji tshiawu; mesa a tshijila ne bintu bionsu bivuaku, too ne mampa malambula Mvidi Mukulu; tshitekelu tshia miendu tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi menemene, miendu yonsu, ne bintu bikuabu bivuaku, too ne mafuta a kutemesha nawu miendu; tshilambuilu tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi, mafuta a kulaba nawu, manananshi a kuosha; tshilamba tshia mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta; tshilambuilu tshia tshiamu tshikunze, munyingu watshi wa tshiamu tshikunze, mitshi yatshi ne bintu bionsu bivuaku; dilongu dinene dia kuowa mayi, ne tshitaku tshiadi; bilamba bia ku lupangu, makunji abi ne bitaku biawu, kabidi ne tshilamba tshia mu mushiku wa mbelu wa lupangu, mionji ne milonda ya bitupa yatshi; bintu bionsu bivuabu ne bua kuenza nabi mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, kabidi ne mu nzubu wa tshijila; bilamba bia lumu bia kuvuala diba dia mudimu wa mu muaba wa tshijila; bilamba bia tshijila bivua Arone ne bana bende ba balume ne bua kuvuala bua kuenza mudimu wa butuangaji
Kadi wewe musangane muntu ne mpingu ya mvidie yebe, muntu awu neafue
Bua Dana yeye wakamba ne, Dana udi bu muana wa nyama wa ntambue: udi muhika mumuke ku Bashana
Nanku, misangu yonsu nenuikale bena diakalenga, nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu
Ndi nkuambila kabidi ne, Yehowa neakuibakile nsubu
Bena Amaleka badi ku luseke lua ku Sude, Bena Hiti ne Bena Yebuse ne Bena Amole badi ku luseke lua ku mikuna, Bena Kanâna badi hehi ne mai manene ne kukala kua musulu wa Yadene

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata Alona ne bana bandi balume badi n andi ne bilulu ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu ne mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne bimpanga bibidi ne tshisaka tshia mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, ubikile bantu bonso ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Amuteke tshianza pa mutu, amukosele muminu muaba awu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Kabakalonda dibala dia argent kudi bafutshi ba bena mudimu eu, bualu bua bakadi mua kueyemenyibua
Kanubingishi mupela nansha muena biuma, padiye mupile

Yoshua Yoshua Udi Udimusha Bantu Hakahita matuku a bungi, ne hakamana Yehowa kuha Bena Isalele dikisha kudi bena lukuna babo bonso bakadi babanyunguluka, ne hakalua Yoshua muntu mununu ne bidimu biandi biakakumbana, Yoshua wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso ne bakulu babo ne bakadi ku mutu kua bisamba biabo ne balumbuluishi babo ne tuhita tuabo, wakabambila ne, Meme ndi muntu mununu, ne bidimu bianyi biakukumbana: nuenu nuakatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba ebi bionso bua bualu buenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, yeye mene wakanuluila nvita
Rebeka uvua muteleje muvua Izake uyukila ne muanende Esawu amu

Yehowa neahingishe mashi andi ha mutu n andi, bualu bua yeye wakashiha bantu babidi bakadi bamuhita yeye buakane; yeye wakabashiha ne muele wa nvita; tatu wanyi Davidi kakamanya bualu ebu; mena abo akadi Abinê, muana wa Nê, kapitene ka masalayi a Bena Isalele, ne Amasa, muana wa Yetê, kapitene ka masalayi a Bena Yuda
Tunkanuniuna tua Yishemaele Kul
; Dut

Kadi bantu bahele kabena bikala munkatshi muenu; bualu bua Yehowa neanusankishe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi buenu; binunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu

Mukalu wakayila nunku ku wesete ne wa kunyunguluka ku sude ku mukuna udi ku mpala kua Bete holona ku sude; wakahatuka ku Kîyata bâla eu udi Kîyata yalima , musoko wa Bena Yuda: eu mmukalu wa ku wesete
Muena Peleshete wakasemena ha buihi ne Davidi: mutuadi wa ngabu wandi wakaya ku mpala kuandi
Meme mene nakenza bualu ebu bubi; kadi mikoko ei, yoyi yakenza tshinyi

Lebeka wakambila Isaka ne, Bana bakashi ba Bena Hete badi batondesha muoyo wanyi, biabaka Yakoba mukashi wa bana bakashi ba Bena Hete bu bana bakashi badi mu buloba ebu, muoyo wanyi newikale ne mushinga kai kundi

Yonatana wakambila Davidi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ikale bu mumanyi wa bualu: banabuela tatu wanyi munda bua bualu ebu ha diba edi nansha makelela nansha dia ha nyima; mona, biambeye bualu buimpe bua Davidi, tshiena nkutumina dî bua kukumanyisha bualu ebu, anyi
Makunshi a tshibi akadi anai, ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku mai, ne bitubuidi bia argent, bakalengesha makunshi ne tshiamu tshia argent
Kadi kuena mua kungenzela mudimu, kuyi upeta difutu nansha
Hanakabanda ku mukuna bua kuangata mabue akadi ne mei a tshihungidi tshia Yehowa mafundahu, nakashala ku mukuna matuku makumi anai munya ne butuku; tshiakadia bidia, tshiakanua mai
Udi mua kunua mai a mu kasulu aka; nakuelela bikololo mukenji bua kukudishabi kuinaku
Tshiena mua kunubenga to
Kadi balami ba mikoku kufika, kuipata bana ba bakaji abu
Yehowa nealue n enu ne mukelenge unuakateka ku mutu kuenu kudi tshisamba tshinudi kanuyi bamanye, nansha nuenu nansha bankambua benu; nenutendeleleku nzambi mikuabo ya mitshi ne mabue
Hakashikisheye kufila milambu, yeye wakahingasha bambudi ba milambu kuabo
Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Nansha tshintu tshimue netshishale
Dituku adi Yehowa wakabandisha Yoshua ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso; bobo bakamutshina bu muakatshinabo Mose matuku onso a muoyo wandi
Ekesode Badi Basa Tshitendelelu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Halua dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa kumudilu, ushimike ntenta wa kusambakena
Maweja Nangila kubamuenekela mu divuba dia muinshi, divua mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Bua bualu ebu nakanuambila ne, Nuditahuluile misoko isatu
Bana ba Loda ne ba Hadidi ne ba Ono, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi abidi ne batanu

Aba mbana ba Esau bakamulelelabo mu buloba bua Kanana Esau wakangata bakashi bandi ne bana bandi ba balume ne bana bandi ba bakashi ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wandi, ne bimuna biandi, ne nyama yandi yonso, ne bintu bionso biakamueneye mu buloba bua Kanana, wakumuka kudi muakunyi andi Yakoba, wakaya ku buloba bukuabo
Mmumeneshe mitshi ya olive mu buloba bua mabue
Bana ba balume ba Yizelaya: Mikaele ne Obadaya ne Yoele ne Yishiya, batanu; buonso buabo bakadi bakelenge
Nanku, netshinuvuluije munudi ne bua kumanyisha bantu mikenji ya Maweja Nangila, uvua munupatule mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Butshia dinda, Balaame kuambila bantu, bavua Balake mutume, ne: Pinganayi kuenu, Maweja Nangila kena musue bua meme kuya nenu to
